1.content:
It's night. You're out in the middle of nowhere, thanks to a wrong turn you made somewhere on your way back to a vacation to Niarga Falls. To make matters worse, you don't have a good map so you can make it back to a city. And your car has broken down in the middle of a spooky-looking forest. You know how to fix cars, but your car refuses to start at all...and everything is connected, so it should be working, but it's not. You're completely baffled at this. After 30 minutes fiddling with your car and trying to fix it, you hear a noise somewhere in the woods. Luckily, you packed a flashlight in case something like this should happen. You turn on the flashlight and you shine the light out into the woods to see what is making the noise. You see nothing, but this forest is thick with trees. You shrug your shoulders and forget about the noise...it's probably an animal snooping around. You continue to work on your car.
Five mintes passes, and you give up starting up the car again. It looks like you need to walk to a nearby house and call in a tow truck...if you can find a house. You haven't seen a house for hours...in fact, you haven't seen any sign of civilization for about 2 hours now. You sigh and look up the road that you're on. The road that you're on is little more than a dirt road with a thin layer of gravel on it. As you look down the road, you hear a low hooting of an owl off in the woods somewhere. Luckily it's a warm night, or you would really be in trouble. It's a clear night, and a half-moon is high in the sky. You're so far away from any city that you can see the Milky Way in the sky...looks kinda neat. You sigh again and make your decision. You'll have to walk and hopefully find a house that has a phone so you can call for a tow truck. So, you make your way up the road, whistling a tune as you walk.
After you've walked about a mile, you see the forest is thinning a little and you can see a huge Victorian house coming up. The Victorian house is on a little hill that the dirt road goes to. The house looks spooky at night, and you can see several lights in the house...meaning, they might have a phone.
Another half a mile, and you come to a sign nailed to a tree. You shine your flashlight at the sign to see what's written on it.

"This is the house of Cassandra Von Fel Lyaniak. Go back if you value your mortal soul"

The sign is written in red letters that are 12 inches tall and faded. Below the writing is another language that you can't read at all. It looks as if it saids the same thing in the other language, but it's impossible to tell. This sign makes you uneasy at once and you feel as if you don't wanna go to the house. You also feel like you're being watched, but you see nobody around you. What to do?
1.title: The House of Cassandra

Smirking he pinched Izzy's nose and tilted his head up, "Bottoms up!" he laughed, emptying the remaining formula into the short boy's mouth. Izzy squabbled around, but couldn't keep up the struggle as he soon gave in, swallowed the potion, and gasped for fresh air.

"Matt, you really don't have to be so rough with him," Mimi chided after taking a look at Izzy, who looked a little sick and nervous.

"Chill out!" Matt snapped, giving Izzy a slap on the back, somehow curing him of his nausea.

"This is serious," Izzy cried, shaking off his nausea, "I can't only wonder what's going to happen to us now since I have no idea exactly WHAT Mimi put in the formula- poison, toxic waste, who knows!"

"Hey!" Mimi cried, "I only used the stuff you had around here. Shouldn't you know what you carry around, boy genius!"

"Well, I have no idea how YOU mixed them up!" Izzy exclaimed, glaring at Mimi right in the eyes, "Why can't you even remember that? Hey, I even put food coloring in them so you could remember!"

"Hey, how about the two of you SHUT UP?" Matt snapped, kicking the empty beaker off to the side. You hear it shatter into a thousand pieces, "I feel FINE, OKAY?" he yelled.

TK glanced at his older brother. Something was definitely happening. It normally took a lot more to bring his anger to this point. Even Izzy seemed nerved up. Maybe the potion was affecting their temper, you wonder. They're definitely acting more pissed than you remember them being.

"Listen," Izzy cried, "I'm only trying to find out-"

Matt quickly snatched Izzy by the collar, "I said I feel FREAKIN' FINE! And you'd better keep quiet if you want to keep that head of your's on right," he snarled as he threw Izzy back on the ground.

Suddenly a deep rumble sounded from underneath Matt's black tee shirt. Izzy glanced at the blond rockstar wannabe with anticipation: whatever happened was going to happen to him too.

"What the hell?" Matt cried amid the rumbling, "I feel kinda funny. . ."

"Is he gonna blow?" asked TK.

Suddenly, Matt's stomach started to billow outwards and stick out. His firm abs grew more lax and less and less chiseled. It grew bigger and rounder and soon his shirt was beginning to ride up and show the thinnest sliver of pale exposed flesh.

His belly kept on swelling and getting softer, as the pale 'sliver' of exposed belly grew wider and rounder and soon formed a roll of flab draping below the tight waistline of his black pants. His shirt kept on riding up, higher and higher as his belly expanded bigger and bigger. His black tee was tight as it soon held his chest which had developed into a set of boy breasts and even his arms were swelling up like warm bread in an oven.

"Matt's getting fat!" TK cried in horror.

His brother's cheekers were round and cherubic now, both sets of them. His face was decorated with a double chin. His butt was pressuring and threatening his designer pants to tear asunder. Now his shirt made stretching noises in protest and rode up well above his now deep navel. His belly was now an enormous mound of flab that jiggled on down almost to his knees.

Matt had just blimped up from a svelte 118 pounds to an incredibly fat 318.

"Oh," Mimi gasped, "How about I set you up on a diet?"

Matt fumed, "How about I shut your face?!?" mad as ever.

Suddenly, Izzy began to rumble too.

"Uh-oh," went TK.

"This isn't good..." Izzy sighed.
123212.title: Bottoms Up!

1232122.content:
"Quick!" yelled Izzy to Mimi as his belly was beginning to billow outwards like Matt did. Matt stopped getting rounder and fatter and it looked like he now weighed around 380 or 400 pounds. "get me the red, yellow and green potions!"

In her hurry, Mimi knocked over some of the other potions that were in the booth with Izzy. Some of the other potions landed on the ground, showering the ground with glass. A total of two potions gets splashed on you and Izzy. By the time Mimi was out of sight, Izzy looked like he weighed around 240 pounds.

"That idiot Mimi" said Izzy.

"W-w-w-w-what other potions did you have in there?" you ask nervously.

"All kinds" said Izzy. "But I'm not sure what potions got splashed on us"

"Well, this is just perfect" said Matt. "I'm fat, Izzy's fat and the only help we have is the dumbest girl this side of the Pacific"

The two potions that splashed on you is starting to have its effect on you.
1232122.title: Extra potions

choices: Both Izzy and you start to change.
Izzy changes, but his change is different than your's
12321221.content:
You look out and start to see TK get closer and closer to the sky. . . is he getting taller, or are you? . . .

"We're shrinking!" you cry and you see out of everyone else, Izzy seems to be the same size as before. No wonder, he's shrinking too!

The two of you shrink- first you're just above Matt, now you're eye to eye with him. Now eye to shoulder... eye to breast.. eye to belly button? Before you know it, you're staring straight at Matt's knees. Before you know it, that's about all you can reach.

Matt scowls and kicks you away with his foot, "Hey get off my leg," he snaps, "Where the hell is Mimi?"

TK looks down at you and bends down, "Are you two alright?"

"Yeah," Izzy says, scratching his head, "But we're due for another change from the other potion right about..." he starts to rumble, "Now???"
12321221.title: Shrinking, and then what?

123212212.content:
A bright light surrounds Izzy. The bright light vanishes as quickly as it came and you all stare at Izzy now. Izzy is now what appears to be a pixie...complete with fly-like wings and pointed ears! He's still wearing his clothes.

"AHHHHHH! I'm a fairy!" yells Izzy in a high-pitched voice.

"How can...?" TK starts to ask when you feel a rumble coming from your stomach. It's time for you to change as well! However...it doesn't aappear that you'll end up like Izzy. You feel sick all of a sudden and awfully dizzy. You trip and fall to the ground as you start your other change.
123212212.title: Izzy the Pixie!

1232122121.content:
Your skin suddenly erupts into long brown fur, and you feel a skinny pink tail emerging from your rear. Suddenly, you hear everything around you prickle as your ears enlarge and grow round. Even your face enlarges into a snout and you fall on all four legs.

"Hey, you. . . you're a mouse now!" TK exclaimed in shock, "This is getting pretty weird. . ."

"Uh-oh," Matt scowled bitterly, "Here comes trouble," as the fat blond noticed a particular girl named Mimi casually strolling back to the stand. She was carrying all the potions she was supposed to, but was guzzling down a yellow potion.

"Hey boys," she smiled, taking a swallow, "Having fun? I hope I got what you wanted, but I found this cool lemon-"

"We already freakin' established that that's not lemonade!" Matt said, pushing her, making the bottle shatter all over her.

"Not again..." TK sighed as Izzy flittered around nervously, not picking up very far off the ground due to his hefty weight.

Matt growled, "You're so dumb. . . what should we do now, Izzy?"

Izzy shook his head and replied in his high voice, "Mimi drank one of the potions we needed. . . now things are only going to get WORSE!"

Matt cursed as he hit the table and. . .
1232122121.title: Feeling Mousy?

choices: His attitude took a turn for the worst
12321221211.content:
"Damn it!" Matt cursed, glaring at Mimi, "This is ridiculous, can't ANYONE do ANYTHING right around here?" he scowls.

You stand on your hindlegs and look up at him, "Dude, lay off!" you yelp in your tiny, mousy voice.

Matt turns his head down to you. His gut drapes out of his black shirt and seems absolutely enormous from your viewpoint, appearing to be the size of a hill. His paunch blocks your view of the lower half of his face. You only see his eyes narrow spitefully in your direction- but they're different! No longer are they icy blue like they were before... Now Matt's eyes are yellow and catlike with long, slitlike pupils. You recoil in shock, and he chortles, thinking he shot you a nasty glare. Maybe he doesn't know about what's happening to him- certainly he doesn't pick up his attitude change.

"My head sorta itches," Mimi winced, removing her larger than life cowboy hat so she could curiously scratch her caramel-colored locks.

"No doubt it's an effect of the potion you drank," Izzy chirped, flittering around.

"Maybe if we're lucky, that means it will blow off any second now," Matt smirked, crossing his chubby arms.

"Oh, look!" TK exclaimed as something caught his eye. He pointed at Mimi, "She's my size now!"

It was true. Mimi stood eye to eye with Matt's nine year old brother. Suddenly, she screamed, "What's happening?"

"She's shrinking, I think," Izzy sighed, "What are we going to do now?"

"Don't worry, Mimi," TK tried to reassure her as he took her hand- and watched helplessly as she shrunk a whole head shorter.

"Make it stop!" Mimi shrieked as she stood eye to belly button with TK, "Make it stop!"

Matt shook his head, "Maybe you should have thought twice before swigging down that 'lemonade', airhead!"

Now Mimi stood at roughly three inches tall, nervously looking around. You spotted her, and waved a paw, "Uhh... hi there," you smiled.

Mimi started to break into tears, but Izzy could only shrug, "It can't be helped now. I'll just have to find someone to get the potions. I guess I can figure out how to mix them in this state as well."

"Hey!" Matt outbursted, beaming at Izzy, "What's wrong with me?"

POP! A sound like a popcorn kernel busting exploded into the air, making TK yelp and leap into the air.

"What was that?" he asked, recovering from the shock.

Everyone looked around to see what it could be. Figuring your stature, you looked up, ruling out the possibility that anything had happened in your three inch height zone. Immediately, your eyes dart to the largest thing- Matt's collosal gut jiggling in the air above you. It's a pale peach color... for the most part- you see something darker a few inches above his crater like navel. Was it some kind of scab? It wasn't there before...

POP!

"There it is again!" TK stated.

"Okay, we know that!" Matt yells, "It's not like anyone really cares. God, sometimes you're so dumb, TK."

Looking up you spot another scab on Matt's belly. Obviously he didn't know.. or care. What's going on here? Is some kind of rash developing on him? Are those... scales?

You sat down, and as Matt began to change...
12321221211.title: Pissed

choices: Gave him whatever he wanted, crying
123212212112.content:
Matt's stomach started to rumble deeply as a few more scales developed, "Come on, TK, we're leaving!" he snapped, seizing his brother's hand and violently dragging him along. As his feet thundered away from you, you could have sworn his sneakers were at the breaking point... were clawed feet bursting out? Sensing something clearly wrong here, you ran as fast as your rodent feet could scurry. You followed Matt as he headed right into the nearest McDonald's, right across the street.

By time you reach the inside, Matt's already placed his order and is making TK carry a heavy tray stacked full of burgers, fries, sodas and shakes- all supersized. Once he hauled his huge, bulging butt down he ripped the paper off the first burger, and smashed it into his mouth with his fist and almost swallowed it whole. He grabbed another one with his hand, gobbled it down, and continued to go back and forth, alternating on handfuls of fries and guzzling down pop. Then his mouth exploded with an earthshaking belch that revealed his teeth were sharpening into long fangs.

"Uhm... Matt, are you okay?" TK asked cautiously, noting his brother's behavior and the fact that he was starting to turn a greenish color.

Matt took another sip of the milkshake before spitting it out, "You call this a milkshake?" he snapped at the cashier girl, getting up to waddle towards her, the restaurant starting to vibrate, "Come on! Get me another one!"

"Uhm... excuse me, sir?" she squeaked.

"And these fries suck too!" he yelled, throwing them in her face, "Get me MORE, and make them CRISPY this time!"

"But I gave you-"

"God!" Matt cried, "Why are you so STUPID? I mean, I hate pickles, and you put pickles on my burgers! Come on! Hello, can I get another waitress?"

The waitress, not sure what to do...
123212212112.title: Unhappy Customer

choices: Matt eats Pete and the waitress
1232122121122.content:
The waitress runs off, leaving Matt to eat his huge meal. Just what is happening to Matt? Judging by his color and scales, it looks like he's turning into a dragon! TK notices you and picks you up from the floor to save you from being stepped on. "Thanks" you say.
A minute later, the waitress returns with a man following her. The man is none other than Pete from all those Disney cartoons (and video games). A shiny gold badge is on Pete's shirt, clearing making him a manager.

"Excuse me sir, what seems to be the probl...?" starts Pete.
"THIS IS THE MATTER!" yells Matt, making the patrons stare at him. "your food SUCKS, that waitress is smart as a sack of hammers, and THERE'S PICKLES IN MY BURGERS! I want you to get me MORE CRISPY FRIES AND BURGERS WITHOUT PICKLES!"

"Please calm down, sir" said Pete.

"I won't calm down for you or anybody" said Matt.

"If you don't stop disturbing the patrons, I'm afraid I'll have you thrown out" said Pete, his voice icy.

"Throw me out! I'll like to see you try" said Matt.

"Matt.." said TK.

"Shuddup, brat" snapped Matt at TK.

"THE FOOD IN THIS PLACE SUCKS" said Matt as he took a burger and swallowing it whole. "I'm in the mood for....LIVE MEAT!"
1232122121122.title: Pete the manager

12321221211221.content:
Suddenly, Matt seized Pete with superhuman strength that came out of nowhere! "Easy there, let's see if we can work out a deal!" Pete backtracked, trying to get off the hook. Matt threw him up toward the ceiling, and when he came hurtling back down, Matt opened his jaw and swallowed him whole. Pete landed inside Matt's stomach with a splash. Matt erupted into a large burp that shook the building and sent the rest of the customers dashing out of the restaurant in panic.
The waitress shrieked in terror as Matt stomped over to her, rubbing his gut, turning all the more lively shade of green, "Wanna say something?" he growled.

Rrrrip!

A long, reptillian tail fell from behind Matt's torn jeans and dropped to the floor. The waitress' eyes grew wide and teary, "You're turning into a monster!" Was he going Godzilla?

Matt just rolled his yellow eyes and let out a sigh, "What the hell? Are you nuts?" he asked, beaming down at her and brushing his clawed hand through his still stylishly glossy blond hair.

The waitress ran out the door, wailing, before Matt could get her. He grit his teeth in anger, "I'll show you...Just you wait, you DITZ! I'll fill you up with PICKLES and junky food and I'll gobble you up MYSELF!" he yelled out the door. He then turned to the kitchen to pig out. He ravenously devoured everything in sight, even cups and trays... Matt started to-
12321221211221.title: Rampage

choices: Matt is done eating everything in the kitchen; he flies off
Izzy (or someone else) takes the cure to Matt
123212212112212.content:
TK ducked behind the counter, not wanting to get in Matt's way. As Matt pigged out in the kitchen, the patrons suddenly left in a big hurry. You are standing on TK's head, watching Matt. Matt's tail dragged on the floor as he continued to stuff his gut. As Matt was eating, he started to grow little horns on his head and spikes that went up his tail.
"What's wrong with my brother?" asked TK.
"Looks like he's turning into a dragon...or Godzilla, I don't know which" you say.
Suddenly, Mimi and Izzy entered McDonalds. Mimi was holding a glass of pale blue liquid and Izzy was on her shoulder. Mimi spotted TK and headed for him.
"Matt is turning into a monster" said TK. "can't you do anything, Izzy? Your potions caused this"
"Mimi found Matt's cure, hopefully" said Izzy. "I finally went with her to make sure she didn't screw up again"
"Can't you forgive me?" asked Mimi. "I'm not into that geeky stuff like you are"
"How are we supposed to get Matt to drink the cure?" you ask. "he isn't in a very good mood right now"
"Well, he's eating everything in sight" said TK, glancing in the kitchen. "so getting Matt to take the cure shouldn't be a problem"
Just then, two huge bat-like wings spourted from Matt's back!
"He seems to develop faster when he's eating" said Izzy thoughtfully.
"Well, get him to drink the cure and he'll go back to normal" you say. "I don't wanna end up as dragon chow"
123212212112212.title: The cure?

1232122121122122.content:
"Well, we've at least gotta try," you say, egging Izzy, "I mean, we can't let Matt get any bigger, and he's well on his way to establishing a national state of emergency-"

Matt was growling as he visciously tore apart at hamburger patties. His black shirt still hung on by tatters over his bulky back and bulging gut, which jiggled with his every movement. His hair was still long, glossy, and now a greenish tint of blond, and his eyes were reddening out as he looked none too happy. Not to mention, his wingspan was burgeoning out too, so slipping him the cure would be better late than never.

"You can ride on my back, Izzy," you say, feeling like you could handle carrying a pixie, even though you're little more than a mouse.

Scurrying over, you dash towards the soda dispenser as Matt's guzzling down as much as he can, "This shouldn't be very hard. Just slip the cure in with the beverages and he'll drink it right down."

"Gotcha," Izzy says, struggling to lift the vial up as he flutters to the top of the machine and drains its contents in the huge basin of drinks.

Matt keeps on slurping down Sprite and Coke, and suddenly, he starts to sparkle... Matt
1232122121122122.title: Drink Up

choices: Izzy, you and Mimi explore more of the carnival
Somebody did eat the whole bottle of 'Booty Pills! uh-oh
12321221211221222.content:
Matt paused after he had drank a can of coke. At first, you thought Matt would roar in disapproval, but the next moment, Matt started to regress to his normal self--slowly. Izzy gives you the thumbs up as Matt's scales vanish into his body as well as his wings. Matt still has his bloated gut, though. You take a few steps back as Matt is still regressing to his normal human self. In minutes, Matt was human once again with a massive gut.
"Ohh...I have THE worse headache" said Matt, grabbing his head. Matt then noticed his tattered clothing and yelped. Luckily, his bloated belly covered his privates.
"Oh god..I did this, didn't I?" asked Matt, looking at the remains of the kitchen. Matt had eaten all of the french fries, burgers and whatnot in the kitchen.
"Yep" said Izzy, coming to land on Matt's shoulder. "it was all Mimi's fault too"
"Hey!" yelled Mimi. "it was Izzy..."
Matt let loose a loud belch.
"Excuse me" said Matt, patting his bloated belly.
"Now, could you return me to normal?" you ask Izzy.
"Of course I can" said Izzy. "I'll get Mimi to take me to my potions and..."
Matt spat out a watch.
"What about Pete?" you ask.
"I think it's too late to save him" said Izzy.
"Well, let's get out of here before we get in trouble" said Mimi.
Matt waddled his way out of the McDonalds, followed by everyone else.
"First thing is that I need new clothes..." said Matt.
"Okay" said Izzy. "Mimi, take me to my potions. Let's cure myself and the mouse there"
"The name's Steven" you say.


In less than 15 minutes, you and Izzy are back to your normal sleves and Matt went clothes shopping at the "big and fat" store down the road. TK Went with his brother.
"Want to stay at the carnival?" Izzy asks you.
"Yep" you say. "I would like to hang around with you guys for a while"
"Alright" said Izzy. "well...I pretty much wiped out my Potion Booth I had from curing all three of us"
"I thought you had more potions than that" said Mimi. "I thought I saw something labeled 'Booty Pills' that could make your butt grow at your booth"
"Someone must've stolen them in the confusion" said Izzy. "as long as they don't eat the whole bottle of pills, we'll be fine"
12321221211221222.title: All cured

choices: Maybe later, but let's explore for a bit longer.
123212212112212221.content:
You, Mimi, and the restored Mimi head down a crowded pathway to get a sight of more of what's going on in the carnival. There's tons of people you recognize, all passing by, getting involved in various events. You pass a few Agrabah merchants, one hawking 'fresh dates' at you, a slight three inches away from your eyeballs. It takes more than a 'no thank you' to give him the slip.

The South Park boys brush by you- you notice Cartman gives his hooded pal Kenny a whack on the head. Moments later, Butters breezes by, "Now-ah, hey, uh, guys, wait up!"

Sonic dashes by and bumps right into Peter Griffin's gut, and is sent bouncing backward the way he came. Your eyes catches Mary Jane Watson sauntering her way down the street. Ron Weasley dodges a cannonball sporadically fired from the street's edge.

You spin around to see its source and to your surprise, your hands brush up against something warm and soft and your eyes become accustomed to a broad goofy smile and big blue eyes blinking back at you, "Uh, hi there," Sora smiles.

"Oh, Sora... but then why..." you look down and see a massive belly jiggling in front of him, which you're currently resting your hands on, "Damn, you're fat!" you blurt out. Suddenly, you hope the Keyblade wielder isn't offended.

To your relief he bursts into laughter, his exposed gut jiggling. He points up and you see a twenty foot tall Mokuba Kaiba grinning back down at you. You notice a ten inch tall Sasuke look up at you, scowling in disgust at his companions.

"I'm sure you're wondering how I got this big... you have to check out the fun house," Sora said, pointing down the street, "It's a blast, especially the hall of mirrors- it randomly changes you depending on your reflection, and you stay like that for a day unless you go back and change again. It's completely random, so you have no idea what you're going to turn into next. I've already been a clown, twenty feet tall, a skeleton, a human carrot, a kindergartener, a were-wolf, a merman-"

"We know, we know..." the tiny Sasuke sighed, "You've been in there ever since you arrived, about two hundred times... Now can we please go back. I don't want to get squashed."

"Wow, two hundred times and it's still fresh... it must be something," Mimi muses.

"Sure sounds like it," Izzy piped in.

"Steve, let's go to the fun house," Mimi suggests.
123212212112212221.title: Entering the Carnival

choices: You step up to the reflection of the alligator
You step up to another mirror
1232122121122122211.content:
"Okay, let's go to the Fun House" you say.

Izzy, you, Mimi, Sora, Mokuba and Sasuke walk down the street, heading towards the Fun House. Sora is massively fat and probably weighs in the neighborhood of 1,000 pounds! Sora's clothes seem to adapt to the new weight of Sora; Meaning, Sora's clothes fit him and his massive gut. Once or twice, Sora's gut is shot with a ping-pong ball shot from a gun that you can get at one of the booths. Sora's weight is due to his massive belly...not much fat is around his other body parts.
The Fun House is a massive building made to look like a huge Ctarl-Ctarl with its mouth open which serves as the entrance. The red carpet that leads to the entrance of the Fun House is wet and slimy...like a real tongue would be. Mokuba decides not to enter the Fun House...that he likes being the bigger brother for this one day. So, you and the other enters the Fun House. You slide down a long and twisting slide in order to enter the Fun House. You all land in a massive room filled with balls the size of bowling balls. There's two doors in the room. Above one of the doors is labeled "The Hall of Mirrors" and the other door has "????" above it.
"What's behind the mystery door?" you ask Sora.
"It's random" said Sora. "it can lead anywhere...or nowhere at all. I've already been through it 16 times myself. It can lead to a house, or into the belly of a dragon...or it can lead to MY belly, or yours...or anywhere. You get to stay whereever you end up for 24 hours, and then the door re-appears behind you"
"Well, let's go to the Hall of Mirrors" said Izzy.
"Well, I'm going to check out the Mystery door" said Mimi and goes over to it and opens it and goes through it. The door snaps shut behind her.
The rest of you enter the Hall of Mirrors. It's a long hallway that twists and turns on itself.
"If you want to change into something else, just get closer to the mirror" explains Sasuke, speaking from Izzy's hand.
Every mirror in the hall has a different reflection. You look at yourself in one mirror and see a dragon-version of yourself...in another mirror, your reflection shows you as 20 feet tall...in yet another mirror, You see yourself as the alligator from All Dogs go to Heaven.
1232122121122122211.title: "SrorriM fo llaH"

choices: "No thanks, I wanna look around some more"
12321221211221222112.content:
The following chapter was contributed by readingmaster1

You step up to another mirror, this one shows you as Ozzy Osbourne. You go up to another one, It shows you as The Incredible Hulk. You decide to go with that one and step closer to it. Immediately you feel your body start to change, everywhere your muscles become more defined, veins are starting to pop out of your massive forearms. Your skin turns green, you become taller as well, much much taller. Your new friends stare in awe as your transformation becomes complete with a six pack and huge pecs. You look yourself over, "....Cool!" you say in a deeper voice than usual. "Oh....I wish I was so lucky..." Sora says sadly. You put a hand on his shoulder, "Don't worry Sora...If you don't like your new form you can always change right?" You say trying to encourage him. "....Oh yeah I forgot!" Sora laughs. "Maybe I can go back to my normal size!" Sasuke shouts up to you. You nod as you all continue your journey down the hallway. Sasuke sees a mirror that shows him as a giant and he points to it wanting to try it out.

Izzy takes him up to it and immediately Sasuke starts to grow. He grows big enough that Izzy can't hold him anymore and collapses underneath him as Sasuke continues to grow. Sasuke grows so much he outgrows the house of mirrors itself! His head pokes out of the roof and he waves to Mokuba who is roughly the same size as he is now. He steps out of the house of mirrors and walks up to Mokuba, accidentally demolishing the funhouse with all of you inside it! All of you are now standing in the rubble of what used to be the house of mirrors. Sora looks dissapointed, "Aw man! I was planning on going 3 more times!" Sora says poking his massive gut. "Aw well....Lets go on some of the rides guys!" You say beckoning your friends to follow you. "No thanks, Me and Mimi are gonna go try to find Matt and TK." Izzy says as he walks off with Mimi.

You turn to Sora, Mokuba, and the now giant Sasuke. "So...anybody know anything we CAN do without breaking something?" you ask to your large companions. They shrug. "Me and Sasuke are gonna go tease the little people!" Mokuba says as he and Sasuke go off roaring and stomping their feet at the tiny people. You and Sora laugh, "Well...It's getting late. Hey, Ya wanna come back to the hotel with me?" Sora says.
12321221211221222112.title: You step up to another mirror

choices: Go to Sora's room and get room service
123212212112212221122.content:
"Sure, I'm getting tired myself" you say.

You and Sora make your way out of the ruined funhouse and head out of the carnival. You see other video game characters along the way; Mario, Princess Zelda along with Link, Kirby, King Dedede, Wario, etc. Sora is easiest the most fattest person around, so he makes a hole in the crowd.

After ten minutes of walking, the two of you come to the hotel. The hotel is an old brick building that's 30 stories tall. The hotel's name is above the main entrance in fancy writing: "The Tipsy Vixen Inn". There's a door big enough for Sora to enter the hotel...while you go through the normal-sized door. The lobby of the hotel is filled with anime and video game characters, who hardly notices you enter the lobby. The clerk at the counter is a rather sexy vixen, who looks up as Sora and you approach her.

"Is my room ready yet?" asked Sora.

"Yes, it is" said the vixen. "have a filling meal?"

"What?" asks Sora, then looks at his massive gut. "oh no, this is from my trip to the carnival. The Hall Of Mirrors, you know. By tomorrow morning, this big gut of mine will be gone"

"I liked you skinny anyway" laughs the vixen. "and who is this?"

"Steven, my new pal" said Sora. "he's with me"

"Well, your room is ready" said the vixen.

"Speaking of meals" you say. "I'm hungry"

"Well, we can fix that" chuckles Sora. "this hotel has a superb resturant...or we can go up to my room and get room service"
123212212112212221122.title: The Hotel

1232122121122122211222.content:
The following chapter was contributed by readingmaster1

"You got any money Sora? Cuz, I kinda lost my wallet before I came here." You say as you both hop into the elevator. Sora just laughs and says "Sure do! You wouldn't believe the rewards you rake in just for saving even one world! But of course thats not why I do what I do." Sora says becoming lost in thought as he pushes a button. "....So....Wheres Kairi and Riku?" you ask causing him to lose his train of thought. "Oh Kairi is up in our room. And Riku says he's had enough traveling to last him for awhile." Sora chuckles. "And Goofy and Donald?" You ask. "Back at the castle of course! So are King Mickey, Daisy, and Minnie. Yep, Everything is back to normal for now!" He says putting his hands behind his head as the elevator begins to go up.

"So where am I gonna sleep? On the floor?" You joke. Sora just giggles a bit, causing his gut to jiggle. "Naw, Theres two beds. Of course, Kairi will have to sleep with yours truly!" Sora says with a grin and blushes after he says that. You just rib him and say "Don't be trying anything funny, Okay Sora?" You both laugh.

When you get to the room Sora pulls out a card and puts it in the locking mechanism and the door automatically opens. Inside there is an Xbox 360 complete with a large Plasma Screen tv. And the window offers a beautiful view of the carnival, AND the swimming pool outside! "Wow! This place has everything!" You say in awe. Its then you notice Kairi, She's sitting on the bed looking at you both. "Uh....Hi! I'm Steven." You say waving. Kairi comes over and shakes your hand, then glares at Sora. "Sora! What happened to you!? What have you been doing now?" She says eyeing his large belly. Sora laughs sheepishly, "Uh...Would you believe me if I told you that this was the effect of a magical Funhouse?" Sora says scratching his head. "Well, In a place like this I wouldn't doubt it!" Kairi says rolling her eyes. "So...Who's up for room service?" Sora says patting his belly.

"Sigh....Boys" you hear her mutter under her breath as she walks over to the phone.

A short while later a man comes in with three trays of pizza, cheeseburgers, and sodas. Sora gobbles his food up, you assume he's trying to get all the fun he can out of being fat while the night is still young, You and Kairi are much less ravenous when it comes to eating your food. "So what kind of games they got on this thing?" You ask turning on the 360. Sora just gives you one of his trademark grins and says "Only every video game known to man! Ain't this place great!" he says grabbing a controller as the game comes on. "Whoa.....It's even got Super Mario World! How did they get this thing to play all these games?" You ask dumbfounded. Sora and Kairi laugh, "This isn't just any ordinary game console......It was specially made by the mayor himself! He ordered that this hotel should have everything the guest's heart desires....And since everybody loves videogames.....Well you get the idea!" He says as he selects a game: Gears of War.

Late into the night you take down Locusts and sometimes if you're in the mood, each other! All the while you laugh and think, "This is the most fun I've ever had!"
"Hey boys! Care to join me?" Kairi says. You both look over to see her clad in her swimsuit and relaxing in the jacuzzi that neither of you noticed before. Sora jumping at the chance says "SURE!" as he runs toward the hot tub stripping his clothes off as he goes. He is left clad only in his underpants as he jumps into the jacuzzi. He comes back to the surface laughing and splashing Kairi playfully. "C'mon in Steven!" He says beckoning you to get in. "No thanks, I don't have any swim trunks." You say not as bold as Sora and somewhat unwilling to strip down you your boxers in front of your new friends. Sora just grins toothily, "....Neither did I, But look at me!" Sora says as Kairi giggles her girlish laugh. "Um...Okay!" You say stripping down to your boxers and sliding slowly into the hot water.
1232122121122122211222.title: Havin Fun With Sora

choices: "Let's go back to the carnival...after breakfast, of course"
12321221211221222112222.content:
The jacuzzi hot tub is big enough for all three of you...barely. Sora's girth takes up most of the room, but you and Kairi have room. You three splash each other, laughing playfully. You and Sora arrived at the hotel an hour before sundown, so its right around midnight now. The view of the carnival and the rest of the town is breathtaking; you're on the 26th floor. While in the elvator, you noticed that the hotel has a 13th floor. None of the other hotels you've been to has a 13th floor....at least, not a marked 13th floor. There probably is a 13th floor in every hotel, but that's likely to have the laundry on it. At around 1 o'clock in the morning, Sora gets out of the jacuzzi and decides to have one more round of Gears of War before going to sleep. You and Kairi soon join him.
"Say, I meant to ask earlier" you say. "but what's on the 13th floor?"
"They call it the "Supernatural Floor" here" said Sora. "It's said to be off-limits to anyone but supernatural beings"
"There's no way to get there" said Kairi. "the stairs just skip the floor; as far as I know, the only way to that floor is in the elevator"
"Why do you ask?" asked Sora.
"Just wondered" you say. "we don't have a 13th floor in every hotel where I come from"
"How odd..." said Kairi.
"Well, time for bed" said Sora. He then flops on the bed, which sags down to the floor with his weight. He competely covers the bed!
"Wow..." said Kairi. "and where am I suppose to sleep?!"
"On my belly?" suggests Sora. "or...in it, if you're okay with that"
"I think I'm gonna sleep on your belly" said Kairi, who climbs atop Sora's massive stomach. "ohh...you make a good bed, Sora"
You decide to sleep on the other bed. That's when you realized what Sora just said.
"IN your belly?" you blurt out. "won't you digest Kairi if you eat her?"
"Nope" said Sora.
"How does that work?" you ask.
"One of the many perks being a video game character" said Sora. Kairi has fallen asleep.
"Goodnight" you say to Sora.
"G'night" said Sora.
The two of you then fall asleep.


*******************************************



When you wake up the next morning, you find that Sora is no longer his fat self. Kairi is beside him, fast asleep on the bed. Sunlight floods the room via the window that overlooks the town and the carnival. You see that the Funhouse at the carnival is up again like nothing had happened to it. There's nobody at the carnival, although its hard to tell from this distance.
"Morning!" saids a bright and cheery voice. You turn around to see that Kairi and Sora is now awake.
"The carnival is still there..." you say.
"It's a week-long carnival" said Sora. "today is the last day of the carnival, as a matter of fact"
"Has Kairi been there?" you ask.
"I only got here yesterday" said Kairi. "so no"
"I've been there all week" said Sora. "I keep going to that Hall of Mirrors...its fun!"
"Have you ever been through that mystery door?" you ask.
"No" said Sora. "so, you're saying that you wanna go back to the carnival?"
"Only if you want to" you say.
Sora thinks for a minute before he answers...
12321221211221222112222.title: Kairi and Sora together in bed

choices: You All Go To The Carnival
123212212112212221122222.content:
The following chapter was contributed by readingmaster1

"Let's do something else today" Sora says as he puts his clothes back on (You all slept in your swim wear) only to discover his clothes are so stretched out he can't wear them without them falling off of him. Sora scratches his head, "Well...Good thing I brought extra clothes!" You and Kairi do the same, but of course you all take turns going into the bathroom to do so. After Kairi FINALLY gets out you and Sora ask what took her so long, She just smiles and says "None of your business. Now c'mon! What do you guys say we hit the pool? Then maybe you two can take me to the carnival?" She says skipping out the door and down the hallway. "Sweet!" you and Sora say together as you rush outside and into the elevator.

Once back on ground level you all toss off your clothes (Save for undergarments) and dive into the pool. Sora, being a showoff, Climbs up onto the diving board and dives right in with a huge *SPLASH* getting you and Kairi even more wet. In the pool you meet Goku and a preteen Gohan from DBZ, Cloud and Tifa from Final Fantasy, And even Shake, Frylock, Meatwad, and Harvey Birdman! You swim over to Sora, "Hey, I thought this was just anime and videogames?" You whisper. "Well for the most part it is, But visitors from the other places always come for the year round carnival. And sometimes they just want to come for the heck of it. We're kinda like neighbors you see. Theres Cartoons, Anime, Videogames, and sometimes even books and comics!" Sora says. "How come I didn't see a book sign when I came here?" You ask.

Sora laughs, "Well duh! Of course you didn't! The way to the book character's world is located somewhere in the Anime world. No one knows exactly where, It's kind of complicated to explain. But there are magic spells protecting it." Sora explains. "Protecting it? From what?" Sora gives you a dark look all of a sudden, "From the several villains that lurk somewhere in each of these worlds. You see, there are good characters and bad characters in these worlds. Just like there are good people and bad people in your world." You nod. Sora continues, "A long time ago, the villains came together and made....a plan. One that could destroy the very fabric of reality itself. No one knows the exact details of this plan, except for one guy. And he died trying to protect us all from it." Sora says looking sad.

"And their first target....Was the world of literature! In other words, they hit the book world first. So after the guy I told you about had sealed up all the villains in a magic sphere, The guys over at the literature world were so scared that they cast a magic spell on their entire world. And you have to have special access to be able to get to it, And after someone has been there, it moves to a totally different location every time. Kinda like Hogwart's charms that make normal people see it as a ruined old castle. So as to keep it safe. They advised us to do the same, Meaning us videogame, anime, and cartoon characters. But I don't think we had anything to worry about. We're all more heavily armed than them."

Sora finally finished his story, leaving you with a feeling of impending doom. "B-But can't the villains escape?" you ask shaking. Sora shakes his head, "Naw, They're locked up forever..." Sora says as a grin spreads across his face, "Now C'mon! Lets go hit the carnival eh?" Sora says getting out of the pool.
123212212112212221122222.title: "Let's do something else today"

choices: You three explore a cave you find
1232122121122122211222221.content:
"I thought you said that this was the last day of the carnival" you say as you, Sora and Kairi all enter the carnival. It's somewhat less busy than it was yesterday...maybe because it was later in the day when you arrived yesterday. You see Sonic the Hedgehog speeding around, calling out for Tails. You also see Scooby Doo and Shaggy, each sporting huge bellies.
"I forgot this carnival never ends" said Sora. "it used to be a week-long, but the mayor made it all-year round"
"That was nice of him" you say.
"Where's this magic Funhouse,anyway?" butts in Kairi. "I want to try out the Hall of Mirrors".
"So you can be 1,000 pounds?" you ask.
"Maybe" said Kairi. "If I weigh 1,000 pounds, nobody will be able to kidnap me" here, she giggles.
"Well, it's the Mystery Door for me" said Sora.
"Where does that go?" you ask.
"I already told you" sighed Sora. "it's random. It might lead you to your own world...or it might lead into another universe alltogether. You spend a day whereever you end up and you go back here"
"Awesome" you say.


The funhouse is there, and it has a sign on it that says: "New Mirrors in the Hall of Mirrors!"
"Cool!" said Sora. "they don't usually get new mirrors"
"Let's go check 'em out before we go through the Mystery Door" you say.
"Sounds like a plan" Sora says happily and you once again end up in the Hall of Mirrors. There are 20 new mirrors in the hallway. One new mirror shows you with a *huge* butt...while another new mirror shows you as a female version of yourself. Kairi quickly finds the mirror that makes you 1,000 pounds, and she has some fun bumping into people with her newly big gut. One of the new mirrors shows you when you're 20,000 pounds! Sora is tempted with that mirror, but he's tired of being big, so he moves onto another mirror.
You don't want to be the Hulk again, so you look for another mirror. That's when you run into a weird-looking mirror with runes all over it. It looks like the Twilight Mirror from Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess! In the exact center of the mirror, you see the Triforce. Some unknown force is pulling you closer to the mirror. As you get closer to the mirror, you start to see yourself as the one and only Ganondorf! You reach out to touch the mirror, when someone grabs your shoulder and whirls you around. It's the 1,000-pound Kairi.
"Don't touch that mirror!" said Kairi.
"I was only..." you start to say.
"What's this mirror doing here, anyway?" asks Sora, who looks like a horse. "I thought this mirror was shattered long ago"
"This mirror shouldn't be here" said Kairi.
"Why?" you ask.
"That's where all the villians are locked up" said Sora. "if you look into the mirror, you'll turn into a villian!"
"Uncool" you say. "well...why is it here then?"
The Twilight Mirror is somewhat out of the way, so its not like everyone is gonna find it.
"Come on" said Sora. "let's go through the Mystery Door. I'm feeling adventerous today"
On the way out of the hall of mirrors, Sora walks up to the mirror that makes you into the Hulk. "Always wanted to try this one out" said Sora in a deep voice.
You quicky find the mirror that turns you into the Big Bad Wolf. Then, all of you make it to the Mystery Door.
"Here goes" said Sora, as he opens the door and all three of you walk in.
*******************
You, Sora and Kairi all wind up on a deserted island. Luckily, it's a big island that has lots of food on it. You three explore the island, and quickly find a big tree house. It's a sunny day, and not a cloud in the sky. Endless blue ocean surrounds the island.
"Not that bad for my first time through that door" said Sora.
1232122121122122211222221.title: The Island

choices: You all three befriend the monkey and have fun
You Suddenly Develop A Wolfish Hunger....
12321221211221222112222211.content:
The following chapter was contributed by readingmaster1

"Hey! Guys come over here!" The Incredible Sora says. You and Kairi walk over to see the big green Sora managing to squeeze his large body into a cave. "Wow! A cave! I wonder where it goes?" Kairi says running after Sora, leaving the now wolfish you behind. You just shrug and run after the two transformed video game characters, "Wait up!" You say running into the dark cave.

Luckily Sora carried with him a small flash light that he uses to find his way farther and farther into the darkness. Suddenly you hear a scream (which you assume comes from Kairi) And all of a sudden the two overly large characters are rushing towards you, Before you can tell whats happening you feel yourself being picked up by Hulk/Sora you look behind you to see that there are hundreds of bats chasing after you! Their red eyes are all that you can see in the dark, you all jump out of the cave entrance and duck as all the bats fly out into the sky.

Later on you, Sora, and Kairi are drinking some milk from a couple of coconuts. It isn't very good, but you are thirsty and you need something to quench it so you tolerate the gross taste. "So Hulk..." You begin until you hear Sora laugh in his new deeper voice and say "You can still call me Sora!" He laughs. "Okay, So Sora. How long did you say we're stuck here?"

"For a whole day." Sora says.

"Well...Urp...'scuse me....What can we do here?" you ask

Sora scratches his chin in thought, "Well.....Actually.....I have no idea!" Sora says grinning sheepishly. Both you and Kairi just stare at him and sweatdrop. "But we're stuck here for a whole day! Unless there are monkeys here, This is going to be seriously boring!" You say. Sora then stands up, towering over you....He looks mad. "Now listen! Look at us! We're a wolf, Hulk, and really fat....No offense Kairi" Kairi wasn't even paying attention anyway though. Sora turns back to you, "Look at our situation guys! The possibilities are endless! Look at all the fun we could have!" Sora enthused. "You-You're right Sora! Lets go make something of this!" But just as you say that, you spot a monkey in a tree. "Hey.....MONKEY!" You say running after it, it seems to panic as it sees a wolf running towards it, screeches, and hops off into another palm tree. "Hey wait up! I'm not gonna hurt you!" You say looking up into the tree.

"Want me to get him down for ya?" Sora says. You nod, Sora then grips the trunk of the palm tree....AND LIFTS IT OUT OF THE GROUND! He then lowers the tree onto the ground. And you grab the monkey before he can run away. He screeches in your face but you don't care, Monkey = FUN FUN FUN!!!
12321221211221222112222211.title: The Monkey

choices: You three all eat the survivors!
It was just a mirage...Kairi eats Sora and you!
123212212112212221122222112.content:
Up until that point, you really didn't have any wolfish behavior; i.e, you didn't start to hunt for food or look for a mate or act like a wild animal at all. But when you grab the monkey, your wolfish stomach starts to growl. Then you have a hunger...for the monkey in your hands...err..paws. The monkey looks like a nice juicy steak to you, and you lick your lips. The monkey is panicing, but you have a firm grip on the hapless creature. You then open your mouth and toss the monkey into it. Sora gasps and takes a step backward as you swallow the monkey down whole. You can feel the monkey's struggles within your belly, and boy does that tickle! You then turn to face Sora and Kairi. Kairi is a nice big meal...and so is Sora. You start to walk towards Sora and Kairi. The monkey was delicious...but you're still hungry! You feel like you could eat more...a lot more.

"That mirror has that effect on you" sighs Sora. "I've been the wolf before...it gives you a wolfish appetite"

"I can see that" said Kairi.

You don't really hear the two talking. All you can hear is your growling stomach, demanding to be fed more food. You stalk Sora and Kairi, looking for your chance to strike. Sora looks to be worried for about a minute, but then a grin breaks out.

"You said you wanted to have some fun?" asks Sora. "well, me and Kairi can have fun in your stomach"

"I beg your pardon!" said Kairi. "I'm not becoming a meal for a wolf"

The problem solves itself as you sniff the air and realize that this entire island has got monkeys on it...and a lot of 'em at that. You quickly bound off into the thick jungle on the island to go and eat every monkey on the island, leaving Sora and Kairi behind. The next few hours are a blur to you; you eat countless monkeys until there's no more. After your big meal, you fall asleep to digest your feast.


When you wake up, you find yourself in the clearing of the island. Your belly sticks out a good ten feet!
"Well, at least I'm not the only one who's fat" said Kairi's voice. You look around to see Kairi and Sora looking at you and your bloated belly.
"Sorry about before" you say. "I couldn't help myself"
"I can understand" said Sora. "when I was the wolf, I ate an entire high school!"
"And I'm still hungry" you say.
"Here" said Kairi. Sora and Kairi have gathered a bunch of coconuts and other island fruit for you to eat. You greedily gobble down the fruits, but you're still hungry for more. That's when you notice that the monkeys are still alive within your stomach!
"Another side effect from being the wolf" said Sora. "you don't digest your meals...you just stuff yourself silly"
"Well, I'm still not being a meal for the wolf" said Kairi.
"Why not?" asks Sora. "it'll be fun!"
"Why don't I eat you and see how much you like it" said Kairi. "looks like there's no more food on this island anyway...and I'm hungry too"
"Some choice" you chuckle. "being eaten by me, or we get eaten by Kairi"
"Wouldn't be the first time for me" mutters Sora.


That's when something incredible happens. Something that solved all of the food problems; an ocean liner has sunk near the island and there are lifeboats coming to the island.

"...What are the odds of that?" asks Kairi.
123212212112212221122222112.title: Glutton Wolf

choices: Sora Wakes Up And You Play together for awhile
Something Causes The Whole Place To Shake!
1232122121122122211222221122.content:
The following chapter was contributed by readingmaster1

Well there you are two are, sitting inside Kairi's belly. Somehow she managed to stuff a wolf and a gigantic Hulk like Sora inside her mouth. "So Sora, What happened to those High Schoolers you ate?" You ask Sora. Sora just grins, "Don't worry about them, They weren't digested, I spat them all up after awhile. You'll have to do the same to the monkeys and Kairi will to us eventually." Sora says reclining against the stomach wall. You do the same, The place is surprisingly big for a normally skinny girl's stomach. "So how long til' we get outta here?" You ask. Sora just grins even bigger, "A good long hour at least!" Sora says before he falls asleep. You can feel your eyelids getting heavy as well, it feels like a car ride inside Kairi's stomach as she walks.

When you both wake up you can see stars in the sky, That must mean Kairi spat you both up. Your belly isn't bloated anymore, You can hear the screeches of the monkeys not too far away. Thats when you notice Sora and Kairi laying beside you. Kairi is sleeping on top of the enormous Hulk-Sora. You rub your eyes and roll over. Soon you are asleep again.

When you wake up again you notice you're no longer a wolf, and Kairi and Sora are no longer in their fat and Hulk forms. Sora is half naked, his pants being ripped and all. It reminds you of those Hulk comics and movies where when Bruce Banner wakes up his pants are ripped. You also notice that you're back in your hotel room. The mystery door must have transported you all back to your room. You carefully get out of bed and turn the tv on.

A cartoon character you don't recognize is hosting the morning news. You turn the channel and your world's News comes on. "Wow....Didn't expect this place to have our world's stations." You sit down in front of the TV and watch the news, Bush is rambling about something concerning Al Queda and Bugs Bunny. You don't really pay attention and decide to play the 360. The menu comes up and you choose Rock Band. Like magic a drum set, A microphone, and a guitar appear! "This place has everything!" You say as you begin to sing Tom Sawyer as quietly as you can.
1232122121122122211222221122.title: Inside Kairi's Belly

choices: It's a gigantic and fat Officer Jenny
12321221211221222112222211222.content:
You play Rock Band for 10-12 minutes before the whole room shakes. It starts out as a gentle quake, but it builds up as a major quake, which wakes up Sora and Kairi. Everything in the room topples to the floor and its hard to keep your balance. You then notice something odd; the quakes feel a lot like footsteps! But who's big enough to make the whole hotel shake? Could a giant be walking around, causing the quakes? You make your way to the window, only to discover that the window is blocked by some flesh-colored wall. The glass is gone, pushed out of its sill by the wall of flesh.

"What's happening?" asks Sora, coming to see the flesh wall out of the window. "hey, who's blocking the light?"

"I don't know anyone that tall" said Kairi. "could it be Godzilla?"

"Wrong color" said Sora. "Godzilla has green skin. Whoever this is, its a person!"

"How can anybody get that big?" you ask.

"You know, the usuall stuff; growth guns, eating a ton of stuff.." said Sora.

The quakes stop, and the flesh wall pushes in deeper into the room. All three of you are now on the soft wall of flesh.

"Soft skin..." said Kairi. "that means this is a woman!"

"One big woman" you say.

"Come on" said Sora. "let's go see who it is"

So all of you exit the room and soon exit the hotel. As you exit the hotel, you see who is leaning against the hotel.
12321221211221222112222211222.title: Something Causes The Whole Place To Shake!

123212212112212221122222112222.content:
The following chapter was contributed by readingmaster1

It's a gigantic Bulma! She's still the same weight but she's gigantic! "BULMA!! WHAT ARE YOU DOING?!" She looks down to see you, Sora, and Kairi looking up at her. She crouches down, her face is as big as Mount Rushmore to you! "Uh....Hi!" you all say nervously. She just smiles and waves, "Whats it like being that big?" Kairi shouts up to her. Her grin gets even bigger, "AWESOME!" She thunders causing you to cover your ears.

After awhile she seems to get bored with this place and walks off. You look up at the Hotel, the windows are all shattered on your and other floors. You look at Sora, "I don't suppose that they can repair this as quick as the Funhouse can they?" Sora just grins that famous grin of his, "Yep! They sure can! Lets go have some fun!" He says racing off down the street.

You all are quite tired of the carnival for now, So you decide to go on a little trip. Eventually you find yourselves back in the woods, "Hey I remember this place! My car is somewhere around here! You say breaking into a run. "Steven! Wait up!" Sora calls out to you. After you've run for awhile you stumble upon an old well. You recognize that it's the well from Inuyasha. What do you do?
123212212112212221122222112222.title: Back In The Woods

1232122121122122211222221122221.content:
The well goes so deep that you can't see the bottom of it. The well is on a high hill that overlooks a small village some distance away. The village looks like the one in Inu-Yasha. Sora and Kairi manage to catch up with you while you're looking at the village.
"If I'm right...this well should lead to the...to my world" you say.
"Are you sure?" asks Kairi.
"I have a good feeling about it" you say.
"Let's jump in it" said Sora, jumping down the well. You and Kairi quickly follow. The well is 30 feet deep, and before you hit the bottom of the well, you see a warp pipe in the Mario games which you enter with Kairi right behind you.
You pop out of another well that looks exactly like the well you've just jumped down. The well is somewhere in the forest where your can broke down. You recongize the road that's right beside the well....although, you don't remember seeing a well earlier before your car broke down. Sora is nearby, looking up and down the road. You wait by the well until Kairi emerges from the well. After five minutes of waiting, Kairi doesn't come out of the well.
"Where is she?" asked Sora.
"She was right behind me" you say, The two of you are looking down the well.
"Should we jump down?" asked Sora.
"I''m game" you say. "It's not like this well could lead someplace different"
You and Sora jump back down the well together.

You two emerge from a warp pipe, not a well. What's more, you two are now in front of a grand castle with a picture of Bowser on the raised drawbridge!
"Kairi!" yelled Sora.
"She could be in the caslte" you say.
"Then let's go in the castle and save her" said Sora, walking up to the castle. The drawbridge to the castle is guarded by four Hammer Brothers and two Heartless!
"The Heartless...here?" sighs Sora. He pulls out the keyblade.
"Need some help?" asks a voice behind you. You and Sora turn around to see that Link is there with his Master Sword in hand.
1232122121122122211222221122221.title: Bowser's Castle

choices: Mimi gobbles all of you up
12321221212.content:
A rumbling sound started to come from Mimi. All of you looked at Mimi in time to see two giant wings burst out of Mimi's back and her skin started to get scaly. Mimi drops the "lemonade" that she had been drinking from and it shatters into a milloin pieces on the ground. Mimi then started to grow and grow....she looked like a dragon!
"Oh my gosh!" yelled TK.
Mimi grew until she was the size of a small apartment building. At that time, Mimi was a full-fledged dragon complete with a head and snout of a dragon. She had green scales all over her body, and light green on her belly. She had claws instead of hands and had yellow cat-like eyes.
"That's some lemonade" said Mimi in a gruff voice.
"We told ya its not 'lemonade' you stupid little bitch" said Matt.
Was it the potion that Matt took that caused this new altitude of his?
"I'm not so little anymore, shorty" said Mimi, looking down at Matt.
"You gotta help us, Izzy!" you yell. "isn't there a way to reverse this?"
"Of course there's a way" said Izzy. "but I need a little time"
"I'm hungry..." said Mimi the dragon.
You don't like the sound of that.
12321221212.title: Bad to worse

choices: He zips past it JUST in time!
123212212121.content:
The following chapter was contributed by Aerodeth (79)

Im hungry'?! But just what exactly do dragons eat? If you had to assume anything... meat. Preferably fresh live meat! However that dragon is still Mimi!! She couldnt possibly resort to eating her friends...

"You want something to eat?!" Matt shouts to her, "then how's about you eat ME, ya stupid bitch?!" You immediately grit your teeth when you hear that plump punk try to zing Mimi!

"No! You idiot!" you squeak, "she might take that slur the wrong way!"

Unfortunately, it's too late! The way the dragoness is staring down at Matt with her slanted pupilss widening while slightly drooling... now might be a good time to say goodbye to Matt!

"Well... dont mind if I do!" Mimi grinned right lowering her head down at Matt with her jaws open wide!!
*CRRRRUUUNNNCCCCHHH!!!*
Her jaws press down hard on the dirt below Matt's feet guaranteeing that she's got him! With a long hard *GULP*, you can stare in horror at the huge bulge slowly going down Mimi's throat until finally disappearing just before it drops into her belly!

Poor ol' chunky Matt... if only he could watch his mouth. To make matters worse, TK is hellbent on avenging his bro!

"HEY, YA DUMB BROAD, SPIT HIM OUT!!!" he starts kicking her huge scaley foot. Mimi just looks down at the little kid kicking her and sighs, "..Oh allright. You can join him too." And with that, the dragoness plucks TK up off the ground with those scaley clawed hands and tosses him over her head!

"Wha?! AAAAAAAAAHHHHH!!!" TK screams the minute he realizes where he's gonna land... into Mimi's mouth! You see her slam shut behind TK the second he out of your sight!

Aw damn... all that's left is you and the pixie. Speaking of which, Izzy swipes you off the ground and starts flying off with you!

"We...We gotta get outta here!" Izzy screams, "or we're next!!"
You just shrug, "God, why did my car have to break down?"

Just then, Izzy gets an idea. You can almost see the lightbulb flashing on above his head. "I know! Maybe we can hide out in that cave over there!"

He seems to be flying toward a big reddish cavern that if you didnt know any better, just appeared out of nowhere. You have quite a bad feeling about this...

This cavern's opening seems to be surrounded in huge shiny jagged-shapped pillars with a long soft purplish carpet stretching out almost as if to welcome you inside. Inside this cave, the walls have some kind of an organic reddish color while water drops drip from the roof and onto the purple carpet. Everything else is too dark to see. However, you can make out a big red squiggly thing in the back of the roof dangling about as if to say 'CMON IN!!'

Yeah, that is deffinitely NOT a cave! If anything, it's Mimi's mouth hungering for seconds! But Izzy's still flying toward it!! The idiot's just gonna end up accidently feeding himself and you to her if he doesnt realize where he's going!

"IZZY!" you shout, "TURN BACK! THAT AINT A CAVE!!!"
123212212121.title: 'Hide out in that CAVE'??!!!

1232122121212.content:
Huh?" asked Izzy, looking around.

"THIS AIN'T NO CAVE!" You yell. "GET US..."

*GULP*

You and Izzy go falling in the dragon Mimi's throat and keep falling until you reach a large chamber--no doubt, her stomach. There's light in the stomach coming from a flashlight in the hands of TK.

"Oh great" said Matt. "how do we get out of here?"

"You don't wanna know" said Izzy.

Matt and TK are on a 'dry' island in a lake of stomach acid. The 'dry' island is perhaps 40 feet in diameter...about 1/2 a mile to your scale. Izzy flies you to the island and sets you down.

"Why can't this be a normal day?" you ask. When you woke up this morning, you were just a normal person returning home from a wonderful vacation, and now you're in the belly of a transformed anime character and you're now a little hairy mouse!

"Well...I guess we're trapped in here until the acid comes to.." Izzy's voice trailed off.
1232122121212.title: belly of the beast

12321221212122.content:
The following chapter was contributed by Aerodeth (79)

Being turned into a mouse, being eaten alive by a girl that was turned into a dragon, being stuck inside a humongous stomach with little chance to survive, and being trapped in the same room with the retards that got you in this mess in the first place! Oh great Destiny, what lies in store for you now?!

"*YAAAAAWWWWWWWWWNNN*...ZZZzzzzzz..."
YAY!!! MIMI'S ASLEEP! HALLELUJAH! YOURE SCREWED! Thanks a lot, Izzy!

This big organic chamber the 4 of you are trapped in is starting to feel up with strange fumes that are starting to fog up your field of vision. All you can barely make out are the pulsating red walls and barely the other 3 victims while the gurgling sounds in the background get louder and louder..

Worried about the heat in the room you squeak, "Hey Izzy! How long do we have until the acid kicks in?"
"Well judging by the rate of the temperature rising," Izzy says,"Id say about 2 hours."

Two hours to think of an escape. Hopefully at least ONE of you can come up with an idea by then!

"MIMI!!!" TK begins to shout, "WAKE UP!! We're gonna die if you dont let us outta here!" He clenches his fists and is about to pound the walls, but Izzy quickly flies in his way and stops him!

"No!" Izzy screams, "That might agitate the stomach and cause it to eject acid much sooner!"
"Well..." you look over to the tight-opening in disgust. You dont wanna do it, but you got no other choice! "We COULD go out the long way..."

"What about ME?!" Matt shouts, "Im like 400 lbs! I cant squeeze through there!"
You just mutter under your breath, "...like I care.." Thankfully, he didnt hear you.

"Do you wish to essssssscape your fate?"
Just then, you hear a voice comming from somewhere. It didnt sound like Izzy, TK, or Matt! The other 3 seem to be arguing, so they probably didnt hear it.

"They cant hear me, Ssssssteve. It isssss their fate to die here. But not yoursssssss."
"Uh... who's there?!" you ask this hissing voice. It kinda reminds you of a snake... which might be a BIG threat to you in your current form!

"Your lassssst salvation," it answers, "The misssstress does not want you to die. Do you wish to return to the House of Cassandra?"
Chances are it would be better than dieing here. But you cant help but feel sorry for your new friends...

"I want to return," you answer, "but what the other three?"
Sadly, you do not like the answer to your question: "They cannot be helped. They shall die here. They are of no concern to her."

Poor guys. You cant just leave them here! Dont they deserve to live just as much as you?
"They are just figmentssssss of Cassandra's imagination. Do you wish to leave alive... or join them?"

Tough question. You really value your own life, but maybe... just MAYBE you can still be able to help them out! However, this voice might be your ONLY shot of escaping digestion if youre unlucky...

What's more important: Their lives or your own?
12321221212122.title: Live and Let Die?

choices: Carmen has other plans for you
123212212121222.content:
You don't want to be digested alive in the stomach of Dragon-Mimi, so you decide to leave the stomach. It might seem cruel to leave your new friends to die here, but you don't wanna die! You wave farewell to your new-found friends as you say to the voice: "Alright, take me outta here!"

"Your wisssshh is my command" said the hissing voice in your head. Suddenly, you find yourself standing in front of the House of Cassandra! You look around and realized that you're back to normal; you're a human and not a mouse. You breathe a sigh of relief, when you feel something wrapping itself around your legs. You look down and see that a huge naga is wrapping its coils around you! The human half of the naga has red hair and large breasts...clearly it's a female! The naga looks to be around 20 feet long or so.

"Greetingssss" said the naga with a smile. "My name issssss Carmen and I'm in the employee of Casssssssandra"

"I thought she wanted me alive?" you gasp out, as Carmen's coils wrap around your torso.

"Drat!" said Carmen, and her coils loosen around you and she withdrawls 'em.

"Ssssssorry" said Carmen. "my instinctsss are hard to control"
123212212121222.title: Carmen the Naga

1232122122.content:
The following chapter was contributed by Anthony-kun (61)

Do you really become A Digimon?

Or maybe something else?
1232122122.title: Really a digimon?

12321221222.content:
The following chapter was contributed by Anthony-kun (61)

Do you become a character from a anime or manga?
12321221222.title: Character of your choise

123212212221.content:
The following chapter was contributed by Anthony-kun (61)

(Note Anime that follow the story of manga example- Naruto,Bleach go under anime.)
123212212221.title: Anime or Manga

1232122122211.content:
The following chapter was contributed by Anthony-kun (61)

Do you become a character of Naruto.

Real or Made up.

Note- Don't make a god type character.
1232122122211.title: Naruto

choices: I'm going to make my own
12321221222111.content:
The following chapter was contributed by Anthony-kun (61)

Real?

Or

Make your own Ninja

Give a good description and leave a choice for other people's ninja's.
12321221222111.title: Yes

12321221222112.content:

How about becoming a spirit.

Note you can be seen by everyone.
12321221222112.title: Bleach

123212212221122.content:
