How about becoming a character from FMA? (Fullmetal Alchemist)
123212212221122.title: FMA Character

choices: A pissed off, obese Matt... he starts going sumo
Unknowing TK- it does something else to him
12321222.content:
There's a loud poof and you open your eyes after the smoke clears... you're now an anime version of yourself. Your eyes are now big, shiny and blue... not to mention your hair... which is also big, shiny, and blue.

"No way..." you blink, seeing your form reflected in a wide glass basin on Izzy's display.

"Duh, yes way- the stupid potion did it to you," Matt sneered, rolling his eyes. Izzy sighed, his growing belly now popping off buttons on his shirt.

"There's got to be some way to undo this," you sweat frantically.

You grab another potion but just then Mimi crashes into you, forcing the potion to fly out of your hands and splash right over...
12321222.title: Something else happens

choices: Follow the map on the PDA
12322.content:
You travel about the place, with slack jawed awe, gawking at all the sights like a tourist. Eventually your wanderings take you aboard one of the larger starships that are berthed near a rather ornate castle. Soon you find yourself in a hanger bay full of people working on some kind of large mecha. Feeling the pull of curiosity you hustle up one of the mobile stair cases and peer inside the chest mounted cockpit.

“Hey what are you doing?” You turn at the sound of an indignant feminine voice to find a young woman in work overalls and a ball cap, peering at you over a raised a data slate. “You’re not in my work logs….Oh! Its you. About time you showed up” You blink as she taps a wrench impatiently against a leg, her azure eyes staring into yours. “I mean really, how much longer were you going to make us wait?”

You blink, not altogether sure what she’s talking about, “Um…I’m sorry?”

She shrugs and adjusts her glasses “Meh whatever…” she hands you a small pda and points to a far door in the hanger. “Go through there and then follow the map. “It’ll take you where you need to go. Now get a move on.” She then brushes by you, shooing you out of the way as she bends over to work on something in the cockpit.

For a moment you watch the way her cloths stretch over her backside as she mutters curse at the machine she’s working on. “It doesn’t do tricks buddy.” She growls and you realize that she’s looking over her shoulder at you. You nod and salute sloppily as she continues to glare, before scurrying away.

You start to head for the door when it occurs to you that now might be a good time to leave the ship and explore elsewhere. You pause and consider your options.
12322.title: Encounters

123221.content:
The starship that you found doesn't look like any ship you've ever seen on TV. It looks vaguely like the Outlaw Star, but it isn't red and it's far more bigger than the Outlaw Star. It does have two grappler arms attached to it. You shrug and decide to follow the map on the PDA. The map takes you to what looks like a large cargo bay in the starship. In the cargo bay, there's several people working on what looks like mechas that look like the "forklifts" of the movie "Aliens". All of the people in the cargo bay are anime characters (or characters from the various Adult Swim shows).

"Hey, you're late!" yells a feminine voice behind you. You whirl around to see Aisha Clan-Clan from Outlaw Star standing there! She's wearing her normal clothes, including the large bell around her neck.

"I'm..." you start to say.

"What's your job here?" asked Aisha. "are you here for work...or are you my meal?"

"What?" you ask.

"Check your PDA" sighs Aisha. "honestly, why I must work with these stupid little Terrans?"

"WHO'RE CALLING SO LITTLE THAT I CAN FIT INTO A MOUSE HOLE?!!" shrieks a male voice that you have no problem in recongizing. You look around and see Edward Elric coming towards Aisha.

"Don't mess with me, Elric" said Aisha. "just do your job or I'm going to use you as a scratching post"

Aisha turns her attention back to you. You look down at your PDA and see that you are here....as Aisha's meal?!

"Oh goody" said Aisha, looking down at your PDA. "I'm terribly hungry and you look delicious"
123221.title: Cargo bay

choices: You go down the waste chute
1232211.content:
You smile at her in return. “Oh good, I was hoping I’d be useful.” you say as you stretch your arms. “So do I need to get any seasoning or do anything special?”

Aisha seems taken aback by your willingness to be her meal. “Um, well, there’s a room over there where you can get rid of those tasteless garnishes then we’ll….Hey, get back here!!” She yells when she realizes that the minute she turned to point out the room, you made a break for it. “Do you really think you can out run me?”

Actually, being what she is, she’ll run you down pretty quick unless you come up with something, and fast. As you vault a work bench your eyes alight on the viable options. A half stripped gundam is currently sitting in its berth, with no techs around it. Elsewhere, you see a small door marked ‘waste chute’. Given the Irate clan-clan closing in on you fast, you make up your mind in record time.
1232211.title: Feet don't fail me now!

choices: Go down into the river at the bottom of the canyon
12322111.content:
You don't like the "waste chute" room for some reason, so you're running with all of your might to the gundam. The gundam looks like Deathscythe from Gundam Wing, but is stripped down so it doesn't have the "scythe" along with it. The only way you know it's Deathscythe is because Duo Maxwell himself is overseeing the group of people that are working on it. Thinking quickly, you run up the stairs to the cockpit of Deathscythe before anyone can stop you. Aisha was right behind you, but a forklift blocks her path and so she doesn't see you flee to the cockpit.
"Hey!" yells Duo. "get out of my gundam!"
You take a moment to look around the cockpit and are able to close the cockpit before Duo can drag you out of Deathscythe. You manage to get Deathscythe in a standing postition and walk to the huge cargo bay doors that are opened. You make it out of the cargo bay and out of the ship. Quickly, you run Deathscythe out of sight of the starship and away from Aisha who would've eaten you. You run Deathscythe for a couple of miles, when you come upon a wide canyon. The other side of the canyon seems to lead to ToonTown from "Who Framed Roger Rabbit". The canyon goes down a good 20 miles (or so it says on a sign) and you just manage to see a river at the very bottom via the gundam's zoom fuction.
12322111.title: Grand Theft Gundam

123221112.content:
It takes some work but you manage to get the gundam down into the river. The water rises to the machine’s waist, but that’s still plenty of space to keep you dry.

“WARNING LIFE SUPPORT SYSTEM FAILING.” You glare at the computer as it makes its announcement. Having no other choice you open the main hatch on the gundam to allow fresh air in. As you maneuver the gunadam through the river, a nice cool breeze wafts over you; you close your eyes, enjoying the flood of relief at your escape when a shadow falls over you. You open your eyes to find one Aisha Clan-clan grinning at you.

“Did you really think you could run from me?” She taunts as she darts inside the open door to wrap you in a bear hug, nearly crushing your ribs. “I had plenty of time to hitch a ride on Duo’s toy before you got it moving. All I had to do was wait for you to pop the hatch.” Her tongue licks your cheeks and she purrs at the taste. “Now you’re all mine!” And with that she flips the switch that closes the hatch, sealing you in with her.
123221112.title: Smarter than you thought

1232211121.content:
The cockpit of a gundam is small and cramped. You wrestle with Aisha, knowing that it's useless to struggle with her. Aisha pushes you into the wall of the cockpit. That's when you hear a faint clicking sound from somewhere above you. Aisha heard the clicking sound to, for she looked up to see what had made the noise. You feel the wall behind you start to give way. Must be the escape hatch. Without another thought, you push with all your might on the wall and find yourself falling through the escape hatch. The escape hatch leads to a back hatch on the back of Deathscythe, which opens as you near it and you end up in the river. It's a slow river with little or no current. You start to swim for shore when Aisha jumps out of the escape hatch and comes after you. Once you make it to the shore, you start to run for all your worth. Outrunning Aisha is impossible, but you really don't want to be lunch. Suddenly, your PDA makes a bleeping sound. You really don't have the time to look at your PDA now.
The canyon was as wide as the river is, but there is a shore you can run on. Aisha is gaining on you and you hope and pray for a miracle to happen.
Just then, you hear a splash from behind you and you look back while running. Aisha has fallen into the river.....no...she didn't fall in...something has a hold on her in the river! You see a huge tentacle wrapped around Aihsa's middle and she's fighting whatever has grabbed her. You then make a choice to keep running...Aisha can handle things by herself and she's trying to eat you. You really don't wanna help someone who's going to eat you after you save them. So you keep on running down the river.
After 15 mintes of running, you see a small village in the distance...on the other side of the river. The small village is populated with anime and cartoon characters. You see one or two hippos from Fantasia fishing in the river, and you see InuYasha fishing as well. There's a bridge on your side of the river that leads to the village. Up ahead, the canyon and river go on as far as the eye can see. Will you go to the village or go on down the river and see where it takes you?
1232211121.title: Escape Hatch

choices: You and Adam talk some more
Adam is too busy to talk...so you mingle with the crowd
12322111211.content:
You make your way to the small village. You're tired of running and want to take a rest for a bit. If Aisha comes to the village, you can find a place to hide within the village. You walk the stone bridge to the village on the opposite side of the wide river. The village sits on a expanse of open land at the bottom of the canyon. The canyon's walls seem to go up forever as you look up. You never heard of a deeper canyon than this one. It's clear to you that you're in another world now...a world popluated by anime and cartoon characters.
You come to the village, which is named Hidden Springs. The village has a population of about 4,000 give or take. Most people of the village are anime characters, and cartoon characters from movies or on TV. There's May from Pokemon going into a beauty shop ran by Captain Planet. You walk on and you spot another human like you! The human looks to be in his mid to late 30's. He smiles at you when he catches sight of you.
"Good to see another human here" said the human. "my name is Adam and I live in this village"
"You live here?" you ask.
"Yep" said Adam. "I've lived here for 10 years now. I don't ever want to leave here. I run a bait shop. The fishing here is excellent"
You tell Adam your name and how you got here and who's chasing you.
"Aisha? She's harmless" said Adam. "she just likes to play it rough"
"But she wants to eat me" you say.
"Let her" said Adam.
"WHAT?!"
"You're a newbie,alright" said Adam. "listen, I like to explain it all to you, but I have a shop to run. I was running an errand for Bugs Bunny and I gotta go back to my shop"
You follow Adam to a 2-story building with "Adam's Bait Shop" written on a big sign over the entrance.
"This is the busy season" sighed Adam as he enters his shop to find that the shop is packed with people looking for fishing bait. You enter the shop too and see a total of 15 people in the shop. One woman catches your eye. She has long gray hair and is tanned. You have no trouble in regonizing her: she's Urd from Ah My Goddess! Urd is with Keiichi.
12322111211.title: Hidden Springs

12322111212.content:
You decide to keep going along the shoreline of the river. You could always go back to the village if you wanted to. Plus, you have a hungry Aisha following you and you need to get out of this canyon. So, you pass by the bridge that leads to the small village and continue on.
After about 4 miles of walking, you come to a waterfall that drops 100 feet. There's no way to get down either. You see that after the waterfall the canyon gets wider and wider....no doubt, you're near the end of this canyon. You then hear something splash in the water. You look around until you spot a hippo from Fantasia looking at you.
"Hi there" you say to the hippo.
"Hi there yourself" said the hippo in a female voice.
"No other way to go down, I see" you say pointing to the waterfall.
The hippo looks at what you're pointing at.
"Nope" said the hippo. "I wouldn't go that way if I were you, though"
"Why's that?" you ask.
"That leads into Oilano lands" said the hippo, as if that answered everything.
"Oilano?" you asked. "who are they?"
"You don't really know?" asks the hippo.
"No..are they dangerous" you ask.
"To humans, yes" said Hippo.
"Well....wait....you know that I don't belong here?"
"Yes of course" said the hippo. "I've seen a human before"
"How many humans are here?" you ask.
"Can't really say...around 1,000 I think"
"And they live here?"
The Hippo nods.
"Well, I got to hide" you say. "I'm being chased by someone that wants to eat me"
"You shouldn't worry about being eaten" said the hippo.
"Oh?"
"People don't get digested in cartoons, do they?" asked the hippo.
You are too stunned to speak.
"You're new here, aren't ya?"
You nod.
"Figured as much" said the hippo. "well, if you really need to hide somewhere...hide in me"
"WHAT?!"
"You won't digest" said the hippo. "I promise"
12322111212.title: An offer of help

choices: Break free and jump in the water!
123221112122.content:
Perhaps not. At this point, it is not a good idea to take ANY chances! You still want to find some way home... and you probably wont get there any faster if youre eaten alive!

"Uh... thanks, but no thanks," you tell the hippo, "I think I better find my own way outta here."
"Allright, if that's what you want!" the hippo tells you, "...oh. By the way, there's something caught on your shoe."

"Huh?" you look down in the water to where your feet are and see a tiny hook stuck on one of your shoes.
"What is thi-AAAAAHHH!!!" Before you could finish asking your question, you suddenly lose your balance and fall in the water while youre getting dragged upstream!!

You try to scream off the top of your lungs, but your mouth is allready filled with water! You can only watch in horror as this strange hook seems to be pulling you somewhere at such an incredibly fast pace.
*SSSPPPPLLLLAAASSSHHH!!*
Finally, that incredible strength that was pulling you up the river finally pulls you out of it!

"YEAH!!! I GOT ONE!!!" you hear a familiar voice shout. Next thing you know, you feel someone's hand grabbing you by the leg holding you upside-down! Before you can say a word, you see a pair of yellowish eyes staring into yours in intrigue...

These eyes come from that white haired dog-boy, Inuyasha whom you saw fishing by that village! Guess who he just caught?
"Hmm?" he looks at you strangely, "I didnt know humans live underwater..."

"L-Let me go!!!" you shout to him as he sniffs you out, "Put me down!!"
Inuyasha just seems to ignore your screams, "Well, youre no fish, but Im sure you'll taste just as good roasted over an open fire."
Did you just hear him say you think he said?! First cat-girl, then talking hippo, now mutt-man?

"WHAT?! Let me go allready, you dumb mutt!" you actually have the nerve to shout as you move around trying to break free of his hand.
"Shut up!" he glares at you, "I caught you fair and square. That makes you mine. So hush up and accept your role in the food-chain!"
"But.. but youre half-human!"

"Inuyasha!! You found him!!" Oh crap... you recognize that voice! It's Aisha! She caught up to you...
"Oh, hi Aisha," Inuyasha greets her, "What's up?" Apparently they know eachother.

"That human there is supposed to be my lunch," she tells him before reaching into your pocket for your PDA and showing it to him, "See? It says he's my food."
Inuyasha nods, "Yeah, I guess youre right. But hey! I DID manage to catch him... so you mind sharing?"

Aisha just smiles, "Oh, not at all! C'mon! Let's go make us a nice fire to roast our 'pig'!"

Wonderful. Now you have TWO predators on your ass! And regardless of what that hippo said, you'll be cooked before youre eaten so chances are you WONT survive the process...
You try to think fast about your options at this point. All you can think of now is trying to break your leg free from Inuyasha's hand and swim through the river again.

However, youre much too close to the waterfall now, and the river is moving at an even faster pace than before. If you jump in the water, you could wind up at the Oilano lands that the hippo warned you about..

Do you want to take the risk... or wait it out until you can come up with a better escape plan?
123221112122.title: Dinner for two?

choices: An Oilano speaking to you from the water
1232211121221.content:
You don't know what the Oilano are, but you don't wanna be cooked like a piece of meat. You struggle in the hands of Aisha and InuYasha, hoping to break free. With superhuman strength that surprises you, you manage to break free of your attackers and jump in the water and down, down, down the waterfall. You start to pray that you'll survive the 100 foot drop to the bottom.


You wake with a start and find yourself alive. You're at the bottom of the waterfall, being swept away by the strong current there. You manage to avoid running into the sharp rocks and make it out of the white water at the bottom of the waterfall. You make it to shore and look around. The canyon is more wide here than it was and you find yourself in a forest. You shake your head. What is it about people wanting you for a snack? The forest you're in now is not a dense forest...just a little forest beside the river. You see a sign nailed to a nearby tree that reads:


YOU ARE NOW ENTERING OILANO LANDS; ENTER AT YOUR OWN RISK


"Who are these Oilano?" you ask.
The PDA in your pockets makes more bleeping sounds and you decide to take a look at it. You see the following:


The Oilano

Recently discovered, the Oilano are a race of giant whales. The Oilano live in the Endless Ocean near Oilano Falls to the south and near Quahog in the north.
The Oilano can reach sizes of 700 to 1500 feet in length, or even bigger out in the Endless Ocean. The Oilano is a omnivore, eating whatever it sees in the ocean..even people..or other smaller Oilano.
Oilanos can speak in English and can speak it fairly well. Oilanos are friendly, but rather easy to anger. The best advice if you run into a Oilano is; be polite as possible or you might end up in its stomach.
There's also rumors about Oilanoilo, but these rumors are so fantasic that it can hardly be believed. Oilanos are said to be the offspring of a much bigger whale, An Oilanoilo. An Oilanoilo is a whale so big that it could swallow the world. An Oilanoilo is also called "The Space Whale"...but it's just a rumor that such a being can possibly exist.


"Giant whales...?" you say, hardly believing on what you just read. "why can't I run into some normal people?"


"All you have to do is go see Cassandra and she'll return you to the real world" said a voice from behind you. You whirl around and see....
1232211121221.title: Oilano Lands

choices: Tell him you'll find your own way...
12322111212211.content:
A whale? A yellowish colored whale it looks like! Could THIS be what is called an Oilano?
"Uh...um... are you a...um... oilano?" you build up the courage to ask.

"That I am.." you hear the voice call back to you, "and this is not a safe place for a human to be."
*rrrrruuuummmmbbbblllleeeee* Just then you hear a rumbling sound coming from underneith you..

When you look down, you notice the oilano getting bigger and bigger as the rumbles get more and more louder. It must be rising to the surface!!

*rrrruuummmmmmm-SPPPPPLLLLAAAAASSSHHHH!!!*

It arose out of the water with you riding on top of it! At first youre frightened, but then your mood changes completely when you check out the surface of the skin youre on.
It's not yellow. It's GOLD! Solid shining gold! Oilanos are made out of pure gold?! Yikes, if you could ever manage to hunt one of these down, youd be a made man!

"Try it and die, human!" Oh crap, did it just read your thoughts?! Youre a little freaked out, but you remember that you have to be very polite to it otherwise..

"Uh, Im sorry," you apologize, "uh... who's Cassandra?"

"She's the creator of this world. She has forged it out of her own imagination. Sometimes, humans from the human world stumble in upon it and cant leave it."

"Is there a way out?" you ask it.

"It's impossible to leave," it answers, "unless Cassandra lets you. If you want, I could take you to her."

Well, that does seem awfully easy enough. But then again, maybe TOO easy... still, should you trust this oilano to taking you to Cassandra?

You quickly object to her little theory! "NO! No no no no NO! Not at all! Me and her never, uh..." For some reason, you cant finish that sentence. You remember falling asleep to her lovely song... however, you cant remember your dream. All you do remember was that it was very, lack of a better term, SATISFYING!

No.. c'mon! That couldnt have happened... could it?

Urd just shakes her head and laughs, "Heh! Honestly... one of these days, Im just gonna have to spay her!" Just before disappearing into thin air.
You could only scratch your head, wondering such questionable thoughts.

You turn around and look back at the angel still sound asleep. Now that you no longer feel threatened by her, you sit down on the rubbery white ground just beside her, smiling.
Of course you cant help but admire such a beautiful black&white creature as her. She is indeed pretty... for a half-angel, half-demon being.

And that lovely song she sang to you that drifted you off to sleep... it sounded so familiar, but you cant remember where else you heard it. All you know is that is was such a heavenly ballad that practically took away your insomnia.
The next day, you woke up feeling so refreshed and rejuvenated, ready to start the day because of that song! You wonder if this could be the exact opposite effect that Cassandra would do to you...

...Wait! That's it! A bright idea just popped into your head! Maybe... maybe you can use this Angel's embrace to negate the effect of Cassandra. Perhaps by developing some kind of angelic immunity, you can reverse the Demon's curse and possibly escape the forest...

'Eh, it's just a theory' you think to yourself and shake your head, before scratching an itch on your arm. That's when you notice an eerie black rash appearing on that part of your arm youre scratching...

It doesnt look like an ordinary rash, but then again NOTHING'S ordinary in this cursed forest! It's probably nothing... but then again, it could be some kind of negative side-effect from the dream-sexUH I MEAN 'heavenly sleep' with World of Elegance... now wouldnt be a good time to take any chances!
12322221122112121.title: Demon's Curse Vs. Angel's Embrace

choices: Breakfast time; you and Urd talk some more
The news has taken away you appetite
123222211221121212.content:
The rash on your arm is a small one, barely five inches round, if that. It doesn't even hurt exactly..it just itches. You decide to ignore the rash for now. World of Elegance is still asleep and you decide to wait until she wakes up. You don't remember the dream you had with World of Elegance, but you don't really don't want to remember! Maybe this angel's embrace could cure you from Cassandra.
The rubbery chamber starts to slosh back and forth gently, meaning that Urd must be walking. The gentle rocking is hardly noticable,but it does wake up World of Elegance.
"Morning" she says brightly in your head.
"Er...good morning" you say. "Urd is getting us breakfast"
"Getting you breakfast" corrected W.O.E "I don't need to eat like you mortals do"
"What?" you ask.
"We get our energy...in a different way" said World of Elegance slyly. Does that mean angels get thier energy from..
"Hey! That's MY angel you're thinking about there" said Mini Urd, suddenly in front of you.
"I would never, ever sleep with W.O.E. or you" you say, sweating bullets.
"So you don't find me attractive?" asked Urd.
"Yes, I do" you say. "but.."
"Relax, kid" said Urd. "I know you didn't pull anything last night. It's just that World of Elegance is a little...forceful"
"Like you are?" you ask dryly.
"Yep!" said Urd. "World of Elegance is my higher self...and I always did like sleeping with mortals"
You feel like you're going to have a nosebleed.
"Don't tell me you're like Keiichi" said Urd.
"I.." you start to say.
"Now there's a head case if I ever saw one" said Urd. "Keiichi says he loves my sister, Belldandy, but doesn't want to take the next step. How boring! I would..." Urd stopped short when she noticed your rash on your arm.
"It's happening already?" asked Urd, staring at the rash. "usually, it doesn't strike so soon"
"What?" you ask.
"Looks small" said Urd. "that means it hasn't progressed as fast"
"Do you know where this rash came from?" you ask.
"You get that rash from being in this world" said Urd. "well...I should congraduate you"
"Why?" you ask nervously.
"You're becoming an anime character"
It takes a full five minutes for you to react.
"I'm becoming WHAT?!"
"An anime character" said Urd. "it happens sometimes to a mortal here. If you spend another month in this world, you won't be human anymore"
"How...can that be?" you ask, stunned to hear this nevs.
"Humans don't belong in this world" said Urd. "so, this world changes you into what belongs here. Most people turn either to an anime character or a cartoon character. It's too soon to tell with you"
"So...everyone that's wandered into that forest becomes animated?" you ask.
"Not everyone" said Urd. "about 9 out of 10 remain human"
"So why am I being effected?!" you ask.
"Because you had sex with an anime character" said Urd. "that tends to change humans"
"But..I never.." you stammer. "that was all in a dream, though!"
"Explains why the rash is so small" said Urd. "usually, you would be at least half human by now...but since you didn't have PHYSICAL sex, the change is effecting you more slowly than normal"
"Is there a cure?" you ask.
"By leaving this world" said Urd. "if you become a full-fledged cartoon or anime character, you won't ever be able to return to your world"
"And the only way to leave this world...is by talking to Cassandra" you sigh.
123222211221121212.title: The Rash of Change

1232222112211212122.content:
It seems as if Urd can practically sense that bit of sorrow in your tone of voice. Not only are you not fond of being trapped in the cursed forest forever, youre also not fond of turning into the one thing youre a huge fan of!
"Aw, cheer up!" she smiles at you, "It's not so bad! You get used to it really quick. Hey, youre probably just hungry! I'll go get you some breakfast."

Youre anything but hungry right now. Youre a little sad, angry, moody, excited, emotional, stressed out, calm, annoyed, even a little horny... but not hungry.
"No thanks," you reply, "I...Im not hungry."

The mini-Urd just shrugs her shoulders, "Allright. Suit yourself. But if you start to get hungry, let me know! Im always here!" She tells you with a carefree smile before turning her head to her Angelic higher self, "Youre THIS close to getting your tubes tied! THIS close!"

Finally, the mini-Urd disappears leaving you and World of Elegance alone once more. Normally, you wouldnt mind some more alone time with the angel, but after the side-effect from what you think is her method of 'feeding'... it just isnt the same!

"Are you mad?" you can hear her voice call out to you in your head as she smiles nervously at you.
You just smile back at her... not a happy smile, a sarcastic smile. "Yeah, kinda! You did practically seal my fate!" you show her the rash on your arm.

World of Elegance's eyes drop to the ground and she begins to frown... "Im sorry. It's... it's difficult for me to control the urges created by my alter. Im still not used to harboring these type of feelings." but then she looks back up at you with a smile, "Besides.. it is so hard to resist such a cute face!"

You actually blush a little after hearing that. Just hearing the angel say youre mood kinda softens your mood JUST a little.
"Well, I uh... youre not so bad looking yourself," you tell her, not really giving a damn what Urd would think, "And honestly, at any other time I would love to... you know... but, Im still a mortal human."

"I understand," her voice continues, "But in case you ever change your mind..." a little mischievous grin appears on her face, "...I'll be happy to make the dream come true!"

"Wouldnt that violate so many laws of nature?"
...That voice you just heard did NOT come from W.O.E. Nor did it come from Urd! It sounded male... youthy, yet stern. You look around the chamber to see where the voice came from, but no one else is there!

"W.O.E? Did you just hear someone a minute?" you ask her. Unfortunately, you get no response. "W.O.E? Are you listening to me?" You look back at the angel and STILL see that grin on her face. She's not even blinking!

"W.O.E? Are you allright?" She doesnt even move a muscle. "W.O.E?!!" you snap your fingers in her face, but still no response! She's frozen in place, but why?

"Why? So that we could talk!" there's the voice again!
"WHO ARE YOU?!" you shout, "SHOW YOURSELF!!!"

"Who am I?" the guy's voice asks, "Im you. Well, that is, Im going to be you... when the change is complete!"
The change? He must be talking about the rash! You look down at your arm and see that the rash is glowing! Could HE be... in there?

"Forget about leaving!" you hear him tell you, "Accept your fate. No one can escape the Mistress's cursed forest. So give it up!"

His arrogant tone sounds SO familiar, but you cant quite put your finger on it! "Goddamnit, who are you?!"

"You dont recognize me? That's just plain pathetic! Im practically the reason you started watching the show! Now you get the allmighty pleasure of being me!"

...NOW you start to remember! This arrogant bastard happens to be one of your old favorite cartoon villains! If you dont figure a way out of Cassandra's forest, youre gonna be...
1232222112211212122.title: Me (Not ME me, but YOU me!)

12322221122112121221.content:
The voice belongs to Mozenrath on the TV Show Aladdin! You're gonna turn into a cartoon villian if you don't get out of this forest and fast. Mozenrath was cool on the show, but you don't wanna change into the bastard!

"As me, you'll have control of the undead" said Mozenrath. "Aladdin defeated me once...but I'm coming back for revenge!"

"But...but...you're evil and I'm not!" you yell.

"Evil is a point of view" said Mozenrath. "and, by the way, only you can hear me and vice versa until the change is complete"

"So...I won't have control once the change is complete?!" you ask.

"I don't really know" said Mozenrath. "this is the first time I gone through this process"

"Urd might know" you say.

"Urd, eh?" asked Mozenrath. "I sorta like her demonic side...what if I said I could force the demonic part of Urd out"

"You have control of the undead" you say. "Urd is a goddess"

"I know a few forbidden magics" said Mozenrath slyly. "that'll allow me to take control of Urd"

"Yeah, and what would be the cost?" you ask. "you had a skeleton arm for payment of knowing your magic"

"You need some sacifice to get power" said Mozenrath.

"No!" you say. "I won't let you do it!"

"Like you're gonna stop me" scoffed Mozenrath.

"I could" you say. "you said so yourself that you didn't know which one of us will be in control once the change is complete"

"...Damn" muttered Mozenrath.

"How did you freeze time, anyway?" you ask.

"I didn't freeze time" said Mozenrath. "I just froze World of Elegance"

You look around and see that the organic chamber is still moving, but W.O.E. isn't moving an inch.

"Having fun talking to yourself?" asked Mini Urd, suddenly appearing in front of you.

"Urd!...I'm changing into.." you start.

"I know" said Urd. "you're turning into Mozenrath, a villian. Well, these things happen. You can't control WHICH cartoon character you'll change into"

"Which one of us will have control once the change is complete?" you ask.

"You'll both have partial control" said Mini Urd. "it's up to you if you want to play the part of a villian or not"

Mozenrath chuckled.

"And now" said Mini Urd. "if you don't mind.." Mini Urd snapped her fingers and W.O.E's grin went away and blinked.

"You shouldn't have let your guard down" said Mini Urd to W.O.E. "he's changing into Mozenrath, ruler of the Land of the Black Sand"
With that, Mini Urd vanishes.
12322221122112121221.title: Mozenrath

123222211221121212211.content:
The poor Angel's eyes widened after hearing those words. Something told you (and it wasnt her!) that she did not like the sound of that! Damn... it's not your fault youre gonna become Mozenrath. In a way, it's actually HER fault! But nonetheless...

"Um... Elegance?" you step just a few steps closer to her. Unfortunately, with each step you take, she steps back away from you. Still, you try to assure her that everything's gonna be ok.

"It's ok," you tell her, "It's still me. Im allright. Please dont be scared! Im still here!"
"...You wont be for long..." you hear Mozenrath gloat.

Thankfully, World of Elegance didnt hear his voice. "Im deeply... DEEPLY sorry!!" you hear her voice plea to you in your head, "I swear if I knew that this was going to happen-"

"It's allright," you smile at her, "Please dont fret. It's ok!"
Nope. No good. In fact, tears start falling from her eyes. "I... I cant believe what I had just did! I just doomed a mortal soul! Because of my unnatural lechery, a kind hearted human will be forced to turn against a cruel bloodthirsty sorcerer!"

She is truly broken up by all this. She even fell to the floor crying! You never knew angels could cry...
"...I dont deserve to be called an angel. I am not worthy of being alongside Urd. Why? Why didnt I just resist?"

"Cry me a river, woman," you hear Mozenrath mock her, "then soak in it!"
Damn. What exactly should you do at this point? What do you do with a crying angel that practically doomed your fate? Sure because of her, youre stuck sharing your body with a bloodthirsty sorcerer , but she's obviously sorry for what she had done!

World of Elegance really is something. It's only been a couple of hours and already youve grown so attached to her. Which is a huge reason why you cant just stand around and let her cry.

But before you could think of doing something about it, your co-vessal has to open his big mouth! "Look, uh... Stewart..."
"STEVEN!" you shout to Mozenrath in your head!
"Like it really matters. Anyway, hate to break this to you, but if youre thinking about getting with an angel, think about this: IT'S UNNATURAL! In fact SO unnatural, that if you mate with an angel, your testicles will melt off!"

"Youre fucking kidding me!" is all you could reply to me. However, he returns your reply, "No, I am not. You see... uh.. I made such a foolish mistake once. Losing my arm felt great compared to THAT kind of pain!"

....Ouch.
123222211221121212211.title: Unnatural

choices: Digesting won't help get rid of Mozenrath
1232222112211212122111.content:
As much as you want to comfort World of Elegance, you just can't mate with her. Whoever heard of a mortal mating with an angel? Your testicles could melt off...or something far more worse could happen. You keep your distance to the poor crying angel with one black wing and one white wing.


"I must admit, she is a pretty one" said Mozenrath.

"You would say that..." you mutter.

"Relax, Stoven"

"STEVEN!"

"Whatever" said Mozenrath. "when we get out of here, I'm going back to my land and plan to get revenge on Aladdin and his friends"

"Is that all what you think about, revenge?"

"Of course" said Mozenrath. "I'm a villian"

World of Elegance's crying is getting softer and softer. You look over to W.O.E. and see that she cried herself to sleep.

"Good riddance" said Mozenrath. "now, let's get out of here"

"No" you say. "you're aren't the boss of me"

"Not yet" said Mozenrath.

"Anyway, do you really think that Urd will let a villian like you escape from her....stomach....?" you voice trails off.

"Hey! Hey!" said Mozenrath. "I know what you're thinking, and it isn't going to help"

"How do you know?" you ask.

"I just do" said Mozenrath.

"I'm going to ask Urd" you say. "Urd, if you..." your voice cuts out suddenly.

"Hey, let me talk!" you yell at Mozenrath in your head.

"No way" said Mozenrath.

"I would rather be digested by Urd than to turn into an evil villian like you!" you yell.
1232222112211212122111.title: An idea

choices: Youre not going through with this!
12322221122112121221112.content:
That's quite a bold statement. You would actually kill yourself before you'd let Mozenrath run your life. You would throw it all away just to prevent yourself from becoming a slave to your new alter-ego...

"You cant possibly be serious!" he doubts your efforts. Unfortunately, being a part of you, he quickly picks up the fact that you ARE being serious!

"Ok ok ok! Alright!!" he tells you, "It just so happens I MIGHT know a way we can get ourselves separate bodies!" Oh, so NOW he might happen to know a way!
"Start talking, Mowzie!" you order him.

"It's like this, Stove-Top..."
"For the last time, it's STEVEN!!!"
"Yeah yeah... anyway, Stefan... I THINK I remember hearing centuries ago about a sacred forest that grows golden apples said to cure all known curses... yours included."

"A sacred forest of golden apples?" you ask him, "Where is it?" You can hear Mozenwrath shrug a bit as if he's a little reluctant to telling you.
"Ugh... it's in Cassandra's garden. Dont know where it is... dont even know if it's real. All I know is that it's completely forbidden to mortals."

Hmm.. he seems to know quite a bit more than he's trying to lead on! Still, an opportunity to get him out of you still would come in handy!
"Uh.. if you knew about this the whole time, why didnt you say anything earlier?!"

"Like I said, I only THINK I remember hearing about it somewhere!" he answers, "Plus, I-er, WE cant go there, because mortals are forbidden in Cassandra's garden!" Oh. As usual, your last hope just doesnt come easy! But just before you could sigh in depression, you sense that Mozenrath has something in mind!

"However... I heard that angels get free passage... to be sacrificed to feed the forest guardians...." Angels? And almost like instinct, you turn your head to the sad World of Elegance fast asleep. Oh crap... now you know what he's up to!

"...No!" you start shaking your head, "Hell no! Forget about it!"
"What other choice do you have?" he asks you, "she's probably our only hope to going our separate ways!"

Despite the fact that a certain relationship would lead to horrible side-effects, you dont have the heart to just have her sacrificed like that!
"Im not doing that!" you object, "It's too cruel! Besides... Urd would kill us!"

You can sense a smug grin on Mozenrath's face. "I know how we can sneak her out without that goddess bitch knowing!"
Figures... figures that sorcerer would have something up his sleeve. But regardless of what he has in store for Urd and her angel, you just dont want any part in this!

"What other choice you got?" he asks you in that eerie tone, "Oh yes.. you can always just accept sharing your weak pathetic body with me... and Im sure we'll become the BEST of friends!"

...jerk.
12322221122112121221112.title: The Internal Struggle

choices: There is something different about you
123222211221121212211121.content:
“Urd!” you call as you reach a decision. ‘Wait, what are you doing?....Talk to me Steam puff?!’ you ignore him and open your mouth to call Urd again, when her mini form appears before you.

“Yes?” she says, head tilted curiously to the side.

You take a deep breath. “I think it would be best if you ended me.” You say quietly, Mozenwrath erupts into a series of curses. “I don’t want to take the chance of this monster getting loose.” You finish “Just…just make it quick and painless please.” Mozenwrath began listing reasons not to do this, but the price for survival was too high to pay. Thus you chose to close your eyes in preparation for the end.

You heard the villain wail in anguish as his end came.

However you opened your eyes a moment later to find yourself alive and human, with Urd giving you an amused smile. “Self sacrifice…” she began “I didn’t think you had it in you but you did.” Seeing your puzzled look she calmly explained “A willingness to sacrifice your life for others is the only way to rid yourself of the villain’s curse.”

You fall, landing on your rump, as you try to assimilate what happened. You look at yourself searching for anything different.
123222211221121212211121.title: Too high a price

1232222112211212122111212.content:
Good news is the anime rash on your arm is gone... the bad news is SO IS THE REST OF THE ARM!! And even worse, it's been replace by some bizarre, furry, brown bear-like claw with long white razor sharp fingernails!

Is THIS supposed to be worth defeating a wicked sorcerer through self-sacrifice?! "Wha... what the hell happened to my arm?!" you shout.
Unfortunately, Urd just smiles as if it's not even out of the ordinary! "Oh that? Not to worry, it's just a little side-effect called the 'Neppis Bane Effect'. It's what tends to happen whenever an anime character's soul is extracted from a human body."

You can safely say you never heard of this Neppis Bane Effect, but it does leave you with one big question, "Uh.. is this permanent?"

Thankfully, Urd shakes her head! "Nope! Usually it only lasts for about 24 hours. But sheesh... Im more suprised that after all these years, a mortal actually passed my test! I am impressed!"

"W w w w WAIT!!" you nearly jump up, "Your test?!"
"Oh yes," she answers, "after you gotten the curse in your arm, I had to test to see whether you were worthy enough to be cured... so I had to use Mozenrath to determine how low you'd sink to be cured."

Mozenrath?! She used Mozenrath?! "You.. you used Mozenrath?" you asked. Just then you heard that certain family sinister voice... come out of Urd's mouth! "Actually, Stephonavich... there is no Ruler of the Black Sand! I happen to be the master of Ventriloquism! AHAHAHAHAHA!" She actually puts her hand to her mouth and laughs in Mozenrath's voice!

Wow... so all of this was just a test to see if you were worthy enough to be cured. Guess you shoulda expected it! Typical of a god...

*YAAWWWWWNNN!* Just then, you overhear your sleeping roommate behind you wake up with a loud yawn. Wait until World of Elegance hears the good news!
She can actually notice the positive mood youre in. "Hm? What happened?" you hear her voice ask you in your head.

"Good news," you tell her, "it turns out it was all just a-"

"-TEST?!!!" W.O.E. jumped up in the air flapping her wings around! Apparently it took her by suprise! "You mean to tell me I cried my eyes out because of some stupid test?!"

Oh dear. Apparently, she's mad too! But can you blame her? Come to think of it, that was pretty cold.
"Relax, Elegance," Urd tries to calm her down, "the important thing is that he's gonna be just fine."

No youre not. Now that you think about, that wasnt pretty cold. That was damn stone-cold! "Wait a sec. If Mozenrath was a lie... what about when you said mating with an angel would melt my balls off?!"

Urd's eyes immediately widened when you said that. And judging by the glare on the angel's face, she was PISSED! "You... you told him WHAT? THAT is a blatant lie!! Urd, how could you tell him that?"

"Look, I can explain. I-"

"Oh my god," you shudder to yourself, "that IS messed up." You dont know what kind of game Urd is playing with you, but damn if youre gonna keep playing it!

But before you could even protest, you look down at notice your feet are no longer touching the ground. That's because the black & white angel is carrying you off of it!
"W...W.O.E!!" you shout, worried about what she's up to, "Where are you taking me?!"

She doesnt answer you. She just continues flapping her wings as she seems to heading toward that big opening in the chamber's ceiling!

To make matters worse for you, you hear Urd's voice coming from everywhere. It's as if her real body's the one shouting, not that mini-Urd!
"HEY!!" said the voice, "YOU CANT JUST LEAVE!!"

You dont even want to, but it's not like it's your choice. W.O.E. seems to be determined to get out, and with you! You dont wanna leave, but it's not like you have much of a choice.
After all, you do know how upset World of Elegance is. You wouldnt wanna do anything to anger her... nor do you wanna do anything to anger Urd, either!
1232222112211212122111212.title: A test? ....A TEST???!!!!

choices: W.O.E. makes it out of Urd's body with you
12322221122112121221112121.content:
"I don't wanna leave!" you manage to yell as you begin to struggle against World of Elegance. W.O.E. doesn't say anything, but tries to hold onto you. You can see tears coming from the eyes of World of Elegance! You continue to struggle as W.O.E. makes her way up the throat of Urd. Urd is trying to keep W.O.E. and you from escaping by sending down food down her throat, but the angel dodges every piece of food. You struggle violently, not wanting to leave.

As you pass the entrance to Urd's windpipe, W.O.E is hit in the face by an entire apple. The impact sends her falling back into the throat and she loses her grip on you! You fall back down the throat, shooting past the windpipe entrance and heading towards the stomach again. You're almost to the stomach again when W.O.E. grabs you again and starts flying up the throat again.


"Wait! I Wanna stay here...for a bit longer, at least" you say.

W.O.E. doesn't respond.

"WORLD OF ELEGANCE" said the booming voice of Urd all around you. "Drop him. You can escape if you want, but I want him to stay"

"SHUT UP!" yells W.O.E.
12322221122112121221112121.title: Struggle against her!

123222211221121212211121211.content:
Quite a sad situation, huh? You couldnt be in more deeper shit, and it aint even your fault youre IN this situation!! Your angelic crush will stop at nothing to betray her alter and escape from her with you in her grip!

"Elegance! Please, listen to me!" you plead to her, "you dont have to do this. Please let me go!"
Again, no good. She just glares up toward the opening as more and more grapes and banana slices drop down from it!

At this rate, World of Elegance will just be knocked back down into the stomach whereas she'll fly right back out and be knocked back in and so on and so on until either Urd or her gets tired! But sadly, seeing as though neither of them have certain mortal limits, they'll never get tired!

But just then W.O.E. looks down at that 'Neppis Bane' claw of yours and by the way she grabs your arm and points it toward the ceiling, it seems as if she's got an idea!
"Quickly!" her inner voice calls out to you, "Use it!"

"But.. use what?!" you ask her, "how am I supposed to-"
"JUST DO IT!!!" That's all you heard. It's not like you had much of a choice at the moment, either! All you could do was guess what exactly your Effected arm could do...
And you guessed right!

*BAAAAAZZZOOOOOOOOOMM!!* A humongous ray of light bursted out of your fingertips, obliterating every single bit of food that was in the way!
And unfortunately for Urd, the blast came straight out of her mouth, leaving her coughing and gagging as her eyes watered.

Thanks to your dumb luck, you and W.O.E. were able to fly straight out of Urd! The moment you leave her body, you and World of Elegance finally revert back to normal size! Great news... if it were under different circumstances!

W.O.E. still hasnt let go of you! She just darts out of Urd's room and flies through the hallway!
You can overhear Urd's angry ANGRY voice from across the room, "I.... TOLD... YOU... TO LEAVE HIM!!!"

At this rate, you could question whether or not Urd would go as far as to kill her angelic alter for this! Speaking of which... she never answered your question!!
WHERE IS SHE TAKING YOU?! It feels as if she knows exactly where she's going. But where is she going?

You sigh one last time before asking, "For the last time, W.O.E., can you PLEASE tell me where youre taking me?"
Her sky blue eyes stare deep into yours as you hear the answer in your head...
123222211221121212211121211.title: Viva Las Neppis!

1232222112211212122111212111.content:
"Cassandra's Mansion. That's the only way you'll find any peace" said World of Elegance.

"But...but..you can get to her house?" you ask. W.O.E made no reply but she winked at you. You and W.O.E. go through the hotel in Argabah until you two are out of the hotel, and W.O.E. started to go north at an unbelievable amount of speed. As you watch, you see buildings and other towns zip past you. 12 minutes later, You two are entering a thick forest, and a few moments after that, you come out of the forest and you're now in front of the Victorian house that Cassandra lives in!

"But...but...she'll drain my life away" you say as you and W.O.E. walk up towards the house.

"I can cure you" said W.O.E. "Urd will find us pretty quickly"

The two of you come up the porch that surrounds the three sides of the Victorian. The door to the house has a bat's head on it, and the bat's head was in the very center of a star within a circle. W.O.E. knocked upon the door.

The bat's head opened its eyes and peered at you and W.O.E before speaking; "Tylana Cassandra hilo donesan't dor'ami eckut!"

"Damn it, can you speak English?" asked W.O.E. "That demonic speech makes my throat sore"

""Tylana Cassanda hilo donesan't dor'ami eckut!" said the bat's head again.

"Well, when will she come back?" asked W.O.E.

"Tylana Cassandra hilo donesan't dor'ami e---"

"I know she isn't in!" shouted W.O.E. "when will she get back, you stupid guardian! Is Dennis in?"

"Dennis hilo doen" said the bat's head.

"Who's Dennis?" you ask.

"Let him know that we're here" said W.O.E. "and that Steven would like to see the mistress"

"Tylana Cassandra--"

"Just tell Dennis to open the door" said W.O.E.

The bat's head sighed and melted into the door and was gone.

"What was that all about?" you ask.

"Dennis is Cassandra's lover" said W.O.E. "he's a human that has lived here for 11 years now. He's Cassandra's housekeeper"

"He's human and he lives with a succubus?!" you ask.

"...Yes" said W.O.E.

"Doesn't he know...?" you start to ask.

The bat's head returned to the door and a moment later, the door opens by a red-haired man in his early 30's.

"What do you want, World of Elegance?" asked Dennis.

"I came here to 'cure' Steve" said W.O.E.

Dennis looks at you up and down. "Car broke down?" You nod. Dennis sighed.

"Alright, he can stay here until Mistress Cassandra" said Dennis.
1232222112211212122111212111.title: "Tylana Cassandra hilo donesan't dor'ami eckut!"

12322221122112121221112121112.content:
And staid here until Mistress Cassandra appeared you did. It wasnt a long wait, though. You didnt really have enough time to think about what you'd say to her... or what would happen to you. Nope, instead you spent too much time hoping to God that Urd wouldnt catch up with you... you DID kinda steal her angel... kinda.

"THERE YOU ARE, ZAM!" Oh crap! Youre busted! Youre caught! Youre dead! Youre-wait a second... did that voice just say "zam"?
You turn your head to see that little ninja/receptionist from back at that hotel! Whew... it's not Urd. However...

"What are you doing outside of your hotel room? Does Urd know youre here, zam? And does she know you have her angel?!" Yukimaru starts questioning you. You try to keep your cool as you try to explain things, "Look! I can explain! You see, it's-"

"Hello, Cassandra," Dennis greeted her. Why did he call Yukimaru Cassandra?

"Aww..." she shrugged as her voice started to change a bit, "Dennis! Why couldnt you let me mess with their heads a little longer?!" Yukimaru clapped her hands together and chanted a few words as her body started to grow and morph.

Her skin lightened to a much paler color, her hair turned a greenish color, her feet became hooves like a bull, demonic wings sprouted out of her back while mini-demon wings sprouted from the sides of her head. Those eerie red eyes of hers began staring into your soul...
THIS was Cassandra. Normally you'd be shocked out of your mind, but at this rate, you've seen worse!

World of Elegance, however, seemed terrified out of her gourd judging by the way she's hiding behind your body shivering. Cassandra must be giving her a REAAAAAAAAAAAL bad vibe.

"Hiya!" she raised her hand in greeting!
"Um... hello-OWWW!!" you screamed as you felt nails dig into your back!
"S,,,sorry!" W.O.E. apologized.

"This guy wants to be cured," Dennis spoke for you.
"Yes, I know," Cassandra replied, "Steven Johnson. You were driving home from Niagra Falls, but your car broke down in my forest. Your unknowing relationship with a goddess's personal caused you to become cursed, am I right?"

"Yeah," you nod, "on the dot." You extend your beastlike arm to her.
"Ahhh... Neppis Bane!" Cassandra studies it, "quite a rare curse... you mustve done something REALLY nasty with your angelic friend!"

"Uh.... not that I know of," was all you could say while Elegance just blushes.

"Well, there are TWO alternatives to getting rid of this curse," the succubus says, "There's a quick and simple way.... and a slow and harshly difficult way to removing your curse!"

"What would I have to do?" you ask. Unfortunately, she wont exactly tell you both of them... instead, she'll make you choose which choice you'd rather pick.

"Im afraid it doesnt work that way," she says, "You can only choose which alternative you want to go through. You can only find out what they are WHEN you choose!"
"WHAT?!! WHY?!"
"Because that's just the way I am, sweetie," is all she says... you have to pick a choice you dont even find out about UNTIL you pick it! ...Aint life fair?

The obvious choice would be quick and simple, but there has to be a catch. Maybe you should pick slow and harshly difficult just to be safe. Either way, neither choice seems promising!
12322221122112121221112121112.title: Game on!

choices: You and W.O.E. walk back to Argabah
Urd comes and takes back W.O.E. and decides to help you
123222211221121212211121211122.content:
"Uhh....slow and diffucult" you say.

Cassandra looks to be somewhat dissapointed at your choice, but she instantly brightens and hands you a bucket.

"Slow and diffucult it is!" said Cassandra. "in order to break the Bane curse, you'll need to pick a few dozen magic flowers known as Jizzarl"

What was so hard and slow about that?

"The Jizzarl flower only grows in one place" said Cassandra. "in a far-away land called The Land of the Black Sand"

"WHAT?!" you and W.O.E. yell.

"Your curse isn't cured" said Cassandra. "when you were willing to give up your own life rather than live as a villian, the curse didn't go away...it's still there...but it's slowed to a crawl now. The only way you can stop from turning into Mozenrath is to pick the Jizzarl flowers from his land"

"And how am I supposed to get there?" you ask.

"The Land of the Black Sand is exactly 666 miles away from Argabah" said Cassandra, who smiled. "Hey, you wanted long and slow, so you HAVE it. You'll need to bring me 5 dozen of Jizzarl flowers and I'll make a cure for you...for a price, of course"

"What's the price?" you ask.

"Have sex with me" said Cassandra.

"But, Mistress---" started Dennis.

"My word is law here, Dennis" said Cassandra.

"Do I have to have sex with you now or later?" you ask.

"Your choice" said Cassandra.

"Later, then" you say. "okay, I'll do it"

"And you MUST do it without any cars, or other vechicles" said Cassandra.

"But...it's in the middle of a dessert!" you protest.

"You said you wanted the long and slow choice...this is it" said Cassandra.

You sigh.
123222211221121212211121211122.title: The long and slow path

1232222112211212122111212111222.content:
With a blink of an eye, youre no longer in Cassandra's mansion! Cassandra is nowhere to be seen! All that is seen is a huge vast desert... and nothing BUT desert everywhere. You'd assume youre near Agrabah, but you dont even know WHERE Agrabah is!!

666 miles... to the land of the black sand... on foot. No vehicles or anything to take you there! Just swell. It's probably been only a couple miles through the desert and already youre feeling the effects of fatigue.

"We...we need to stop... and rest.." you sigh. Although Elegance doesnt say anything (nor THINK anything), you can tell she agrees with you as she rests beside you...
At this rate, you probably have about 636 miles to go! Normally, you'd suggest that W.O.E. simply fly the two of you toward the land of the black sand... however, just by the overly tired look on her face, she doesnt look like she can manage it! Your angelic friend seems to be getting weaker. She seems even less active and headstrong anymore... if you had to guess, it's probably due to being away from her goddess for too long.
Well... there is actually the certain ALTERNATIVE to restoring some of her power, but not even you have enough strength to endure the process! Besides, that's what got you in this mess in the first place!

Sigh... where is Urd when you need her?
"You called?" said that familiar voice breathing down your neck only a few inches behind you! You slowly turn your head and back away from the godly presence whom you escaped and inadvertinely stole an angel from!

"Uh... nice to see you again, Urd!" you smile nervously. Unfortunately, the smile isnt returned.
"Right. Now care to explain to me what youre doing here?" she ordered, "and without ME?!" There is no time to start to fight, so you just get straight to the point. "Look, we're headed for the land of the black sand to pick a few dozen Jizzarl flowers."

"Jizzarl flowers?" Urd raises an eyebrow, "Youre actually going over 600 miles to a cursed desert of the undead to pick flowers?! Why?"
"It's a deal with Cassandra," you answer, "so that she'd cure me of this!" you point to that beast arm of yours, "that way, I wont turn into Mozenrath..."

"M...MOZENRATH?!!" Urd lets out a loud shout of suprise that could possibly be heard in the land of the black sand! "But... but that was just a joke! It's not true! Youre not gonna turn into Mozenrath!"

"Gee, I hope not ALL holy divinities are that stupid." a colder, stern voice came out of your mouth as you said those words. Worse even, you didnt even THINK about saying them! You quickly put a hand to your mouth! "Oh crap did I just say that?!"

Urd, on the other hand, seemed a little recourse of your little outburst, "EXCUSE me?! What did you just say?!" You want to apologize for whatever made you say that, but all that comes out is, "Oh... so theyre deaf AND stupid! Heh, guess that means they'll be easy to take down!"

Oh crap! That arrogant smug tone sounds vaguely familiar...
"Mozenrath?!" you shout in your normal tone... which quickly changes, "Not exactly. But I can assure you, it is not Urd... although I did enjoy her ventriloquism! She might make for some fun entertainment later!"
NOT EXACTLY Mozenrath?! If it's not him, but it's not you... who is it?
"Steven?" World of Elegance looks toward you in concern, "Are you alright?"

"Elegance. Return to me," Urd commanded to her.
"But Steven-"
"NOW, Elegance!" Not given any other choice, she sighs and returns to Urd's side.

"As for you," you can hear Urd sound much less carefree and much more demanding, "as soon as we free you of this curse... you're going to work your ass off making me VERY happy!"

"Ooo... someone's in trouble!" your other voice mocks you.
"SHUT UP!" you shout back at it!

"Now let's get moving!" Urd ordered, "We need to get there by sundown!"
1232222112211212122111212111222.title: Look Who's Talking (no, it aint babies!)

choices: You're all able to sneak without getting spotted by Templeton
12322221122112121221112121112222.content:
"I don't think so, you stupid bitch" said that stern voice again from YOUR mouth! You instantly cover your mouth with both hands. Urd turns around and is giving you the evil eye. Since Urd is half-demon, she CAN give you the evil eye...and you try to look anywhere but Urd's eyes, but you're glued to them. Urd comes over to you and slaps you across the face.


"OUCH! THAT HURT, YOU LITTLE WHORE!" There's go that stern voice again!

"WHAT DID YOU...?!" asked Urd.

"It's wasn't me!" you yell in your normal voice. "it's Mozenrath!"


"NOT QUITE Mozenrath, you twit" you say in the stern voice.

"Not quite Mozenrath?" asked Urd.

"Let's just go and get the Jizzarl Flowers" you say in normal voice.

"NO!"

"We're going!" yells Urd, grabbing you by the sruff of your neck and forces you to walk with her. The endless desert is all around the three of you, and it's tottally desolate. The stern voice is still protesting, using your voice to insult Urd and her parentage. After you insult her mother, Urd throws you down...HARD!!

"I had it with you, mortal" said Urd. "you've gone too far this time! THIS MEANS PUNISHMENT!"

"But it's not me!" you plead to Urd, getting on your hands and knees and pleading with this goddess.

"Urd!" yelled W.O.E. "it's not his fault! It's the curse"

"Yeah" said the stern voice. "trust the little angel whore"

"You can pick those flowers by yourself" said Urd, walking away from you.

"Good riddance" said the stern voice.

"NO!" you yell in your normal voice. "don't leave me, Urd! Please!" But Urd is out of earshot by now and it looks like she's not coming back! You start to cry.

----------


Later, as you walk in the desert, you feel yourself loosing your strength. You're going to die out here in the desert, with that stern voice as company! As you crest a large sand dune, you see that there's a village off in the distance. No...it's not a village. It's the remains of a fairly large county fair. Who would have a fair so far out in the desert?

"DON'T go there" said the stern voice. "you'll regret it"

"Like I would trust you" you say. "and WHO ARE YOU, ANYWAY?!"

"You'll find out" said the stern voice slyly. "just don't go to that fair"

"Why shouldn't I?" you ask.

"Because it's the home of a rat named Templeton" said a voice from just behind you! You whirl around to see Urd standing there!

"You came back!" you say, glad to see the norse goddess. Urd doesn't look pleased, though.

"The Big Boss Lady sent me back to make sure you don't die" said Urd.

"The Big Boss Lady?" you ask. "who's that?"

"Someone who is extremely short" said Urd, looking skyward and raising her voice slightly. You look skyward, but the only thing you can see is the sun.

"You don't need you" said the stern voice. "leave!"

"The Big Boss Lady told me about you, Mr. Stern Voice" said Urd. "Mr. Not-Quite Mozenrath--whatever that means. Now, we should steer clear of that fair down there"

"Why?" you ask.

"It's the home of Templeton the rat" said Urd.

"So...?" you ask. "Wait...Templeton? You mean from Charlotte's Web?"

"Bingo!" said the stern voice. "give that boy a cigar!"

"So what's that gotta do with keeping away?" you ask.

"Templeton eats everything and everyone that gets near him" said Urd.

"That little rat?" you ask.

"He isn't so little anymore" said Urd. "we should get out of here before he sees us"
12322221122112121221112121112222.title: Urd is sent back

123222211221121212211121211122222.content:
After all that youve said to Urd (despite the fact that it wasnt really YOU that said it!) you do NOT want to get on her bad side again... and to keep from doing that, you need to do EXACTLY as she says and keep your friggin mouth shut!

Unfortunately, the amusement park is HUGE, so going around it might take it too long. The quickest way out would have to be through it, but then again, youre most likely to be caught by Templeton. Besides, Urd said steer clear of it, so that's what youre gonna do.
"Wow, when are you ever gonna grow a pair?" the voice whispered to you. "SHUT UP!" you whisper back!

Speaking of which, as all of you continue walking down the path (with the exception of World of Elegance who was hovering around Urd's side), you still feel bad about what happened earlier.
"Um... Urd?" you try to speak up. All that comes out of her is "Hmm."

"Look, uh... Im really sorry about earlier," you apologize, "I didnt mean any of those things that came out of my mouth. Especially about Hi-" Before you could mention HER name, Urd immediately turned her head to you and glared at you with that near-demonic stare of hers! After edging the point-of-no-return, you decide the best option would be to shut up.

"Dont worry Steve," thankfully, you hear the angel's heavenly voice sooth your pain, "She'll come around."
"Thanks, Elegance," you thank her in thought. But the stern voice whispers again, "You REALLY wanna nail that thing, dont you?"
"For the last time... SHUT...UP!"

*BAAANNNNGGG* Before you and the voice could go at it, you heard a loud sound that sounded like a bang.
"Whoa! What was that, Urd? ...Urd? .....URD?!"She doesnt answer. You assume she's still pretty pissed off, but when you turn your head to see her, she's face-down on the ground, not moving!

"URD!!" you lean down and check her. She's still breathing. The woman's still alive, but out cold! What the hell did that?
"Heads up!" the stern voice warned you. "Huh?" you look up... JUST in time to see a big furry first hit you STRAIGHT smack in the face!

*POOOOOOWWW!!* Everything goes black....

****************************************************

"HEY! Wake up you worthless sack of rat shit!!" that pleasant sound of that bastard voice wakes you up from you slumber! "Ughh...." you slowly wake up aching... mostly your face is hurting from that fist to your face. If you had to guess, that was probably Templeton.

"Damn rat," the voice mutters, "I'll skin that fat waste of-" You ignore HIM and look around at where you are. All you see are reflections of yourself all over... it's a room full of mirrors. Could you perhaps be in the Hall of Mirrors? Well, it beats waking up inside the stomach of a giant rat...
Speaking of which, you realized something. Urd's not here! Neither is W.O.E.!

"Urd?!" you look around only to spot your own reflection all over the place, "Where's Urd?!"
"Who cares?" the voice replied in his uncaring tone, "let's just get outta here before that rat finds us!" Although youre worried about her (or more worried about the angel), there's not much you can do. But before you can even think of getting out of the park, you gotta get out of the House of Mirrors.

"I want her. She will grand attraction to the KaibaZoo Im opening up."
"No way! Not MY daughter! She's coming home. Back to Hell where she belongs! No more following that little midget's orders."

What the hell? You can overhear a conversation going on...

"Whatever she plans on paying you, I'll double it! I need that angelic creature as our signature display! We'll have the very first angel in captivity..." said the familiar smooth-yet-demanding male voice.
"PST! Take the angel! I dont care, just give ME Urd." said the familiar carefree feminine voice.
"Whatever. Do what you want with the women....Just give ME the boy," said another familiar voice, but sounds a little more dark and sinister..., "Or rather, just give me his cursed arm. I dont need the rest of his body."

Apparently two of the voices seemed to be talking about Urd... could the third be talking about you?
"Heheheh! Relax, everybody!" said that weasely voice you recognize as Templeton, "We can all come to some sort of agreement. After all, sales arent final!"

'Sales arent final'? What the hell does that mean?
"It means that rat is planning on selling you and that divine whore like used cars," the voice answers! ....WHAT?! Templeton's gonna sell you?! Well, I guess you'd understand, since he IS a dirty rat... but who is he planning on selling you to? Those voices did sound familiar... Maybe you should sneak closer toward those voices to find out.

"FORGET IT!" the voice already knew what you were thinking, "let's just get out of this place! Ive had enough fun for tonight..." Perhaps he's got a point. Maybe it'd best to just run... but then again, what about Urd? And W.O.E?
"...God youre soft."
123222211221121212211121211122222.title: Damn dirty rat...

1232222112211212122111212111222221.content:
You figure that Urd and W.O.E. can take care of themsleves. In the meantime, you decide to get the hell out of here. You don't wanna be sold like a used car. Anyway, isn't Templeton suppose to eat whoever enters the fair? Or...is that fat rat not hungry? Well, you're glad that you didn't wake up in Templeton's stomach. You get off of the floor and begin to walk down the hallway of mirrors. You manage to get quite far without walking into a mirror. You still hear the voices coming from somewhere in the hall of mirrors.

"What do you mean, 'all sales aren't final', you little fat rat?"
"I ain't so little now" came Templeton's response.
"Yeah, yeah. If it wasn't for you fat stomach, you'll be small"
"Hey, now!" said Templeton. "want to go into my stomach?"
"Can we get back to the main issue please? I Just want Urd. Take that angel whore away and eat her for all I care...I just want Urd"
"Hmm...angel food" said Templeton thoughtfully.
"And I want that cursed arm that kid has"
"I'm gonna sell the kid" said Templeton. "arm and all. I need money, after all"
"How much for the kid, then?" asked a new voice. This voice sounds female and it has a slight echo to it.
"Well, well...if it isn't the Big Boss Lady" said Templeton.
The Big Boss Lady?
"You can't sell the kid to her!"
"Yeah! She only wants him for herself"
"Please" said the Big Boss Lady. "I want him just to set him free of this place"
"I'd be willing to sell him to you for $500" said Templeton.
"I'd be willing to pay $700!"
"$1000!"
"$2500" said the Big Boss Lady.


You are steadily going away from the voices. It sounds like there's 4 or more people, including Templeton.
"I wonder who's the Big Boss Lady" wonders the Stern Voice aloud.
"Be quiet!" you hiss.


"You only want him as a sex toy!"

That voice belonged to Templeton, and it was quite loud.

5 minutes later, you manage to find the exit to the hall of mirrors. The hall of mirrors is in a building that looks like a clown and the entrance is the clown's mouth. The building is heavily graffitied, and the clown has a red bull's-eye for an eye..wheater it was make-up or graffiti is hard to tell. Regardless, you make a run for it.

"Behind you!" warns the stern voice.

You glance back and see that a woman with light brown hair is chasing you. The first thing you notice about the woman was her eyes. The woman's eyes were blue with red pupils. As soon as you look into the eyes of the woman, the woman orders you to stop. Your body then stops and you didn't want to stop...but your body didn't listen to you!

The woman comes up to you and she smiles at you.

"A-are you the Big Boss Lady?" you blurt out.

"You could say that" said the woman. "actually, I'm the sister of the Big Boss Lady...in truth, all three of us are bosses..."

Your body is frozen and you can't move, no matter how hard you try!

"What do you want with us?" asked the Stern Voice.

"To help you escape" said the woman. "here" The woman places several flowers in your hand! The flowers look a black rose. There's at least a dozen of 'em.

"Jizzarl flowers" said the woman. "and no dropping them. That goes for the two of you"

"TOKIMI! You little bitch, I knew you would pull something like this!" yells the unmistakable voice of Cassandra from behind you.

"You're free to go" whispered Tokimi. "run for it.I'll take care of Cassandra"

Your body can move again and you say thanks before running to the exit of the fairground.
1232222112211212122111212111222221.title: Escape!

12322221122112121221112121112222212.content:
Thank Heaven for your unique-looking savior, Tokimi! Maybe when you get home, you'll start going to church more often! You owe the big (or little) woman upstairs a HUGE favor!

"OOF!" Just then, you ran straight smack into a huge soft bean-bag! Unfortunately, it wasnt a bean-bag... it was a big black furry belly... TEMPLETON'S big black furry belly! In how many languages can you say the word 'screwed'?

"Well, well, WELL!" Templeton glared down at you with his hands to his hips, "trying to ditch my ever-so generous hospitality, slave?! You need to be punished!" Next thing you knew... was intense pain from a humongous blow to your stomach via Templeton's furry fist!

This caused to fall to the ground, dropping all those Jizzarl flowers Tokimi gave you! The moment you stopped writhing in pain, you got up off the ground and noticed the flowers scattered all around you! You better get 'em quick!

You werent quick enough! The big fat rat greeted you once more with his furry fist across your face! "AARRGGGHHH!!" Before you knew it, a furry foot collided to your side just under your armpit knocking you back to the ground!

Just when you lifted your head back up, BOOM! A kick to the face sends it right back down!

"Urrgghh..." you groaned over the intense pain all over your body! Geez, how could you be getting your ass kicked by a giant mouse?! What the hell has he been eating that makes him so strong?

"GET UP!!! GET UP AND FIGHT BACK!!" you hear THE voice shouting to you in your head! "You will NOT let him do this to you!! FIGHT, DAMMIT!!"
"What the hell do you want me to do?!" you reply to the stern voice!

"What do you THINK?!"
Suddenly, you start feeling an intense surge of power flowing in your cursed arm.. it doesnt hurt. It actually feels kinda good... in fact, so good, it overshadows the pain in the rest of your body!
"Use the arm!! Use the arm!!" the stern voice starts to sound less human and more demonic.... it's actually starting to scare you! "Unleash the power of Neppis... and obliterate the rodent!!"

The sinister voice is giving you the creeps... if you didnt know any better, you'd think this 'thing' aint Mozenwrath anymore... what is it?! Whatever it is, you have a bad bad BAD feeling of what would happen if you used this eerie power in your cursed arm on the big rat.

But then again, you know what's gonna happen if you dont!! Templeton might break you in two, then eat one half of you and sale the other to the highest bidder!!

Use the arm or not use the arm? THAT is the question!
12322221122112121221112121112222212.title: No one escapes from the Almighty Ass-Kickin'!

choices: Washu sends you back to Cassandra's house
Washu wants to have 'fun' with you first...she has somewhat of a demonic side!
123222211221121212211121211122222121.content:
You get off the ground shakily and just stare at Templeton. Templeton is so fat that his belly is 2 feet bigger than you are! What could that rat be eating to make him so fat..and strong? No matter. You aren't gonna be defeated by a fat mouse...or rat...or whatever Templeton is!

"I'm surprised you got up from all that" said Templeton, readying to punch you again, but you punch him instead with that cursed arm of yours. Templeton not only went back, he FLEW back a good 40 feet! You look at your cursed arm in amazement.


Tempeton lands on the ground with a loud thump.

"What the hell--?!" asked Templeton.

"Wanna dance, fatso?" asked the stern voice.

"You betcha!" said Templeton, coming at you again. You punch him again, knocking him back 50 feet this time. You punch him right in his fat belly, and it sounds like you've knocked the wind right out of him.

"What is this arm?!" you nearly shout. It's like Ashitaka with that cursed arm in Princess Monokoe!

Templeton is trying to get his breath back. Now it's time for you to escape. You pick up all the Jizzarl flowers around you and run off into the dessert before Templeton (or anyone else) can stop you. You wanted to stay and kill Templeton..or at least a part of you did. Is this cursed arm taking over you?!

You ran blindly, not caring where you're gonna end up. You put the Jizzarl flowers in your pockets, making sure you have them on your body now.

"What are you?" you ask as you run towards a mountain in the distance. You clearly see the snow-capped top of the mountain. "you're not Mozenrath...are you a demon? Am I changing into a demon?!"

"Yes" said the stern voice.

"You said something about Neppis" you say. "is that your name?"

"No" said the stern voice. "I'm just a servant of Neppis. Call me Mundus"

Mundus?! Wasn't that the name of the main enemy in "Devil May Cry" ?!

As you get closer to the mountain, you notice that it's not a mountain after all; It's a person! You know its a person because you can see tiny arms. The person--whoever it was--was as big and fat as a mountain! Who could possibly eat that much food?? HOW could anyone eat that much food? It's impossible to gain that amount of weight...but then, you ARE in a cartoon world where anything is possible. Hell, you just meant a goddess--several goddesses to be exact--so the sight of a mountain-sized person isn't all that shocking to you. You just hope that the mountain-sized person is friendly. Suddenly, the mountain-sized person tips over and is coming down towards you...or, at least, the face of the person is. You're far enough away that you won't get squished. In a matter of moments, you're face-to-face with a woman with crab-like red hair!
"Greetings, Steven" said the woman cheerily to you. You just stare and wave. The woman has three jewels embedded in her head. Each jewel is about the size of you.
"You know my name?" you ask.
"I know everythng about you" said the woman. Suddenly, the mountain-sized woman shrank down to 6 feet tall! Your jaw drops in awe. The woman just smiles at you.
"Who the hell are you?!" snaps the stern voice, and you slap your hands to your mouth.
"My, you have a sharp tongue" said the woman.
"It's not my fault...it's my arm...!" you say.
"I know" said the woman. "Mundus must've sneaked into you when Mozenwrath went away. A sneaky little demon, isn't he?"
Just then you reach back with that cursed arm of yours and make to punch the woman in the gut. You aren't in control of that cursed arm, and you can't stop it from punching the woman. However, the arm ran into some kind of force field that surrounded the woman in front of you.
"What the-?!" you and the stern voice ask at the same time.
"That's quite rude, you know" said the woman. "now, allow me to introduce myself...I'm Washu, one of goddesses that created the universe and all dimensions within it. Well, the term 'universe' is something that you mortals came up with...it's actually called a multi-verse, where...."
"You....made the universe?" you squeak out.
"Yep" said Washu. "I also made the human speices, and all the other races that live within the multi-verse"
"But..I thought...." you stammer. "should I worship you...or..."
"Do that if that's what you want" said Washu indiffently. "you're free to do whatever you want. I'm a big fan of what you call 'free will', you know?"
