"So....we got it all wrong?" you ask.
"Let's not bring up religion" said Washu. "I'm not here to discuss religion. There's more religions out there than stars in the multi-verse. I'm not saying that you did wrong with Christianity..that's one of my favorite religions by the way"
"Uhh..." you say.
"What do you want?" asked the stern voice.
"I see that you're being chased by that gluttonus rat" said Washu. "I'm here to send you back to Cassandra's house so you can get out of here"
"Thank you" you say. "All I wanna do is get the heck out of this place..and get rid of Mundus"
123222211221121212211121211122222121.title: Meeting Washu

1232222112211212122111212111222221212.content:
You know Mundus did not appreciate hearing that little slip of your tongue, but it's not like he could do much about it anymore!! Washu has your cursed arm in check for now... and you could not wait to get rid of it AND get the hell out of here!

"Ok, Im ready," you tell 'God', "take me to Cassandra's place." However, judging by that odd stare in Washu's face, she seems a little reluctant to take you there...
"WAIT just a second there!" she raises her hand about a few inches away from your face! "I did you quite a tremendous favor! Wouldnt it be fair that I get something in return?"

Sounds fair enough. "Uh...ok. What do you want?" you ask her, wondering what someone like you can give to someone who already has everything in the multi-verse! Judging by the raised eyebrow and eerie smirk across her face, you have a abysmal feeling about what she has in mind!

"Im uh... going to need to um... test our your mortal endurance," she answers.
"How?" you ask.
"You know, I'll need to sample your ability to perform the task involving satisfaction," she tries sounding intelligent."
"But what am I gonna be doing?" you ask, still unable to understand her.
"I would like for you to engage in a rigorous but sacred ritual of procreating one's climax with me."
"Uh....what?"

You can hear Mundus' voice groan... "Uggh... SHE WANTS TO FUCK YOU!" Oh. OOOHHH!!! Geez... why didnt she just say it in English? Well, you do seem rather curious about having sex with the almighty... but are you willing to bet 1000-to-1 odds that it's going to be painful?

"So... do you think youre up for it?" she asks you, "or is your puny mortal body far too inferior to satisfy one such as I?"
"Oh God, here they come..." you heard Mundus voice grumble to himself as if he knew something was just about to happen...

"Nah! He's far too weak to ever dream about satisfying the great Washu!" said a very high pitched voice! A high pitched voice coming from that little mini-Washu puppet on her left shoulder! "Yeah!" the mini-Washu puppet on her right agreed, "maybe he should just quit fantasizing about it now! Washu is FAR too much woman for him!"

Great... even puppets are mocking you! "Now now!" Washu waved her finger in front of one of them, "We shouldnt just assume that he's not able to perform! Who knows? He might surprise us!"
"I'LL say surprise! Take a look at THIS!" said the other puppet... but it wasnt on her shoulder! You looked down and saw it hanging onto the center of your pants looking down it!!

"AAH!!" out of instinct, you quickly batted it off you! You immediately blushed as Washu giggled. Great... God is playful! But so far, everyone you met in this place is playful! Nonetheless, you let out a long hard sigh and look 'Crab-head' straight in the eye and say, "I'll show YOU who's inferior! Bring it on!" Best even, it wasnt even Mundus's voice that said that!

"YAY!!!" the puppets cheered at Washu flicked her red hair back and smile, "Well, what are you waiting for? An invitation? HAVE AT YOU!"
You grinned back and prepared to began to unbutton your shirt.... BUT...

In a blink of an eye, Washu's figure disappeared and appeared in it's place was that black and white angel looking back at you with a sad look in her bright blue eyes...
World of Elegance....
Your smile immediately dropped out of regret for what you were about to do!
But the moment you blinked again, World of Elegance was gone and Washu was still there in her place smiling back at you! Oh crap... you almost forgot! Urd... and her angel...

"Hmm?" Washu then tilted her head and frowned at you, "You seem very hesitant. Did you change your mind?" You didnt want to answer her question. You just wanted to lie and say that nothing was wrong....BUT...
"Apparently, this vessal cant get that little angelic creature out of his head!" the stern voice answered for you!

"Oh, is THAT all?!" Washu's smile quickly reappeared, "Not a problem! I am capable of changing my physical appearance to whatever you desire! It can be anything! Urd, W.O.E, Bulma, Aisha, Shampoo, Kagura, Tsunade, Officer Jenny, Renamon, Gardevoir... ANYTHING! You name it!"

Wow... that's quite an offer! Anything you want! "Sounds good to me," Mundus's voice replied in your head, "How about you, Steven?"
But then AGAIN.... it just wouldnt be the same. Even if you got World of Elegance, it wouldnt really be her...

Damn this miserable heart of yours!
1232222112211212122111212111222221212.title: The Heart Wants What It Wants

choices: You want her to turn into someone else
You want her just the way she is right now
12322221122112121221112121112222212121.content:
It's not like you hate World of Elegance for putting this curse on you...and dooming you to turn into Mundus. Anyway, how can you say no to "God"? But wait....wouldn't you like melt if you made love with "God"?


"Just forget about religion, will ya?" asked Mundus aloud.

"You can really change into anyone?" you ask.

"Yep!" said Washu, and she changes into you! "I can even change into you" she says in YOUR voice! Washu winks at you, and changes back into herself and smiles. You smile back.

"Okay!" you say. "I'm all up for...erm..being your guiena pig"

"I only have one guinea pig and that's Tenchi" giggled Washu. "but..I wouldn't mind having another one for this little experiment. Want me to turn into World of Elegance? Or Aisha? Or Officer Jenny...or Urd? Or just be myself?"
12322221122112121221112121112222212121.title: Can't say "no" to God

123222211221121212211121211122222121211.content:
(DISCLAIMER FROM AERODETH: I've had a hard time trying to come up with THIS kind of chapter (mainly because this isnt what I'm used to!), but hell, I pulled it off with absolutely no regrets thanks to the second half... NO SPOILERS! READ IT YOURSELF!)

"World of Elegance." It didnt take more than a few second to answer that question. Hopefully, you didnt offend her... lord knows what she's capable of! Thankfully, Washu merely snickered... not exactly sure if that's a GOOD thing, but surely whatever's gonna happen to you will be better than what would happen to you if she's mad, right? ...RIGHT?!

"Heh! Made up your mind pretty quickly, have you?" the crab-haired immortal laughed, "instead of falling in love with a goddess, you fall for her little tool she carries with her like a dead fetus? What kind of a weirdo are you?"
Her words dont exactly strike you as 'charming', but before you could shout in protest, once of her puppets shout!

"HEY! THAT'S NOT FUNNY!" Dummy #1 snapped, "So what if the guy has a crush on a supporter? Edward Elric thinks I'M hot!"
"Tsk! Please!" Dummy #2 snapped at her, "he also thinks Colonel Mustang is dead sexy in a mini-skirt!"

In your current situation, you couldnt find this 'CUTE' little moment the least bit funny. Believe it or not, there was some sort of rage building up within you, though youre not sure if Mundus had anything to do with it. You ARE pretty sure that it has something to do with your arm.
"Can we just hurry this up already?!" you didnt shout, but your tone was very lenient and on the offensive, "I rather not spend another minute longer than I have to in this hellhole."

Barely a moment of silence past and regardless of who/what Washu is, you STILL dont regret standing up to her! Dont nobody diss the WOE! It is a shame that you'll never see again, however...
"Pst!" Washu psted, "alright fine, ya big baby! Close your eyes!" So you close your eyes...
*THUD!* "OW!" only to get pushed to the ground while you werent looking! However you have a very hard time getting back up because of some excess weight not only keeping you down, but PINNING you down! Not only that, but you can feel a bright, warm aura flowing around you followed by blissfull angelic music playing in the background.It sounded good and felt good...

And when you opened your eyes, it looked VERY good, too! There she was... the World of Elegance smiling down at you! Just looking into her lovely blue eyes made all your built-up rage go away.
"WORLD OF-" she put a finger to your mouth and shushed you. And with a sly wink, she gently grabbed the bag of your head and pulled it toward hers... or rather, to her LIPS. Her lips are so soft and warm pressed against yours and you can even feel her ticklish tongue play around with yours! Just seconds later, the floating robe around her torso quickly drops and her wings gently wrapped around your back and began squeezing your body as close to hers as possible!

You'd moan if your mouth wasnt full! The lukewarm rubber-like and slightly wet twaut was smooth and comforting to your exposed member as if it was MADE for you! The way it constantly vibrated and 'massaged' your C0<I< welcomed your inevitable orgasm and constantly demanded for it! Wow... so THIS is what it's like to make love to an angel conscious (or 'God' disguised as an angel!) All this fun made you feel hot... burning hot... scorching hot... a little less scorching hot... somewhat burning hot... kinda warm... just room temperature... now it's kinda cold... ice cold.... freezing cold... chill down to your SOUL cold!! Ok, what the hell's going on?! Not only is it cold, but the bright warm aura is gone, her lips and tongue felt completely dry (not even gonna DESCRIBE her no-no place!), and even the angelic music sounds bizarrely distorted!

"Alright, Washu! What the hell are you-....!!!!" by the time you opened your eyes, you noticed World of Elegance was no longer there. Neither was Washu! Instead, you saw an extremely pale female face with white hair and glowing red eyes glaring into your soul as her mouth was still locking yours! You quickly pulled your mouth away, but you couldnt get up. In fact, you couldnt move period! You could stare in horror at the new woman mounting you. While her top-half was humanish with a feminine face, chest, and arms with extremely long fingernails on each hand, her bottom half was completely blackened with long 'tentacles' binding your arms and legs completely still!

"W...wh...are you-OMPHH!!" another tentacle slipped into your mouth! Whoever this demonic bitch is doesnt like idle chit-chat during her tentacle-rapin'! The world around you was completely developed in absolute darkness... something tells you ya aint in Cassandra's place anymore! And this... THING doesnt look like any goddess YOU know of! You'd scream, but you cant even do that! You could barely cry at the intense pain your feeling of her intense, bone-crushing inside as well as her long fingernails scratching your chest with each key thrust! Her demonic howling sent chills down your spine while her long blackened wings flapped, trying to 'speed up the process'!

After a long LONG time of intense pain and muffled screaming, everything goes black. Thank God you FINALLY passed out!

***************************************

You finally started coming to. Aching everywhere, but youre still alive. When your eyes fully focus, you quickly observe the new room youre in. Someone's bedroom... definitely not yours. The bed itself was far too tiny for you. Your legs were leaning right over the edge.
Regardless, the first question you asked yourself wasnt 'Where am I?', 'Who was that creepy woman?', or even 'Where's Urd and Washu?'. The very first question you asked yourself was "Is that damn curse FINALLY gone yet?!"

You looked in the mirror...
123222211221121212211121211122222121211.title: The Virgin Sacrifice

1232222112211212122111212111222221212111.content:
You look at your arms in the mirror and realize that they're back to normal! With a sigh of relief, you look around the bedroom you woke up in. That's when you see that this is YOUR bedroom....kinda. The details are all wrong; you never had a bedside TV in your room, nor did you remember getting that painting of Washu that's hanging on one wall. The bed was way too small for you, so you hop off the bed. This must be Washu's room, you're thinking...or perhaps someone else's room. You walk to the door of the room, and notice that it had a golden padlock on it. The padlock has a large letter T on it and the letter T looks to be made of solid emerald. You try the door, only to find that the door is indeed locked. What the hell is a padlock doing on THIS side of the door?! Are you a prisoner?! You look around and notice that there's another door in the room; a door that's too small for you or even anyone your size. The door seems to be the right size for a mouse, and the door looks like a mouse hole. Suddenly, the door with the padlock opened and in stepped....Tokimi,
"What a curse that was!" said Tokimi. "you owe my sister a favor"
"What bullshit!" you yell. "I was raped by a..."
"That demonic bitch was the curse made flesh" said Tokimi. "If Washu didn't do anything, you would be a demon by now....so you owe Washu"
"What kind of a favor?" you ask. "and where am I?!"
"You're in.....Itajanvald" said Tokimi.
"Where?"
"Itajanvald" said Tokimi. "it's a place between dimensions....a Nexus, if you wish"
"What am...?" you begin.
"Cassandra has opened many portals to other dimensions' said Tokimi. "and that causes trouble. Your task shall be to close these portals with this"
Tokimi hands you a box-like device the size of a regular key. "When you're near a portal, this will close it"
"Where's Washu....and why isn't she telling me this?" you ask.
"She's very busy" said Tokimi. "do this task and we'll reward you in any way you wish"
1232222112211212122111212111222221212111.title: You Owe Washu

1232222112211212122111212111222221212111.content:
Groan... task this, task that, task hit me with a Louisville bat! Since day 1 of godknowshowlong, from the very moment your car crapped out and left you stranded in Cassandra's 'funhouse', you've been through quite a bit of hell and dis. You get played with by a goddess, cursed by an angel, your ass kicked by a giant rat, and raped by the very curse that leeched off you! NOW youre expected to apparently save the universe?! You would totally say 'Hell no' and pretty much end the adventure here if you didnt think there'd be a tremendous downside if you do.

Out of curiosity, you asked "What if I refuse?"

Tokimi thought for a bit, putting her finger to her chin and looking up in the air, "Hmm.... how do I explain this in a way a mortal would understand? Goodness, this is tough... uhhh... AH! You ever seen the ending to Berserk?"
"...Yeah?"
"Well, ah.... imagine that very scenario in the last two episodes. Replace the Hawks with your entire family and friends, replace the God Hand with the 4 Great Fiends, replace Guts with World of Elegance, replace Casca with you, and replace Griffith ala Femto form with your curse made flesh and visualize that!"

You squinted your eyes a little trying to visualize SOME sort of scene that she just told you about... but either way, you could pretty much assume well enough that it was gonna be bad. REAL bad. ...Wait. Did she say YOU'D be Casca in that little mental image?! Eh, maybe she made a mistake and W.O.E. would be Caska and you would be Guts.... right? ...RIGHT?!
Nonetheless you just groan and put the key in your pocket, "Can.... can I have a little while to think about it?"

Judging by the way Tokimi was crossing her arms and glaring at you, she is NOT a very patient person! "You better make it quick!" she commanded, "I'm expecting company with a few very important higher-ups in two hours and I really dont feel like babysitting a deflowered mortal with a mental break-down in the middle of it! When I come back, you better have a decision, THEN I'm kicking your ass out! Got it?!"

Sheesh. Touchy. Still, you nod, "Yes ma'am."
She smiled sweetly, "Good. I'll be back in a little while," she said as she reopened the door with a huge padlock, "please think carefully about your decision. Remember, the fate of not only YOUR world, but many many others rest on this little decision. Please think hard and choose well!" and with that, she slammed the door shut behind and relocked the door.

And thus, you were alone again. Just you, the bed, the mirror, and that little rat-hole with a door. If you were smaller, you'd probably sneak through that tiny door and escape this madness... but you have a feeling you wouldnt get far anyway. Either way, no matter what choice you make, youre a prisoner. A prisoner of your fate. You can either take the task and risk getting yourself again or refuse and expect it all to come back and bite you in the ass!

"Ugh... what am I gonna do?" you ask yourself. Thankfully, you dont hear a voice coming from your arm anymore. Your loneliness is a little relieving, but still! You closed your and kept talking to yourself, "Well, so far I've been through so much shit. What's a little more? I mean it's not like I havent experienced any of my worst fears come to life yet! But... but why am I still scared? I... I just wanna go home."

Aheheheheheh

You coulda sworn you just heard giggling a moment ago. Dont tell me your cursed arm's back! You open your eyes and looked at it. Your arm's just fine!

"Eh, it's just probably just my imagina-" the moment you lifted your head back up, you noticed something odd about your reflection in the mirror. You... you looked MUCH different!
Your hair was wilted and grey, your clothes were your body was extremely skinny, your skin was pale, your nose was bleeding, and your eye-sockets were missing eyeballs!

"AAAAHHHH!!!" you screamed off the top of your lungs at the very moment you saw THAT 'you'! But when you looked back at your own body, you were still the same as before! "What the?!" and that 'odd' reflection in the mirror was gone. Just regular you again.
"T....t....that was.... weird." Was that just your imagination, or was that some sort of sick warning?

Either way, maybe it's about time you make your decision. Will you choose to accept the task or refuse?
1232222112211212122111212111222221212111.title: Trust me... You DONT want to be Casca!

choices: The Keystone leads you to Planet Express
The Keystone leads you to the sewer
1232222112211212122111212111222221212111.content:
The reflection in the mirror scared you silly. You don't really know if that was your imagination or some kind of sick warning from Tokimi, but you've come to your decision about 3 minutes after you saw that reflection in the mirror; you'll accept this task and do it...no matter how long it takes. That could prove tough...let's face it, how many dimensions could there be? There couldn't be an infinite number of dimensions...could there? Let's face it, you just met a goddess, is it really that hard to believe in an infinite number of dimensions after that? You sigh deeply, and you say loudly "I accept the task!" At first, nothing happens. Then, the room vanishes around you and everything blacks out. You're surrounded by blackness for 2-3 minutes (although it feels much longer) until the background comes back and you find yourself in the middle of New New York of Futurama! It's nighttime, and the streets are all but deserted; you see 4 or 5 cars drive by when you're walking down the sidewalk. You have the box-like thing in your hand and you have no idea how to locate these portals.
"You're helpless without me, I see" said Tokimi, suddenly appearing right in front of you! You almost walk right into her, but she manages to stop you. She's wearing a sweet smile and you find yourself staring at her eyes. They say that eyes are windows to the soul....if that's true, Tokimi has a piercing gaze. Tokimi is not only looking at you, she's also giving you info how to locate the portals directly into your mind! As you stare on, you see flashes of your life pass you by....and even into the future, where you're old and surrounded by your grand children...which is insane, because you don't have any children yet! You also feel a sense of what only can be described as purity. The stare lasts for a timeless amount of time, and then suddenly its over and you find yourself alone on the sidewalk.
The box-like device in your hand is called something that's totally unpronoucable to you or any other human. Tokimi just called it "the keystone" while she was sharing the info. The keystone should vibrate should you near a portal...the harder its vibrates, the closer you are to a portal. To close a portal, all you need to do is stick the keystone into the portal and it should close it. Tokimi also mentioned via the stare that you are tasked to close up 10 dimensions. When you close a portal, you'll be teleported to another dimension that needs to be sealed. These portals can be anywhere in the dimension; in the sky, in a building, in outer space, or even in a belly of a creature that lives in the dimension...well, that's comforting! If you lose the keystone, just call Tokimi and she'll give you another one.
All righty then! Time to do this task! The keystone is vibrating only slightly. You walk down the sidewalk and as you do, the keystone vibrates a little more. Well, at least you're going in the right direction.
1232222112211212122111212111222221212111.title: The Keystone

1232222112211212122111212111222221212111.content:
OH GOD NO! Not a sewer! Not a big, dark, ranchy, foul-smelling, rat-infested sewer!! Why a sewer?! Why not Planet Express?! You hate sewers... ever since you were a little kid and accidentally fell into an open man-hole, your experience in sewers was never the same. And the experience inside this one is just as bad as you remember it.
It was dark with very few lights, there was very little walking-space that wasnt knee-deep in brownish sewer water, moss was growing from the ceilings, and you could see a few rats scamper here and there. On the plus side, at least you got over your fear of rats thanks to your encounter with Templeton.

To make matters worse, lord only knows what lurks within the sewers of the Futurama universe! Still, perhaps fate has brought you here of all places for a reason. For the fate of the universe and your life, you suck it up and bear it. Well, actually you hold your breathe and try to follow down the path... taking instant breaths every once in a while.
"You better be worth it!" you yelled at the box in your hands, "cuz I'm having a mind to just drop you in that shit-pool and high-tail it!" Of course, the Keystone doesnt response. It just continues lighting toward the direction it apparently wants you to go. To ease your troubled mind, you try thinking happy thoughts...
'World of Elegance... World of Elegance... World of Elegance... World of Ele-HOLY CRAP A TENTACLE!' You jumped back the moment the moment a big long purple tentacle popped out of the water! It slithered around up on the surface as if trying to feel something. You wanted to back away, but you were already back at the wall and the purple thing was just a few feet from you! You shivered a little, but you didnt scream. You kept quiet and waited for it to pass by...

It slithered to the left, then to the right, then to the front, then to the back, then-
*SMACK!!!* It smacked you right across the face and dove back into the water! You could almost hear watery giggling coming from it. The hell?
"Sonovabitch!" you snapped as you tossed a rock into the brownish pool. Yeah... you LOVE sewers.

"HEEELLLLPP!!! SOMEBODY HELP ME!!!"

Just then, you hear a shout for help. Not far from you, you could make out somebody tied up and hanging from on the ceiling in the middle of the yuck-pool. A lovely young girl with long blonde hair, sky blue eyes, wearing a blue and white striped church-skirt with black shorts underneath.
"Somebody? Anybody?! HELP!!" the poor girl continued to scream. Because you were never the type to abandon a damsel in distress, you jumped into action!
"Hang on, lady! I'm coming!"

"Help me, sir!" the girl continued to call out to you, "a couple of really mean guys jumped me a while ago while I was walking home from church and tied me up and left me here! I just wanna go home... I want my mom and dad..."
Aww... what kind of horrible brutes would do that to a poor little church-girl? You were completely compelled to save her. Luckily, there were quite a couple of large stepping stones that lead to her, so it's easy enough, right?

Unfortunately, the 2nd stone you stepped on triggered a trap! The moment you stepped on it, a net sprung up from the floor and snagged you! To make matters worse, you dropped the Keystone in the process! It was right below you but far outside your reach. What could make such a bad situation even worse?

"HA! PSYCHE!" the 'helpless' girl shouted as she easily squeezed out of her ropes and dropped to the ground. Ugh... why didnt you see this coming?! You shoulda known the little 'innocent church-girl' was a bit more than meets the eye!
Speaking of, you noticed her voice suddenly changed a bit lower-pitch... still kinda girly, but not GIRLY girly!
"Haha! I did it! I caught him! I, Bridget, THE world class bounty hunter actually caught the renown keeper of the Keystone, Steven Johnson!"

Bridget?! BRIDGET?! ...oh no...

She-or rather HE snagged that box of yours on the ground, then pointed up at you with a big grin on his face! "Alright, Steve! Youre coming with me! The Great Fiend Laharl promised a huge cash bounty on your butt and I'm gonna claim it!"
"Grrr!!!" you struggled to break free but to no avail, "Let me go, ya scrawny little she-male! I got a job to do!"

"Shut up!" he snapped back at you, "the only job youre gonna be doing is shoveling rocks!" As if the little weirdo wasnt weird enough, he pulled out a little teddy bear and started talking to it, "Can you believe it, Roger? I actually caught THE Steven Johnson, the guy who actually escaped the House of Cassandra the Succubus! Everyone said a guy like him would be next to impossible to catch, BUT I CAUGHT HIM!!!"

"Geez, what a little freak," you mumbled to yourself... which didnt go unheard by Bridget!
"I SAID SHUT UP!" he cut a rope that caused the net you were in to drop on the ground!
"OW!" safe to say it wasnt a gentle landing. But by the very moment you werent entangled in the net, your hands were tied together behind your back by yo-yo strings. STRONG yo-yo strings!

"Alrighty, Mr. Johnson," Bridget smiled sweetly as he spoke in his more feminine voice as he spun a yo-yo in your face, "you stand guilty of galactic governmental conspiracy. That's a very very big crime. One that deserves a really really big punishment. However, the sooner you cooperate, the less horrible your punishment's gonna be." he finally stopped spinning that yo-yo and his sweet smile quickly changed to an angry glare, "NOW MOVE IT!"

Sheesh. You've only been outside your world for a few hours and already a bounty's on your head by those who are trying to stop you! To make matters worse for you, your at the hands of some little smart-mouth transvestite with yo-yos! If you still had Neppis's Arm, you could probably drop this little brat with ease, but now that youre no longer cursed... you dont really stand much of a chance, do you? And even if you could run, the little brat's got your keystone. Youre pretty much useless without it. How-

*SMACK!* "AAAHH!!" you screamed in pain at Bridget belting your butt with a yo-yo!
"I said MOVE IT!"
1232222112211212122111212111222221212111.title: The things you find down there...

choices: You meet up with Buster and Babs
You meet up with someone else
1232222112211212122111212111222221212111.content:
"Uh...are you sure you know the way outta here?" you ask.
You and Bridget had been walking together, all the while you try to loosen the yo-yo that has your hand tied to no avail. Meanwhile, Bridget doesn't seem to know her...his way around the sewers, as you're just wandering down random tunnels. You don't pass any manholes that would lead back up to the surface either...which is very unusual. You aren't traveling in circles, that much you know....the tunnels look the same, but you're sure that you're not traveling in circles. You ask your question when you pass a wooden sign that says "The Ruins of Old New York -- 1/2 mile". The sewers of the Futurama show were filled with mutants and the ruins of Old New York. You see a mutant every now and then, but they have left the two of you alone. Are the mutants on the same side as Bridget? Come to think of it, you don't know where the cross-dresser is taking you.
"Do I look like a sewer expert to you?" asked Bridget. "the Ruins will have a ladder that'll lead up to the surface, mark my words. Now, would you kindly shut up?"
The two of you continue to walk down the tunnel until it comes out to a huge room which has the ruins of Old New York within it. The ceiling is so high that you can't even see it. The smell of the sewer backs off a bit in this chamber as you and Bridget make your way to a ladder that seems to lead to the surface.
"Spare a dollar?" asked a mutant, coming right up to Bridget and you. The mutant is wearing a cape and a hood, so that the features of the mutant are hidden....yet, you think the voice of the mutant is familiar. In a minute, you realize that its one of the mutant children that you saw in the show from time to time.
"Get away!" snapped Bridget, waving a hand in a dismissive gesture,
"Cheap ass" muttered the mutant child as he stalks off.
The two of you walk through several ruined neighborhoods. There's the Empire State Building, still standing tall. Most of the buildings are in ruins, and are covered with moss and vines and what look like rejects from Little Shop of Horrors. In fact, the two of you pass a small flower shop. You glance in the window and see a plant that looks uncannily like the plant from the Little Shop of Horrors (from the '86 movie) As you pass by the window of the shop, the two of you are tripped by a long vine that's connected to the plant in the shop! Before you two can do anything, the two of you are dragged into the shop and towards the man-eating plant.
"Lookee at what I have here" says the plant in a faux southern accent. "two meals for the price of one!"
"Let me go, you overgrown flytrap!" yells Bridget.
"I think I'll have the girl first" said the plant. "I've always been parcel to the fairer sex"
Bridget gets out a yo-yo and manages to tie the plant's mouth shut just when the plant is about to eat him. The plant tries to break the yo-yo strings, but that yo-yo is strong enough to hold the mouth shut. The plant throws the two of you clear across the room, where you black out when you hit a counter squarely in the middle.


When you come to, you're just in time to see the plant devour Bridget. You're in the clutches of the plant and the plant is moving you to its open mouth...looks like you're gonna be desert! You struggle and manage to free yourself somehow. The Keystone is lying on the floor, near the door of the shop. You sprint out of the shop, and grabbing the Keystone as you do. You hear the plant yell "I didn't order no fast food!" as you leg it away from the shop.
The plant has freed you of the yo-yo strings that tied your hands behind your back. The Keystone leads you to a large theater. According to the marque of the theater, it's showing "Friday the 13th 3000"....but you doubt that. The theater is run-down and there seems to be nobody in it. The Keystone leads you into the theater itself. That's when you see one of those blobs that ate people in that one commercial. The blob is talking to a very tall man in black robes. As you enter the theater, the blob and the man in black quickly duck out of sight. You shrug and head towards the screen itself. As you get closer, you see the portal in the screen itself. The portal is just big enough to allow one person through. You can't see what lies beyond the portal. You hold up the Keystone to the portal, which emits a thin laser. The laser closes the portal in a matter of seconds. One portal down.
SNAP!
Just like that, you're teleported to yet another dimension. At first, you don't know where you are since it's very dark....a bit too dark in point of fact. It's as if you're in a cave with no light in it. The only light comes from the Keystone, which is pointing in a north-eastern direction. Nothing to do but follow it, so you walk in the direction. After you've walked a good half mile, you finally see a faint light straight ahead. You eventually exit from a cave opening and see that you're somewhere in the mountains. A dirt path leads away from the cave. You follow the dirt path for a good two miles until the path enters a forest.
"Dead men tell no tales!" cries a voice from deep within the forest. The voice sounded like Buster Bunny from Tiny Toons.
"Oh, will you just stop?" comes a second voice; its Buster and Babs Bunny (no relation).
You enter the forest.

1232222112211212122111212111222221212111.content:
C'mon! Who the hell CANT resist getting to meet their favorite cartoon characters in person?! As a child-fan of Tiny Toon Adventures, youre compelled to delve deeper into the big scary woods possibly full of more creepy critters that want to take a bite out of you. Besides... there's no turning back now!

"BUSTER?!" you called out to the voices, "BABS?!" No response. Either theyre playing around with you or you might have been hearing things. Either way, you cant turn back seeing as though you sorta forgot which way the exit was. Even after retracing your steps, there were certain paths, certains trees, certain ways the rocks in a pattern, etc. that you dont recognize from earlier. Oh well. It could be worse... you could be ambushed or something!

*Phew!* *THHHUUDD!!* You stopped in place the moment you saw a shiny blade fall from the sky and crash into the ground just a few feet in front of you! It was almost as if it was aimed at you!
"Damn! Almost got him, dood!" you heard a rather high-pitched shout come from up in the air, possibly from the direction of the blade shot! Your attacker dropped back down to the ground, landing on it's and looked up at you right in the eye.
...A short blue penguin with wings? You got attacked by a little blue talking penguin with wings and stitches across it's chest?!

Normally you'd find it cute, but the really sharp swords he was pointing your way wasnt! It slowly stepped toward you glaring at you, ready to slice you into ribbons! Fearing how sharp those swords were, you slowly stepped back.
"Like, HEADBUTT!"
"OOPH!" another penguin jumped you from behind and headbutted you in the back, knocking you to the ground! The keystone flew out of your hands, but was caught in the air by ANOTHER penguin!

"Got it! I got it!" the high-pitched penguin cheered, "Great Fiend Laharl will totally give us a bonus for this!" MORE bounty hunters?! First transvestites, now talking penguins?! Yikes, how many MORE weirdos are after you?!
"Yeah, dood! He might end up giving us a 5-minute break!"
"Or even better! He might even start paying us minimum wage!"
"MINIMUM WAGE?! AWESOME SWEET!"

By the time you lifted your head off the ground, you found yourself surrounded by a whole group of sword-wielding penguins. At least 20 of 'em! None of them you recognize from Tiny Toons... in fact, you mightve recognized them from-

"ALRIGHT, DOOD! LISTEN UP!" one of the penguins pointed his sword between your eyes and ordered, "youre in Prinny territory, now! That means youre a prisoner to the Prinnies!"
"Yeah!" another prinny agreed, "we know about you, Steve Johnson! Youre like... that guy who trying to stop our bosses, so... we gotta stop you first!"
With no other choice, you raised your hands in the air, ready to surrender!

"Whoa, dood. That was easy," one of the prinnies scratched his head, "we didnt even get to the part where we threaten to cut out his balls and play ping-pong with 'em yet." They woulda went THAT far if you resisted?!

"Smart move, Stevie!" another prinny pointed at you, "youre gonna pay for your crimes!"
"What crimes did I commit?" you asked.
"The bad ones, dood!" he answered.
"WHAT bad ones?"
"REAL bad ones!" The prinny smirked a bit as if thought he zinged you! This was getting you nowhere. It's not like you could reason with these dumb birds at this point.

"We'll be taking that shiny box from you and giving it to our boss where it belongs!" a prinny announced, "As for you... uh... um... youre gonna... well.. uhhhhh..." Another prinny whispered something in his ear. Whatever that other prinny told him, it caused an eerie smirked to appear across his face, "I know of a fitting fate for you, dood!"
"Yeah!" another prinny grinned the same exact grin, "we've been reduced to cheap, low-budget slaves for too long. It's about time WE get a low-budget slave of our own!" ...Slave?!

"Yeah, dood!" another prinny nodded, "Youre gonna start cooking US breakfast and dinner!"
"Yeah! And clean OUR pigpens!"
"Shine OUR swords!"
"Scrub OUR feet!"
"Serve US booze!"
"Brush OUR teeth!"
"Fetch OUR foodstamps!"
"Pick the fleas off US!"
"Read US bedtime stories and kiss US goodnight!"

Were these little creeps serious?! Youre gonna let yourself be reduced to being a slave to these little throw-away minions? Unfortunately, youre outnumbered and unarmed. You have no choice, especially since you value your testicles! Besides, you have a GOOD feeling someone or something'll rescue you!

Speaking of...

*BZZZZZZZZZZZZZZTTTTEEEOOUUUUWWW!!!!!* "YAAAHH-" *BOOM!*
Just then, a huge laser blast fired out of nowhere and hit one of the prinnies, blowing it the hell up! Literally, the prinny exploded into little prinny bits the moment it got zapped!
The rest of them jumped back and freaked out at the sight. "WHOA, DOOD!" one of them even screamed!

You looked over to the direction of where the laser blast came from.... you saw...

A familiar emblem is on the sword, as well as the stone; its the Triforce! As you enter the clearing, something enters it from the opposite side as well. You squint to see who it is, and are delighted to see that its none other than Link! Link walks towards the sword in the middle of the clearing and yanks it out of the stone.
