"Dont worry about me, zam," she humbly sighed, "youre just still entranced by goddess aroma. It'll go away soon... and then you'll just forget about me."
"Please! Stop!"
"G....Goodbye, C-C-cruel w-world!" she shouted as her hand with a knife in it started to shiver like crazy. Would she actually go through with it?! By the way she's shivering, shaking, and sweating, she didnt seem all that serious about this! She is clearly overexaggerating! The way she's looking back at you is almost like telling you 'Please stop me!'

Do you buy it? Or do you even want to take the risk that your new friend might do something stupid?!
12322221122212111111111.title: The God of Failure

choices: Yukimaru has calmed down and realized that she overeacted
123222211222121111111111.content:
Yukimaru's grip on the knife is steady, more or less. She didn't brought the knife any closer to her throat, and yet...it seemed to inch towards her throat. Without thinking about it, you rush up to her and manage to wrestle the knife away from her throat. Yukimaru doesn't give up a fight either; otherwise, you'll never get the knife away from her throat. You slowly take the knife away from her and throw it to the ground....and then, hug her. It's hard to say who is more shocked by this, you or Yukimaru.

"What good will it do if you kill yourself?" you ask. "you're not weak; you just started way too big with your new powers. You got to learn how to control them, and you can't do that if you're dead!"

"But...z-z-zam, I destroyed a whole galaxy" said Yukimaru, "if I stay around you, I just might kill you by accident!"

"I'll take my chances" you say. "I just can't let you kill yourself"

Yukimaru made to pick up the knife, when someone came into the room.

"My, my....Aren't you two a charming pair" came a new voice.

You and Yukimaru looked around until you spot Xellos from Slayers entering the room. The purple-haired priest is wearing his trademark smile, as well as his clothes from the series. In his hands, he held his wooden staff, which was slung over his shoulder. As you watched, he ate from a large apple in his other hand.

"Who are you?" asked Yukimaru.

"I am Xellos, a wandering priest" said Xellos, bowing slightly. "and I just couldn't help but notice that you're a new goddess. It's been quite a while since we had a new goddess around these parts"

"I'm no goddess" said Yukimaru sadly. "I destroyed an entire galaxy, zam!"

"Yes...my superiors saw what you did" said Xellos. "and they're willing to teach you how to use your powers"

"But, I'm not worthy..." started Yukimaru,

"Listen" said Xellos. "you just got your powers...it'll take time for you to learn how to control 'em. You can go to see my superiors, and they'll teach you how to use your powers properly"

"But..."

"Yukimaru, shut up!" you shout. It came out more sharply than you intended. You instantly cringe, ready for whatever punishment that Yukimaru was going to dish you out. But it never came. "Yukimaru, you gotta believe me when I say that I find you the most attractive woman I ever saw.."

"You haven't met any of my superiors" interjected Xellos.

"...and I would be sad if you kill yourself now. You're worthy of being a goddess" you continue.

"It won't be that easy" said Xellos. "a deity gets their powers from prayers and worship...that's why your powers went out of control. You haven't even established a temple to yourself, or even a religion. You can't expect to become a goddess and instantly create a whole new solar system just like that--" here, he snapped his fingers. "--it takes time. My superiors can teach you how to use your powers....only when you've earned your powers through being worshiped"

"You honesty think that, zam?" asked Yukimaru to you, ignoring Xellos and his little speech.

"Yes, I do" you say.

"What am I? Chopped liver?" asked Xellos, sweatdropping.

"You say that your superiors will teach me how to use my powers, zam?" asks Yukimaru.

"Why, yes" said Xellos. "it'll be quite a long journey, though"

"Can't you just send us there?" you ask.

"Well...I could" admitted Xellos. "but I'm awfully busy with something else" With that, Xellos vanishes into thin air, leaving behind a map.
"Hey, come back here!!" you yell.
123222211222121111111111.title: Xellos

1232222112221211111111111.content:
"I SAID GET BACK HERE, YOU GOD OF CROSS-DRESSING!" you continued yelling. But you already knew that Xellos was long gone. To where? Who knows. Youre not a god... All you have left of Saint Tranny is that map. A map of what seems to be the world but with continents you never heard of... 'Knaron', 'North Pelasar', 'Ahum-Raj', 'Skulvadia'... there's even a red line that seems to lead from where you assume this location is to a certain whitish, sparkly continent circled in red. It said 'Celestia'. The Gods' homeland, perhaps?

Youre picking up nothing but bad vibes at this point. You know it aint gonna be easy.. hell, it's probably gonna be one of the hardest things you've ever attempted in your entire life if not THE hardest! But youre a long way from home and you think very highly of your new friend... and youre bored. VERY bored. And as we all know, when some people are bored... they do very desperate things to entertain themselves...

"Um....S-Steve?" just then you felt someone tugging on your shirt. It was Yukimaru... looking up at you with her cheeks reddened. Is it just you or is it REALLY easy to make that girl blush? "...W..what you were saying to me in front of that lecher, zam... d...did you mean it?"
"Absolutely, zam!" you tell her, not realizing you slipped the z-word out! "a wonderful woman like you has far so much potential. It'd be an awful waste if you throw it all away and take your life." As you said it, you noticed Yukimaru's eyes beginning to twinkle again. She's still goddess enough to find her irresistable!

Yukimaru then looked back at you with a determined look on her face and nodded, "I... I was a foolish coward for doubting myself just for simply destroying one solar-system. I refuse to allow myself to be so weak again, zam! With this new light shining on my soul, I shall flourish from this mortal shell of a makeshift demon-ninja forever cursed to running a run-down hotel all alone in the world... and emerge as Yukimaru, the Goddess of Hope, Strong-Will, and Determination!"

You could almost see a flame light around her body as she continued her speech, "I owe this all to you, zam! Your manly physique and romantic voice has shown me the light!" you blushed a bit when she referred to your 'manly physique' and 'romantic voice'! "When I become the Impervious Goddess, you shall be my greatest and most trustworthy servant. You will dedicate your life to me, zam... and I shall fight with my body and soul for you! No one will ever be able to stand against us... especially not Cassandra!"

It sounds like she is more than ready to begin the journey that weirdo Xellos is gonna put you through. Still, great to know her spirits are lifted... especially thanks to your 'manly physique' and 'romantic voice'! ...Heh... they sure dont make 'em like that back home! No surprise why!
"I...I must prepare, zam!" Yukimaru announced, "This journey will be long and perilous. We'll need to get ready! I'll need to increase my training, extend my exercising sessions, meditate and clear my mind, change my diet, increase my chocolate intake to store blubber for the extremely cold weather we'll come across.... And....*yaaawwwnnn*...and..."

Despite how determined she was, her lack of sleep was catching up with her! "Yukimaru? Perhaps we should start going to bed. It's getting late."
"No!" she snapped despite her eyelids were getting heavier, "I... I cant sleep now, zam! I need to.... need to.... *yawn*....get.....ready.... zzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzz....." She literally fell asleep standing up!
You couldnt help but shake your head and smile. The girl's got spunk. But she still has a heck of a way to go!

You gently carried the small kunoichi in your arms and carefully set her down on her bed which was surprisingly restored just moments ago and pulled the covers over her. She looked so peaceful in her nice deep well-deserved sleep.
Speaking of, it's about time YOU get some sleep too. Since Urd's no more, you got a room all to yourself....

...Or you could hop into Yukimaru's bed and appease that inner Xellos of yours!
1232222112221211111111111.title: 'Manly Physique'... 'Romantic Voice'...

choices: In the morning, the two of you make your way to Quahog
12322221122212111111111112.content:
You climb into bed right next to Yukimaru. Despite your desire to feel her up, you're too tired for it....besides, Yukimaru would probably punish you for touching her without permission! So you get as far as you can get away from her on the bed and watch her sleep for a minute until you fell asleep too. Within ten minutes, you find yourself standing in front of Horseshoe Falls in Niagra Falls. You're standing on the platform that overlooks the falls and the sight is breathtaking! There's nobody around; just you. The sound of rushing water is the only sound you hear. As you approach the edge of the platform, you hear something behind you. You whirl around and spot Yukimaru!
"Beautiful place for a date, zam" said Yukimaru.
"I guess" you say. "hey, how did you get here?"
"I just stumbled into this dream" said Yukimaru. "I guess this is one of my powers, zam"
"You mean, you're the real Yukimaru?" you ask.
"Yes, zam" said Yukimaru. "I....err..." she then blushes! Gosh, she blushes SO easily!
She then notices the falls behind you and smiles.
"Hey...I just realized I'm awfully thirsty" said Yukimaru. "and this place has plenty of water, zam. Hehe, watch this!"
Yukimaru then jumps off the platform and into the water fall below. You then jump off the platform too and end up in the water, next to Yukimaru!
"You better watch out" said Yukimaru. "I might drink you up along with all this water, zam"
"I've been in your stomach before" you say.
"Good point..." said Yukimaru and swims over to the bottom of the falls and opens her mouth wide. As you watch, Yukimaru's belly quickly swells up with water. Within moments, Yukimaru soon takes up the entire bottom of the falls' basin! You end up on Yukimaru's stomach as it swells even bigger. Soon, Yukimaru dwarfs the falls.
"That hit the spot, zam!" said Yukimaru.
You're about at the top of Mount Belly, and you make your way to her inflated breasts. Before you could reach her breasts, you find yourself floating towards her fattened face. You land right in front of her mouth.
"So....have you ever been to Celestia?" you ask.
"Nope" said Yukimaru. "but I did hear that it's awfully cold up there!"
"What do you know about it?"
"Its the Gods' Homeland" said Yukimaru. "very few mortals live there...the continent has only one city of mortals, in fact...they call it North Haven....and all the people up there are fat to protect themsleves from the cold"
"It looks to be a long trip" you say.
"Yep" said Yukimaru. "and you can't go there directly either! You have to take several ships to get there...it should take about 3 months to get there, zam"
"Three months?!" you ask. "isn't there a faster way?"
"I'm afraid not, zam" said Yukimaru. "in the morning, we'll make our way to Quahog for the ship that goes to....Ahum-Raj. I've only been there once"
"Ahum-Raj?"
"It's a continent that's dominated by this big desert, zam" said Yukimaru. "full of sand worms the size of Godzilla, zam! but don't worry...I'll protect you from those worms. There's only ten cities on that continent, zam!"
12322221122212111111111112.title: Dreamscape

123222211222121111111111121.content:
"Ten cities, huh?" you continue chatting with her as you tried balancing yourself on.... uh... the air!
"Well..." the excessively plump ninja's eyes were looking upward as she stopped in midsentence. That usually tells you she's thinking. "...Actually, I heard there was an 11th city, but I think it was destroyed a long time ago after a big town revolt which led to the Mayor and his wife being executed by the townfolk."
"Geez... that's terrible," you comment. Yukimaru nodded, "I feel bad for their son, zam. Left all alone in the world at such a young age... I could relate, though." You noticed her eyes lowering to the ground as she spoke, "I'm just thankful I still had my big brother to look out for me, zam..."

Hmm? Something unpleasant about her past? Now youre a little curious.

"Oh? I never knew you had a brother..."
"Hmm?! OH!" for some reason, her distant look of sadness was immediately replace with a carefree grin, "N-nevermind that, zam! That's all in the past. We have the future to think about... my future as a full-fledged goddess!" Hmm... she's obviously hiding something. But hey, this is supposed to be a GOOD dream, so you'd rather not butt in and make her feel uncomfortable. And the last thing you want is to give bring back suicidal tendencies! Besides... you dare not make those beautiful blue eyes of hers shed tears of sadness.

Once again, Yukimaru sensed that bit of interest from you and starting blushing a bit. "U-U-Um.... S-Steve? W...why are you looking at me like t-that... zam?"
"No reason," you just replied with a smile on your face. Oh man, you hope this dream could last forever, but you know youre gonna have to wake up sooner or later...

"Hey Steve! STEVE!!"

"Uh... did you hear something, Yukimaru?"
Your colossally obese friend shook her head, "I didnt hear anything, zam." She didnt? You coulda sworn you heard somebody else called to you.

"HEY STEVE! We gotta talk!" You DEFINITELY heard that!
"Um... are you sure you didnt hear anything?" you asked Yukimaru.
"No, I dont think so, zam. Why?"

Just when you were about to answer her, there was blinding flash around you and she was nowhere to be seen! Not only was Yukimaru gone, you werent even in Horseshoe Falls anymore! You were in the middle of some forest next to a campfire and a tent. Where were you?! You were supposed to be with your ninja-goddess pal!

"Sorry to interrupt your little fun time with the newbie, but we gotta talk." You heard the same voice again. You turned your head, only to see that very lecher from earlier... Xellos! What the hell is HE doing here in your dream?!

He raised his hand to greet you "Hello again, Steven! Long time no see... uh... well, technically it's only about 7 hours since we last met, but nice to see you again!"
"What the hell are YOU doing here in my dream?!" you politely asked him. Unfortunately it wasnt enough to wipe that carefree smile off his face.
"Now now, relax! Your friend doesnt know the difference... in fact, at this very moment, she's still chatting away with you."
"What?"
Xellos pulled out a little orb from his pocket and showed you, "See?" In it, you saw a vision of you and Yukimaru still talking with one another, although you couldnt hear what either of you were saying. ...WAIT A SEC! How could you be THERE when youre HERE?!
"Wait! How could I be THERE when I'm HERE?!"

"Stand-alone double spell. It's a clever little trick only a true full-fledged High Priest like myself could master!" Xellos bragged about his incredible powers, "Ha! Amazing, isnt it? She could be knocked by a different double every day and never realize it! Ha ha ha-hUGH!!" You stopped his snooty laugh short after you grabbed him by the neck!
"What are you doing here?" you questioned him.

"Hey hey! Easy easy!" In an instant, he disappeared out of your grasp and zipped right behind you, "Anyways, I heard you and the goddess-in-training are heading for Quahog to take a boat to Ahum-Raj. Very dangerous place.... of course, it'll be difficult enough to even get to Quahog in the first place. Not even your powerful friend might not be enough to protect you from the horrors that await."
"And what is it to YOU, Xellos?" you asked the rather nosey priest.

"I want your body!" ...WHAT THE HELL?!
You slowly stepped away from him "Dude... you might wanna look elsewhere for that kind of thing!"
"What? No, you misunderstand!" Xellos, keeping some sort of a dignified persona, cleared his throat, "*Ahem!* I propose we have ourselves a little bargain. You see... I need a place to um... hide out for a while. And I thought of the perfect place... your body!" Your body?!
"Wait wait! Here me out!" Xellos could sense you wanted to object, "I err... just need to take possession of it for just one day. One day is all I ask."
He's practically asking you to let him possess your body a day. You do not like where this is going.

"And why exactly should I do that?" you raised your eyebrow, "care to tell me why you need to take MY body?"
Xellos blushed a little as he scratched the back of his head, "Well... it's quite simple, really. I mean youre young and new, and I am quite highly experienced with this world. With my incredible knowledge of the route to Quahog, I can lead you and your friend to safety without causing any harm whatsoever to your dashing body!" ...'Dashing'? "That and um... I kinda need to lay low for a while for some big reason, but you dont need to know that!"

"Like hell I dont!" you snapped back at him, "I aint letting you take control of my body! Lord knows what you'll do with it!"
"Oh come now!" Xellos swayed his hand, "You have my word I wouldnt do anything... unpleasant with your body..." you then notice a slightly devious grin on his face appear on his face as he looked through his little orb, "of course if your friend were to get rather.. frisky, I cant possibly be held accountable, can I?"
Curious as to why he's grinning like that, you looked through the orb... and saw your double start making out with a smaller-sized Yukimaru! Of course, he had to pick her up to reach her mouth, but HIS was practically everywhere on her body! The nerve of that fuckin' priest! He's messing with YOUR girl with... your clone... and making her think that's you! But....

"Look, this can work for the both of us!" Xello continues to plead, "I get adequate... hiding time playing as you, and in return, I help you and your girlfriend through the route of Quahog and maybe pick up some essential supplies for your trip to Ahum-Raj, and even teach your friend of certain survival tips and secrets to getting through the merciless desert quick and easy. And in just one day, you'll be back in your normal body and nobody'll ever know of the 'switch'!"

You really dont want him to gain control of your body even if it's only for a day, but maybe Yukimaru could benefit from Xellos's help on the road to Quahog. But one question remains.
"And where will I be during the whole time?" you wondered.

"You would be in MY body," Xellos answers, "But dont worry. There's nothing to be scared about when being me. Just keep a low profile and dont make yourself too obvious and you'll be fine!" then Xellos frowned a little and blushed even more, "...however, you might wanna keep away from a certain someone I'm trying to get away from. It's not like she's gonna hurt you or anything... but yeah, you'll know to watch out for her when you see her! So do we have a deal?" He extended his hand, waiting for you to shake it.

You obviously dont trust Xellos's true intentions for switching bodies with you and youre a little worried about who this certain person is he's trying to avoid, but it's only for 24 hours. Plus, Yukimaru could use Xellos's knowledge. Is it worth the 24-hour switch?
123222211222121111111111121.title: "I Want Your Body!"

choices: Try to talk some sense into her!
1232222112221211111111111211.content:
You sigh heavily before answering. It could be fun switching bodies with Xellos.

"Deal" you say, shaking Xellos's hand. As soon as you do, there's a bright flash, blinding you for several moments. When you can see again, you find yourself in a one-room shack. You blink and look around and find that you're indeed in the body of Xellos....but where the hell are you? The one-room shack you're in looks to be a storage shed of some kind....that hasn't been used in about 40 years! You decide to open the door to the shack, only to find yourself on a low hill overlooking a canyon. Okay....so...you were kicked out of the dream because you switched bodies with Xellos and were sent to whereever Xellos was hiding out. You were going to ask him what was wrong about the trip to Quahog, but it looks like you don't get to find out. You wanted to ask who was after him too. It's still night out with the faintest hint of sunlight coming. Looks like the start of the day. You take a closer look at the shack and find a flashlight with working batteries in it. You decided to explore your surroundings. In five minutes, you find a note from Xellos not far from the shack on a sizable boulder. The note reads:


If you're reading this, I will answer some of your questions that you no doubt have.
There's nothing wrong about Quahog; the road that leads to Quahog goes through Neko's turf. Neko--that isn't her true name--is a fox that's a well-known robber and murderer. Neko also happens to be a goddess, thanks to her devouring of the god known as Ako-Ako (you wouldn't know him). Anyway, Neko is a dangerous goddess that likes to torture people in brutal ways....and she's not after me if you're wondering. Neko's turf is a dangerous place to be for anyone (especially a goddess-in-training). I do know the one weakness that Neko has that I will not say here. I'll try to get Yukimaru to avoid Neko and we'll be in Quahog before the day is done. Hopefully, you'll be in Quahog tomorrow.
The person who's after me is Lina Inverse. Lina isn't too dangerous per se, but she has an terrible temper and I have what she's looking for. There's also someone after me by the name of....

At that point, the note is snatched out of your hands and you look up in time to see a gigantic foot rushing at you. You manage to dodge out of the way at the last moment and scramble to your feet. You gasp as you see that a full-grown dragon is standing right beside you! The dragon merely glances at the note and snorts with laughter.

"So, Xellos is hiding in your body, is he?" asked the dragon in a female voice.
"Who are you?" you ask.
"Nithog" said the dragon. "looks like I have a dilemma on my hands. Do I stand and wait for Xellos to come back to his own body....or roast his body with you in it? Decisions, decisions...."

Nithog tosses the note into her mouth and swallows it.

Nithog is about 50 feet tall, and is dark green. Her underside is light green. She also looks to be quite fat.
1232222112221211111111111211.title: Nithog

12322221122212111111111112112.content:
Oh wonderful. You havent even been Xellos for 10 minutes and already youre in deep shit! No wonder that lecher couldnt wait to switch bodies with you! Youre being stared down by a 50 foot dragon towering over you. All the while, Xellos could probably be leading Yukimaru to a trap or perhaps trying to take advantage of her as you! You wouldnt put it past him...

Sad that youre in the body of one of the most power Dark Priests in the world and you have no clue how to use his powers! His body's there, but his brain is long gone! You dont even know how to teleport! And there's no way in hell you can outrun a colossus like Nithog! Youre only hope is to plead with her...

"L...l....listen, N-Nithog!" you take a deep breath as you slowly step back away from her... up until you bump into a wall, "Y-y-you dont wanna do this! I... I'm not really with Xellos, we're just doing eachother a favor is all!"
Nithog merely snarls, blowing smoke down at you! "Tsk! Oh poor baby. Let me guess.... did he threaten to murder your first born if you didnt let him give you his body? Start talking... or start squirming in my belly!!"
"No! No, that's not it at all," you admit, "he said he'd help a friend of mine out if I lent him my body. That's all!"

"Oh?" Nithog tilted her head, "...and just where might your original body be then?" You were just about to tell her, but then you remembered:Neko... whoever she is. He's probably the only one keeping Yukimaru safe from her! You rat him out... you might never see her again!
"I...I cant you tell you."
"AND WHY NOT?!" she roared!
"Because," you swallow hard, "it's for the safety of a friend. I cant tell you!"
"Oh, you'd better start talking!" she demanded, "I'm starting to feel like that village I had earlier didnt tide me over!" Crap, she aint giving you much choice!
"I'm sorry! I just cant!"

"I'll give you to the count of three to cough it up before I gobble YOU up!" she threatened, "...1....."
Man, why couldnt Xellos have left you a note on how to use magic as well?!

As you pondered the nearest escape route, you noticed something just below her bulging belly... a switch?
"...2...."
You dont have time to question it, so you let your curiosity get the better of you!
"THREE!!!"
*Click!*

*POOOOOOOOOFFFF!!!* The moment you flip that tiny switch, Nithog bursts into a humongous cloud of smoke!! Yikes, what kind of big scary dragon has a self-destruct button?! But when the smoke cleared, you learned that Nithog wasnt a kamikaze dragon...
What was left when the smoke cleared was a little girl lying on the ground. A short young(looking) blonde girl with blue eyes, a cute blue bow in her hair, wearing what seems to be a white sleeveless choir-girl dress and little white wings sticking out her back! For some reason, this girl seemed to be sweating bullets as she stared up at you.

And youre pretty sure you know why! Say hello to the big bad NITHOG!!
"..WHAT?!" you growled under your breath, almost causing your darkened aura to explode all over the place!
"Uh...uh....um..." the girl stuttered nervously, "uh.... Roar?"

"WHY YOU LITTLE-"
"EEEKKK!!!" the brat let out a loud shriek as she got up off the ground and tried running away! Unfortunately for her, the twerp wasnt getting away! As if acting on ranging animal instinct, you leaped into the pounced on her! As your shadow overshadowed her, you noticed her blue eyes widened at the sight of you just before!

"OOOMMPPPPHH!!!!" You pinned the sneaky little runt's arms to the ground, ensuring that she aint getting away! You didnt hurt her (not like you didnt want to after she scared the living hell out of you!), you just restrained her!
"Grr! L-Let me go!" she squealed and struggled, "I-I-It is a crime against the Celestial laws to brutally torture an angel-in-training!!!" 'Angel-in-training'? "N...Not to mention it's also a crime to hide confidential information of a wanted criminal I, Flonne Caspius, Angel Trainee and Love Freak place you under arrest!" Who is this little brat kidding? And what is this little brat talking about?

"First of all, youre in no position to flaunt authority, little lady!" you snap at Flonne, "Secondly, what are you talking about? What do you mean by hiding information of 'wanted criminal'?"
She gave off an angry frown that seemed more cute than it did threatening, "Hmmph! I'm talking about the Dark Priest Xellos! Wanted on many accounts of murder, thievery, lechery, co-inspiring against Heaven! It's my job to see that awful criminal brought to justice and pay for his crimes!" And YOURE the one who gladly accepted to switch bodies with him?! You had a feeling the guy couldnt be trusted! You better hope he makes good on his deal.

"U-Unless you wish to share his punishment," Flonne continued to squirm, "you'll let me go and tell me where the real Xellos is!" Once again, YOU had HER pinned to the ground. Threats were out of her league.
"No way!" you snapped at her, "not after that little prank you pulled on me! I seem to recall you threatening to eat me!"
"Th....th....th..." Flonne stuttered like crazy again, "....then at least give back the thing that he stole from Celestia!"
"What did he steal?"
"...I dunno," Flonne shrugged, "I only heard that he stole it... um... so give it back!"
Safe to say you were getting tired of the little angelic flunkie, so you gave her a little proposition, "How's about you give me a good reason why I shouldnt yank those little wings of yours off?!"
"I-I'M TELLING THE SERAPH YOU SAID THAT!!!!!!!!" she squealed like a little girl.

"XELLOS?! WHAT IN THE...?! I KNOW YOURE A PERVERT, BUT... A CHILD?!!"

Aw snap! Somebody else spotted you. You turned your head to see a red-headed girl with a black bandana, red eyes, big yellow earrings, wearing what seemed to be light swordswoman armor and red pants... Lina Inverse, you take it? Judging by the disgruntled look on her face, she's not very happy to see you... or it could be due to the fact that she's looking at you on top of a little girl, pinning her arms to the floor! Not exactly a good sight!

"W-w-wait! M-Ms. Inverse! I can explain, ya see-"
"Oh, save your worthless excuses!" Lina snapped at pointed her sword at you, "just step away from the kid and hand it over!"
"Hand what over?"
"You know what I'm talking about!" she snapped again, "I said give it back!" So this was what Xellos when he said you had what she was looking for. Shame he didnt say WHAT... or at least he MIGHTVE if Flonne didnt eat the note!

"L-Look! Ms. Inverse, this is all a big misunderstanding!" you explain, "I'm not really Xellos."
Lina just tilted her head and looked at you funny, "...What?"
"Yeah," you continued, "I swapped bodies with him as a favor so he'd help my friend! Isnt that right, Flonne?" you looked down at Flonne, "C'mon! Tell her it's all a big misunderstanding!"

Flonne....
12322221122212111111111112112.title: Someone's apparently good with the ladies...

123222211222121111111111121121.content:
Flonne sighs heavily before speaking. For a minute, you're afraid that Flonne would rat on you...in which case, you might be on one end of a Dragon Slave attack from Lina.
"...He speaks the truth" said Flonne. "said that Xellos switched bodies with him to protect a friend of his"
"And why should I believe you?" asked Lina.
"Cause I'm an Angel-in-Training from Celestia" said Flonne. "we're forbidden to tell lies"
"If you're not the real Xellos, then where is he?" asks Lina.
"And would you kindly get off of me?!" asked Flonne.
"You threatened to eat me" you snarl. "you think I would let you up after that?"
"Oh, come on!" said Flonne. "that was an act"
You let Flonne up after some thinking. When she's up, she tells Lina that she's looking for something that Xellos stole from the Hall of the Gods...she doesn't know what was stolen however. After that, you tell Flonne and Lina about yourself and how you came to be in this situation. It's a little hard for Lina to believe your story, but she's convinced that you aren't the real Xellos. You leave out the fact that Xellos knows how to get pass Neko.
"Are you and Flonne looking for the same thing?" you ask.
"I seriously doubt it" said Lina. "unless the Gods want a breast expansion potion..."
"A...what?" asked you and Flonne.
"Breast expansion potion" repeated Lina. "I've been looking for it for years, but Xellos stole it from me"
"Uhh..." you say.
Lina Inverse is a very talented magician, but she's not very....well, curvy in the breast department. This is a running gag on the Slayers anime. You think that she's one of the cutest anime girls out there; proof that not all anime women need to have big breasts to be cute.
"Couldn't you use magic to make them expand?" asked Flonne.
"If I was able to do that, I would do that" said Lina. "but expansion magic isn't my forte...and they can go VERY wrong if you're not careful. I discovered the potion that would expand my breasts. As soon as I got it, Xellos came and stole it from me....that was about three weeks ago. Ever since, I've been searching for Xellos. So, you don't have the potion with you?"
You do a quick search of Xellos's pockets (which is deeper than normal pockets) and you pull out pretty much everything besides the potion. Lina sighed.
"Xellos must've hidden it somewhere" you say. "he did left me a note explaining everything....and then, SOMEONE came along and ate it!" When you say "someone", you point at Flonne.
"Hey, I was...." starts Flonne.
"Speaking of eating, I'm awful hungry" said Lina. "time to get some breakfast!"
When Lina Inverse wants to eat, there's no stopping her. So, you and Flonne follow her to a nearby city called Pfoensheare.....which is a sizable port city. It turns out that you're on the other end of the contient. You three find a resturant and start scarfing down major amount of food. Lina's hunger is legendary, and she lives up to it; she even warns you to keep your hands and feet away from her mouth! "Unless you wanna end up in my stomach" she quips as she gulps down a drink.
"I think I'll pass on that..." you say.
Flonne also has a bottomless pit for a stomach it looks like.
"So...everyone has a bottomless pit for a stomach?" you ask, hoping to sound causal.
"Pretty much" said Lina.
"Where's Gourry and the others?" you ask, realizing that Lina is traveling alone. Lina thumbs her nose at you and doesn't answer you. You look over at Flonne, but she shrugs and continues to eat nonstop. For a moment, you think you hear muffled voices coming from Lina's stomach, but that's just crazy.
123222211222121111111111121121.title: Forbidden to Lie

1232222112221211111111111211212.content:
Just then, a shocking surge sparked in your mind! It wasnt painful... it was more like a premonition. Someone was coming! Someone with bad intentions! You dropped your fork as you waited with fear and anticipation for this someone to come! Unfortunately, neither Lina or Flonne were as astoundingly perceptive as you are!

*whew!*

Hm... that shocking surge is gone. That was fast.

Before you can relax, Lina put on a rather shocked expression. She seemed to be staring in the direction of the waitress coming over to your table to offer seconds. Unfortunately, the waitress had stopped suddenly in place and had an expression of frozen shock as if whatever happened just scared her stiff. But before you could ask her if she was alright...

*sssslllliiicccceee*

"EEEEEKKKKK!!!" Flonne shrieked as you gazed in absolute horror as the poor waitress's body split in half! Her top half fell on the floor while her bottom half stood standing with pools of blood gushing out of it's gaping sliced wound! Poor woman probably died before she could experience how excruciatingly painful that was! It's a good thing Xello's body has a strong stomach, otherwise you'd be fighting back the urge to puke and piss yourself!
You tried to sound out the other customers' screams and panicking as you pondered who could do such a horrible thing.

As if things couldnt get worse for you, you felt the shocking surge come right back. At the very back end of the room you saw a very familiar-looking silhouette. Although her body was completely shaded, you recognized the midget's shape and figure: Yukimaru!!
And if you thought THAT was painful, she whipped out a particular knife that you recall she attempted to commit seppuku (or was it harakiri? I forget) with.... drenched in blood!

"No... no friggin way!" you mouthed in disbelief. Your own little girlfriend... a cold-hearted murderer?! Sure she inadvertently destroyed a universe, but it was clearly an accident! Not that this... which was clearly on purpose!
Not only that, she whipped out something from her pocket... a little bottle full of green bubbling liquid! Seeing that made Lina tense up!

"SHE'S GOT MY..." Lina suddenly stopped mid-sentence for some reason, "...Elixir of Healing!"
"But I thought you said it was a breast expa-OOMPH!" Lina covered Flonne's mouth before announcing, "LET'S GET HER!!"
Not wanting to look the other way, you followed the angel and flat-chested heroine as they chased after your lover's shadow! Yukimaru dashed down the hallways as you followed after her! She was so quick and agile, she even leaped against the walls and dashed across them like the Prince of Persia! She was fast, but so were you. Xellos musta done a lot of running around.

It wasnt long before Yukimaru led you and your allies out of the restaurant and into a dark back alley. Your newbound intelligence told you she was leading you into a trap, but it didnt matter to you. All that mattered was why she had done what she did. And on the plus side, she finally stopped running... right in front of a brick wall!

"Nowhere left to run, murderer!" Lina warned as Flonned whipped out a bow with a pink heart arrow and aimed it your lover's way, "Hand over the.... bottle now!"

Yukimaru turned around.... she has no face!! No eyes, no nose, no mouth! Her exposed head was completely pale and white! A fake?!
The fake Yukimaru quickly fell to the ground like a marionette that's been clipped of it's strings!

"What in the... YAAAAAHHH!!!"

Just then, electric surges sparked not only your mind, but also the bodies of Lina and Flonne! By the time the surging stopped, your two friends fell to the floor with a thud!
THANKFULLY they were just knocked out. UNTHANKFULLY, you were all alone!

The shocks that knocked your friends out came from the two identical demons in ninja garbs.... with tasers. Not exactly sure why ninjas would have tasers, but whatever. The ninja demons pointed their tasers toward your neck and crotch area, making absolutely sure you werent going nowhere! Not wanting to piss off your kidnappers, you remained still and quiet as you awaited their mercy.

Just then, shadows appeared out of the brick wall, revealing more pointy-eared ninjas… and another figure, with a more dominating aura stepped out of the center shadow! This figure wore the exact same ninjaish uniform that Yukimaru wore, had the same pointed elven ears... even had long black hair similar to her as well. but by the time you caught a glimpse of the figure when it stepped into the light, you could tell this was not Yukimaru.

This figure was much taller than her, even taller than you! His eyes were completely white, void of eyelids or pupils, with black ring makeup around them. His aura felt similar to that of Yukimaru's but a lot colder and less welcoming. A relative of hers, perhaps?
His pupiless eyes were locked on to yours as he stepped toward you. Split seconds seemed like split hours as you both stared daggers at each other. This gave you plenty of time to think about who this guy might be and what he might want. Since you believe he is related to Yukimaru, you had to think hard for clues.

*****************************************

"I'm just thankful I still had my big brother to look out for me, zam.... zam... zam...."

*****************************************

"Let me guess..." you finally broke the silence, "you must be Yukimaru's big bro, right?"
He said nothing. And you didnt like the sound of that. He stared at you for a few more seconds before whispering something to one of his fellow ninjas in a language unfamiliar to you which lacked the word 'zam'. His ninja underling nodded and whispered to the ninja with the knife to your crotch who then nodded.... and stabbed you HARD in the shin!

"YAAAAGGGHHH!!!" you screamed off the top of Xellos's lungs. You fell over, gripping the side of your leg in pain! You couldnt nurse that wound for long, cuz Fubuki's underlings had tied your arms together and gagged your mouth! Geez, is this any way to treat your brother-in-law?!
Shame you had no friggin clue on how to conjure magic... but even if you did, you sensed special little magic-blocker tags on each on the ninjas preventing you to cast anything! Wait a sec. How do you know about magic-blocker tags?
...Better question! How did you know his name's Fubuki?! Yukimaru never told you his name, did she?!

Anyways, the guy who you think is named Fubuki leaned down at you and whispered...
1232222112221211111111111211212.title: Time to meet the in-laws!

choices: You, Flonne and Lina talk about various things
12322221122212111111111112112122.content:
"That's a clever disguise....Steven Johnson" said Fubuki. All that you could do was stare up at the ninja with a shocked expression on your face!

"How do you....?" you ask, speaking through the gag you had on your mouth.

"My mistress apologies for not showing up much sooner" said Fubuki. "but she was in the middle of something when you came to her house...or rather, when your car broke down"

"Wha...?" you ask. "what's this all about?!"

Fubuki turned to face one of his ninja underlings and gave an order in that same unfamiliar language....was it Latin? It sounded vaguely like Latin, but you were never good at studying other languages besides English. The underling in question did a quick salute and then vanished from sight.....just like that. He turned to another underling and barked out an order. The underling hauled you to your feet. Fubuki started to walk down the dark alley, and the ninja underling forced you to march after Yukimaru's big bro. You look over at the still knocked-out Lina and Flonne on the ground and pleaded at them silently to get up and rescue you....but they never did! As you are frog-marched out of the dark back alley, you notice that you're being led to a large red and black carriage. The carriage looks like it could seat at least a dozen people! As Fubuki, you and the underling approach the carriage, the footman opens the carriage for you. The footman looks like a demon, complete with horns and cloven hoofs! You're forced into the carriage, followed by Fubuki and hid underling ninja.
"The mistress will be with you shortly" said the footman as he closes the door.
The inside of the carriage looks just like the inside of a limo and could seat at least a dozen people. The seats are made out of black leather and the walls are a light red.
The underling and Fubuki start to have a conversation in that strange language of theirs. You try to get their attention, but they ignore you. Four minutes later, the carriage opens again and a demonic woman steps into the carriage and takes a seat near you. The woman looks like Morrigan from the Darkstalkers games with blue hair and silvery eyes. She looks directly at you.....and you find yourself kneeling in front of her! You don't recall getting up from your seat at all.
"A sheep in sheep's clothing" mused the woman. "allow me to introduce myself. I'm Lady Cassandra. I own that house you saw before you entered into this world. I apologize for not greeting you sooner, but I was busy with something else. Let me take this off of you...." Here, she removed the gag from your mouth. Her voice was like honey to your ears, and it effected you like a siren's call. You couldn't help but be enthralled by her voice and her looks. She smiles at you and motions for you to return to your seat.
"I imagine you have a lot of questions for me" said Cassandra, and you feel the carriage start to move.
"What's this all about?" you ask. "why did you kidnap me?"
"I kidnapped Xellos' body" corrected Cassandra. "I want Xellos....but you're my second-place prize. I could return you to your own world if you want. For a price of course. Nothing is free you know"
"You can....?" you start to ask when the carriage suddenly exploded!


You wake up to find yourself looking at Lina! Flonne is there too. All of you are in a wagon, speeding down the streets of the port city. The wagon is being drawn by two horses and driver is Gourry.
"What happened?" you ask groggily.
"Dragon slave" said Lina, pointing behind the wagon. You turn around to see that a small section of the city has been destroyed and nothing is left save for a huge crater.
"Thanks for saving me" you say.
"We're not out of the woods yet" said Flonne. "a dragon slave won't kill Cassandra"
"I know that" said Lina. "but it'll slow her down"
You figure you must still be alive because you're in Xellos' body. Xellos isn't a pushover by any means and it's doubtful that even a giga slave would harm Xellos, let alone a dragon slave.
"Where are we going?" you ask.
"To get your body back" said Flonne.
"At least I got this" said Lina, holding up that breast expansion potion.
"Good for you" said Gourry.
"Who is this Cassandra?" you ask.

"She's a succubus" said Lina. "she opened up a portal to our world because she was bored of your world. She's very powerful and she plans on ruling our world! Other than that, I don't know that much about her"
"She's the seventh daughter of Lilith, queen of all succubi" said Flonne.
"Lilith?" you ask. "Adam's first wife?"
"Who's Adam?" asked Gourry.
"Never mind that" said Flonne. "we need to get to Quahog as speedily as we can"
"We'll never make it to Quahog in a day" said Gourry.
Now, the wagon had made it out of the port city of Pfoensheare and was on a wide cobblestone road. You're in farm country by the looks of it.
"So where are we going?" asked Gourry.
"Head for Mt. Templeton" said Lina. "it's the fastest way to get to Quahog"
12322221122212111111111112112122.title: Meeting Cassandra

choices: She eventually calms down and puts away her knife...
More time passes, and she's STILL at it...
123222211222121111111112.content:
From the look on her face it was obvious she was scared to go through with it. Trusting your judgment, you give her time to work out her emotions.

Which is taking longer than you would expect. Several minutes later she continue to stand there, trying to mentally prepare herself for her next action (and failing).

You decide to see how long she can keep this up.
123222211222121111111112.title: Mental Preperation

choices: Tell him you dont know where she went.
1232222112221211111111121.content:
It seemed like hours passed as you stared down Yukimaru reluctantly pushing herself to commit seppuku (and doing it WRONG), even though it was only a few minutes, although it's probably because she was intentionally slowing down time. But you stood your ground. If she really wanted to kill herself, she wouldnt have bullshitted around for so long, she'd just DO IT! You stared her down as she sweated kunais, shaking the knife at her throat...

"I....I...I.....I...." she finally lowered her head and put her knife away, "I cant do it..."
You breathed a sigh of relief. She's finally calmed down. However, she wasnt the least bit happy about it.
"...I am not even brave enough to die with honor!" She was ashamed that she couldnt kill herself?!
"Yuki, dont say that-"
"I am truly a disgrace to the rest of the Snow Clan! I have disappointed my own brothers and sisters!"
You were not liking the fact she hasnt uttered the 'z' word yet! "N...Not even a 'zam'?"
"Only a true strong blooded Snow ninja can utter the word," Yukimaru started breaking into tears, "I...I... I have lost the meaning of the word! E-excuse me!" And with that, she stormed out of the room crying her eyes out! Oh dear.

"Yuki! Where are you going?!" you called out to her, "Wait! Yuki!" She didnt wait. She darted off down the hallway, not even bothering to look back! You chased her down the hall and out of the hotel...
"Yukimaru, come back! COME BACK!! YUKIMARU!!" Too late. She was gone. You lost all sight of her. "Aw... damnit!"
Perhaps you shouldve stopped her from humiliating herself when you had the chance. She is pretty stubborn after all. Now she's wandering off somewhere, leaving you all alone stranded in the middle of nowhere in front of her hotel.
On the plus side, you dont think you need to worry about her getting in danger. After all, she is practically a goddess now. Perhaps she just needs some time alone to clear her head. "She'll come back," you say to yourself as you turn around and head back inside.

"Oof!" only to bump into someone who suddenly appeared out of nowhere! Just inches in front of you was a tall shady long brown-haired slightly bearded man man in a black leather trench coat with a bigass wooden cross strapped to his back glaring into your eyes with those red and blue dual-colored pupils of his and a cigarette in his unemotional frown. You didnt know whether he was trying to intimidate you or just try to look badass. After a short while of staring at you, he took a slight smoke of his cigarette and blew right in your face!
The nerve of that Van Helsing reject!

"...WHO will come back?" before you could get a word in, he questioned you in a dark roughnecked badass tone of voice.
"Excuse me, what do you think-!!" you stopped in midsentence the moment he whipped out a little switchblade from his coat and pointed it at your throat!
"Dont move," he warned you, "dont even take a single breath." Without Yukimaru's protection, you were at the stranger's mercy.
He flipped his switchblade around, revealing a crucifix on the opposite side, holding in your face as he looked you over.
He checks your eyes. "Hmph. Pupils arent dilated." Checks both sides of your face and under your neck. "No sign of any scratches or teethmarks. Your breath kinda smells a little off, but then again, it could be just bad dental hygiene." Smartass! Still, he continues looking you over, "No weird markings or tattoos. Skin tone doesnt seem quite pale enough. No wings, no tail. Testicles still seem to be attached." ...THE HELL?! After a bit of looking you over he FINALLY puts his switchblade back in his coat, "Heh. Guess youre not a demon... good."

Uh... good?
"Wh...who are you?" you finally muster the courage to ask, to which he gladly answers.
"Hunter. Hunter H Hunters. Demon Hunter, 1st Class, 25 years straight. See my badge? Course you dont. Know why? Hunters dont carry badges. An assassin for hire, but I'm a pure-blooded servant of the Good Lord," he says as he reaches into his coat and pulls out a bible... shaped box with a liquor flask marked 'Good Lord' inside! He twists open the top and takes a huge swig of the flask! "AaaAAAAH! That's the Good Lord for ya!"
Holy hell, a Van Helsing reject with a drinking problem?! Lovely.
"S...so... um... that makes you, what? A vampire hunter or something?"
"Vampire, zombie, werewolf, ghoul, devil, you name it, I aim to slay it," Hunter responds cooly, "I'm in charge of keeping the demon population in check. Heard the Succubus's lair is a good place to do a little... 'population control'!" A Van Helsing reject with a drinking problem that decided to wander into Cassandra's place to kill monsters! Can this guy get any better?!

"Speaking of which... have you seen this demon?" he reached into his coat once again and pulled out a piece of paper. Your eyes widened when you saw the picture! It was Yukimaru! "This one's got a hell of a record. Wanted on multiple charges of vandalism and homicide. Forty accounts on robbery. Twenty-one accounts of destruction of property. Twelve accounts of rebelling against the judicial system. One account on devouring a well-ranked goddess. 723 billion accounts of murder. 9 accounts of galactic imbalance which led to 723 billion accounts of murder." Oh right... the universe destruction incident! "The client, a certain family member of said devoured goddess, demands the demon dead, it's head sticking on a pike, and it's tongue removed so that can never again utter the cursed 'Z word of Heracy'."

Damnit! This guy's set out to kill Yukimaru?! YOUR Yukimaru?! He cant possibly be serious! Has he got too much of the 'Good Lord' in his system?! He cant kill Yukimaru.... can he?
"Uh... listen, Mr. Hunter-"
"Let's see..." Hunter pulled out random objects from his trenchcoat, "it's a ninja type... got a robe of camouflage and a few shurikens handy. It's of the Snow Clan... got my lighter and a can of aerosol. Has plenty of God blood flowing through it... packing plenty of Hines blood. Yep... bitch is good as dead. Alls I need now is leads. HEY YOU, KID!"
"I got a name! It's-"
"Dont care!" Hunter cut you off again, "I couldve sworn I heard you calling out the demon's name. Which way did it go?!"

And now he's asking you where Yukimaru went! Seeing as though he's out to kill your special lover, the last thing you wanna do is tell him where she is! Not that you know anyway...
But lying to him might be kinda bad for your health as well! Do you dare give Hunter false directions... or just flat out tell him you dont know?
1232222112221211111111121.title: Wanted: Dead or... just dead.

choices: A woam enters the hotel....and she looks like Janet!
You talk some more with Janet and Yorick
12322221122212111111111211.content:
"I have no idea where she is" you tell the Hellsing reject. "she just stormed off!"
"Hmmm.." said Hunter. "Well, she can't have gone far. I'll go and kill her, shall I?"
Hunter turned and was heading out of the lobby of the hotel when somebody entered the hotel; it was a young man dressed much like Hunter was, but he had a mess of blond hair instead of brown. The young man rushed past Hunter, not even noticing Hunter. By the time Hunter turned around to see where the young man had gone, the young man was chatting away with you, apologizing for being late and asking for forgiveness. The young man was still babbling on when Hunter grabbed the kid from behind. The young man yelped and faced his attacker.
"I believe I'm the one you're looking for, boy" said Hunter. "I thought I told you to come as soon as possible!"
"The map you gave me wasn't any help" said the young man. "and this place is out of the way and..."
"Shut it!" snapped Hunter. "seems this one has been in contact with the demon we're looking for"
"Hey!" you yell. "I have a name!"
"I thought I smelled the demon on him" said the young man.
Smell? You sniff yourself, but can't make out any other scent.
"You stay here and keep an eye on the place" said Hunter. "I'm going to try to pick up the trail" With that, Hunter stalked off out of the hotel. The young man re-entered the lobby of the hotel and looked you over. The young man looked to be two years younger than you were. His leather trenchcoat had old stains of blood all over it and a sizable claw-mark was on the right shoulder. A rather shabby-looking coat.
"Might as well get on with the introductions" said the young man. "I'm Yorick, Hunter 4th class"
"I'm Steven" you say.
"What do you know of the demon?" asked Yorick.
"Only that she's a ninja and runs this hotel" you say. "and she's NOT a demon! She's a goddess!"
"Only because she ate that goddess earlier" said Yorick, sitting down at a table. He motions for you to join him at the table and you do. Yorick whips out a flask from an inner pocket filled with an amber-colored liquid. The flask isn't labeled...could that be more of that Good Lord stuff?! Now you have two hunters with a drinking problem! Yorick takes a small swig from the flask and makes a face. "Wish I didn't have to take this stuff...."
"Huh?" you ask.
"Every Demon Hunter has to drink this shit at least once a day" said Yorick. "have no idea why....I'm just 4th class, they tell shit to Hunters of my class" He takes another swig of the stuff and nearly gags. You puzzle over that little statement....why would they have to drink once a day? Sounded like some sort of medicine. That's when you hear the doors of the hotel open once again. This time, it's a woman who enters....and she's dressed like Hunter and Yorick was. What's with the trenchcoats?! And she's quite the looker too with curves and big breasts. She's wearing a low-cut shirt under the leather trenchcoat and she has dirty blond hair. She looks much like Mai Valentine from Yu-Gi-Oh. In fact, you wonder if it really is Mai. Does Mai has a twin sister? The Mai lookalike looks around the lobby until she spots Yorick. She comes over to the table and sits right next to you.
"Good afternoon, I'm Janet. Hunter, 3rd class" said the woman, shaking your hands and Yorick's. "And you're the new guy I've heard so much about"
"I'm Yorick" said Yorick. "I'm with Hunter"
"I'm with Dastena" said Janet. Yorick looks shocked.
"They have TWO hunters going after the demon?" you blurt out.
"Dastena isn't after the demon" said Janet. "she's after Hunter"
"What?" yelled Yorick. "why on earth she's after Hunter?!"
"She wouldn't say" said Janet. "all she said was that a third party wanted to stop the killing of Yukimaru"
"Third party?" you ask.
"Even so, a Hunter can't hunt another Hunter" said Yorick. "its against our ways"
"I don't get it either" said Janet. "Dastena just came to me and asked for my help...and she looked scared"
"Scared?" asked Yorick. "I thought nothing would scare her"
"Well, something did" said Janet. "Dastena sent me here to look after the place"
This is quite the development! First, there's a Hunter who's after Yukimaru and then there's another Hunter going after Hunter! And who...or what is this 'third party' that wants Yukimaru to live? You find yourself staring at Janet's large chest and notice something. She's wearing a golden pendant with the letter "Z" on it. In a moment, the pendant vanishes into thin air as if it was never there! What the hell?
"What're you looking at?!" asked Janet.
"Uh...nothing" you say, quickly looking away.
"So...Dastena is another Hunter?" you ask.
"She's our leader" said Yorick. "she's a master of swordfighting and spying"
12322221122212111111111211.title: Swarming with Hunters

1232222112221211111112.content:
"I'm sorry to say that I'm too tired to stargaze with you tonight" you say with complete honesty. Even though you've done nothing but feed Yukimaru all day long, you feel sleepy at the end of the day. What worries you is how this new goddess will react to your refusal. Will she kill you with her knife, or will she be merciful? You wait several tense moments as Yukimaru considers on what to do with you.

"Eh, you're right" said Yukimaru, taking her knife away from your throat. "I feel that you're too tired to stargaze with me, zam. And I won't have a tired worshiper hanging around me"

"Whoah!" you say. "who said I was your worshiper?"

"I did" said Yukimaru. "if you have a problem with that, I'll digest you like I digested that crazy Urd, zam!"

"Hey, I have no problem with that" you say. "I was pretty much your worshiper anyway by feeding you all those chocolates"

"I guess you're right" laughed Yukimaru,

You then wonder why Yukimaru returned to her normal size and weight. Was it because Urd was skinny too? Or was it a status choice...I mean, who ever heard of a fat goddess? Statues of goddesses were thin and lovely....in fact, the only goddess that was remotely fat was a goddess of fertility. You're just too tired to think straight, and you automatically head for Urd's room,when Yukimaru tugged at your shirt once again and you turn to face her.

"Since you're too tired to stargaze with me...." said Yukimaru. "would you mind....sleeping with me, zam?" with that, Yukimaru blushes so deeply red that she looks like Mars!

"You really want me to?" you ask.

"Do you think you're the first mortal to sleep with a goddess, zam?" asked Yukimaru. "you humans have a history of being smitten by the divine..."

"I don't have the energy for that, either" you say. "I just want to sleep"

"And so you shall" said Yukimaru. "and I'll provide a nice and warm place for you to sleep in" she then licks her lips.

"You want me to sleep in your stomach?" you ask.

"Well...in my body, anyway" said Yukimaru. "it doesn't have to be my stomach. You could just go up between my thighs and sleep in my womb...or up my butt...." here, she giggles.

"Whatever..." you say, yawning hugely.
1232222112221211111112.title: Sleeping arrangements

12322221122212111111121.content: What will she eat you with?
12322221122212111111121.title: Yukimaru eats you

choices: You wake up hours later, still resting on between her enormous breasts.
You wake up snuggling right next to Yukimaru's fat face, holding her plump hand.
123222211222121111112.content:
Yukimaru's blue eyes beamed as you place chocolate after chocolate into her gaping maw, her fat cheeks growing ever fatter as she swelled. Breasts already the size of wrecking balls soon grew to be twice that, then three times the size as they swelled with fat from the magical sweets. Enormous thighs soon became gigantic as they grew, their combined width enough to crush a large truck. Plump feet wiggled as the cankles around them swelled to immense proportions. The room is especially made for someone as obese as Yukimaru. You massage her tummy as she sits on the floor.
"That feels good, zam...now come here" said Yukimaru, and you two kiss passionately again. You can't help but be turned on...and neither can Yukimaru. Soon, the two of you are naked and you practically make love to Yukimaru's fat belly.

1232222112221211111121212121122.content:
Early in the morning, you hear two knocks at the room's door. Getting up and putting on one of the hotel's robes for normal-sized guests, you open it to find two of the strange, aquatic women. You then remember their race's name: Nereids. "What can I do for you?"

"We've got a transportation schedule for the day, sir. You said before that you wanted to head to Daniel?" she says in a very soft, musical voice. You nod, taking it out of her hands and thanking her. Yukimaru is just rising. Right now she's rubbing her blue eyes of sleep, her pudgy face yawning. "Good morning, Yukimaru."

She stands up, albeit with a little difficulty, looking for her clothes. You pick up the stretched out pair that she was wearing yesterday and hand them to her. She smiles and points, telling you to dress her. You pull up a pair of snowflake-print panties, big enough to cover a hippo's rear end, slipping them over her enormous legs and large, round derriere, your face blushing as you did so. Her silky smooth skin was almost unbearable to touch, almost perfect. You slip her matabiki over her legs next, the tight blue fabric wrapping around Yukimaru's massive legs and cankles, formfitting to them exactly as the day before. You apply a new bandage bra to her, not too tight as to allow her to breath but enough so that her breasts. become big, full cushions of fat. Yukimaru puts her shirt on herself, it being very simple. You've already donned your underwear, pants and T-shirt by the time she's done, but only because you were hurrying. You didn't want her seeing how flushed you were getting.

"R-ready, Yukimaru?" You ask. She nods.

"Yes, zam. But let's get Revya and Mesa. I hope we didn't keep them up last night...zam." She giggles, thinking about how much fun you two had last night. It might've kept those two up all night...
= = = = = = = = =
Taking the elevator up to the fourth floor, you arrive at room 101, a room engraved with angel wings. You hear someone's soft sighs in the room. Strangely, the door is unlocked. You two slip in, despite Yukimaru's impressive girth and large frame, quieter than mice. What you see almost makes you double over because of the cute factor.

Mesa is sleeping right between Revya's massive breasts! Their faces are touching, with Mesa snuggling into Revya's cleavage and her large cheeks, cooing a little at Revya's soft form. Revya's immense body is serving as a very large, fleshy mattress, her fattened thighs, hips and butt cheeks perfect cushions for her enormous belly and KK-cup breasts. However, something is amiss...oh, right. The number of sleeping Nereids on her fat tummy. Including Juno. There are four or five, all snuggling deep into her soft belly, all enjoying the thousand and a half pounds of Revya. Yukimaru giggles, waking Revya.

"Hey, what's up?" she says, a little sleepy. Her big pillowy arms are wrapped around Mesa's torso, almost engulfing the 4'6" android. She notices the number of *ahem* 'guests' on her tummy and laughs. "I know. Juno's had a crush on me ever since I met her. And so do many of her followers, for some reason."

"When can you guys get ready?" you ask, trying to contain a major nosebleed. She's laughing quietly at your attempt to stem the flow, her entire body shaking and jiggling with laughter.

"It'll be about half an hour. Mesa's always ready because she never needs to get clean, but I need to give these little hitchhikers some time to get up. They love cuddling up to a gigantic fatty like Yukimaru or myself."

12322221122212111111212121211221.content:
(Note: Okay....if a certain author doesn't pay attention to this chapter, I will stop writing for this thread)


The town of Daniel isn't where our group is in now. Appearently, the bus driver took a wrong turn somewhere yesterday and ended up in a completely other town called Hidden Springs....which is 30 miles away from Daniel, which is two miles away from Samna Rapids, which is the home of Expanding Dreams, which is the company that made that box of chocolates that made Yukimaru so huge. In order to get to Daniel, you have to take a bullet train from BlackTail Station on the outskirts of Hidden Springs. The group makes it to the station with 10 minutes to spare.
Yukimaru and Revya are easily the biggest people within the station. Revya had to wait nearly a hour for her "guests" to get off her tummy at the hotel. After a quick breakfast, you and the three others walk to BlackTail Station.
When the train got to the station, Yukimaru and Revya was the first people to enter the bullet train. The train was expandable to allow Yukimaru and Revya to enter it....the train even had specially made seats for someone as big as the two massive females. The train was crowded with nearly 400 people on the train. You had to sit on Yukimaru's belly because there weren't any room left for you on the train...likewise, Mesa sat on Revya's massive stomach because there wasn't enough seats on the train.
The train started up and quickly reached speeds of nearly 400 miles an hour...which would make the trip to Daniel a short one.
"Couldn't we just so to Samna Rapids on this train?" you ask Yukimaru.
"Daniel is the last stop of the train, zam" said Yukimaru. "the bullet train begins in an area called Rezard's Cliffs--which is about 1,000 miles back that way--all the way to Daniel and back. Samna Rapids is just a short car ride from Daniel. Oh...and Samna Rapids is close to Oilano lands...which is forbidden to humans"
"Oilano?" you ask. "who are they?"
"A collection of marine animals that are angry at human-kind for the oil spills that occur often in your world" said Yukimaru. "They journeyed to this world and became animated creatures--as some animals often do when they wander into this world--and claim some land on their own. Samna Canyon empties into The Endless Ocean....and that's where the Oilano are"
"Uhhh,,," you say, not sure what to say.
About 15 minutes later, the train arrives at Stillwind Station, WHICH IS IN THE TOWN OF DANIEL.
Revya, Mesa, Yukimaru and you get off the train along with 200 or so people. There's a big wooden sign that says: "WELCOME TO DANIEL" as you exit the station.
"Alright" you say. "finally, we're in Daniel"
"Yep" said Mesa. "Daniel is a fine city"
"Enough talk, zam" said Yukimaru. "let's get a taxi to Samna Rapids"
12322221122212111111212121211221.title: DANIEL at last!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

123222211222121111112121212112212.content:
(Sorry Drez about the mixup. I'll do better on that)

"Damn!" you say, looking around for an available taxi but seeing none. Apparently, taxi services had been cut for some time due to an entity around Daniel that caused mass destruction. Yukimaru and Revya are looking for other forms of transportation for your group. And as for Mesa? Well...

"Mr. Johnson, I suggest we leave as fast as possible!" she whispers, buying a long robe from a nearby cart. She pulls out the small, protruding barrel on her chest and attaches it to the blade on her left arm, as if trying to hide it. Donning the robe, which is a sandy brown in color, she hides her face, eyes shifting every which way.

"Why are you so nervous?" You say airily. Yukimaru and Revya are walking back to you, looking kind of disappointed. Guess they couldn't find a bus or something else that would take them to Daniel. Your eyes shift after Yukimaru and Revya sit on a bench to a poster. You read it slowly, your eyes widening.

"Wanted: Mesa Chateau, Cascade Range AC. Notorious for destroying the last tram rail to Samna Rapids, as well as terrorizing the roads to said city. Reward: $1,000,000, Dead or Alive. Preferably deactivated." You turn to her and she looks away, her body shaking. "Mesa!"

"Shut up!" she hisses, "I don't want my name to be heard!" In fact, you can tell. Two or three rough-looking bounty hunters glance in your direction, hands at their rifles and pistols. Revya and Yukimaru appear to be on guard as they chat lightly, eyes unmoving from the bounty hunters. "I went berserk! This is one of those crazy things Urd made me do one day. She unlocked my Seraph form and implanted a rogue AI, which promptly took control of me and devastated the rail system and roads to Samna Rapids. I think she saw the box of chocolates Yukimaru had at one point and knew it from somewhere. Maybe she didn't want competition, I don't know! But now, I'm utterly hated by the entire populous of Daniel!"

You catch her miserable tone of despair and feel sympathy for her predicament. But you had a nagging question. "So, it was you that made the bus make a wrong turn and die?"

"Yes, yes, yes! Maybe if I hadn't, it wouldn't have been a problem. But instead, I panicked! I knew exactly what they were going to do if we arrived in DAniel and they saw me...I fired an electromagnetic pulse at the engine, frying the wires and the plugs. It messed up the GPS. I knew it bought me time, but I hated it. I can't help it now. You probably hate me...and so does Revya, probably, due to the fact that she has really good hearing..."

Indeed. Revya had picked her massive body off the reinforced steel bench, waddling over to Mesa. She put her hand on the android's shoulder, who was silently crying, her broad, mechanical shoulders shaking uncontrollably. Now you felt really bad. She must've been expecting that you were going to shout at her, turn her in to the burly looking guys at the end of the street, and laugh at her as she was beaten into a synthetic-bloody mess. Part of that was along the lines you were thinking. You also place your hand on her shoulder, knowing that while what she had done was considered treachery, what you were thinking of doing to her was much worse. She hadn't hurt you or Yukimaru. In fact, with the worst circumstances imaginable, she might've died for you because you set her free.

"Mesa." Revya's voice was soft, motherly. She put a tender hand to Mesa's wet cheek, wiping away her tears. "It's all right. I understand. There's no reason for you to worry that I'd hate you. We've been friends for the longest of times, and to think that I would hate you over something like that is just silly. You'd have to destroy an entire world before I hated you." She hugged Mesa's mechanical body, kissing her on the head. You then speak.

"Mesa, I'm sorry too. I know I sounded...accusing and I'm sorry I did. If you wanted to hurt me and Yukimaru, you would've done it long ago. At least now I know why you hated Urd so much..." you say apologetically. You're kind of awkward with apologies, never one to start something and never one to hurt somebody. However, Mesa takes it in kind and hugs your legs, the only part that she can reach.

"Thanks..." she says, before standing bolt upright. She sees Yukimaru giving her a 'Look out!' glance, and notices that the group of bounty hunters is coming closer, drawing their weapons. Mesa motions for you to stand back, but oddly enough only you. Yukimaru takes a stance behind her and draws a couple kunai, hiding them from view. Revya's gripping that wicked blade you saw on her before.

"Well, well, lookie here!" One of them says, putting a rifle up to Mesa's forehead. She doesn't even blink. "Mesa Chateau, the unstoppable machine-woman. Basically, a demigod of artificial creation. You destroyed our lines about six months ago. Remember that? Well now, we're here to pay you back a hundredfold. You ready?"

The other two snicker. He seems to have practiced that speech at least a thousand times before Mesa arrived. Mesa simply brushes the gun away from her face with her right hand, her left one sliding out. You notice it's got sharper finger tips, is dark grey with red wrists and arms, and has two barrels poking out of the bottom, underneath the hand. Come to think of it, she looks like she grew about six inches, too. "I don't suggest you do that."

"And why not? I heard you earlier! It seems the oh-so-scary Mesa is just a whiny bitch!" Little beams of light erupt from the barrels, producing two very long, very thin, and very deadly-looking blades of energy. "You know what? I think killing you will be the easiest job I've ever-urk!"

Mesa had punched him in the gut. ZASH. And the blades came around. They sliced the rifle in half and took off his trigger finger, the gored through his left arm.

"Ah, ah! AH!" he yells, pulling back. A hole as big around as a gun barrel is gaping in his arm, the inside seared and smelling of burnt flesh. The foul odor drenches your nostrils. "What the hell? Nobody told us about hidden laser blades!"

You look at Mesa. Her hood has fallen off, revealing...a new, rounded head. It's oval in shape, with a pointed chin and a large flair rising from the top. The blue eyes are burning. Once broad shoulders are now narrow, sleeker looking. She has two enormous jetpack-like wings. Her body is now rounder, sleeker, more refined...like a jet fighter. And most of all, she's emitting a very, VERY disturbing aura.

"Now listen here, you little shits. The next time you fuck with me, I promise you, I will rend you from the inside out and stuff your entrails down your throat. I'm the second most hardcore asskicker in the entire world, and if you piss with me, I'll castrate you with rusty nails." They were very frightened, the leader now looking at Mesa with eyes as big as dinner plates and a gaping mouth. Then he snapped back, thinking of something.

"Hey...if you're the second most hardcore asskicker, who's the first?" he asks insolently, standing up. Mesa points behind her to Revya.

"Her."

He laughs. "This fatass? What she going to do, sit on me? Make me into a barbecue sandwich? That's rich!" He stopped immediately. Something was very wrong.

"WHAT THE HELL DID YOU SAY, NUMBNUTS?" Gig roars, his silver-haired, red-eyed visage popping out. "SHE MAY BE A GODDAMNED FATASS, BUT THAT BREAKS IT! NO FUCKING LITTLE PIECE OF RAT SHIT IS GOING TO TELL REVYA SHE'S A FATASS UNLESS IT'S ME!"

The guy must've wet his pants. He runs away screaming like a little girl, two friends in tow. Gig settles down, fuming at Revya's side. She kisses him on the cheek, not lovingly, but in a thankful sort of way. "Thanks, Gig."

"Whatever. Those little peons were pissing me off. They deserve it. I think I made the leader shit his pants."
He laughs, then you laugh, then Mesa...pretty soon the entire group is laughing at the mention of that. Gig eventually stops and vanishes, probably back into Revya's body.

"So, now where to? They probably won't tell anybody. Let's see...there's a buffet, a tourist center...oh! There's a mall here...and the state fair!" You say, running down a tour guide that you bought. The three girls put their heads together and think, eventually deciding on...

You've gained about 100lbs since you began eating, and you now feel like you're about to explode. You slam the fork down and stretch, unencumbered by your fattened body. Mesa is taking it at a little faster pace than you, not nearly enough to outeat Revya and Yukimaru, but enough to make a normal person gain about 300lbs. You look at her body questioningly, wondering why she wasn't gaining anything. Voicing the question, she smiles a little, blushing at Revya's gorging form, then replying to your query.

"Well, in my other forms an excess of energy is created, caused by calorific intake. In this 'Seraph' form, I use up far more energy than I can replenish, and therefore I have to eat a feast's worth of food before my generator has an excess of energy, which is stored in my generator's condenser cap. The more energy I store by impacts or eating or even just shocks the higher tier I go to."

Just then, Yukimaru reached over to Revya's plate and stole a handful of fries out of her hands, swallowing the greasy food without much effort at all. Revya was looking at her with a very pouty/mad expression.

"Hey! You stole my fries!" she said, leaning against Yukimaru with an intent to squash her. She snickered.

"Yeah. So what're you going to do about it, zam?" Revya took a couple of ribs from Yukimaru's plate, stuck them in her mouth, then slowly dragged them out while sucking on the ribs. They were both stripped of all their meat. "Hey!"

"What're you going to do about it, fatty?" she challenged, bumping her with her massive side.

"Simple: I challenge you to an eating contest! Whoever eats the most without fainting wins! Mesa can help you. I'll just call an ice maiden for me. Steven-san's kinda knocked out right about now, zam."

"You're on! Mesa, get on the table. I want you to stuff my face until I say stop. Got it?" she asked Mesa. She eagerly agreed and hopped on the table, taking a handful of Revya's food in each hand. She was about to be the feeder of a lifetime.

"Ton-chan!" Yukimaru calls, and a very beautiful(and chubby) ice maiden appears out of nowhere, with long, lavender hair and skin paler than moonlight. She takes up a place next to Yukimaru, getting ready to stuff her.

= = = = = = = = = = = = =
It's about two hours into it, and people are actually stopping to watch the two girls gorge themselves. Revya is a little behind, but it appears that she's smarter. Yukimaru was worried about not eating enough, and as such had Ton-chan feed her massive amounts of food at one time, stuffing her at a very quick pace but also cutting her endurance short. You hear her belly gurgle and moan, the space in it getting completely filled to capacity. She's biting her lip, holding her sore tummy, chewing through another plate of ribs. Revya motions for Mesa to pick up the pace, who does it happily, beginning to just stuff her face full of the fattening, greasy treats. Yukimaru looks sick, staring at them. Her face is paler than normal, her belly is gurgling almost constantly now, and she reaches for a large slice of ham when...

She falls face first onto the table, moaning in pain as her belly reaches its limit. Revya smiles in triumph. "I win!" she chants, patting Yukimaru on the back.

"Hey, cheer up! Ton-chan could probably give you a good belly massage to ease the pain. Speaking of that, Mesa, could you do that for me? My stomach's starting to hurt something awful..."

"No problem, Revya-chan!" Mesa snuggled deep into her love's fat tummy, giving it a full body massage. She really had no shame. You simply gawk at the amount of food they had eaten. How much was this going to cost?
