"Ah, thank you, my mistress Yukari sent me over her to retrieve you" Ran explained "You see there's a certain errand she needs to run and she believes that you would be most useful to said errand" Strange, someone you didn't even know finds you interesting? Well, it's not completely unbelieveable, after all alot of people in your travels up to this point have thought about you as such. But still you weren't going to just pack up and go with this fox-girl, you had to make sure it was okay with the others; namely Yukimaru.

"Is it okay if I go with her," You ask to your girlfriend "If you don't think I should then I'll stay here"

"Well, she does seem like she needs your help, zam" "But, what is all of this for certainly there's a motive for all of this"

"My mistress needs his assitance to move a couple of things," Ran explained "She told me she needed an able bodied male and soon caught sight of you after which she told me to come retrieve you and...here we are now." That seems like it's understandable, but it still didn't explain why this Yukari needed you in partiular to move something, if anything she could have chosen anyone in this entire area. "And yes, I know you wondering why she would choose you, in fact I wondered that myself and asked her...she simply told me that she found you 'interesting'."

You sit up slightly and think on the matter, it does sound rather reasonable. Although the part where Yukari found you interesting doesn't really sit well with you that much, is that really any reason to turn down helping a someone in need? Thinking nothing of it, you shrug and face Ran "Alright let's go, I'm sure it shouldn't be too much trouble to help"

"Thank you." Ran nods a small smile on her face as she turns to your group and bows to show her apologizes, perhaps more to Yukimaru then to the others. "This won't be long, please excuse us." She then motions you to follow, which you comply to.

"Ten bucks says that he'll get screwed over the minute he leaves" Gig interjected as you left the group behind.

-------------------

The music has started back up now, and the sun was beginning to set lower in the sky now, did Yukari really need you so badly that she chose to send for you at night? Well there is the valid assumption that she only say you just now and suddenly decided that you were the one who was to help her with her tasks. The walk is silent at best, being neither you nor Ran exchange words with one another that is before the kitsune decides to break the ice a little with a simple question. "I didn't catch you name earlier," She spoke as she glances over her shoulder "Do you mind telling me what it is?"

"Oh it's Steven" You answer casually to which Ran nods and goes back to navigating you to where she and Yukari had sat. Before long you come to a table that holds two plates that were cleaned of their contents, it would appear that this is where Ran and Yukari had their meal, however, the one thing missing is Ran's supposed mistress; Yukari who is noweher to be found. You look to Ran who seems to be just as puzzled (if not even more so) than you are at the mysterious disappearance of Yukari. "Ran...?"

"I-I don't know where she could have gone" Ran remarks as if knowing what you were going to ask of her. "This is common for Yukari, but to just disappear like this..." Ran seems especially nervous about her mistress' supposed disappearance.

"Well, we could still find her right?" You inquire "Do you know where she could have gone off to?"

"With Yukari there's no telling...she comes and goes as she pleases, even I, who has served her for hundreds of years on end, can't fully predict where she'll go unless I go with her..." Ran answers in a mutter as she turns to aplogize before you notice a sudden change in her expression; one that reflects pure shock. Needless to say your a bit concearned about this and turn to see a purple rip that floats in the middle of the air the endings of said rip donned with red ribbions. Before you can even think on what to say, or do a gloved hand rockets from with the confines of the dimensional gap, grabs you by the colar and drags you inside with unworldly force. Immedieatly you start to panic and struggle to get free from whom ever grabbed you but you soon realize that the hand that had grappled you earlier is no longer around your shirt collor nor is there anyone around you to pull you in...What the hell's going on?

You soon realize that you seem to be floating in a never ending void composed of nothing but eyes glaring back at you. Everywhere you turn your gaze is only met with the unblinking stares of the eyes that now surround you. Each one watching your every move. It's so...creepy, and unnerving to be here, yet you still have no clue as to why, or even how, you got here. Wait...where's Ran, maybe she knows! You turn around but you see no one beside, behind or in front of you...

"What...the hell's going on" You mumble to yourself, now at a complete loss as to what you're going to do now. Hell any sane person would feel the same way at this point. As you sat by still trying to figure out how you ended up here, an ominous giggle echoes from the far reaches of this creepy void. Was someone here? Could it be Ran? No, for some reason you don't think that's Ran for one thing that doesn't sound like her voice. You pull yourself together getting yourself ready for whatever it is that's approaching you when the visage of a woman suddenly appears floating by your left side.

"My, so you must be the human I saw earlier~" She muses causing you to jump and whirl around to face her. As soon as you lay eyes on her, the first thing you realize is that she's absolutely gorgeous, having long blonde hair that reaches down to her back, several ends of it tied in small red ribbons, the top of her head is covered in a weird hat that is donned with frills along it's edges and a large red bow in it's center. The restof this woman's attire consists of a purple dress that hugs her every curve from the large and copious bosoms that were pressing the chest are to it's very limits, to her lushcious hips and thighs. Strangely she also seems to carry with her a parasol of some sort, now why she would need such a thing in a place like this is more than baffling...but then again you ARE in a void filled with eyes...so perhaps it is that strange. The mysterious woman opens a small fan that she holds and hides her face behind it as she begins eyeing you up and down, pacing around you as if sizing you up for something. "Yes...you'll do nicely, I'll have to thank Ran once she finds us~"

She just mentioned Ran, so does that mean that she's the 'Yukari Yakumo' she told you about earlier? One way to find out. "Are you, Yukari Yakumo?"

"Mm-hm, that's me" Yukari answered closing her fan shut and slipping it in a dimensional rip in the air. You take quick note of that gap in the air and notice it looks familiar to the one you were pulled into, albeit smaller than the one you remember. But as you are about to ask Yukari about this, you spot Ran trotting up from behind Yukari's position, and it seems she's been running for quite some time as well.

"Finally, I...*pant*...managed to catch up to you..."

"So it seems," Yukari cooed as she turns to Ran "Oh and good work on bringing this human to me, he definetly could have the potential" Potential? Fore what? None of this is making any sense and it was starting to get to you none the less.

"Could someone tell me what the hell's going on!" You practically shout in frustration towards the large bosomed Yukari who turns to face your words. "Were you the one who pulled me in, what do you need me for and what's this about me having the potential for something?" The void falls silent as none of these uestions were answered, which only pisses you off even more. As you open you mouth to further expand on your frustration Ran suddenly cuts in.

"I-I'm sorry," The kitsune spoke up even though you directed the barrage of questions to Yukari. "I didn't realize Yukari would be this...assertive with her actions, please forgive-"

"No Ran, allow me to explain my actions." Yukari then remarks abruptly "After all, he deserves a right to know, especially if he's going to lose his humanity of it" Okay that last part pretty much sent you for a loop, what did she mean 'lose your humanity'? All of a sudden none of the above questions you mentioned seemed to matter all you wanted now was to get back to Yukimaru and the others...at least then you wouldn't have to worry about losing your humanity...
123222211222121111112121212112212221.title: The Almighty Yakumo of Gaps

1232222112221211111121212121122122211.content:
Getting worked up won't solve anything, nor will it bring you any closer to getting the truth out of Yukari who would be your best (and only) hope of making sense of what's really going on so far. You sigh in exasperation and decide to address her on a calmer note. "Just...tell me what it is you want with me, or rather what you plan to do with me."

Yukari looks to you and nods "Well, you see, I need you for more than one reason; First, I've had this theory so far that a normal human can become a Shikigami if I can somehow manipulate the boundry between Human and Beast, you seemed to have remarkable potential being you've survived through alot of rather interesting ordeals up to this point." The youkai woman chuckles with a smile. That last part could only be justified by her having been watching you the entire time, which is impossible there's no way she could have had her eye on you that long...or could she...

"Lastly, I need another Shikigami to accompany me on a certain journey we have to embark to a place called the Monad Abyss" Yukari explained, pacing around you as she did so. "While Ran also has her own Shikigami, Chen Yakumo, she does not wish for her to accompany us into the Abyss being it is quite dangerous"

"How dangerous?"

"Oh you know, the 'Go in and never return alive' kind of dangerous." Yukari answered in a playfully nonchalant tone as she shrugged slightly. It's amazing how she can speak so lightly of this, but then again she made it sound like this Monad Abyss place was nothing more but a cliche. "But, believe me, it's for a noble cause, if we don't go there soon Erebus will wreck havoc on this world, and pretty much destroy it."

"Who's Erebus..." You pause a moment as you beign to peice together the clues Yukari dropped off in her explanation earlier. "Wait...don't tell me..."

"Mm-hm, he's you're typical Sealed evil in a tin can~"

Well, that's just great, you can't go two feet without running into some impending cataclysm, but still there could be a way out of all this, Yukari did say that normal humans could become Shikigami so that meant you weren't the only candidate for this, you just happened to be the best possible option. "...Does it really have to be me? I mean can't someone else do this?"

"Well, we could find someone else, but they must be spiritually aware to have the potential to become a Shikigami, and you can probably understand how hard it is to find someone like that." Yukari remarked "Still, if you do not wish to do this, then that's fine, I won't force you into doing something you don't want, of course if the world ends because we couldn't find a new Shikigami to accompany us to Monad Abyss then you can be sure that it'll be all your fault~" That's playing dirty Yukari, but then again she proved a painful point, they did come to you after all...so if anyone else is to do this then it had to be you. Still, Yukari did say you could decline if you wanted, there was an off chance they would fail and the world would inevitably end but you could still decline none the less.
1232222112221211111121212121122122211.title: Pact for a Shikigami

choices: Ask the woman if she's seen Yukari
Leave her be and look elsewhere
12322221122212111111212121211221222111.content:
There was no getting around it. If you declined you ran the risk of endangering the very existance of this world as you knew it and you really didn't like how it seemed like Yukari was putting you on the spot for this decision, what with her saying that last bit before shutting up, but that still didn't change the situation that much. You remain silent for another few minutes before giving Yukari eye contact "What will happen when all this is over?"

Yukari frowns a bit as she puts her finger on her chin in a thoughtful pose. "Hm, can't say, Erebus has never had a hissy fit before thus no one can say what will happen when we actually do beat him-"

"Not that. I meant will you return me to the way I was"

Yukari gives you the same answer, only in a different light. "Again, I'm still not sure, I've never manipulate a human before into becoming a youkai-like being, whether it's permanent or not we'll have to see when this is over" She steps closer to you, apparently a little impatient with your questions. "So, are you going to accept or not?"

Might as well take this in stride. "Fine, I'll accept."

"Spelndid~" Yukari mused as she clapped her fan shut and walked towards you with a cheerful (yet slightly unsettling) smile on her face. "Now, this may sting a little~"

Wait, was this going to hurt? By the time you even try to ponder on if it did, you feel your body being thrown into chaos as every aspect of your being is being twisted and manipulated to the wills of Yukari. You gasp out in pain as you glance at your hands feeling like someone was tearing them apart...yet upon seeing them, they looked completely normal. Along with this pain comes a strange sensation as all of your humanoid sense are amplified to a beastial level; your eyesight is sharpened, your hearing increases, your sense of smell is heightened and you can pratically feel your muscles growing large.

However, it would appear that although everything about you has been enhanced your still losing conciousness, the last thing you hear is the concearned voice of Ran which you can barely make out before passing out completely.

=================

"Ohhh my head..." You moan as your sense kick back into high gear, your vision slowly returning to you as well. You look around and notice you're no longer in that creepy void, although the intial location you're in is still just as weird; the sky is a bloody shade of crimson, and the landscape looks craggy and barren with various ruins scattered about. Was this Monad Abyss? You look down at your hands again and notice that your nails have slightly sharpened, and you can also feel that you now have fangs that replace your human teeth. It looks like Yukari really did turn you into a beast, albeit a humanoid one as your palms lack the fur of one.

You look around but don't see Yukari nor Ran in the area, although you do lay eyes on a green haird woman clad in a long, form fitting dress of the same color, her bust line just as bountiful (if not even moreso) than Yukari's. She also has a set of horns on her head, with a red ribbion tied onto the right one, and a busy green tail. She doesn't seem to have noticed you as she appears to be looking around for something, perhaps she was looking for Yukari as well, it was unlikely, but it's worth asking her.
12322221122212111111212121211221222111.title: Trans-Mutation

choices: Wait for Yukari and the others
123222211222121111112121212112212221111.content:
Its worth a shot, asking around is a key way of getting information, and last you checked you were definitely in need of some. You pull yourself up from the barren ground walk towards the woman who glances over her shoulder the moment you get close enough to her. "Uhm, hey do you know where Yukari went off too?"

"Yukari?" The horned woman says before perking up as if realizing something important "I'm not sure, the only thing I know of is that she came here dropped you off and then went back into the gap she popped out of...matter of fact she was the one who pulled me here in the first place." Hmm, no dice, although you're a bit disappointed you somehow were still expecting to be let down in someway. "Oh, I'm Keine Kamishirasawa by the way, and who may I ask are you?"

"Steven." You answer casually to her question. Keine seemed rather nice, she didn't seem to have this strange aura around her like Yukari did, which is a good thing now that you're in a place that looks pretty unforgiving. "So...are you in the same boat as me?" You question, the vagueness of it causing Keine to tilt her head in confusion. "I was turned into a Shikigami but Yukari, did she do the same thing to you?"

"No." Keine answers as she looks down "I...I've always been like this..." Why did she sound so ashamed of her answer, was there any reason for her to dislike who she was? "Well, I don't always look like this, being I have a human form"

"So you're half?"

"You can say that..." Keine answered flatly "I'm a Were-Hakutaku, so I change into this form when it's a full moon"

You look up at the sky and notice it's not a full moon, hell, there is NO moon to speak of, it's just a crimson void above you, no clouds, no stars no nothing. Needless to say this confuses you being according to Keine, there needs to be a full moon for her to be in this form. "But...there's no full moon out...or a moon for that matter."

"I know," "I'm not sure why, or how, but this area can forcibly change anyone who sets foot here into a monster..." Interesting, it looks like those who have a demon side to them has it forced out, but what about you, you felt fine. It is then you realize you were already a monster; Yukari just turned you into one. So was that transformation not only away to get you to help Yukari but also a subtle way to protect you from the Abyss' effects on humans? There's no telling...especially with Yukari.

You look around once more and still see no sign of Yukari or Ran. Where the hell were they anyways? They were the ones who hassled you here, why would they disappear like this. You sigh and feast your eyes on the road ahead; a long snaking path that leads to and ominous looking building that was perched atop a formidable crag. You could go on with Keine and save you the trouble of waiting for Yukari, but your rational side told you to simply sit tight and wait for them.
123222211222121111112121212112212221111.title: Kamishirasawa

1232222112221211111121212121122122211112.content:
Well, you're already here and you know what you have to do so why not get a head start and take the fight to Erebus, or whatever his name was. You're sure Yukari will be able to catch up to you later so you turn to Keine and begin to talk this over with her. "Hey, why don't we go in ahead of them?" You say grabbing Keine's attention. "I already know what we're here for so we can get a headstart and take the fight to the Big Bad instead of waiting."

"Well, I don't know...if we do go in and happen to run into trouble I'd like it best if Yukari were with us" Keine commented as she takes a look at the building looming over the both of you in the distance. However, as she's looking onward, there comes an inhuman sound from behind you, followed by some rather heavy foot steps that only seem to get closer to you and Keine's location. You turn your head behind you and see something in the distance...something that's definetly not of this world...well maybe it was but you're damn sure it wouldn't belong in your own world.

"W-what is that thing?" Keine asks in both concearn and worry.

"I-I don't know!" Was all you can tell her, although you can tell it was some sort of reptile, being it looked closer to one than anything else. It was fairly large, bigger than a bus you estimate, and didn' have arms. It's legs were bulky and think, which would explain why they made such a loud sound with each step the monster took. One thing you also note is that the creature didn't have eyes either which only made it's appearance all the more creepy to you. The bi-pedal monstrosity halts and straightens up, before it's head turns directly toward you and Keine. Did it spot you? How could it, it didn't even have eyes to see with. The monster then proceeds to let loose the most gut wrenching, ear splitting roar you have ever heard as it charges forward it's mouth open wide letting you get a good glimpse at it's horrendously sharpened teeth.

That would be your cue to run. NOW!
1232222112221211111121212121122122211112.title: Abyssal Construct

choices: Propose to take a quick nap before moving on further
Talk with Keine a little more
1232222112221211111121212121122122211112.content:
Fuck this, there is no way you're staying here and letting, whatever that thing is, kill you. Turning on your heel you instinctively grapple Keine's arm and dash forward, taking the hakutaku with you in an incredible burst of speed. Was it just you, or were you alot fast than you were before? Well Yukari did turn you into a supernatrual being so it's possible. You glance back to Keine who's trying to keep up as best she could with out stumbling and further behind her is that reptilian beast that is hot on your trail, and actually gaining on you at that. Damn so much for being faster...

"Steven-kun! Up ahead!" Keine alerted to you bring your attention to the building you were rushing towards, the door wasn't open, but it didn't look like the monster was going to fit. If it's solid enough it may stop it in it's tracks...if not then you better hope it get's knocked out on impact.However, what you're more concearned about is if the door is even unlocked, well either way you had to get through it, and sense you're already running at a pretty high speed, you see no other choice but to ram your way through.

"Get ready Keine! We're gonna bust through the door!" You yell toward Keine who nods and braces herself as best she could for the coming impact. You really had no idea if the door was actually gonna give if you ran at it full force, but with big ugly riding on your ass you had no real choice, lest you wanted to die a horrible bloody death in this empty red world. You take in a deep breath as the closed doors draw closer and closer by the second. There's no turning back now, it's do or die time! You bring your shoulder down and with everything you've got, you slam into the closed doors of the building a loud CRASH thundering into the air as you collided with it.

To your surprise (and relief) the doors actually gave in to your charge and you find yourself tumbling into the building with Keine in tow, both of your bodies intertwined in a chaotic dance as you free fall into, what appears to be, a sinkhole inside the main room building. With a low and dull THUD you hit your back on the not so soft floor the weight of Keine's body also landing on you full force. Thankfully, she isn't very heavy.

"Geeze...that hurt more than i expected..." You groan to yourself as your gaze moves up to see the monster couldn't fit through the door and was relenlessly lashing out against it to get to you, it's loud and bone chilling cries resonating throughout the vacant room of the building you and Keine were inside.

"Come, we have to go." Keine points out as she pulls herself up from off you and helps you up. "That monster is stayed for now, but I doubt the walls will hold him for long, this building is several centuries old and if anything a tireless assualt like this will surely bring it down." You don't argue with Keine's suggestion and look for away out; You come to spot an exit to this room just to your east, you had no idea where it led to or what was beyond it but you didn't want to stay here. Not for another minute. You motion for Keine to follow and make a run for the exit not even taking the time to look back.

=============

The sound of the beast seems to have died down some, or at least you may have gotten so far off from it that it could no longer be heard. The latter is the best assumption seeing as to how you and Keine had been running down this hallway (it seemed) for a good long while now, and it seemed to take even longer for you to reach a small chamber that connected to the hallway you escaped through. Both of you, now exhausted from non-stop running, sat down for a moment to rest, Keine her self plopping down against the wall her bountiful chest heaving up and down with each breath she drew in. "Did...we...lose it..." She gasped out turning to see that you too we against the wall catching your breathe

"I guess...so...I don't...hear it...anymore..." You look around and see that there are multiple exits to the chamber but no more than 2 at that; one veering north and another veering east. But for right now it's best to take a moment to rest a bit, and rid yourself of any fatiuges you may have. If there was something like that monster on the outside of this place then there was no telling what this area had in store for you and Keine. You sigh and sit down across from Keine and watch her as she attempts to relax her shaken nerves, her eyes closed and her breathing now slowing down to a balanced and calm pace.
1232222112221211111121212121122122211112.title: Monad Run

1232222112221211111121212121122122211112.content:
Staying in silence isn't really something you wanted to do, especially with someone like Keine to talk to. Why not strike up a bit of conversation, learn about where she came from and how she was chosen by Yukari in the first place. "So, Keine..." You began as you clear your throat to catch the woman's attention. "What was it like before you came here?"

"Oh, well..." Keine replied as she pauses to think for a moment. "I was a school teacher in a village before I was sent here by, Yukari, the village I came from was populated by humans and I saw that I had also had to protect them from the dangers of my homeland, Gensokyo." Ah, so Keine works a double life, being a teacher and a village gaurdian. Hm, she must be fairly strong to have become the latter. But one thing seems to strike your interest the most...

"Gensokyo?" You echo that foreign word as a means to elict her to elaborate on it, you know it's her homeland, but what is it about Gensokyo that's so dangerous to humans?

"Gensokyo, is a land full of beings called, Youkai, which are also the ones who devour humans." Keine explained. "Gensokyo was actually a barren land before, until various priests and priestesses gathered to seal the many spiritual beings of Japan into the land so they would not harm humans any longer, the resulting seal covered the entire land in a barrier called the Hakurei Border and it is this border that has managed to seal 'Gensokyo' from the world in which humans of the mordern world live." So, if you understand correctly, Gensokyo is a land that was sealed off by priests and such to get rid of countless Youkai that plauged ancient Japan. When the sealing was completed the land became isolated from the outside world, creating it's own seperate 'world' if you will. It's...rather hard to grasp, but I think you get the gist of what it means." At least now you know that the reason Keine protects the humans is because the Youkai most likely out number them in Gensoyko.

"Ah that's...interesting." You comment, before moving on to another topic one that should be a bit less, meta-worldly. "So, Yukari chose you for this thing too, huh?"

"Indeed, Yukari told me that she needed my ability of History manipulation to help 'seal' Erebus" Keine replied. "What about you, how did she come to choose you, Steven?"

"It's rather odd...she told me that I had the potential to become another Shikigami for her to enter the Monad Abyss, she even went so far as to turn me into some kind of beast to make me her Shikigami." You recall how she just pulled you from the resturant...and Yukimaru. Was it really the right choice to make in accepting her offer? You still asked yourself this question but all the answers remained unknown to you. "But, now that I stop and think about it, I'm not sure if she actually plans to use me as a Shikigami...I feel like that there's something else she wants to do with me, but I can't figure out what exactly." You concluded looking at your hands to see your sharpened nails.

"Yukari does work in mysterious ways, perhaps she wished to transform you so that she could see how a transformed human would fair in the Abyss?" Keine explained which actually made sense, although the fact of you being used as someone's lab rat isn't really a comforting thought. "She'll probably reveal everything when the time comes."

"I guess...I just want to get all of this over with." You answer looking around for a moment and noticing how quiet it has gotten since you arrived here. You begin to wonder how strong this Erebus really is. Hell, if he's strong enough to destroy this world, and the universe along with it, then you'll be facing something that has all the powers of a God. Can you really fight and defeat something like that? More over...can you survive a fight with something like that. "Keine...do you think...we'll actually be able to beat Erebus?"

"I'm...not sure," The teacher shrugged. "Yukari said my powers would be able to help in sealing him, but while I'm in my Hakutaku form, I can only create history, not erase it." Whether it can help beat Erebus or not, that's still a fairly powerful ability within itself, having the power to create history at will...you can't really imagine what it would be like to have such a power. "If we can not defeat Erebus, then I'm sure Yukari could help defeat him, she wouldn't send us on an impossible mission that she knew we couldn't accomplish." Keine concluded, trying to end her sentence on a positive note of things. Things weren't really looking too good if one were to sit down and observe the situation in full, for one you had no way of knowing on how you can actually get to Erebus, and even then the both of you are lacking food and other supplies as well. If there were any wildlife here you could probably kill something and eat it but what if it were poisonous? Then you and Keine would really be screwed...you only hope that Yukari would return with supplies and food...that's really what matters on this excursion. Luckily you aren't that hungry, and Keine appears to be fine as well.

"I suppose you have a point there, she did seem pretty anxious to stop Erebus when I met her and Ran..." You nod weakly and continue to look around the area, noticing how odd it is for this cavern to look like the inside of a hotel, albeit a ruined and twisted one. In anycase, there doesn't seem to be any real reason to stick around, and you feel you and Keine have rested up enough to move on deeper into Monad, there's only one tunnel headed to the south so that should be the next path you take. "Well...shall we move on now?" You ask to Keine.

"Sure, we won't get anywhere closer to Erebus sitting around here." She replied with a nod as she got and the two of you began down the tunnel, or rather, hallway of this strange hotel esque cavern. You had no idea as to why it was shaped like this...it was actually somewhat creepy in away. Keine also seems to take note of the strange surroundings as well.

"It's...odd that a cavern would have such a strange architecture to it..." She remarked looking around the area as she walked. You glance over and open your mouth to answer when you notice her copious bosom bouncing softly within her form fitting green dress. You tear your gaze away from Keine's breasts and focus on responding to her, after all you already had a girlfriend...

"Y-yeah, I noticed that too," You add "I guess you could say these are some type of ruins." Which, now that you think about it, makes a bit of sense. Perhaps Monad Abyss used to be a paradise for some ancient race that was wiped out when Erebus came along? Who knows, maybe the answer to that was located somewhere within this abyss alongside Erebus.

"Hmm, I never thought of it that way before." Keine says taking a look at the walls before she noticed a branching path up ahead and promptly alerts you about it.

"Oh...this is just great..." You complain a bit knowing that you had no idea as to where you should go. One path seemed to keep straigh while another looked as though it headed west.
1232222112221211111121212121122122211112.title: Small Talk in the Nightmare Abyss

choices: Too late! She starts to devour the restaurant staff!
Saved by the bell! Your table awaits, with appetizers!
12322221122212111111212121212.content:
However, even as you looked at for a decent restaurant to feed the two enormous girls behind you, you get the feeling that something isn't right. Turning around, you notice Revya drooling at the sight of the riders that had gotten off the bus, her massive stomach rumbling deeply for sustenance. Mesa appears to be not too worried, and actually seems to be waiting for her to jump at the potential prey. You, on the other hand, are now a little afraid, for what if the redhead decided to turn on you? Yukimaru appears to have the same exact thoughts as you, as she shuffles to your side and whispers into your ear. "We need to find a restaurant and soon, zam. Miss Revya seems to have a bigger appetite than most people. Enough to EAT other people if they're not careful, zam."

"Right..." You scan the streets for a single taqueria, a single sushi shop with haste, as the sound of Revya's belly growling gets louder and louder with every minute that passes. Eventually you manage to spot a small restaurant tucked into the corner of the end of the street and grab Yukimaru's hand, dashing over to it. The warrior and Mesa follow, the much larger girl almost following by scent alone. Reaching the restaurant and opening the door, you find that it is fairly small, meant for only a hundred or so people, and that there are a TON of waitresses, all scantily clad in two piece bathing suits, all from different games, and all fairly fat. You quickly run up to the service counter. "Uh, excuse me miss, I would like a table for four, please...?"

She sighs at you. "Customers' total weight, combined total weight, must be over 600lbs. If not, we can't offer you service..."

Revya suddenly pops in, the door bell chiming. The attendant raises an eyebrow and realizes that she might be the third member of the party, and the fourth one was not far behind. Standing on the scale in front of the counter, she sees that the total weight exceeds the limit, even without the fourth member. You sweat profusely, hoping that Revya doesn't go and start to eat the entire restaurant. "I see. Well, let me see if a server is available...yes, Furi is, and Kuri is your waitress, and if you will wait about a minute they'll be up here..."

You're chewing on your lip, tasting the fresh droplets of blood as you count down the seconds. Revya's looking hungrier and hungrier, and the girl behind the counter looked mighty tasty to her...
12322221122212111111212121212.title: Quick before she goes on a voring rampage!

choices: "Maybe it's time to go on a diet, zam"
123222211222121111112122.content:
This is what the label you see says:


"Warning: Ingesting too many may result in change being permanent. If you reach the size of a mountain, the effects of the chocolates will stop and you won't grow any more. If you're happy with your new size, you're free to join the Fat Mountains--a collection of people that are mountain-sized due to ingesting this product. If you want to return to normal size, please come by our factory in Acme Acres and we'll shrink you down to normal. Warning: Ingesting too many may reduce your stomach acid production"


Reduce stomach acid production? Is that the reason why you were able to go to Yukimaru's stomach and not get digested. It must be. You don't really know how big Yukimaru wishes to become...it may be that she wishes to be a mountain of fat. On the opposite side of the box, it shows a picture that runs alongside the box's edge. The picture shows five hugely fat people that are called the Fat Mountains.


Yukimaru wakes up when a stray missile from the robot hits her in the eye. The damage is only slight, but Yukimaru wakes up angry! She then sucks in the fighters into her mouth (including Ash) and gulping them down. You then tell her about what you read.

"You really want to be that big?" you ask.

Yukimaru thinks it over for a full three minutes.
123222211222121111112122.title: Fine Print

choices: Hild comes to explain it to you and Cassandra
You try to wake up from the nightmare
123222211222121112.content:
Sometime in the long night, you start to have a dream. This dream starts--as dreams often do--right in the middle of a scene. You see Cassandra's house on that high hill that you saw earlier with dark clouds over it in the sky. Yukimaru is still with you--in fact, you're standing on her vast stomach overlooking the house of Cassandra and the surrounding countryside. You then realize that Yukimaru is growing to epic size! Soon, the house and all other things on the ground is covered by Yukimaru's fat as she gets ever bigger and fatter. In a few minutes, Yukimaru even outgrows the entire Earth! That's when a hand grabs you from under you and pulls you into Yukimaru's flab! You yell for help, but your mouth is covered by a second hand and before you knew it, you were sinking in Yukimaru's flabby stomach! You find yourself in a large chamber of some kind; not exactly a stomach and not exactly a normal room either. You aren't alone in the room. "Hello there, I'm Cassandra"
Cassandra was worthy of worship. She was without a doubt the most beautiful woman you ever saw. She had blue hair and silvery eyes that seem to pierce right through you! Her demonic features (hoofs, tail, wings) didn't make her unattractive; in fact, it made her the sexiest woman you ever saw! You found yourself bowing to her without another thought.
"You must be the mortal that wandered into my magical woods" said Cassandra, her voice dripping honey. It was all you could do not to get on your hands and knees and prostrate in front of her. She chuckles at your struggles.
"I am Cassandra Von Fel Lyaniak" said Cassandra. "I own the house you saw before entering this world. I see you're making friends also. Sorry for not coming to you sooner, but I was rather busy with other affairs"
"What do you want?" you ask.
Cassandra gets closer to you and kisses you on the cheek. It was nothing but a quick peck, but you feel a stirring in your pants.
"I want your body in me" she whispered directly into your ear. "I want to feel you struggle within my stomach and beg to be let out. I want you to utterly worship me. I want you to be my sex slave and have sex with me every night until your dying day. But I can't do that" here, she leans away from your ear and starts pacing up and down the room. "you see, normally I would offer you a way out of this world and return to your own world...for a price. But now, it seems, that I need your help instead"
"With what?" you ask.
"We'll get to that later" said Cassandra, waving her arms dismissively. "Ordinary, I would have one of my servants to do this task. But the Big Boss Lady wants you to help me....I have no idea why either. She likes to keeps secrets from me.."
"Big Boss Lady?" you ask faintly.
"The Boss of hell" said Cassandra matter-of-factly.
"You mean Lucifer?!"
"Lucifer? HAHAHAHAA, that's a good one!" laughs Cassandra. "no, no, no dear boy! The devil is a beautiful woman named Hild. You think you have a problem resisting worshipping me, just wait until you meet Hild....and you WILL meet Hild sooner or later"
"What does she want with me?" you ask.
"To help me on my little task" said Cassandra. "if you'll help me, Hild will send you back to your own world free from my...price"
"What's the task?" you ask.
"She hasn't told me yet"
"WHAT?!"
123222211222121112.title: Cassandra's Task and You

choices: Go back the way you came
Might as well see the sights of Fat County
12322222.content:
You speed past Argabah because it looks like that Ladies' Night is happening there too. You just stop for a minute and see that men are being grabbed off the street and dragged to various houses, so you decide to move on and continue down the highway. Every few miles down the highway, you see rest stops or another small town. The desert keeps going on and on and so does the highway. Other cars and trucks are traveling up and down the highway along with you; you see a truck for "Binford Tools" and one for "Weight Gain 4000", and another one for "Acme".
Around 40 minutes later, you noticed that you are the only person on the highway. You look around to see nobody else is on the highway..which strikes you as weird. You shrug and continue down the highway until you see a sign that says "You are now entering Fat County. Please stop at the Welcome Center 5 miles from here"
Fat County? Hmmm...strange name for a county.
You decide to visit the Welcome Center because you're tired of just driving down the highway and want a pit stop. So you turn off the highway and into the Welcome Center. The Welcome Center is a large building with a very huge parking lot around it. About 50 or so cars are at the Welcome Center and you get off your cycle and enter the building. The lobby of the Welcome Center is filled with fat people around 200 pounds. You walk up to the desk with a very fat woman behind it.
"Welcome to Fat County" said the woman behind the desk. "you're new here, so read this" She hands you a booklet. "enjoy your stay"
You look over the booklet and make a startling discovery. It seems that this county is called Fat County for a reason. There's some magic in this entire county that makes people who live in it fat! "For every month you're in Fat County, you'll gain 200 pounds" you read aloud as you take a seat on a bench.
200 pounds in a month?! You'll weigh around 2,400 pounds at the end of the year! Can this really be possible?! You read more of the booklet. Fat County is 100 square miles in each direction and contains 30 small cities and one major city called "Fatopia". The booklet also shows you some interesting facts about the county and tourists stops. One of the tourist stops is a mountain range that's actually 10 mountain-sized women all in a row!
"Geez!" you say.
12322222.title: Fat County

123222221.content:
200 pounds a month is just too much for you- you'd get at least six pounds fatter every day, and frankly, you don't really have the desire to become the next mountain of lard lazing around in the distance. You're not going to wait around here for too long. You decide to hit the trails back to Agrabah, but to stay the night here until Ladies' Night ends.

"Hey, you!" you hear a female voice call out to you. You spin around and you find a tan skinned girl with scruffy looking brown hair wearing rags. She's chewing on a chicken leg and eyeing you. You suddenly recognize her; isn't she Sadira from Aladdin? That girl who knew sand magic. "Did you just come from Agrabah? Are you heading back that way?"

"...Yeah and yeah," you answer cautiously.

"Would you mind giving me a lift?" she asked, "I hear that Princess Jasmine's throwing a surprise party for Aladdin tomorrow- supposedly, it's his birthday or something. People from all over are coming, even that weird Sora kid that ventured out here once. They're not going to be cheap, and I'd hate to miss out," she smiled.

You shrug and say...
123222221.title: Back to Agrabah

choices: A very chubby Jasmne greets you two
1232222212.content:
"Sweet!" you say. "let's go"

You and Sadira walk out of the Welcome Center of Fat County. It's nearly one in the morning and the parking lot is nearly empty. You and Sadira get to your cycle and speed back to Argabah. You say good-bye to Fat County. 200 pounds a month is too much for you and you don't want to be a mountain of lard...and neither does Sadira. Sadira was in Fat County to get some extra-fattening food from there, and she did buy a lot...due to her sand magic, no doubt.
You make it back to Argabah just before 2 in the morning. By this time, the streets of Argabah are all empty. You ride into town and heading for the Palace of Argabah. When you get to the palace's gates, you're stopped by four mean-looking guards. One of the guards turns out to be a very chubby Sora from Kingdom Hearts. It seems that Sora spent a month or two in Fat County. However, it looks like Sora is making a real effort to slim down once again, and he's doing a fair job of it. Sora probably weighs in the neighborhood of 300 pounds.
"We're here for Aladdin's party" said Sadira. "looks like you've slimmed down a lot, Sora"
"Yeah" said Sora. "it was fun being as big as I was, but I decided to slim down again and go adventuring again"
"How big were you?" you ask.
"Well, I was in Fat County for 4 years" said Sora. "I'll let you do the math. Is he with you, Sadira?"
"Yep" said Sadira. "I'm surprised that Kairi didn't get you for Ladies' Night"
"The night is young" said Sora.
"Why are you guarding the palace, anyway?" asked Sadira.
"To work off all this fat" said Sora, patting his fat stomach. "I've not eaten all day....saving for tomorrow" he grinned.
"I sometimes wonder if you want to be skinny again" teased Sadira.
You and Sadira are let in by Sora and the other three guards.
"So...am I yours tonight since it's Ladies' Night?" you ask nervously as you and Sadira enter the palace.
"I got someone earlier" said Sadira. "but thanks for asking"
1232222212.title: In the palace

choices: The next day at the party...
12322222122.content:
"Hey, Sora," Sadira calls out, beckoning the overweight boy to her side.

"Yeah, Sadira?" he asks.

"Here, I got these for you," she says, taking a few tiny pink petals out of her cloak, "I thought you might want to have these for the big day."

Sora's blue eyes widened, "Wow, thanks a lot, Sadira," he smiled as she dropped them into his open hands, "Gee, I don't know why Jasmine thinks you're such a witch," he exclaimed before popping them into his mouth. Afterward, he let out a small hiccup that shook his gut before his entire body started rumbling.

"What the heck's happening?" you ask as Sora's body starts to tingle. You can't believe your eyes as you watch Sora begin trim down magically! It's like watching the progression from a diet commercial. Almost as if the air were let out of him, his round belly deflates down to flat abs. Suddenly, he's got a wide grin on his face as he's back to his usual stick-thin size, clutching his wide pants that once fit him perfectly as if they were circus tents.

"Thanks a lot, Sadira, wait until Kairi sees me tonight. Now I can really let loo-"

"Idiot!" she gasped, flicking his nose, "Why did you go and take them now? I meant you took them AFTER the feast, after you put on all that weight from the tons of grub you'll pig out on tomorrow. Those weren't cheap, you know," she scowled.

"Oh, right!" he scratched his head in embarassment, "Well, it's the thought that counts, right?" he chuckled with his goofy toothy smile.

"I don't know what I'm going to do with you," she sighed, shaking her head, "Well, I'll leave you two," she said, "I've got to meet with someone. See you tomorrow at the party."
12322222122.title: Magic Petals

123222221221.content:
"So...How much food will there be at this party?" you ask.
"Tons" said Sora, smiling. "it's supposed to be the biggest feast in history. You should've seen the carts of food that came earlier! I swear there must've been like 200 carts filled with food...and that's just for the appeitizers!"


"Who's gonna be at this party?" you ask.

"All kinds of people" said Sora. "Officer Jenny, Ren and Stimpty, the Simpsons, the Griffins, The Aqua Teen Hunger Force, Inu-Yasha, Kagome, Sango, Kairi, Hades....the list goes on and on! Lady Cassandra is even coming!"
"Wow" you say. "well, I'm off to bed"
"See ya tomorrow" said Sora as you walk off towards the palace of Argabah.
You enter the palace and quickly find an empty bedroom with a balcony that overlooks Argabah. Off in the distance, you hear a loud belch coming from the direction of Fat County. Is someone from Fat County coming to the party? You shrug your shoulders and fall into the very soft bed in the room and drift off to sleep.


"Hey, get off my tail!" someone shouts in your ear. You wake with a start to find that you're looking at a very weird-looking woman with fox ears instead of human ears! You scramble out of the bed, and you notice that it's morning. You look back at the fox-woman.
"Yeah, and what are you gawking at?" asks the fox-woman. "haven't you seen a kitsune before?"
"A...Kitsune?" you ask.
"Yes" the fox-woman sighs. "you know, a fox that can take on human shape and has nine tails?" You look and see that the woman has eight tails.
"Well..you don't have nine tails" you say. "you have eight"
"Eight and 1/5" growled the kitsune.
"Who are you?" you ask.
"I'm Sakura" said the woman.
"So...you got me for Ladies' Night?" you ask.
"No, no" said Sakura. "I got myself a man last night, see?" Sakura then pats her bloated stomach!
"Erm..." you say. "so, when's the party gonna start?"
"Not until noon" said Sakura. "this Aladdin is away on a mission or something. He'll be back around noon, and that's when the party begins!"
123222221221.title: Rude awakening

1232222212211.content:
You begin to grow tired and yawn, your eyes falling to the ground. You begin to feel tremors. A small pebble on the ground begins to bounce up and down... suddenly, it's flying up in the air as a you hear a large crash and brace yourself for the shockwave. Suddenly, you lose your balance and are catapulted to the opposite wall. You crash into it hard.

When you're able to open your eyes, you find Sakura staring down at you, "Are you okay?" she asks urgently, grabbing your shoulders trying to help you up; you take on the slightest grin.

"Yeah, I'm going to be fine," you nod, "But what the hell was that? I didn't know Agrabah was prone to earthquakes... well, then again, scratch that, Agrabah's prone to anything under the sun," you correct yourself.

"Well, while you were staring at the ground, I was looking out the window- some kind of shooting star fell from the sky and landed right in the courtyard," Sakura explained, straightening out one of her tails that got squashed in the shake.

You blink, "Shooting star?"

Before you know it, Sakura's bolting out the door, "Find out for yourself, c'mon!" she says, giving your collar a tight pull, yanking you down the hall. Your surprised how much strength she has.

After descending a maze of staircases and passing through an array of hallways, you reach the courtyard. Birds are flying away in panic to the skies. What looks to be a small, beat up spacecraft is steaming in a huge, dark fissure in the middle of an otherwise well kept courtyard full of flowers.

"What is this?" Sakura asks curiously. You guess she must have never been in a science fiction world before.

"A spaceship," you answer, "It looks like a smaller one, like a speeder or a scouting vess-"

"A what?" Sakura asks, tilting her head.

"A spaceship," you repeat, "Uhm... it's what you use to, uh, well, you know, travel in space?"

"Space?"

Before you can answer her, the craft's door slowly slides open, "Wow. What a rough ride... Hey, do you guys know where I can get some food?" a voice croaked. Out walked a figure, heading spinning. When he emerged, you noticed it was a thin, almost starving looking version of...
1232222212211.title: Crashing Landing?

choices: A shadow falls over all of Argabah
12322222122112.content:
Jim Hawking stumbled away from the crashed ship and walked over to you and Sakura. Other people are coming from all around; Sora, Kairi, Jasmine and Iago to name a few. Jim looked like he hasn't eaten for a week and he makes it out of the small crater he made with his ship.
"What happened to you?" asked Sakura to Jim.
"Was...on...my...way...to.....Jam..Jampmoppe...but....Cassandra spotted me..." said Jim, panting. "please, do you have any food or water?"
"Who's Jampmoppe?" you ask.
"He's.." started Sakura.
"Please!" yelled Jim. "I need food!"
Jim was led into the palace and into the kitchen, where he gobbled down a whole case of food in under 10 minutes.
"Ah...that's better" said Jim, now looking more like himself.
"Why were you going to see Jampmoppe?" asks Iago. "that's against the rules"
"I'm looking for Gene" said Jim. "Jampmoppe probably knows where Gene is because Gene was helpinh Jampmoppe earlier"
"Who's Jampmoppe?" you ask.
"...The oringal ruler of this world" said Jim. "Cassandra defeated him and took over. It's rumored that Jampmoppe is still alive and being held on another planet...or in the belly of an impossibly large space whale...the details are really unreliable"
"Space whale?" you ask.
"Look, it's not of your concern" said Sakura.
"Never mind Jampmoppe now" said Jasmine. "we have a party today! It's Aladdin's birthday today and we're throwing him the biggest party ever! I invited nearly 300 people to this party. I even invited Cassandra herself, but I don't know if she's coming or not"
"When's the party?" asked Jim. "I'm in the mood to eat"
"In two hours" said Jasmine. "don't worry...we have enough food to feed all ten Fat Mountains in Fat County!"
"Why? Are they coming?" asked Sora.
"At least one of 'em" said Jasmine.
12322222122112.title: Feeding Jim

choices: Genie shows up and screws up Aladdin's birthday wish
123222221221121.content:
Two hours later, everything clicked into place... it was showtime.

It was around noon when Aladdin coasted in through the palace balcony atop his magic carpet. Though the journey had been long, he had woken up late that morning, so he wasn't exhausted in the least. Carpet suddenly veered around in a ninety degree turn!

"Carpet, what's going on?" Aladdin exclaimed, hopping off his mat of a companion. Taking a glance to the side, Aladdin noticed that the entire great room had been covered up with a vast chain of crimson curtains, "That's odd... did Jasmine hire painters?" Aladdin scratched his head.

The throne room was completely devoid of people- even the palace guards. Aladdin stiffened as he called out, "Hello? Is anybody home?"

Before Aladdin could start to suspect an ill spell or villain behind the strange conditions, the curtains began to soar to the ceiling, revealing the great room...

"SURPRISE!" thundered the entire room before breaking into a lively applause. It was full of both people and food from all over the land and from as many worlds imaginable.

Aladdin could see handfuls of famous faces in every glance. Both the Simpsons and the Griffins were in the house, his eye caught Kagome wrapped around Inuyasha and Sango throwing a fist against Miroku in the distance. Not to mention Souta and TK running around. Sora had reunited with Kairi in the hubbub. The Weekenders were there hanging out with Trunks. Even an enormous 700 pound Officer Jenny had managed to make it to the celebration, squeezed into her police uniform. He noticed Sadira, the girl who claimed to be a sand witch that had a crush on him, in the crowd- she was smiling, which made him blush. Lady Cassandra was nowhere to be seen.

And then, at the front of them all was Jasmine,
shooting her boyfriend a wink, "All for you, birthday boy," she smiled.

"Gee... Thanks," Aladdin smiled and laughed.

It was going to be a birthday to remember.
123222221221121.title: Surprise?

choices: Mirage and Sadira have a magic duel
You and Jenny talk some more
1232222212211211.content:
The party was under way then. You get a slice of cake fairly early before all the other guests got to it. There were a total of 50 cakes in all and all kinds of other food was at the party. Lady Cassandra was nowhere to be seen yet....and you didn't know wheather to feel sad or happy about that. You go to a corner to eat your slice of cake, bumping into the 700-pound Officer Jenny in the corner. You turned to look at the fat officer. Her uniform was riding up on her, revealing her deep belly button to you. Officer Jenny was eating an apple pie when you bumped into her gut.
"Oops..sorry" you say.
"Quite alright" said Jenny. "you're new here, ain't ya?" You nod.
"Been a while since I saw a human" said Jenny.
"There's humans in this world?" you ask.
"A fair few" said Jenny. "some of 'em might even show up here"
"So...Jenny" you say, eating your slice of cake. "been eating whole truckloads of doughnuts?"
"Nope...just spent the last two years in Fat County" said Jenny. "didn't you notice me earlier? I casted a shadow all over Argabah"
"But...you're skinny now" you say.
"Sadira gave me one of her magic petals that reduces weight" said Jenny. "I took two of 'em. Didn't want to be skin and bone again"
"Err..."
"Hey!" yelled a voice from across the room. You and Jenny look over and see that Mirage, one of Aladdin's enemies, is fighting over a slice of cake with Sadira. "that's my slice!"
"You already had four slices, you cow!" yelled Sadira.
"This could get interesting..." said Jenny.
1232222212211211.title: Eating with Jenny

choices: Aladdin is put under a heavy curse...
Sadira gets in a magic duel with Jasmine for Aladdin, fueled by Mirage's magic
12322222122112111.content:
"Curse you!" Mirage spat, releasing the plate Sadira was tugging at and letting her fall to the ground, flat on her bum.

"Common street rat," she hissed darkly, before gliding to the corner of the room like a shadow. She was rapidly muttering something that sounded ominous to herself, perhaps in a long forgotten language.

As she slides past you, you hear her speak in English, "... she'll get her's, that stupid brat. Doesn't she have any idea who she's dealing with?" Turning around, you saw her rubbing her paws together, her saphire eyes gleaming diabolically.

Clearly, she had something up her sleeves... or lack thereof.

"This doesn't look good..." the officer said, rubbing her pudgy fingers against her round face, "But it could get interesting."

You nod, taking a bite out of your cake, eagerly anticipating what's about to happen...
12322222122112111.title: Mirages backs off... or?

choices: Sadira changes Jasmine into a.....(your choice)
Jasmine starts to shoot off magic spells on everyone at the party
123222221221121112.content:
Mirage disappears from view. Five minutes passed by in silence. The people at the party are all eating, playing games, or having a good time with each other. Aladdin is sitting with Jasmine, stuffing his face with various kinds of food. Suddenly, Sadira's voice is raised. "Aladdin is MINE, Jasmine! You can't have 'im!"

Sadira waves her hands, and shoots a blue streak right at Jasmine. Jasmine ducks before the magic bolt can hit her. The bolt of magic goes past Jasmine, and reflects off a mirror and heads directly for Genie, who reflects it again by a mirror shield and the bolt of magic is now heading for you! You dodge out of the way, and Jenny gets hit by the bolt of magic. Suddenly, Jenny gets at least 200 pounds heavier! Her belly is rubbing up against you.

"DRAT!" yells Sadira.

"You little brat!" yells Jasmine. "how DARE you attack me! Take THAT!" With that, Jasmine shoots a green bolt of magic right at Sadira! Since when Jasmine can do magic?! Maybe because of Mirage.

The green bolt of magic hits Sadira and she turned into a hippo!

"Oh goody!" said the now fatter Jenny. "a magic duel! This oughta be interesting"
123222221221121112.title: Magic Duel!

1232222212211211121.content:
"A magic duel?" you repeat.

"Yeah," Jenny nods, "Both try to win by either turning themselves or one another into something else... though honestly, I didn't know either of them had such a mastery over the magical arts."

"Neither did I," you state as your attention darts over to the two circling around each other aggressively, preparing to fight. The entire room was quiet in awe. Sadira stomps a little as a hippo, her green robes starting to strain around her curves. She snorts furiously as she rolls up her sleeves, "Let's see how you like THAT," she cries, her hands erupting into a red burst of magical energy that shot right at Jasmine, "Street rat!"

Jasmine recoiled from the blast before straightening herself up, "Excuse me, but in case you haven't noticed, Sadira, I am p-"

"Just another commoner?" Sadira grinned as Jasmine's vibrant blue garbs turned a dusty brown and her silky sable hair became less brilliant, now tied back into a ponytail.

"How-" Jasmine started, but before another word could leave her mouth, magic sparkles appeared around her and she jumped a little as a long, pink ratlike tail burst from her back. Her ears became furry and pointy as a finishing touch.

"What did I say... street rat?" Sadira grinned, making Jenny chuckle a little.

"What? How dare you!" Jasmine cried, squirming to carry her pink tail in hand as if it were, ironically, a dead rat. You might be seeing things, but you could have sworn her face was a tad rounder, "I'll show you..." Jasmine swore.

Just then...
1232222212211211121.title: Street Rat

choices: You're able to swallow up the much bigger Jenny!
12322222122112111211.content:
Suddenly, a bolt of magic hit Sadira. At first, you can't tell where the magic attack came from. Then you look around and see Mirage grinning in the opposite corner from you and Jenny.


Sadira has turned into a mini-dragon, about 8 feet in height and has a 4 feet long tail. The dragon Sadira smiled at the rat Jasmime and breathed a column of fire at the humanoid rat. Jasmine ducked and the column of fire went out of the palace via a wide window.

"Take that!" yells Jasmine, firing a green spell at Sadira, who dodged it by inches. The green spell of Jasmine's is coming straight at you. Before you can move out of the way, the spell hits you. You grow brown fur all over your body and two ears pops right out of your head! Your nose turns into a wolfish snout, and you gain at least three feet! You just turned into the Big Bad Wolf! And...you're hungry for live meat. You look over at the 900-pound Jenny and grin widely and lick your lips.
12322222122112111211.title: Who's Afraid of you?

choices: Jenny is struck by another spell, making her too big to swallow
You revert to human form while sucking on a very angry Jenny
123222221221121112111.content:
The following chapter was contributed by Gronker (67)

1232222212211211121121221.content:
All eyes in the palace turn to Ash who froze in shock as the spell hit his body. His cheeks were stuffed full of unchewed food. The silence and sudden attention prompted him to swallow, and the gulp was heard across the vast chamber, "Wha? I feel fine everyone, no need to- haha!" Ash abruptly started rumble, laughing, "Oh, sorry, it's just that- hehehe, I feel ticklish, that's all."

Officer Jenny sighed, looking down at you, "And you know that can't mean anything good..." she stated in a flat voice. Looking across the room, you can even see Pikachu adopting a sheepish expression due to Ash's blissful ignorance as he continued to eat as if nothing was going to happen.

"What's going to happen to Ash?" you ask.

"I'm not entirely sure but by the looks of it, Ash got in the middle of a hardcore weight gain spell," Officer Jenny observed, "He might even get bigger than me by the time this curse is through."

"Wow..." you say. Already you can see it's starting to work; Ash's weight is climbing rapidly. His tummy is getting rounder and more and more jiggly by the second. Every time you look, he's walking, no waddling, closer and closer to you, and his shirt is riding up higher and higher; first, showing off his gut, then exposing his navel, and when he's right next to you, it barely reaches his boy breasts. His flab's practically pushing against your side. He sandwiches you between Officer Jenny... you know, for once, you really regret being skinny.

"Mmmmm..." Ash tears into a sandwich of his own, completely oblivious. He's so happy, his eyes were closed like his friend, Brock's. He clearly has no idea his weight is in the neighborhood of 300 pounds and on the rise!

You hear a bang and notice the duel is still on... But are you going to bother telling Ash of his dilemma?

"You have to stop EATING!" you bark. Suddenly Ash's stomach rumbles deeply and he lets loose a loud belch. Ash's eyes fall down to look at you, "You're going to crack the palace wide open if you keep eating at this rate!"

"Hmm?" Suddenly, Ash notices how large he's grown, "Whaaa? Hey, I'm huuuge!"

Jenny finally squeezed out from behind Ash and groaned, taking a gasp of fresh air, panting to recover her breath. "No kidding!" She extended her finger and gave him a firm poke, "I think we're going to have to place you under a diet, sir!"

"A diet?" Ash scowled, "That's no fair! It's my body, my choice!" he whined.

"C'mon, scootch!" Jenny sighed, as she shoved the obese boy off, "Unless you want to be put under arrest, you'd better start doing laps right now!" she snapped in a voice that almost convinced you to do the laps yourself.

Ash nodded and started to waddle off, his huge gut jiggling up and down... it wasn't such a great idea as the duel was still on in the midst of his run. You saw Jasmine and Sadira in the center of the room, still circling one another, but now they looked like South Park versions of themselves.

"Screw you!" Sadira cursed. She appeared to be cut out of construction paper and her animated mouth moved rapidly. She thrust out her black paper wand at Jasmine, it glowed (with green paper) and the spell hit herself!

12322222122112111211212221.title: Super-Extra Weight Gain Spell = BIG Jasmine

choices: she reverts back to her human self.
she wants to have fun in her monster form.
123222221221121112112122211.content:
Trapped under tons of bloated Jasmine, Sadira managed to find herself out from under the gigantic blob that was now Jasmine. Squirming out and glaring at Jasmine's immense frame, Sadira was now determined to win this magical duel and she knew how. "Be glad you're so big Jasmine, because your time being it has ran out." she spoke with a hint of malice in her voice. Using her own magic on herself, Sadira felt herself changing and growing into something more monstrous. She grew claws on her fingers, spikes on her back and her legs began to merge together, forming a snake-like body. Wanting her counter-attack to be a surprise, Sadira dug into the sand and vanished.

Meanwhile on the outer part of the city, you, Officer Jenny and everyone wandered down to check on Jasmine who was so large, her head alone couldn't see beyond her mountainous breasts and belly which were planted on top of destroyed buildings. She tried to look for her friends, but she couldn't. "Hey, guys, where are you?" she called in a garbled voice.

Her calls were unanswered, but not unheard. Genie used his magic to create a floating rock-like piece that allowed them to view Jasmine. It was made big to have enough Officer Jenny on top of and still had room for you and the others. "Sorry everyone, if I ruined the party." she said embarrassingly. You and the others forgave her instead of Ash who was a Pikachu and Aladdin who's party was destroyed. "Hello! Party-goers!" said a distant voice who sounded very familiar. Looking down, you saw Ren and Stimpy down on the ground. "Gee, Ren, are you sure the party was here?" asked Stimpy. "Shut up, I know where I'm going." snapped Ren. "Hey, Ren! Stimpy!" you called. "Did you hear that? Someone's calling us." said Ren. "Hey, Genie, could you?" you asked. Using his magic, Genie transported Ren and Stimpy up your location. "Cool, Ren, we're flying." said Stimpy. "Hey, you're right. This is kind of cool." said Ren.

Once they on the same rock as you and everyone, Stimpy asked, "Are we late for the party?" "The party's been destroyed." Aladdin said as he pointed to Jasmine. Looking at her, Stimpy spoke, "Whoa. She's amazing." Jasmine giggled and said, "Thank you." "She's also the reason my party's up in smoke." Aladdin said, "I was enjoying the food buffet before she and Sadira had their duel." Ren smacked him in the face and said, "Ah, quit your whining. At least you got to have your party. We just got here and no cake."

"Hey guys, let's not fight anymore." you said, "We're all here and Genie can just wish the palace back to normal, right?" "I can, but it might take a while." Genie said. "Besides, at least, the duel is over now, right?" asked Officer Jenny. Unfortunately, she was wrong. VERY, VERY wrong.

An even bigger, more threatening earthquake began to rumble. You and everyone couldn't feel as you were in the air, but Jasmine could. It was so powerful, that she was jiggling like jell-o. If Aladdin wasn't mad at her right now, he'd be enjoying himself right now. Then from right behind Jasmine, a giant cat-like head broke from the sand and as it rose from under the sand, its body was becoming bigger and bigger. When it completely rose from the ground, it bellowed in a deep feminine voice, "TIME TO FINISH THIS!!!" Jasmine tried to see what was happening, but she couldn't. If she would, she would feel fear like none she'd felt before. Behind her was a huge creature that dwarfed her in both weight and height. It was 400 feet tall and 1,000 feet around. Its snake-like body was 300 feet thick with spikes, while its human-like stomach was 100 feet wide and 90 feet in front of it. But was its upper body that made everyone realize who it was. The creature's upper body had breasts the size of blimps and cat-like head was 100 feet big. Add the destroyed ragged clothes that it wore which has tentacles made of cloth-like bandages, everyone yelled, "SADIRA?!?"

"That's right, everyone. I'm back to finish the duel." she spoke. Placing her head down on top of Jasmine's, her jaws grabbed hold of her immobile prey and she began to feast. Genie moved everyone to safety, but as he tried to stop Sadira from eating Jasmine, he found his magic had no effect. He, too, fled with his life. Everyone watched in both terror and awe as the once finished duel continued. "Well, that's a way to finish a duel." Officer Jenny told you. You agreed, although you didn't want to be in Jasmine's flab right now. "Now this is a party." cheered Ren. "You said it, pal." Stimpy agreed. "Maybe she can change me back into my human self." Ash thought. Sadira was engulfing every piece of Jasmine she could stomach. Her flab, her magic, it was delicious. As her jaws stretched like a python's to encircle Jasmine's immense waist, she wanted to chew a little bit just to get some revenge on her for crushing her. Her flabby arms tried to struggle, but they were too bloated to move. As her legs entered the mouth, Sadira delivered the final part. Getting her legs into the right spot, she began to chew softly so they could go down easier. As Jasmine's feet entered her throat, she closed her mouth and watched her stomach bloat out. With her as the victor, Sadira patted her stomach with honor and soon after...
123222221221121112112122211.title: Sadira Grows Even Bigger.

Sadira remained in her monster form for another 30 seconds before she started to shrink and change back into her human self. Her stomach still remained its incredible size until Sadira reached her normal size....in which case, her belly returned to a bloated state (but still much smaller than it should've been). You and the others slowly returned to the party site, which was completely destroyed. All that was left in the rubble was the smiling Sadira with a 10 feet wide belly. Muffled screams and curses were coming from Sadira's belly. You feel sorry for Jasmine, but the others seem indifferent to Jasmine's plight. Genie was going around and restoring the ruined parts of the city, which would take some time even for him. The damage was extreme indeed. You and Jenny go to a secluded area to talk. For you had turned your head and returned looking at Cassandra. Cassandra was being greeted by everyone at the body, and she talked to nearly everyone that talked to her. You and Jenny manage to leave without anybody noticing. Cassandra was far too busy talking to Peter Griffin.

You and Jenny wander through the palace for a good ten minutes before finding a private room. The bed of the room was quite large. The room had a balcony that looked over Argabah's southern end. Jenny walks to the middle of the room and sits down, causing the whole floor to shake a little. She motions for you to come over and you do.
1232222212211211121121222111.title: Alone with Jenny

choices: Somehow, the game lasts a month. Sweet!
123222222.content:
You have to admit- the entire concept of Fat County amazes you. Maybe seeing if you really get 200 pounds heavier in a month might be exciting- it would definitely be a conversation starter. Plus, all those sights seem to be interesting- cities, entire mountains of people who stayed in the area for too long. How could you pass up?

"Check me in," you say to the front desk.

"Sorry, we're very full. No vacancy," the rotund lady shook her head.

"Aww, man!" you sigh, disappointed that you won't be able to find a place to stay the night.

She raises a finger, "Well... I suppose I could find a room, that is, so long as you're not opposed to having a roommate."

"Why not?" you shrug, how bad could it be. Maybe you'll stay your times in Fat County with an interesting character.

* * *

*BOOM*

"Yeah!" hooted Souta, the younger brother of Kagome, throwing his XBox controller up as he crunched down on another candy bar, "This is great!" he cheered, his black locks bouncing up and down as he jumped in his pajamas.

You couldn't believe it. Out of all the characters, you ended up with Souta- and he's here only because of the XBox in his suite. He just got here the other day and said he wanted to run away, yet still be comfortable, and supposedly, this was the cheapest room he could find.

You wonder if he even knows the effects of Fat County. Even without them, you wonder if he'd put on a few. He's just lazing around here, playing Halo, with tons of snacks around him. You pop open a bag of cheese doodles.

"Hey, wanna play a round?" he asks, offering you a controller.

"Uh, sure," you nod, grabbing it, intending to show him who's the man.

The Powerpuff Girls are all in a row, and so are all the Ewoks from that old cartoon in the '80's. All of the people on the tour bus are fat as you are, so it looks like they've been in Fat County for a month too.
You and Souta take a seat next to the last row of seats. You take the pamplet of the Fat Mountains away from Souta and read more about those 10 women.
What you find slightly startles you; There's only one road past the Fat Mountains and that's through one of the stomachs of the 10 women! There's actually a road in the stomach of each women and the road goes right through them...like a sick and twisted version of a mountain tunnel. You're not too sure about traveling in the stomach of someone, but you'll cross that bridge later. You read on and find out that 1,500 people a year climb at least one of the Fat Mountains. 24 people have died trying to climb, and 3 people sunk into the flab of Officer Jenny and was never seen again...although, there are stories that the 3 people are still living within Jenny's flab.
The booklet also has pictures of someone on the "summit" and looking at the surrounding landscape. It's quite a view!
"Okay, ladies and gentlemen" said the driver, getting onto the bus. The driver was Genie from Aladdin, wearing what a bus driver would wear. The Genie had a strong Brooklyn accent. "we're gonna go to the Fat Mountains, and we're coming back here. Any who wish to drive past the Fat Mountains, there's another tour bus that'll take you to Mt. Delia and points beyond. Enjoy the ride"
123222222212.title: The Tour Bus

1232222222121.content:
The magical mystery bus bounced along the road. Genie blabbered on as it passed various microscopic landmarks, elaborating about the history of this tree or that sign. And of course, nothing could go by without a corny joke injected in the middle of it all.

"... don't cry, it's only a joke!"

"We KNOW, already!" the crowd barked back.

"Jeez Louise!" Genie rolled his eyes, suddenly morphing into Louis XVIII, "C'est la vie!"

The bus started to shake as dissatisfied riders rose their fists for the cheesy lines to stop. A cartoon fish booed. You saw Tai from Digimon start a protest chant. It was getting pretty hectic in there. And then you felt a tugging on your shirt from the window seat.

You turn and see Souta staring up at you, blushing, "Uhhh... Steve?"

Forgetting the crowd, you sigh, "...What's going on, Souta?"

"... Steve, I've... gotta go! Can you stop the bus for me?"

"Can't you hold it in until we get there?"

"N-no... I'm seriously got to spring a leak!"

You eye the chaotic crowd nervously. Well, maybe if you two can break through to the front and stop the bus for a while, everyone will calm down.

"Alright, we're going in!" you say as you grab Souta's wrist and try to plow your way through the crowd. It's tough because you can barely fit through the aisles as is. But luckily, when you push through, others either move or are forced out of your way.

You now pass by the front few rows, "Hehehe, look at the fat tourists," giggles a purple haired girl, "Hey there, shoebie," Reggie Rocket smiled, giving Souta's large gut a poke. He was blushing now, but for a different reason.

"... I think we're up here for a different reason," you whisper as you walk up to the driver's seat, "Hey, listen, can you pull over? ... We have a little emergency..."

"Emergency?!?" Genie cried, erupting into a large siren that flashed red lights through a dimmed bus, "Where? Where?"

You grab him by the collar even though he's driving and bellow in his ear, "I mean to say Souta here needs to take a leak!" ... wow, maybe the atmosphere is making you behave more cartoonish...

Genie slams on the brakes and suddenly opens the door for you and Souta. You follow him out just so you can get a breath of fresh air... plus, you're so wide, Souta really can't make it out unless you get out first.

As he strayed off behind a wide array of trees, you hear Genie make a goofy remark, and the crowd starts yelling and shaking the bus. Suddenly, it speeds off behind you, without you. Great...

Just then you hear Souta call, "Hey!
1232222222121.title: Pit Stop

choices: Souta and You decide to pick who will duel Mai
Souta and You decide not to duel Mai
12322222221211.content:
"I found something! Come see!"


The tour bus has left the two of you just outside of a rather dense-looking forest. Souta has disappeared behind some trees to go to the bathroom. You waddle over to the tree, wondering what has Souta found. When you come over to where Souta is, he has something in his hand. You look closer and realize that Souta is holding a deck of cards! And not just ANY deck of cards; these look to be the cards from Yu-Gi-Oh! The first card is none other than the Dark Magician Girl!

"Who would leave these behind?" you ask aloud, as you and Souta look through the deck of nearly three dozen cards. One of the cards has an "Exit" sign on it and nothing else.

"I don't know" said Souta. "hey, where did the bus go?"

"It left without us" you say. "it was getting pretty ugly in there...I guess they couldn't wait any longer"

"Phooey" said Souta. "well, what now?"

"I don't know" you say. "maybe look for the owner of these cards"

"That sounds like an execellent idea" saids a cool female voice from behind the pair of you. You and Souta look to see that Mai Valentine is standing behind you.
