Mai has an immense belly; its bigger than you and Souta combined! The clothes that Mail has is riding up on her massive belly, revealing her deep belly button. Her hips, thighs and butt are big too. "considering that the owner of that deck is in my stomach. Would you like that?"

"Erm..." said Souta.

"Not really..." you say.

"Ah, but listen" said Mai. "here's something; I'll duel one of you. If you win, you get to eat me....but if you lose, I get to eat you"

"Can't we just massage your belly?" you ask.

"Hmmmm..." said Mai. "I've been looking for someone to rub my big tummy. Oh right...after I eat one of you, the other will become my belly massager"

"And what if we refuse?" you ask.

"Oh, you're free to go if you two refuse" said Mai. "I'm just looking for a meal and I'll only eat those who lose duels to me"

"That's kind of you" said Souta.

"Don't let it be said that I'm a baddie" said Mai.
12322222221211.title: Time to Duel?

choices: It turns out she's on the run.
It turns out she's Lady Cassandra in disguise!
123222222212112.content:
The two of you huddled up away from Mai, "What do you think, Souta?"

"I don't know- we're supposed to be sightseeing, and we're not going to see very much if we get eaten by her. Besides... something about her is funny," he says, looking at her as if something is off. You're not exactly sure why but you have to nod your head.

"Alright, so we're going to have to pass on this on?"

"I think so," says Souta, unfolding the booklet to see what else there was to do in Fat County.

"So boys, what will it be?" Mai asks, winking at you.

You stammer, "Uhm, I'm afraid no-" but you're interrupted by Souta.

"Hey!" he exclaims, "You're Mai Valentine... aren't you supposed to be one of the fat mountains?" Mai sighs and narrows her eyes at the boy.

"Right you are," she says in a funny voice, trembling, looking at the ground, "Right you are..." You look at her, unsure of what's going on.

"Are you okay?" you ask, going up to her.

"Not exactly..." she sighs.
123222222212112.title: Souta and You decide not to duel Mai

choices: "It's Kairi...the smallest of the Fat Mountains"
1232222222121121.content:
In the booklet, Mai Valentine was clearly visible as one of the bigger Fat Mountains. In fact, Mai was the second highest of the Fat Mountain, second only to Officer Jenny, So...how did Mai manage to slim herself down like this?

"Being mountain-sized really wasn't for me" said Mai. "so I decided to slim myself down and run off"

"How did you slim down that much?" asked Souta.

"Well, you see" said Mai. "in Fat County, there's these magical flowers with these petals that makes fat people skinny once again. There's a special potion made from these flowers that shrink down fat people. They give a little of this potion to each of the Fat Mountains...to make sure they don't get fat enough to cover the world. So I took more of the potion than I needed to...so I'm this big now"

"So you ate someone to plump up again?" you asked, grinning.

"I love to eat people" said Mai. "But I don't like being the size of a mountain"

"What was it like being that big?" you ask.

"Stay in Fat County long enough and you'll find out" said Mai. "you're basically immobile...you can hardly move. I hardly felt people climbing on my massive belly...and its VERY cold up there...I used to get bad frost bite..."

"Is anyone coming after you?" asked Souta. Just as he said that, the ground shook violently.

"I...I guess so" said Mai.

"Who?" you ask.

Mai sighed and said...
1232222222121121.title: On the run

choices: The both of you go to town, looking for a cure
The two of you get lost and find some shack in the woods
12322222221211211.content:
"It's Jenny..." she sighed, "Officer Jenny- she's always breathing down everyone's throats around here. Such a do-gooder. It doesn't matter whether you're Bugs Bunny or Inuyasha, if you're a toon, she'll find something to keep you in line..."

Souta shuddered.

"She does good alright," Mai continued, "...but how she does it- you'd better watch out."

"But Mai, certainly there's somewhere you plan on heading to start anew outside of Fat County. Agrabah? Out in the forest?"

She shook her head, "What forest? And I'm afraid it's a bit more complicated than that. I can't just find some place to lay down low. You see, I ran into Jenny before."

Souta's eyes grew wide, "Did she arrest you? Or make you go back and be a mountain again?"

"Probably fined you right?"

"No, she didn't- because she spied me from across a ravine- and I thought there wasn't very much she could do to me," Mai said, "She gave me something most women would kill for. She said if I cared about losing weight so much, she could help me out and she cursed me to continually lose weight- sort of like what happens in Fat County except backwards but more powerful. I think it's that you lose 250 pounds a month."

"Lose 250 pounds a month?" Souta gasped, "Wow... that's brutal."

"Well, considering our conditions it's not so bad," she smirked, "And it's a little devious of her. In Fat County you gain 200 pounds a month anyway. So really I only lose 50 pounds a month, but it's starting to get to me. The tricky thing is if I leave Fat County, I'll lose the full 250 pounds a month and I'll be done for."

"So she's trapped you!" you conclude.

"Yep, and until I come back to her crying for help, I'm in a terrible pickle," Mai sighed, "I'm trying to keep gaining to beat the spell but it's very hard to do it hiding in the wilderness. The only other way around is if some sort of cure can be found in a spellbook... maybe if you boys are heading back to a town, you can keep me in mind."
12322222221211211.title: Another twist...

choices: The night passes without anything happening
Something happens late in the night
123222222212112112.content:
"You're not coming with us, then?" you ask.

"A lot of people get lost in these woods" said Mai. "luckily, there's enough food for me in the forest...I go around eating up people and animals to gain some weight before I lose 50 pounds of it"

"So that's why you wanted to eat us" you say.

"Yep" said Mai. "and Jenny has forbidden me to find a cure to this curse I have...if she caught me trying to find a cure, she'll eat me"

"What, she does patrols while she's that big?" you ask.

"She doesn't have to" said Mai. "she's so big, she can spot me for miles away. Believe me, when you're a mountain you see see for miles and miles around...she's probably watching us even now"
You and Souta look around nervously, but see nobody else around.
"So you see, I'm stuck here" said Mai. "If I could, I would come with you two"
"Don't you worry" said Souta. "we'll find the cure"
"Good luck" said Mai, and she wanders off in search for more food.
You and Souta decide to head for the nearest town to look for the cure, which is on the opposite side of the forest. The two of you walk into the woods.


There's no path in the woods, so you and Souta easily get lost. At one point, you two were going around in circles, until you noticed and went another way. According to the booklet, the forest was very large.

It was approaching sundown when the two of you came upon a large shack. The shack was a small house with only one room. It looked like nobody had lived in the shack for many years, but it had a moth-eaten bed. It was well-equipped for being an old shack.
"I hope the three bears doesn't live here.." you say, making Souta laugh. The two of you decide to stay the night in the shack, since it was getting late.
123222222212112112.title: The Old Shack

choices: In a glowing fungi covered basement...
1232222222121121122.content:
While Souta fell asleep relatively quickly, you had difficulty. You tossed around, trying to get some shut-eye to no avail. All you hear is that scratchy noise of a branch against the window and the creaky sound of the bed against the floor. It could be the old rusty springs of the mattress but it could also be the fact that your combined weight was easily six hundred pounds, if not more. You couldn't even expect a new bed to carry that much.

Souta is snoring now, much to your annoyance. You try sitting upright and the bed makes a dangerous lurch and you feel a slight disorientation. The bed is... sliding off? Suddenly comes a loud crack and the lower righthand side of your bed snapped through the moldy flimsy floor. Souta sprung away, only to have the bed crash through the floor, the downside now tipping into the darkness.

"Holy crap!" you hear Souta shriek as he crawls up the bed and hops off, his rebound making the floor groan again. You try to pull yourself up but the bed heaves to the basement, carrying you with it.

You feel a firm grasp and Souta's on his belly trying to pull you up, but your weight only succeeds in pulling him down with you.

You both holler as you fall into the abyss... and land...
1232222222121121122.title: Late at night...

choices: The two of you eat plain mushrooms
The two of you eat polka-dot mushrooms
12322222221211211221.content:
The two of you fall about 15 feet before you land on soft earth. The impact of the pair of you causes the ground under you to tremble slightly. Souta has landed right beside you, and is getting up along with you. The two of you discover that you're now in a glowing room filled with mushrooms. The glow is coming from four mushrooms, which gives off moonlight-like light..making the room look more eerie. There's all kinds of mushrooms growing right from the ground. Some of these mushrooms look like the mushrooms from the Mario games! The floor and walls are covered in mushrooms. There doesn't appear to be stairs leading out of the basement.

"Great" you say. "looks like we're stuck here"

"Unless these mushrooms can help us" said Souta.

That's when you notice a sheet of paper hanging on the wall. You look at the paper and read aloud:

"One side makes you bigger, the other side makes you smaller.
Don't eat any of the polka-dot ones unless you want to be a mountain of fat"
The paper is signed by someone named "Alice"

You and Souta look at each other.

"So...if we eat the plain mushrooms" said Souta. "we'll get bigger or smaller"

"And if we eat the polka-dot mushrooms" you say. "we'll be mountains of fat"
12322222221211211221.title: Mushroom Basement

choices: "Oh okay then...." Souta nibbles just one.
You shove just one into his mouth.
123222222212112112212.content:
You smile and immediately grab a polka dot mushroom. Souta smirked back at you, armed with a polka dot mushroom of his own.

"Hey Souta, c'mere," you laugh, chasing him, arm extended with a mushroom, "I've got something for you..."

"What, you want me to eat that?" he asked, eyes getting a little big.

"Yeah," you say, inching close to him.

"Fat chance!" he laughs, stepping closer to you with his polka dot mushroom, getting on his tip toes so he can shove it in your mouth.

"What is this? A weapon?" you ask, brushing him away, "Beside, the note said if you eat polkadot MUSHROOMS... meaning more than one will make you a mountain of fat."

"I guess... hold on," Souta said looking at the note, "No, it said don't eat ANY of the polka-dot ones... meaning none!"

"Oh come on, how bad could one be? Just one," you say, making a big smile.
123222222212112112212.title: Polka-dot mushrooms

choices: You take a nibble of your mushroom
1232222222121121122121.content:
"Oh, okay then" said Souta. "just a small nibble to start with"

"What are you, chicken?" you ask.

"Nope, I just don't wanna bury you in my fat" said Souta. The two of you laugh. Souta takes a nibble of the polka-dot mushroom in his hand....and instantly grew to outgrow the entire shack itself. You are caught up in Souta's fat, but not by much...you manage to wiggle out of the folds of fat. Souta still grows, bursting out of the shack and uprooting trees. He continues to grow bigger and fatter until he's about 200 feet tall! You're somewhere on Souta's massive belly. You're still holding the polka-dot mushroom that you picked up from before.
"Wow!" said Souta's booming voice. "all that with just a nibble"
1232222222121121122121.title: Just a nibble

1232222222121121122122.content:
Souta opens his mouth to say something, and you shove the polka-dotted mushroom into his mouth. He swallows it (and almost gags on it). A few minutes go by, and nothing seems to happen. Souta is still holding out the polka-dotted mushroom to you, standing on his tip toes.
"That was yummy" said Souta, "but nothing is happening"
"Maybe its slow-acting..?" you suggest.
Just as you speak that, you hear a great rumbling coming from Souta's stomach...it sounds just like a small avanlache is happening in Souta's belly! Then, Souta becomes fatter, and he starts to get taller. In under a minute, he's towering over you! You are pushed to the wall by Souta's fat belly. Soon, Souta fills up the basement and he bursts out of the shack and continues to grow taller and fatter. You're trapped within Souta's blubbery fat...the air is breathable, but its growing stale. If you don't get out of Souta's fat now, you could suffocate! Having little choice, you start to "swim" in the blubber. The blubber is very yielding, allowing you to move quite easily. You have no idea just how big Souta will get...as big as a mountain, you guess. The great rumbling coming from within the blubber around you gets louder and louder as Souta grows even bigger and fatter. Ten minutes later, you finally emerge from Souta's flab, and gasp. At this point, Souta has grown into a virtual mountain...many thousands of feet up...perhaps even ten thousand feet up! You're near Souta's head. You know that because you see his hair somewhere above you. Souta's clothes had long ago been ripped apart, so he's now naked. The rumbling in Souta's stomach keeps going for five-six minutes, and then it stops. You have a great view....and you see the Fat Mountains. In fact, Jenny waves at the new mountain of fat...Souta waves back.
"SOUTA!" you yell as loud as you can, hoping he can hear you.
1232222222121121122122.title: Mt. Souta

choices: The rabbit runs off...you decide to follow him
Someone even bigger than the two of you comes....and its Alice!
12322222221211211222.content:
The abyss the two of you had fallen in was a very long drop. It was so long a drop that it seemed impossible....you were starting to think that it was a bottomless hole, in fact. When the two of you landed on soft ground, it felt like you landed on something else other than ground. Both of you landed on your stomachs, which softened the fall somewhat. You get up from the ground and look up....only to see blue sky above you...there's no trace of the hole you've fallen through. Souta gets up from the ground beside you.

"Where are we now?" asked Souta.

"In my front yard, thank you very much!" came a tiny voice. The two of you both look down to see a small white rabbit standing there. The rabbit is as tall as your big toe! It takes you a moment to recongize the rabbit; its the same white rabbit from the Disney movie Alice in Wonderland! You look around to see that you're on the outskirts of a forest. The trees in the forest barely come up to your knees! If this is Wonderland, why did you start off so big?

"I think we're in Wonderland" you say to Souta.
12322222221211211222.title: Giants of Wonderland

choices: Souta's been tied down by a tribe of forest fairies
Souta's been tied down by a ruthless female hunter
123222222212112112221.content:
"We'd better go after him," you tell Souta. He nods and goes after the tiny white rabbit, huffing as his weight bobs up and down. "Careful!" you yell, "Don't step on the poor guy."

"Whoa!" Souta turns his heels in and comes to a screeching halt, just like a cartoon. Although his weight threw him forward and after waving his arms around frantically, he fell down with a giant crash. Trees toppled and tiny birds scattered to the skies, "Ughh... that was terrible. I hope I didn't crush the rabbit... or anyone for that matter," Souta grumbled, lying on a wide swath of the forest.

Suddenly, the tiny rabbit scurried up onto Souta's nose, tapping his foot impatiently, "Oooo! You monsters cause so much trouble! The new Queen of Hearts will not be happy when she finds this out, not happy at all!"

"I don't think we're monsters, Souta said, scratching his lower lip, accidentally knocking down a whole column of trees, "Whoops... Do you have anything that could maybe make us smaller?"

But the rabbit was gone.

"C'mon, Souta, you're right maybe we should look for something to cut us down to size."

Souta tried to move but found himself unable to rise. He groaned and struggled, "It's no use. I'm stuck!"

"What? Are you too big to move or..."

"No... I'm... I'm tied down!"
123222222212112112221.title: Forest Crash

choices: "...are going to meet the New Queen of Hearts"
"....are going to the zoo of Wonderland"
1232222222121121122212.content:
"Tied down?" you ask, and you blink your eyes a couple of times and realize that Souta is indeed tied down by what looks like millions of tiny ropes. You squint down at the ground and see a tiny human female on the ground next to Souta's massive form. The female has red hair that comes to her shoulders and she's carrying what looks like a shotgun. She looks first at Souta, than at you.

"Who're you?" you ask.

"Allison Albright" said the female. "The most famous monster hunter in all of Wonderland!"

"We're not monsters" said Souta.

"I know you're not, but it's the law that any persons bigger than a mile high is considered to be a monster" said Allison. "Your friend just squashed half of the forest and goodness knows how many people"

"Sorry" said Souta. He struggled against the ropes that was tied around him, but he couldn't get the ropes free! That must be pretty strong rope!

"Good luck breaking out of that" sneered Allison, aiming her tiny shotgun at you. "and you're next, tubby"

"Wait! What...?" you start to ask. Allison pulls the trigger of the shotgun and out comes a huge net big enough to capture you within it! No matter how much you struggle, you can't break free of the net.

"What are you gonna do with us?" asked Souta.

"Haven't made up my mind to tell the truth" said Allison, sitting down on the ground and reloading her shotgun. "there's a zoo that pays big money for monsters like the two of you. The new Queen of Hearts could use a snack or two.....or, I could always eat you"

"How could you eat us?" asked Souta. "we're surely too big for you"

"Let's just say I have a big appetite" said Allison. "An appetite not easily satisfied. However, if I do eat you, than people will hunt me as a monster. No, I won't eat you"

"You said something about the new Queen of Hearts" said Souta. "since when there's a new Queen of Hearts"

"And what happened to the old one?" you ask.

"Like I would tell the two of you that" said Allison. Allison is sitting on a fallen tree that Souta knocked over just moments before. She pulls out a cellphone and dails a number. "All that I know is that the new Queen of Hearts is named...Delia. Hello? Yes, it's Allison....."

Delia? The name means nothing to you or Souta. Meanwhile, Allison is talking on the phone.

"Yeah, I just caught two monsters. Any luck on your end?"

She must be talking to her partner.

"Damned shame. Listen, what do you want me to do with my catch?"

After listening to whatever her partner said, Allison nods and answers "Yes" and turned off her cellphone.

"Well" said Allison. "looks like the two of you....
1232222222121121122212.title: Allison the Hunter

1232222222121122.content:
"I know I should've picked someone else to copy" said Mai, patting her belly absent-mindely. You and Souta exchange questioning looks before it happens. Mai's skin begins to--there was no other word for it--boil. You and Souta both gasp as Mai's skin begins to boil away. It took Mai's skin a full five minutes to melt away, to reveal what looked like Morrigan from those Darkstalkers games. The Morrigan look-alike had blue hair and silver eyes, which causes the illusion that she has no pupils. She still had the big belly, and she smiles at Souta. Souta seems to be smitten with the demonic woman. After a minute of looking at each other, Souta bows down to her.

"Who're you?" you ask.

"Lady Cassandra" answered Souta. "she's a.."

"I'm a succubus" said Cassandra, turning her attention to you. You look into those silver eyes of hers. Once you look into her eyes, you seem to be put under a spell. You can't look away from her...not that you would want to. Try as you might, you can't turn your head away from her...you can't even blink your eyes. But you no longer care if you can't turn your head...or blink. All you care about is Cassandra herself. You seem to be drowning in her eyes, and you couldn't give a damn about it. Then, the spell over you and Souta seems to lift. You blink several times, and Souta got up from his knees.

"I'm usually good at disgusing myself" said Cassandra. "but not today, it seems. I just had to copy someone who happens to be a mountain..."

"Who's...?" you begin to ask.

"I'm Cassandra" said Cassandra. "I'm a succubus...that's a kind of demon, you know. And I opened the gateway to this world and many other worlds. You wandered into this world when you got lost in my woods. And now, you're stuck here....that is, until you pay a price to me to let you out of this world. You see, you can enter this world easily...but getting back to the real world is tough without my help. I'm not saying it's impossible without my help, but it does take a lot quicker"

"What's the price?" you ask.

"20 years off your life" said Cassandra. "I feed on your life force after you have sex with me, and I'll take you back to your world"

"And I die sooner?" you scoff. "sorry, but I like to live a bit longer"

"Are you sure?" asks Cassandra. "being old is tough...you can get all kinds of dieases that'll leave you helpless as a baby"

"Sorry" you say. "but I like it here...and I think I'm gonna stay awhile"

"Your choice" said Cassandra.

"So..." said Souta. "who did you eat?"

"A yummy kid named Yugi Muto...and his Pharoah friend...although, he's one in the same" said Cassandra. "I also had someone named Seto Kaiba and...oh....about five more people....and I'm hungry for some dessert, and you two will do nicely"

"No thanks" you say. "I have better things to do"

"Like I'm giving you a choice on that subject" said Cassandra, and then she jumps at Souta, pinning him under her belly. She looks at you and beckons you to her, licking her lips. You feel yourself walking towards her, and you can't stop! Looks like you're chow!
1232222222121122.title: Cassandra's Hungry

choices: You ask Caroline about her past
Caroline has a mischievous look in her eyes
12322222221211222.content:
Suddenly there was a red blur as Cassandra hisses at the sudden threat, and a green-singlet lady with red hair in a long loopy ponytail charges in roaring like the demoness she was confronting,

"So, how dare you pick on a defenseless human!" Caroline wields a weapon against Cassandra, it looked like a switch-blade and Cassandra was unfettered.
"What does that do?" Cassandra huffs, "You hace some nerve to pick on someone your own size," Caroline doesn't back away, she just kept her eye level with the beast, and she looks at Souta with a listless expression.
"Stay behind me, it'll be quick," Caroline urges as she lunges at Cassandra, switching the blade to a mode suitable for gouging the succubus.

There is an outrage as Cassandra backs away, suddenly afraid of the threat, but it licks the lips deftly, determined to get flesh.
"... You think you can eat me?" Caroline says wickedly, "I'm your main course, if you chomp on me, I'm going to bust outta there joint in no time flat!" Cassandra is heistant and finally says, "You win, feisty mortal for now..."

"Thanks" you say to Caroline as soon as the demoness is out of the picture. Caroline flicks her hair,
"No probs," Caroline says, "I keep an eye out for fiends"
12322222221211222.title: Caroline fends off Cassandra

1232222222122.content:
The following chapter was contributed by Gronker (67)

After a brief drive, the bus pulls into a carpark placed near the middle of the foot of the 'mountain range'

From so far down, it's impossible to make out their faces but a helpful signpost informs you that you've stopped underneath 'Mt. Yuffie'.

"Ok ladies and gentlemen, we've arrived at our destination and now- you have a choice. You can decide to climb one of the mountains in which case please regard the safety booklet yadda yadda yadda, or you can stay here as we progress to the second range, what'll it be?"
1232222222122.title: At the base.

12322222221221.content:
You and Souta and three other people head out of the bus to go climb Mt. Yuffie. You look up...and up, and up at Yuffie. Yuffie's head wasn't visible...nor were her breasts. Yuffie's belly is about 16,000 feet wide...which shocks you to no end; ordinary people were like tiny ants to the Fat Mountains! According to the booklet, Yuffie was the smallest of the Fat Mountains at 19,230 feet tall! Officer Jenny was the biggest of the Fat Mountains at 40,035 feet tall...taller than Mt. Everest! Combined, all of the Fat Mountains weighed more than a billion tons!
"Wow!" is all you can say.
"Yeah..." said Souta.
The "base camp" of Mt. Yuffie was located in Yuffie's belly button...which was a good 3,200 feet high. The other three people with you are: Cloud from Final Fantasy 7, Sora from Kingdom Hearts, and Washu from Tenchi Muyo.
"Hi there" said Washu.
"Hello" you say. You introduce yourself to the red-haired genius.
"What brings you here?" asks Washu, who has a slight big gut.
"What else?" you ask. "to climb Yuffie"
"This is our first time here" said Souta.
"First time for me too" said Cloud.
"As well as me" said Sora...who has the biggest gut of the group..looks like Sora spent at least four months in Fat County.
"Well...let's start climbing" said Washu.
12322222221221.title: Go Climb a Rock

choices: Yippee! You start eating up, this is great!
Very suspicious... You take a small nibble.
124.content:
You set down the path with the candycane sign, thinking it will be the most safe route. What could possibly go wrong with that?

Your surroundings start to change as you embark down the road... the dark forest starts clearing up, and the moonlight keeps on getting brighter... is the sun really coming out at this time of nigh-?

It's day. You blink. What's going on here. Suddenly, you start seeing things.... or are you? Where the trees used to be now stand tall candy canes with bright green leaves, which upon closer examination are revealed to be dollar bills.

You hear rushing beside you and you expect to see a river but instead you see flowing chocolate; the grass is soft and warm, and you have little doubt in your mind that everything here is edible- the riverbank's full of gumdrops and the mountains in the distance must be made of ice cream- you think you can see hot fudge falling through an enormous waterfall.

Where are you?
124.title: Candy... land?

choices: You go and eat...err...meet the family of chocolate bars
You continue to eat the trees
1241.content:
Where are you, indeed. One moment, you were in a forest at night and the next moment you are in candy land at mid-day. The mountains in the distance look like to be made from ice cream and you see what looks like a castle in the distance too...but the castle is much closer to you than the mountains. The caslte is perhaps a good 5 miles away, but you can still see it...it looks like its made from solid chocolate and vanilla bricks.
The candy cane trees around you are 30 to 60 feet tall. Some of the trees are made out of chocolate and vanilla...and one tree looks like its made out of gummi worms. You look in wonder at the sight before you. Then your stomach starts to growl.
"Time to eat" you say, as you pick out a handful of chocolate grass and stuff it into your mouth. The very soil in this place is made out of chocolate and vanilla...the whole place is edible! You eat the chocolate grass until you clear a path to the gum drop tree before you. You eat the gum drops one by one, eating the tree. Everything is VERY tasty. After compeletly eating the gum drop tree, your belly sticks out a good 2 feet in front of you. You then catch sight of something that makes you gasp.
Sitting on the chocolate grass, not 70 feet from you, is a whole family. The 4 people are sitting on a blanket and seeming to have a picnic. These people are walking chocolate bars! You see that they're eating real food; roast chicken, sandwiches, etc. They haven't spotted you yet.
1241.title: Candy people

choices: Ice cream mountain, Stephen, ice cream mountain...
Go to the candy castle instead
12412.content:
You decide to spare the chocolate bar people for now and instead you turn to another tall tree and start gobbling it down. This is amazing, it's a junk food paradise, just like you always imagined when you were a kid. You lick a tall peppermint stalk, relishing its crisp minty flavor.

There's so much you could do here. Suddenly, your slightly distended belly grumbles. You're still hungry? Well, then there's even more to do... you could swim down the chocolate river straight to the ice cream mountain or you could take an early stop and try to nibble away at the delectable castle walls.

What will it be?
12412.title: Exploring

choices: Officer Jenny with the biggest belly you ever saw!
124121.content:
The castle would have to wait for now. You make your way to the chocolate river, and jump in. You begin to swim your way towards the mountain. You eat some of the chocolate river, and it's delicious. You even swallow a few chocolate fish that wiggle in your stomach, tickling your insides. You wonder if you're the only person in this wonderful edible world.
It takes you 20 minutes to get to the ice cream mountain. While swimming down the river, you see more chocolate bar people and even some M&M people. Eating those candy people sounds tempting, but you're heading for an entire mountain of ice cream. The river leads to a valley that's beside the mountain. You get out of the river with an even more slighty distended gut. You look up at the mountain and lick your lips.
Suddenly, a shadow falls over you and the mountain. You turn around and gasp at what you see.
124121.title: Swimming to the mountain

choices: Why aren't you in school like everyone else?
Do you need help getting anywhere?
1241211.content:
She was stronger than she looked and actually managed to pull you from the chocolate river with the flick of a wrist into a fish net and rise it to over her eye level in one foul swoop. Was Officer Jenny always this tall? It seemed like she was well over six feet... though then again, it could have been the elevation of the river bank leading you to believe that.

"Excuse me, sir, you know swimming in the chocolate river is a misdemeanor here," she stated, looking you right in the eye.

"Well, uh," you blushed, "Sorry, Officer Jenny, I guess I got a little carried away."

Officer Jenny took a double take of you, "Hmm, well, you don't look like you're around here, so I'll let you off for that. Just don't swim in the chocolate river, okay?"

"Yes, maam," you smile and give a salute as she lowers you to the ground.

"Now..." she started, "..
1241211.title: Officer Jenny?

choices: A shadow falls over all of Acme Acres...here comes Delia!
You and Jenny arrive at Acme Looniversity
12412111.content:
"Why aren't you in school like everyone else?" asked the 700-pound Jenny.


"I'm 26" you say. "too old for school"

"I meant college, dumbass" said Jenny.

"Oh..." you say. "you see, I just got here and, um...I don't know where college is....why do I need to go to college at all? I'm not a regular...I don't even belong here!"

"That's what they all say" said Jenny. "but...since this is your first day here, I won't send you to my stomach...err, I mean jail"

"Could you take me to college?" you ask.

"Of course I can" said Jenny, smiling. "now...the nearest college would be....Acme Looniversity"

"Looniversity?" you ask. You know that's from "Tiny Toon Adventures".

"Acme Acres is a long way off" said Jenny. She looked at her watch on her chubby arm. "If we hurry, you might make it in time for afternoon classes"

"Can't I just stay here and eat?" you ask.

"Nope" said Jenny, picking you up. Jenny waddles her way pass the ice cream mountain and heads for a wide field of chocolate. Jenny sets you atop of her bouncy belly, which you sink into like it was dough instead of flesh. You're disappointed that you won't get to eat anymore here now...but when college is over for the day, you're going to come back here and eat to your heart's content.

"So...you eat people?" you ask, wanting to talk to the hugely fat Jenny.

"Not on a regular baisis" said Jenny. "If someone pisses me off, I'll eat 'em and send 'em to my stomach. No, I'm just here on my lunch break. If you're impressed by my size, wait until you see a friend of mine named Delia"

"Someone is even bigger than you?!" you ask, not believing that anyone could be bigger than Jenny.

"I'm small compared to some people" said Jenny. "the fattest person I know is Delia"

"And how....fat is she?" you ask.

"I'm not telling" said Jenny with amusement in her voice.

After 20 minutes of walking, Jenny entered another type of land...clearly, Acme Acres. You gasp as you spot Fifi La Fume walking pass Jenny...Fifi must've weighed over 3,000 pounds! Clearly, Fifi was in candy land as well.
12412111.title: Acme Looniversity

choices: Vore, with Elmyra as the main course
124121112.content:
Finally, after continuing on past the Candy Canes, you can see Acme Acres. "Wow" you say astounded. After all, a half hour ago you thought this place was just on television.
It doesn't take long before you reach "Acme Looniversity". College to the great cartoon stars of tomorrow.

Jenny dislodges you from her belly. "Have fun" she said walking off. "Wait, will I see you again ?" you ask. After all, this is still really new to you, and you don't really know anybody else. "Maybe" Jenny winked at you. As she walked away, you couldn't help but stare at her massive jiggling rear. Her skirt also visibly riding up her crack.
You turn around and look at the campus. "Oh well, maybe they at least have a decent cafeteria" you say.

Any nervousness you have completely disappears once the fan in you takes over. I mean, all around you are your favorite characters. Plucky Duck, Hampton Pig, Dizzy Devil, Fifi La Fume, and so many more. Some of them did appear to be fattened, while others did not. You may be in another dimension, but you still find that a little odd.

That's when you run into the big star himself.
"Hey watch it" Buster said. "Oh my god, Buster Bunny ?" you ask amazed. "In the flesh" he proclaims. Even in college Buster look mainly the same as before, just taller.
"Wow, Buster I am a big fan" you tell him. "Always nice to meet one, wow, wicked gut man!" Buster points out.
"Heh thanks, you look pretty good to" you compliment. "Yeah, being big isn't for everyone....just for most" he said.

Just then, loud stomping shakes the ground. "What is that ?" you ask getting back up. "My girlfriend" Buster smiled.
Finally appearing on the scene, the one, the only "Babs Bunny!".
"Hey Buster" Babs said giving him a huge hug. Though you can see that everything about Babs is huge. She is big, even bigger than that time when she gorged on carrot cakes as Super Babs(Even though she can actually move this time). All that fat has even made her taller than Buster.

Once she puts him down, the two look over at you. "Wow, Buster and Babs Bunny" you say. "No relation" they remind.
"So who's your new friend Buster ?" Babs asked. "My name is Steven, and" you are interrupted by the bell ringing. "Whoops, we gotta get to class" Buster said. "I have no idea where I'm supposed to go" you realize. "You should come to our class" Babs suggests. "Okay" you accept.

Once in the class, you sit across from Buster and Babs. You also notice that Babs required three chairs to sit in.
Now the teacher showed up. You reognize her as a plump Lola Bunny. "Hello class" she said. "Hello Ms. Bunny" the students all respond. "Today's lesson will be on........".
124121112.title: No Relation

choices: Lola shows the class how to swallow people and keep 'em alive...with you!
"Feeding Frezy!"  yells Lola and ALL of the students jump at you
1241211122.content:
"Today, we'll take a lesson on Vore" said Lola Bunny. "now, I see we have someone new here. What's your name and do you know what vore is?"

The class is filled with students; Fifi La Fume, Plucky Duck, Hampton, Souta from Inu-Yasha, and others. You are startled when you're called on by the plump Lola. Lola Bunny, making her first appearance in Space Jam, isn't the skinny little rabbit she was in that movie. Lola is slightly bigger than the massive Babs...which means that Lola's belly is bigger than you! You just know that you're gonna end up at the bottom of a 'dogpile' of fat cartoon characters! You just hope that you live through it.

"My name is Steven and yes, I do know what vore is" you say.
You know about vore from finding certain sites on the internet.
"Good" said Lola. "now...our main course will be Elmrya!"
A great cheer rose around the room. Elmyra is brought into the room by Sonic the Hedgehog (who isn't fat at all) in chains. Elmyra is struggling to get loose from the chains, but it isn't helping much.

"One of you will eat Elmrya" said Lola. "however...I said that Elmyra will be the main course...we need to pick who'll be the appeitezer and the desert"

Babs and Buster exchange looks and grinned.

"Any volunteers to be the appeitezer?" asked Lola.

Nobody raised thier hand. Suddenly, your hand raises high in the air without you meaning to! You look closer and discover that your right arm has strings all over it...just like a puppet! You look wildly around and see that Puppetmon of the Dark Masters from Digimon is there in the room in the back!

"The newcomer has volunteered" said Lola happily.

"WHAT?!" you ask. "no-no...it was...."

"We can pick who'll be the desert later" said Lola.

You're the unwilling appeitezer in a class about vore! You could try to escape the room, but Lola could block the door with her girth. You sigh and hope you survive getting eaten,
1241211122.title: An Appeitezer

choices: It's time to choose who will eat Elmyra and who's dessert
Lola lied about the gland, you get digested into fat
12412111221.content:
"Now Steven, are you ready ?" Lola asked. You gather up all your courage, preparing for what is next "Yes". "Good, but first I need you to take off your shoes" Lola said. That did make sense.

After tossing off your shoes, you looked as Lola started to slightly drool.
"Now, to insure a meal, make sure you have a good grip" with that, Lola grasped hold of you. Pressing you up against her enormous squishy belly. It actually felt kinda good.
"After that, just do what comes natural" she said. The class was probably thinking "Duh, we already know this".

Lola then lifted you up on top of her belly. Still not letting go, she shoved your feet into her wide maw. Licking your feet with her tongue, you couldn't help but laugh. Taking her first swallow, your feet quickly moved to the back of her throat. As your legs continued to disappear, you could feel her throat muscles firmly grasp them.
Also, even after seeing this before, the class never did get bored with it.

Lola opened her mouth a little wider to take in your hips. With one big gulp, she was up to your stomach. You could only watch as more of you vanished into the hungry bunny. You could clearly see that she was enjoying this. You were too, a little, but you were still alert in the back of your head.

Finally, after swallowing your chest, only your head and arms remained outside. You looked down at Lola, and she smiled at you. You smiled too, until she licked over your face. She then swallowed again and took in your head. Once inside her mouth, you could hear her making Mmm-ing noises outside. She then slurped up your arms like noodles, and gulped.

You quickly descened, and landed inside her belly with a plop. That made her belly jiggle outside.
"Well, now that he's inside, we can keep going, Steven! Can you hear me ?" she called out. "I can hear you Lola, what's next ?" you ask. "Do you see a little red light ?" she asked back. You look around. It's a little darker inside a belly, but you soon see something glowing on the stomach wall. "What is that ?" you ask aloud. "It's a special gland that controls the secretion a digestive acids, if someone wishes for their meal to live, this gland will become visible, just press it" Lola explained.

You steadily move closer, and lightly touch the gland.
Nothing happens. "That's it ?" you ask. "That's it" Lola said. Smiling you just lie down on your back and relax. You are greatful of your safety, though a little disappointed that you'll miss the next show.
12412111221.title: Eaten alive

choices: It's the entire Looney Tunes crew!
It's the cast of another cartoon/anime
124121112211.content:
The little red light from the gland is the only light within Lola's massive stomach. Lola's stomach is pinkish red and very yielding...and quite squishy. After watching all those Looney Tunes cartoons, you expected to see Lola's ribs from the inside...but you don't. There's hardly any stomach acid in the stomach. Lola's stomach is much bigger on the inside than out...you guess that makes sense. There's nobody else in the stomach besides you and you wonder how will you get out of here. You decide to worry about that when the time comes, and lean back on the squishy wall of Lola's stomach. The air in the stomach is stale, but breathable.

Outside, Lola smiled at the rest of the class.

"Oh righty" said Lola. "it's time for the main course. To determine who will eat Elmyra, you'll all will take a test on vore. The person with the highest score will eat Elmyra. We'll name who is for dessert after Elmyra is eaten"

Inside, you can hear all what Lola just said...though its muffled. You suddenly realize you hear something that's coming from inside the stomach other than you...and the gurgles of Lola's stomach. You can hear Lola's steady heartbeat, but you also hear what sounds to be...a party? Lola's stomach is MUCH bigger on the inside...a trait that you wonder if all cartoon characters share. You decide to look at what's making all that noise.
124121112211.title: Bigger in the inside

1241211122111.content:
You wonder through Lola's cavernous stomach. Each of your foot steps makes a squishy noise.
It got darker, as you strayed further and further from the glowing gland. However, you seen spy many multicolored lights ahead. You quickened your pace, and soon found yourself in the prescence of legends.

The entire Looney Toons crew !

They were all dancing and partying their butts off. Also, you noticed that above them was a working multicolored disco ball. The fact that is was working, you didn't put much thought into it. A few hours ago, you were just trying to fix your busted car, and now you were face with famous cartoon characters, and in the belly of one of them.
Upon forgeting the laws of physics, was when a few of the toons noticed you. "Hey guys, looks like Lola swallowed another one" Bugs informed. Some of them came over to greet you. Bugs pulled out a carrot and spoke his classic line "Eh *crunch* what's up doc ?". "Oh not much" you couldn't think of anything else to say. "So, what brings you to scenic Lola Bunny ?" he asked.
"I didn't take a left turn in that creepy forest" you answered. "I thought that joke went, I didn't take that left turn at Albuquerque" said a confused Sylvester.

"By the way, my name is Steven, so how did you all end up here ?" you asked. "I accidentally called Lola doll" Bugs admitted. That was kinda shocking. Next you turned to Daffy "After the kids pulled a fast on me, I was drenched in barbaque sauce, and that was that". You wiped off some saliva he sprayed on you "I see".
After him was Sylvester "Hey don't look at me, I got here following him". He pointed up to Tweety, who said "I thought this was a good hiding spot".
Next in the group was Porky "I was j-j-j-j-just eating an apple, and Lola walked by once it got st-stu-st-stu-caught in my mouth".
"The point is, even though were all in here, were making the most of it" Bugs said reffering to the party.
They headed back, and Bugs said "Come on Steven, we've got chips, dip, soda, pizza, stereo, satellite TV". Still not questioning any of this, you decide to roll with it.
1241211122111.title: Looney Toons

choices: The party soon ends and you explore more of Lola's stomach
12412111221111.content:
Outside, the vore test was going on. All of the students in the room were answering a list of questions on paper. This is a sample of some of the questions they were to answer:


1. How do you eat a person?
A. Whole and Alive
B. Deep fried
C. Skinless


2. How do you perfer you food?
A. Willingly eaten
B. Kicking and Screaming
C. Cooked over a roasting fire


And so on. Lola looked over everyone, making sure that everyone was taking the test. Lola just spotted someone who wasn't doing thier test! It was that stuck-up boy billionaire, Montana Max. Lola came waddling over to Max, who was preparing to shoot a spitwad over at Babs Bunny. Lola grabbed him by the throat and picked him up.
"You better do the test in the next five minutes, or you're gonna take a field trip to my stomach" The test should be about half-over by now.



In Lola's cavernous stomach, the party is going on swimmingly. You're dancing with Taz (who was tricked to enter Lola's mouth by Bugs) and he turns out to be great at breakdancing (no surprise there). You're utterly amazed at the size of Lola's stomach. This breaks all the laws in psyscics..but then, Lola never studied law. You wonder if all toon characters have this in common...and its a safe bet that they do. Lola's stomach is quite warm and comfortable "Like Pismo Beach, without all the calms I can eat" says Bugs. You don't care if you get out of Lola's stomach or not; you're having a great time in here!
12412111221111.title: Test half-over

124121112211112.content:
The toons boogyed till they just couldn't boogy no more.
"Phew, what a party" Daffy said exhausted. "So what should we do now ?" Tweety asked. Taz spoke in his own language, a kind you don't understand, but it came with subtitles. "I'm with you Taz," Daffy read what he said. "What ever we do, I ain't moving" he agreed.
Bugs finally stepped up, and made the decision. The best and only thing you should do when you are tired, watch television !
As everyone gathered around the big screen, you noticed something. A large opening in Lola's belly, a valve to be precise. "Hmm, it must lead to her intestines" you figure.

However, just when you are about to take your first step, Bugs stops you "Woah ! Where ya goin mack ?". "Uh, that way ?" you pointed to the exit. "Are you serious ? Do you know what's in Lola's intestines ?" a scared Sylvester asked. "I can think of a few things" you joke.
"The big bunny's intestines, are actually a huge maze, full of twists, turns, and dead ends" Tweety explained. "and *gulp* who knows what else" Daffy added while biting his nails". "Well even if that's all true," you start. "It is, it is, it is all ture" Tweety said. "Even so, I will get out of here, see you on the other side" you say just before walking into the valve.
"Th-th-that has to be the bravest man in the world" Porky said. "Or the dumbest" Daffy added.


Back on the outside, the test had been finished. Lola quickly graded them.
"Alright class, I have the results" she said. Everyone leaned in. Elmyra meanwhile was crossing her fingers, hoping that no one passed.
Lola read the name of the winner "And the person with the highest score is...."
124121112211112.title: Intestinal Labyrinth

choices: You go and meet Todd and his....friend? brother?
1241211122111121.content:
"The person with the highest score is....Babs Bunny!" said Lola.

Babs smiled and bowed to everyone in the room before going over to the bound and gagged Elmerya, who was struggling to get loose! The mighty Babs picked up the struggling animal torturer and opened her mouth wide and lowered Elmrya into her mouth and swallow her whole!

"Tasted like chicken" said Babs, and everyone laughed along with Babs. Lola grinned.



In the depths of Lola's intestines, you are completely lost. The Intestinal Labyrinth is filled with twists and turns..and who knows what else! You hardly believe that Lola is THIS big on the inside! However, cartoon characters tend to have much bigger insides. You decide to go with the punches and not worry about it. If you can't find your way out of Lola, you guess you'd go back to her stomach and watch that big-screen TV with the rest of the Looney Tunes. The Intestinal Labyrinth has a bad habit of double-backing on itself, making you even more confused. Each step you take makes a squishy sound. It would be dark in the intestines, if it wasn't for the lights attached to the ceiling. Lola seems to have electricty all through her digestive system...which makes you wonder who had installed the electricity. You come to a T-Section, which makes you pause. There's no T-Sections in normal intestines...of course, this isn't a normal situation! You're walking in the intestines of a cartoon character! You take a right at the T-Section and come to several booths. One booth is selling T-Shirts that says "I was eaten alive by Lola Bunny, and All I got was this lousy T-Shirt", another booth is selling maps to the toon stars' homes! Still another booth is selling Looney Tune shirts! You just chuckle at this amazing sight. You go on deeper into the intestinal labyrinth.
You come to another T-Section when you hear two voices on your right.

"Don't blame me, Todd! I wasn't the one who owned the car that broke down!"
"That car had no buiness breaking down! I tuned it every other month!" said Todd.
"Yeah, yeah"
"And who wanted to go to Acme Loon?!" asked Todd.
"And who called Lola 'doll' ?!"
"Lola IS a doll" said Todd. "she's freaking hot"
"Man, you're talking about a doodle"
"A doodle we're inside of!" yelled Todd.
"Hey, I wanted to hang with Bugs and the others"
"Well, go ahead" snapped Todd. "If you can find your way back there" said Todd.

It seems that Lola had eaten people that had the exact same trouble as you did! Should you go and meet Todd and his friend to the right, or go down the left side?
1241211122111121.title: Not Alone in the Intestinal Labyrinth

choices: The Toad's Tongue garbs you and *GULP*
12412111221111212.content:
You decide against meeting the two strangers and go to the left.
Still unsure of where you are exactly, you just keep trying to move forward.
At the same time, trying not to be confused by the shifting walls.

After a while, you think you hear something. Some more people might be in here. The sheer size of this makes that very possible. Of course, the constantly changing pathway makes this place seem even bigger.
Speaking of which, a certain wall shift forces you to go a certain direction. After turning around the corner, you see that you have reached a dead end. However, you can vaguely see someone else up ahead.

Make that two people, you hear two voices.
"Power B-" the voice a woman is cut off. "Ah shut up and come here" a male, but non human sounding voice says. "No ! This isn't right!" the woman begs. "Down the hatch!" the man said. You soon hear struggling, slurping noises, and a resounding *GULP*.
Finally you decide to get out of there. Unfortunately you get grabbed by a long red, tongue !

After being pulled back, you fall to the ground. Once you look up, you get a good look at the male individual.
It's a toad-like monster. More specifically, the Terror Toad from 'Might Morphing Power Rangers'.
"Mmm, dessert has arrived *ribbit*" he says. To your horror you see that all the Power Ranger's faces are printed on his big gut.
In short, He ate them all !!!
"Uh, can't we talk about this" you nervously say. "Ah don't worry, I still got room for one more" he cackled while patting his fat side.
12412111221111212.title: Green mean eating machine

choices: The Animanics are in the stomach too!
Meanwhile, the Terror Toad gets eaten by....(your choice)
124121112211112121.content:
The Terror Toad looks a LOT fatter than you remember seeing him on that show that you watched nigh on 15 years ago...or so...when did that show first came on again? You don't have time to wonder about that, you don't even have time to run, you DO have time to watch that Terror Toad's tongue shoot out of his mouth and grab you around the waist. You don't have time to gasp as the Terror Toad's tongue pulls you closer and closer to its open mouth, and before you can blink, you're heading down the Terror Toad's throat! This is the second time you've gone down a throat, and you're beginning to wonder if there's someone in this toad's belly that's gonna eat you too.
You land in the Terror Toad's stomach with a squishing sound and you sigh, looking around. The stomach of the Terror Toad is just as cavernous as Lola's stomach was...although, the stomach of the Terror Toad looks somewhat smaller compared to Lola's stomach. All of the Power Rangers are there with you.
"I seem to have this habit where I'm eaten" you say dryly by way of a greeting.
"We do too" said the Red Ranger...what was his name? Jason? Josh? "So don't feel to left out"
"Well...we need to get outta here" said the Blue Ranger. Was that Billy?
"And how do you suppose we do THAT?" asked Kimberly, the Pink Ranger.
"Look, he swallowed our weapons too" said Blue. "maybe if we attack his stomach, he'll throw us back up"
"So..is anyone else in here?" you asked.
"Why, yes" said a voice that didn't belong to any of the Power Rangers. The voice kinda sounded like Orson Wells.
"NARF!" said another recongizable voice. Pinky and the Brian were in this stomach too! You must've missed those two tattoos on the toad's gut earlier.
124121112211112121.title: Toad food

choices: The toad swallows Sora, Donald, Goofy and you
Someone else comes to the rescue
124121112211112122.content:
The Terror Toad's tongue is connected to you, but you give a sharp jerk, and the tongue lets go of you and you decided to make a run for it...you don't wanna end up as dinner for a toad...being in Lola's stomach is more than enough for you. You start to run the way you came, with the Terror Toad giving chase.

"I didn't order fast food!" yelled the Terror Toad as it gave chase to you. The two of you run through the twisting hallways of the intestinal labyrinth. The terror toad is so fat, that he can't hop after you very well. You turn a corner, and see up ahead that reached an opening of some sort. You run past the opening, and you notice that the walls of the intestines are bigger and further apart than ever before. You just realized that you've enteted Lola's large intestine...which means that you're heading for the "exit" and that can't be that far off....could it? The Terror Toad is still after you, and you keep running for all your worth. The large intestine is just as twisting as the small intestine. You're amazed at the sheer length of Lola's bowels.

You turn a corner, only to bump into someone.

"Watch were yer goin'!" yelled a male voice...and it didn't belong to any human either! You look to see who you just ran into. You gasp as you recongize Donald Duck. With him is Sora from Kingdom Hearts and Goofy.

"Where did you...?" started to say Sora. That's when the Terror Toad appeared.

"Well, well, well" said the terror toad. "looks like I get a big desert!" He said this while patting his fat gut.

"That's what you think, fatso" said Sora, wielding his Keyblade at the toad monster.

The Terror Toad shot out his long tongue and grabbed the Keyblade and yanked it out of Sora's grip. The toad just swallowed the Keyblade.

"Hmm...not very tasty" said the toad. "but there are sweeter meats right here!"
124121112211112122.title: Chase scence

choices: He's got plans for you(He's been alone in that maze for a long time)
1241211122111121221.content:
Donald fired his magic, and Goofy tossed his shield. Unfortunately, they ricocheted off the Terror Toad's monstrous gut, and back at them.
Donald had been cooked by his own fire blast. "Mmmm, Roast Duck !" Toad's tongue shot out. Donald was grabbed by the rbig slimy tongue, and pulled into the big slimy maw. His injured teammates could only watch as he vanished into the big slimy belly.
"Your gonna pay!" Sora said angrily. "No, I'm gonna eat!" mocked the Toad. He then pulled off another one of his moves. An energy tongue shot out of a horn on his head, and rapped around Sora and Goofy.
They were then turned into little balls of energy !
They floated back to the Toad, and he gulped them down "Yum Yum, delicous!".
Once insid him, they went back to their normal form. His huge gut surged out even further.
He licked his lips, still being able to taste his meals.
He then looked over at you. By now you were in the fetal position on the ground. He heavily waddled over.
He said "Man, eating like this, it gets me so...so..".
"Full ?" you tried to answer
1241211122111121221.title: Feed the Toad

choices: The Terror Toad runs into the White Ranger
You notice something odd about your body
12412111221111212211.content:
"Full?" asked the Terror Toad and he made a croaking laugh. "I could eat forever If I really wanted to. Thing is, why should I hunt for food out there when Ms. Lola sends me such delicious meals?" The Terror Toad comes closer to you, and you get up and run. The Toad's tongue shoots out and grabs you by the back of the head, and pulls you back into the open mouth of the toad! The toad swallows you in less than a second,sending you down into his bloated gut. The Terror Toad burps after it has eaten you and rubs his gut.
"Have fun in there" laughed the toad, as he walked to find someone else to eat.


You land in the toad's stomach with a loud squishing sound. Sora, Donald, Goofy and all of the Power Rangers are in the stomach with you. The toad's stomach is big...about as big as Lola's stomach..or even a little bit bigger! You get up from the squishy "floor" of the stomach with the help of Sora.
"I really hate being swallowed" said Donald.
"I would almost prefered to be swallowed by Monstro again..." said Sora darkly.
"Don't tell me Monstro is really here" you say.
"Not in here, no" said Goofy.
"You know about Monstro too, huh?" asked Sora.
"Well...who hasn't?" you ask. "a huge whale swallowing people and ships like that would get famous"
"Yeah.." said Goofy. "but,what do we do now?"
"We made it out of Monstro, we can make it out of this overgrown toad" said Donald.
"Maybe" you say.
"Maybe there's a door in here somewhere" said Goofy.
"Are you serious?" you ask.
"Goofy, that's just silly" said Sora.
"So..how do we get out?" asked the Pink Power Ranger.
That's when you notice the White Ranger isn't in the stomach with the rest of the Power Rangers.
"Where's the White Ranger?" you ask.
"Last time I saw, he was in the Cafeteria at Looniversity" said Red Ranger. "Lola ate us to get rid of the Terror Toad. Lola ate the terror toad because someone put him in her lunch"
12412111221111212211.title: Toad's Stomach

choices: He gets eaten, you all get digested, and we continue as the Toad
124121112211112122111.content:
The Terror Toad patted his enormous belly. He did the same to the fat sides of his body, he couldn't wait till his meals digested.
"I am going to be so Fat" he smiled.
For now though, he was just enjoying being temporaily full.
However, he was still searching for another meal. A certain ranger he missed.

He soon came across him in the maze.
"Ah ha, found you frog face" White Ranger mocked.
"Enough with the chatting, let's get to the chomping" Terror Toad said.
"Bring it" White Ranger said.

He rushed for the Toad. The Toad launched his tongue, but the Ranger jumped, and then struck with his saber. Toad yelled in pain.
The White Ranger rushed again, this time ready to ram his weapon into that Toad's gut. However, this time th Toad belly bumped off to the side. He then tried to slash, but the Ranger rolled out of the way.

(What's the battles outcome ?)
124121112211112122111.title: White Ranger

choices: You cut in line and get out of Lola
You decide to stay in Lola for a while
1241211122111121221111.content:
The White Ranger and the Terror Toad faced off each other in the intestines of Lola Bunny. The fight was a long one, involving more grunting and straining than in DragonBall Z! The White Ranger was clearly winning, his fighting skills were far more superior than the other Ranger's. Finally, The White Ranger managed to hit the toad hard in the gut with his fist. The punch caused the toad to fall to the "ground", and to throw you up! You're covered in slime and stomach acid...you then join in the fight. Little by little, you and the White Ranger beat down on the toad until he (the toad) gets knocked out and falls to the ground. The others all get out of the belly of the toad.

"Let's kill him and have some frog's legs" said Sora.

"Uhh...he's a toad" you say.

"Whatever!" said Sora. "I'm just tired of getting eaten...especially when I'm in the intestines of a cute bunny girl"

"We can't call the zords in here" said the Green Ranger.

"You need a..." you begin to say. "wait a minute...isn;t the Green and White Ranger the same person?!"

"Ermm.....yeah, but who cares?" asked White.

"Okay, that's it!" yelled the Black Ranger. "I refuse to be referred to as the "Black Ranger"! "

"But...you're a ranger...and you're black" you say.

"Oh" said the Black Ranger. "that makes you a racist!"

"Enough!" yelled Donald. "can we get away from the toad before he wakes up?"

Sora slices the toad's head off with his Keyblade.

"Uh...that was a tad out of character" said Goofy.

"Yeah" said Sora. "well, let's go"


You and your new friends walk on down the intestinal maze until you come to a larger chamber that's labeled "Welcome to the anus. Please take a number" Another sign read: "Now Serving 4". You pick a number; 24,500,400.

"What!" you yell
1241211122111121221111.title: Saving the Day

choices: You wake up in someone else's bed...
12412111221111212211112.content:
"No way!" Sora exclaimed.

"Well, that's ridiculous. There's no way I'm going to wait in THAT line to get out..." you sigh, "There has to be some other way."

"Hmm... it could just be a slow day," Sora shrugged as he plucked out ticket number 24,500,401.

"No kidding it's a slow day... and a crazy day," you shake you head as your thoughts start to spin... You were driving, got lost, wandered around some odd path... then there was Candyland, then Acme Looniversity, then you got eaten, then you got eaten again... and you have NO idea where exactly you are right now. It's like you're in a riddle within a riddle... You sigh again.

"Gawrsh, you don't look so good there, Steve. Are you doin' okay?" Goofy asked.

You shook you head, "Not exactly... I think I just really need to lay down right now, maybe that will clear things up." It seems likely to you that the whole thing is a dream... and if it is, then maybe going back to sleep will make you wake up, back in your own bed?

"Steve, I think I saw a bed by the last turn we took before we entered the chamber. You can head up and hit the hay- I'll hold your ticket for you until you get back."

Without hesitation, you slap ticket number 24,500,400 into Sora's palm, lurching off to where the bed might be. You really needed to sleep, and Sora seems like an honest enough guy, "See you later," you groan.

A few minutes later, you find and collapse into the bed Sora had seen. It's seems old fashioned and sort of rickety, but once you hit it, it's as soft as a cloud. You plunge your head into the soft confines of a faded light blue pillow and throw the crimson blanket over you. You close your eyes, relax, and begin to drift away...

Good night.
12412111221111212211112.title: Need a rest

choices: The voice belongs to Marge Simpson
The voice belongs to Lois Griffin
124121112211112122111122.content:
The bed that you found is in what looked to be Lola's appendix...but you're no expert on the lower digestive tract. Anyway, the bed was old fashioned and slightly rickety, but it held your weight. You fall asleep almost at once. You were so sleeply that you didn't even notice the sign that was on the head of the bed. This is what that sign says:


THE CURSED BED OF SHEL'LDEON


This bed is the property of the great wizard Shel'ldeon. If this bed isn't returned to Shel'ldeon, all who sleep in the bed shall be cursed to switch bodies with someone. The body that the sleeper goes to is competely random. Also, while the sleeper's soul is transferred to somebody else's body, the soul of the body the sleeper goes to will enter the sleeper's body. The curse will continue until the bed is returned to Shel'ldeon. The cursed sleeper will continue to switch bodies every time he or she goes to sleep. It may be possible that the cursed sleeper will return to his body. The wizard Shel'ldeon may be found in the Sheell Valley, near Springfield.


-----------------------


You wake up some hours later...in some place else entirely! You've waken up in a bedroom of some sort. You can't tell what color the walls of the room are because the room is dark...and it looks to be early morning..the sun isn't even up yet. You sit up in bed and look around. Where are you? More importantly, how did you get here? Are you in Lola's house?
You get up from the bed and go over to the one and only window in the room. What you see out the window is a quiet neighborhood with a paperboy going down the street on a bicycle.
There's a knock at the door.
"Are you up yet?"
The voice is female, and you have no trouble recongizing it.
124121112211112122111122.title: Cursed Bed

1241211122111121221111222.content:
You hear the voice ring out, "Peter, it's noon, are you going to get up or do I have to come in there?" Suddenly, a light flicks on, illuminating the glass pane of the mirror you're standing in front of.

To your horror, you find a massive gut jiggling out in front of you. You find a reflection staring back at you; it's none other than the face of Quahog's Peter Griffin. You gasp out, "Ah, holy crap!" Suddenly you stagger, not used to the sheer weight you've suddenly acquired and fall to the floor. You blank out from shock, not only from hitting the ground, but perhaps also due to the fact that you have suddenly woken up as Peter Griffin... and that is not something that happens every day.

You fly back into unconciousness... and when you wake up...

... surprise, surprise...

Your head spins and as you open your eyes, you try to process your surroundings...
1241211122111121221111222.title: Out Cold

choices: It's Leonardo from the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
12412111221111212211112221.content:
You get up from the street, next to your bike...which is filled with newspapers. You look around and see the Griffin house several houses behind you...you see Brian get the newspaper that was devilered as you watch. You shake your head to clear it and see a list of people that are subscribers to the newspaper that you're deliving in the bike's basket which is holding bundles of newspapers. WHAT IS GOING ON HERE?! First, you wake up in Peter Griffin's body...and then you wake up in the body of a paperboy. What was the paperboy doing sleeping anyway? You look more closely at your surroundings and you see a sizable dart sticking out of your neck. You pull the dart out with a grunt of pain and look around, hoping to find who had shot the dart at you. You don't see anybody that could've shot you with a dart. You decide to get on the bike and keep delivering newspapers.
That's when you see the headline on the newspaper: "Man-Eating Alligator escapes from zoo"
MAN-EATING ALLIGATOR? oh great. Like you don't have enough problems.
You continue down the block, when you see an opened man-hole in the middle of the street. You avoid the man-hole, but something jumps at you from the manhole.
12412111221111212211112221.title: Paperboy II: Papper Harder

choices: The Pizzaria- any paperboy's one weakness...
124121112211112122111122211.content:
You slid your bike away from whatever jumped out at you, and as you speed by, you spin your head around. A seven foot tall alligator is glaring at you with a hungry look in its eyes. It's headed right for you!

"Yikes, dude!" you scream, furiously hammering away at your pedals. Suddenly, you feel a click in your body and your legs start pumping at a ridiculous rate. You hear a sort of robotic buzzing. Your arm mechanically darts to your bag and grabs newspapers, propelling them at whatever subscribers you pass. What's going on here?

The alligator bellows behind you. In panic, you begin to accelerate... 15 miles per hour, 20... 35... 50... 70... You speed away, leaving flames in your wake like the car from Back to the Future, forcing the alligator to turn around and find lunch elsewhere.

Meanwhile, a cop turns to the road to pull you over for speeding... but you can't stop. You keep biking and doling out papers. It doesn't matter though- you're out of the area in a matter of seconds, and the cop's left to himself.

Suddenly, your legs stop pumping. You're out of papers and you're able to slam your brakes to a halt. What was that all about? It was almost as if you were some kind of paperboy cyborg... was that why you were knocked out? Had some nutcase scientist done an upgrade job on you? But where were you now...
124121112211112122111122211.title: Paper, Stronger, More Efficient!

choices: Officer Jenny comes to get you
1241211122111121221111222112.content:
You find yourself at a mall. According to the words on the mall itself, it was the "Magical Mall". Finding no other newspapers in your bicycle, you decide to do some shopping. You enter the mall, parking your bike in the parking lot. The mall is crammed with stores and people from cartoons, anime and videogames. All the stores sell magical items such as: magic wands, talking top hats, A deck of cards that shuffle themsleves and so on. Not knowing what to shop for, you enter a store called "Magic Mirrors". In the store, there are many magical mirrors. Some magical mirrors show you as 1000 pounds, while other magic mirrors talk to you, while still other magical mirrors show your insides. Just as you suspected, you're a cyborg with a robotic arm and two robotic legs. You soon exit the store, not wanting to buy something bulky as a magic mirror.


You see a cop at the mall--but not the same one that had chased you earlier. That cop was a male...while this cop was female. In fact, the cop is no other than Officer Jenny! Officer Jenny probably weighs a good 700 pounds or more, making you wonder how is the floor holding up her massive weight. It looks like the same Officer Jenny that sent you to Acme Looniversity. Officer Jenny's uniform rode up her belly, revealing her deep belly button. As you get closer to her, you hear her talking on her walkie-talkie.
"You were after a speeder and he got away?" asked Officer Jenny. "could you describe him please"
You quickly walk away from Officer Jenny and enter a nearby store that sells magical pills.
1241211122111121221111222112.title: Magical Mall

choices: Well, you're blowing up anyway, it was a weight gain pill!
Psyche! It was a sleeping pill. You wake up in someone else's bed.
12412111221111212211112221121.content:
You slip out of Jenny's warpath and into a nearby store that sells magical pills. Already you can tell there's quite a selection- rows and rows of shelves sit before you, all loaded with various boxes and bottles. This is an accident just waiting to happen.

You'd like to spend a bit more time closely examining what's in store, but Jenny decided to take a turn, right into the store you're in. She waddles up to the cashier, and starts whispering something to him. You don't have to guess that she's asking him if he's seen a fellow your size, hair color, weight... He shakes his head but turns around- and to your horror, he's pointing out the security cameras to Jenny.

Suddenly, your situation becomes clear to you- and your options are few. You can't run out without passing the security camera and having Jenny catch you on tape... but you can't hide in the store either because you just know there'll be a security camera watching you... and she'll probably come for you then too... What can you do?

With a sigh of relief, you smack your forehead. Of course! You're in a magical pill store... no doubt you can change your appearance- if anyone questions you, you can say you're just testing them out... So you run for the closest box, open it hastily, and carefully take one pill... you don't want to blow the store up by accident, after all, especially if it's you that's doing the blowing up.
12412111221111212211112221121.title: Browsing

124121112211112122111122211211.content:
Nothing seems to happen after you gulped a pill down. The pill was the size of a large walnut and was tasteless just like any other pill. As you wait for something to happen to you, you see Jenny waddle her way to the back of the store..no doubt, she's gonna check the security cameras of the store. If Jenny catches you, it'll be all over. She'll give you a ticket...or whisk you off to jail. You don't wanna end up in jail or paying a ticket. You reach into your pockets, finding that you have no money to pay for a ticket...in which case, it'll be the slammer for you...unless you can somehow bribe Jenny, which seems unlikely. As soon as Jenny opens the door at the back of the store, you hear a faint rumbling sound coming from your stomach; it sounds like a train going by! The rumbling noise attracts Jenny's attention and she begins to waddle towards you. As she comes up to you, she pulls out a bunch of tickets and begins to write down your ticket.
"Hey! You're that speeder, aren't you?" asks the obese Jenny when she's standing right next to you. The rumbling in your stomach gets louder and louder....and you start to feel your stomach is slowly inflating.
Jenny hands you the ticket. You look down at it and nearly scream. You're fined $300,000 for speeding!
"Erm....I don't have any money" you say. "I can't pay for this ticket"
"Well...in that case, I'm placing you under ar...." Jenny's sentence is cut short when your stomach starts to inflate at an incredible rate. Within moments, your stomach is filling the aisle you're in! Jenny manages to get away before she's caught in your ever-expanding stomach.
"What kind of pills did you take?!" asks the cashier, who comes over when he hears what's happening.
"Looks like weight gain pills" said Jenny.
"We just got those pills this very morning" said the cashier. "we got two kinds of weight gain pills; something called 'Planetary Pills' and 'Weight Gain 6000'"
"I...didn't notice what pills I took.." you admit. By this time, your stomach fills about half the store!
"This could be bad..." said the cashier.
124121112211112122111122211211.title: Weight Gain Pills = Fatter You

choices: You wake up in a cot in a weird sort of jail for toon characters... go figure
You shrink back down to size!
1241211122111121221111222112111.content:
Jenny, meanwhile, is furiously writing up infractions on various slips of paper. Your ticket collection is growing almost as fast as your gut, "Theft of merchandise... $523," she scrawls on a green paper, "Contempt of law... $73," on a red... "Illegal drug use..."

"Hey! I didn't do that!" you cry waddling towards Jenny, your legs surprisingly held up your now Volkswagon sized belly very well despite the fact that it was now skimming the tiled floor. You have to be in the 700 pound range, and on the way up! Your widening dimensions bumped against a shelf and it came clattering to the ground, random boxes scattering all over the place.

"... you took the drugs illegally, so that qualifies in my book," she rattled off, scribbling away on a purple piece of paper, "Property damage... to be determined. Certainly adding up, huh?"

"But I already told you I can't pay!" you protest, waving your fat arms in the air. You feel your shirt riding up on your backside, exposing part of your rear.

"Oh, you're still under arrest, make no mistake. I just like doing this," Jenny smiles.

You try to waddle closer to her, and you actually can because your bionic legs can easily hold up 900 somewhat pounds of flab... and you now knock down the two outer aisle that you missed. They crash loudly and the cashier is practically in tears, "My store!"

"Don't worry," Jenny smiles, "This fatso's not going anywhere."

You feel heavier and heavier as you try to reach Jenny, hopefully so you can maybe knock her aside just by brushing by with your huge girth, but it's getting to be too much, even for your bionic legs. You fall softly, backwards, onto your wideload rear... and keep growing... bigger and bigger... you can no longer move your legs under more than half a ton of blubber... your pants have given up the ghost and now your shirt is tearing to shreds. Jenny smiles at your predicament, holding back a laugh, knowing she's won. She kindly escorts the cashier out of the shop, which is now falling apart as it fills up with you.

Your rolls of flab pushes merchandise aside and accumulates and soon you're growing closer and closer to the ceiling. The air starts getting hot, and when you block out the windows, it gets dark... the pressure builds and you hear a rumbling like a soft drumroll, accelerating... Are you going to burst the store open? Can you even survive that? You close your eyes and suddenly...
1241211122111121221111222112111.title: Written Up, Blowing Up

choices: You aren't alone in the cell
12412111221111212211112221121111.content:
You black out. You probably got knocked out by your head ramming into the ceiling of the store, but you have no memory of how you blacked out. All you know is that you were getting fatter and fatter with each passing second. You couldn't have gotten bigger than the store could you? Or even the mall for that matter?
When you wake up, you find yourself in some sort of jail cell. The cell is probably 20" x 20" x 20" x 20"....big enough to house at least 6 other people besides you. You wake up on a cot that's a little bit bigger than you are. That's when you notice something odd: You're in your own body that you started with! You haven't got bionic legs or other bionic body parts at all. You look around as you hear some chuckling. The chuckling is coming from....your eyes go wide at this..Urd, from the anime Ah! My Goddess! Urd is wearing a police uniform that shows off her curvy body. You drool at the sight of her.
"That was some curse you were under" said Urd.
"I was cursed?" you ask.
"Yep" said Urd. "Haven't you figured it out yet? Well, I leave you to figure out what the curse was by yourself. Now, I'm late for Thor's wild parties" And with that, Urd vanishes!
You get up from the cot and headed for the door of the cell..it looks to be unlocked.
"Hold it, Sonny Jim!" barks a voice.
You look around, trying to find the source of the voice. It turns out that the voice is coming from the padlock on the cell door! As you look closer, you can plainly see that the padlock has a face on it!
"Who're you?" you ask. "and where am I?"
"I'm Jason Locke" saids the toon padlock, "and you're in Springfield Jail"
