"QUIET DOWN THERE!" snaps a voice from the opposite side of the hallway. You look to see that it was Sideshow Bob who spoke. Bob returns to the book he was reading: The Joy of Cooking Bart Simpson.
"How did I end up here?" you ask Jason.
"You were dragged here by Jenny" said Jason. "and then, the Goddess Urd came and cured you of that curse you had. Shel'ldeon was always a weird one.."
"Who's Shel'ldeon?" you ask. "and what curse was I under?"
"Shel'ldeon's curse" said Jason. "made you wake up in another person's body every time you went to sleep. You likely got the curse from sleeping in Shel'ldeon's stolen bed"
"Well...I did found a bed" you say. "It was in the intestine of Lola Bunny"
"Indeed?" asked Jason, then he burst out laughing. "Shel'ldeon will never find it then!"
"Uh....would you mind letting me go?" you ask.



(Note: To clear up any confusion, you're still a toon)
"Can't do that" said Jason. "Jenny told me to keep you in here until she returns"
12412111221111212211112221121111.title: The Talking Padlock

124121112211112122111122211211111.content:
You hear a sharp creaking from above- the cot you shook yourself awake in is apparently a bunk, "Can someone shut him up..." an irritated male voice snaps, "--just when I thought I could get that damn lock quiet I get another new inmate-"

Suddenly, there comes a thud and a tall, slim but muscled figure bounds from the top of the bunk to the ground. Long cascades of indigo hair descend past his shoulders. His arms are adorned with sleek Arabic looking tattoos. He rises to his feet to glare at you with sharp anime looking eyes, "Phh... figures," he dismisses you after looking you over.

You blink down at your own body and notice you're just an animated cartoony version of yourself. Average build, nothing to write home about. Not tough looking in the least. You're wearing the typical orange jumpsuit, whereas this guy somehow managed to get a gray tanktop and camaflouge pant.

"Just un-frickin'-believable," he shouts, walking back up to his bed.

"Aww... poor Jeor'zel," Jazon Locke mocked in a pitful tone, "Such a harsh, sharp fall from being Lady Cassandra's own lover-"

"I said shut it, Locke!" the indigo haired Jeor'zel roared, lunging to the padlock with clenched fists, "Not one word- I swear, if Cassandra hadn't turned you into a hunk of metal and me into this... this animated waif... I would have torn your throat out thirty times over!"

Jason Locke whistled, "Strong words, but I'm metal, you're flesh, and what bangs on me-"

"SHUT IT!"

"-torn your knuckles out AT LEAST thirty times-"

"SHUT IT!" he explodes, eyes look ready to kill. He glares at the lock with pure hatred and expels a stream of lock-related expletives.

You now notice the scars around his fists... he must have been in there longer than you thought. Jeor'zel scowls and resignedly climbs the ladder to his bunk again and picks up the squeaky rubber Cassandra Chronicles, the only literature to find in this entire cell, aside from the newspaper.

Well, that was an interesting bit of dialogue... you certainly didn't know that about Cassandra. At least she spared at least ONE person she lost interest with to a somewhat menial fate. He starts muttering to himself in a tone that makes you fear for your life... if truth be told, you are the only 'fleshy' person in the cell... and there HAS to be a reason why there was vacancies in this cell.

On the bright side, maybe going to bed will make this all better... well, knowing your luck, at least temporarily better.

You turn in your bed and...
124121112211112122111122211211111.title: Tough inmate

1241211122111121221111222112111111.content:
You fall asleep almost at once. You considered reading the other copies of the "Cassandra Chronicles" there were in the cell with you and Jeor'zel...but there were only two other Cassandra Chronicles in the cell; "Cassandra Chronicles # 45: Dre'asianz, my first love" and "# 7: What REALLY happened in the Garden of Eden". You figure if you would read those books, you would like to start with the first book. Jeor'zel was reading Number 10: "Hitchhiker's Guide to Hell". You glanced at the ratty old newspaper before going to sleep. The headline read: "DRE'ASIANZ SPOTTED!" But you were too tired to read more. That's when you fell into a deep sleep.


You find yourself near a fountain. The fountain is perhaps 30 feet round, and has a stone statue at the center of it. The statue was that of a beautiful woman. The woman was clearly not human, judging by the huge bat-like wings on her back and her other demonic features. Water was flowing out of the statue's open mouth. You look around and see that you're in the center of what looks like a ruined town. The town looks to be deserted. Ivy and moss are growing from the buildings and from the cobblestone road. This place looks to be "real"...as in, not a cartoon. You look down at your own body and gasp to see that you're back to your normal self! You aren't a cartoon anymore! But...how did you get here? And where is this place?
"The town's name is unpronouncable to humans" said a male voice. You look around to see that an average-sized man is standing beside you. The man looks human, but there's a hint of evil in the depths of his sky-blue eyes. His hair is light purple, and he looks to be as stong as Jeor'zel. At the man's feet, there stood a black cat.
"Who're you?" you ask.
"Call me Drez" said the man. "I don't remember my true name. If I did, I wouldn't be stuck here. And he's forbidden to say my true name" he points at the cat.
"Where's here?" you ask. "I just fell asleep, and I found myself here"
"This city was once a city of demons" said Drez. "Sleepers tend to come here sometimes...nobody knows why"
"City of demons?"
"Yep" said Drez, who smiles and reveals fangs in his mouth! "The city's name was Tera Jeera....that's not it's true name, but its close enough for you humans to pronounce it"
"And why are you stuck here?" you ask.
"That doesn't concern you" said the cat. It has a male voice, but its oddly high-pitched.
"And why..?"
"You talk too much" said Drez. "I don't know why you're here. I didn't summon you here, that's for sure"
"I summoned him here" said a female voice. You look around to see Urd standing there!
"The Goddess Urd" said Drez. "what do we owe this honor?"
"The Nameless One" said Urd, talking to Drez. "the one demon who can't remember his own name. I summoned the mortal here because he holds the key to your freedom"
Drez bursts out laughing. "How could a lowly human set me free?"
"I don't know" said Urd. "the Big Boss Lady won't tell me...but she did told me that this mortal will set you free"
"Big Boss Lady...??" asks the cat. "why does she care about a demon like Drez?"
"Look, I don't know" said Urd. "She doesn't tell me everything....you two figure it out" With that, Urd is gone.
"Let's see where you're at" said Drez, who grabs your hand. In a flash, you see images of the cell you fallen asleep in.

"Jeor'zel...?" asked Drez, letting go of your hand. Then, he laughs. "how the mighty have fallen. Cassandra must've been really pissed at him"
Before you ask what he means, you find yourself waking up. The scence slowly starts to disappear.
"I guess I'll see you again" said Drez. "if you truly hold the key to my freedom, I'm sure we'll meet again"

"Why did...?"

"Hey, you're the one that wanted to duel!"

"Nevermind that now..." said Draco. "do something!"

That's when your stomach starts to growl.
1241211122111121221111222112111111222112.title: Ginger Draco

choices: You're now one of the Power Rangers?
You're in Outlaw Star with a purple haired Jim as your accomplice
1241211122111121221111222112111111222112.content:
The gingerbread-ifying Draco notices your stomach growling. He throws his stiff arm clutching the candycane out at you, crying "Expelliaum!"

Your hunger instantly dissipates and is replaced by a growing strange sensation. Looking down, you notice your fingertips are getting tan and warm and smell like gingerbread. Cursing under your breath, you spin towards him, "What was that for?"

"That's so you don't go eat me while I'm not looking. Now you HAVE to help find a way out of this universe," he smirks arrogantly.

You pause, "Doesn't that just mean going to sleep?"

The Jeor'zel Draco chokes some, "... Well, yeah, but you probably won't gobble me up this way."

You shake your head, "This magic duel was SUCH a draw. And a disappointment."

"Whatever," he scowls, "Just lay down and get to sleep."

The two of you cookie wizards lay down, trying to sleep yourself away to another crazy world when you hear something loud thump in the long hallway behind you. Another louder boom sounds, closer this time. You try to get up, but have a hard time because you're turning into a gingerbread cookie.

"What's that?" You mutter. To your horror, Draco's either asleep or fully a cookie and is unable to respond.

Another sound crashes dangerously close to you, right by a torch. You see the giant wide shape illuminated in front of you; it's Hermione! She's at least 2,000 pounds but somehow mobile. Her butt almost spans the width of the giant hallway, her massive belly jiggles and bobs to the floor, a big round sphere ripping through her now tiny robes.

"Gingerbread? Honestly, who would make gingerbread at a time like this?"

You turn cold and try to close your eyes and sleep yourself away... when you wake up...
1241211122111121221111222112111111222112.title: How the cookie crumbles

choices: The  viewscreen comeson suddenly....to reveal you're in Aisha's hand!
1241211122111121221111222112111111222112.content:
You wake up on a bed. You blink several times and get to a sitting position on the bed. You wipe away the red hair that's blocking your view. You got out of the bed and see that you're non other than Gene Starwind of Outlaw Star! You're wearing nothing but underwear and you quickly get dressed before hearing a knock at the door. Not waiting for an answer, the door opens and in steps a purple-haired Jim Hawking. Exactly why does Jeor'zel keep his hair after going to another dimension? Jim looks up at you and sighs heavily.

"What?" you ask. "it's not my fault you got cursed along with me"

"Yeah, yeah" said Jim. "well, let's see what's happening here"

The two of you walk to the bridge of the Outlaw Star to find it empty and powered down. The only light comes from the dashboard which is emitting a faint glow. You head over to the pilot's seat and see that the glowing is coming from a screen that seems to be the ship's log. Shrugging, you and Jim decide to listen to the last ship's log.
The last log was filed just 24 hours earlier. It seemed that the Outlaw Star had wandered into an unexplored region of outer space. When the Outlaw Star had entered this unknown region of space, all of the women of the Outlaw Star vanished without a trace (Melfina, Aisha and Suzuka), leaving only Jim and Gene behind. Gilliam was shut down by an unknown force and he has been offline for at least 32 hours. The screen to the outside no longer works either, and neither does the airlock. There's no telling what's outside of the ship.
"We picked one hell of a time to drop in, then" said Jim.
Suddenly, the whole ship rocked back and forth violently.
"Now what?" you ask. "did we hit something?"
"No way to tell" said Jim, working at his station. "I can't get anything to work at all....give me a few moments here...."
The ship rocked back and forth again....gentler it seemed this time.
"We have partial sensors now" said Jim.
You read what the senors say and you blink.
"What is it?" asks Jim.
"Well..." you say slowly. "it seems that we were just hit by a soccerball"
"A soccerball?" asked Jim. "you must be joking!"
"Are the senors working right?" you ask.
"It doesn't seem so" said Jim. "there's malfuctions everywhere. Maybe we're better off going to sleep again"
You're about to answer, when the ship is rocked violently again and you feel as if the ship is lifting up.
"We're going up" said Jim.
"Why do I have a bad feeling about this?" you mutter.
1241211122111121221111222112111111222112.title: An Outlaw Mystery

choices: You're in Jenny's stomach for a month
You're in Jenny's stomach for 3 to 5 years!
12412111221111212211112221121112.content:
You start to feel yourself shrink down a bit, which makes you open your eyes. Indeed, you're shrinking back down to size...but what then? Jenny has placed you under arrest, which means that you're going to jail for who knows how long? As you continue to shrink down, you see Jenny and the cashier watching from just outside the store. Jenny has a smirk on her face, and the cashier looks to be mad. Your rolls of flab are shrinking down back to normal. In under 15 minutes, you're back down to your regular size and weight. The store is in ruins. All kinds of pills and pieces of wall are scattered on the floor.

"I told you those pills were experimental" said the cashier.

"You did?" you ask, not remembering if the cashier told you that.

"Okay.." said Jenny. "You just caused around $2,200 worth of damage...in all, you owe $4,000!"

"But..I have no money!" you say.

"Should've thought of that before you broke the law" said Jenny.

"So...I'm going to jail?" you ask.

"Yep" said Jenny, rubbing her stomach. "and guess what? My stomach IS the jail!"

"What?!" you say. "you're gonna eat me?"

"Yes" said Jenny, smiling.

"But...I'm too young to die" you plead.

"Who says you're gonna die?" asked Jenny. "I should read you your rights...ahem....you have the right to digest...anything you say or do will have no effect on my stomach"

Before you can ask what she meant, Jenny grabs you with her fattened hands and lifts you off the floor and into her mouth! Jenny gulps you down. You go down her long and slimy throat until you're forced through a ring of muscle and you end up in a huge chamber that can only be her stomach. You land with a squishy sound and wait to be digested in a matter of seconds. After a minute, you realize you're not digesting. That's when you realize there's someone standing right behind you. You turn around to see Ash in a suit.

"Hello there" said Ash. "I'm Ash Ketchum, warden of the Stomach Jail...and how long will you stay in here with us?"

The stomach of Jenny is far more bigger than the outside. You ask Ash how can that be so.

"Cartoon and anime characters have hammerspace in thier stomachs usually" said Ash.

"Uh, hammerspace?" you ask.

"So...you're the new guy?" asked a sweet female voice from behind Ash. Ash steps aside to reveal that Delia Ketchum--his mother--is standing there. "hmmm...you look like a human that has walked into some trouble, eh? You should've gone to Cassandra's house, you know"

"How do you know all that?" you ask.

Delia tweaks her nose in reponse and smiles warmly.

"Anyway" said Ash. "how long will you be staying with us?"

"I dunno..." you say. "Jenny didn't say"
12412111221111212211112221121112.title: Stomach Jail

choices: A shadow falls over the neighborhood...here comes Garfield!
124121112211112122111122211212.content:
You feel sleepy after you take the pill you've just took and look at the bottle. The bottle of pills were sleeping pills! Oh...just what you need! You're probably gonna end up in someone else's body now and end up somewhere else. In a way, this is exactly what you need to get away from Jenny. As your eyes get heavy with sleep, you see Jenny waddle toward the back of the store...to check out the security tapes, no doubt. You settle on the soft floor and slip off to sleep.





Hours later (or what feels like hours), you awake to find yourself in a soft bed in an ordinary bedroom. Sunlight pours into the room via the windows that's in the room. You look around, but the room doesn't give you a clue about what house you're in. The room does look like it belongs to a man, judging by the messy floor and the faint odor of feces. The bed is a four-poster bed and quite soft. You get out of the bed and turn to face the only mirror in the room. You see none other than Jon Arbuckle looking back at you. You just woke up in the house of Garfield and Odie. You look at the clock on the bedside table: 7:20 AM. You look around the room, but there's no sign of Garfield anywhere...or Odie. You decide to get out of the room and get a bite to eat since it's been a while since you've eaten. Of course, there's not a scrap of food in the entire house...no doubt, Garfield has gotten all of the food. You sigh and get the morning newspaper. The lack of Garfield and Odie is a bit odd, but perhaps the two are off on an adventure. You get the morning newspaper and see the headline that catches your eye:


CITIZENS FLEE IN TERROR


You quickly read the story.


"Citizens of our fair city were rudely awakened at 4:35 in the morning when what seemed to be an earthquake happened. It didn't take long for the incredible news to be heard; the earthquake was in fact caused by a giganticly fat cat! Yes, a cat caused the 6.7 Earthquake early this morning. The cat in question is about the size of a football stadium, and seems to like lasanga and other Itilian food. As the food runs low, citizens flee in terror, fearing they might get eaten by this fat cat. Nobody knows who owns the cat, or how the cat got so big"


"Wha....?!" you ask. Why couldn't you woken up somewhere else?!
124121112211112122111122211212.title: Morning paper

choices: She turns out to be Cassandra
1241211122111121222.content:
The Terror Toad launched his tongue forward and grabbed Sora. Donald and Goofy tried to fire atacks at him, but the toad's gut expanded and they ricocheted back at them.
You meanwhile just try to stay out of the way.

After knocking out the other two, the Toad swallowed Sora whole "Yum, yum *burp*".

"Come here you tasty morsels" he appraoched Donald and Goofy.
Suddenly, a noise was heard from deeper in the maze. Hissing, and it was getting louder.
Everyone looked intently. Well mostly everyone, you just peek through your fingers.
Finally to everyone's horror, a Giant Snake Appears !
It quickly slithers forward, and you shut your eyes tight. You here loud screaming and gulps, but none involve you.

You open your eyes, and see a writing bulge within the snake. After seeing that the Terror Toad is gone, you put two and two together. You figure, "This snake can't be all bad".
Then, the snake transforms. Her shape becomes more human. Unfortunately her true form brings you more horror.
She's actually Lady Serpentina !! From Power Rangers Mystic Force.
(Long story short, she looks like a human snake, but in a very sexy way, and her scales are dark blue. She changes into a giant snake to eat her enemies).

"Mmm, you look yummy" she says to you. She creepily, and yet seductively, licks her fingers.
"Uh guys, a little help ?" you ask. However, you soon notice that you are all alone. That's when you see just how big her belly is ! Even worse, it doesn't seem to be weighing her down at all !
The again, she did still have her legs in giant snake form.
Serpentina just does that snake, tongue, thing.
1241211122111121222.title: Lady Serpentina

choices: Swallowed alive sounds a LOT better than being ripped to shreds!
12412111221111212222.content:
Suddenly, the snake-woman in front of you changes into the mirror image of Morrigan from the Darkstalkers games. She has blue hair and silver eyes and is quite lovely to look at...until you notice the demonic features on her body; Hoofs, wings and claws. Despite her demonic look, the woman looks totally HOT. She's wearing skin-tight clothing that shows off her curves. She still has a pot belly from eating three people and a toad. She smiles at you as she licks you again.

"MMMM...you do taste delicious" said the woman. "allow me to introduce myself, mortal. I am Cassandra Von Fel Lyaniak, a visitor to this dimension much like you are. I see that you entered the enchanted forest around my house...it was I who opened the portal to this world. I also see that you're enjoying yourself in the bowels of this bunny girl"

Cassandra looks just so lovely that you can't help but stare at her. However, you manage to ask. "What about Sora and the others?"

"Sora and his friends are quite safe" said Cassandra, patting her potbelly. "they've been swallowed before, ya know...by that overgrown fish, Monstro. My stomach is much more safe than Monstro's stomach...well, there's no Heartless in my stomach at least" here, she lets out a giggle. "would you care to join 'em perhaps? I'm still hungry"

"Why does everyone I bump into wants to eat me?" you ask.

"Because you taste yummy" said Cassandra.

"Well, I just want to find my way out of here" you say, gesturing to the intestial walls around you.

"Just head that way for 5 miles" said Cassandra, pointing.

"Five miles?!" you ask.

"Lola is proud of her "endless intestinal labyrinth" as she calls it" said Cassandra. "nobody has ever found thier way out. Now, there's a faster way to get out of here"

"Really?" you ask. "how?"

"Let me eat you" said Cassandra. "I won't digest you, I promise. I like having people in my belly...I just love the way they squirm around"

"I'll just walk, thank you" you say.

"Alright" said Cassandra. "but there are other monsters down there that'll eat you. A werewolf lives just two miles away from here...and he makes a habit of ripping his meals to shreds. With me, you'll just end up in my tummy safe and sound"
12412111221111212222.title: Cassandra

choices: Help ? You are on your own
124121112211112122221.content:
"I'll take my chances, I can take care of myself you know" you try to sound indipendent.
"Very well then, Steven is it ?" Cassandra asked. "Yes" you answer, perplexed on how she knows your name. "Hopefully I'll see you on the other side" she said. Then, in the blink of an eye, she is gone.

You now have started your five mile walk through the 'large' intestine of Lola.
"I don't need Cassandra's protection" you think. I can handle this maze, even if it constantly changing. Then there's the closing drakness, the claustrphobic feel, not to mention a man eating werewolf waiting for you.

WHAT THE HELL WERE YOU THINKING!!!!!!

You start to panic.
Then, you freeze when you hear a noise behind. Slowly and regretfully turning your head, you see the wolf.
He looks like Jon Talbain form Dark Stalkers.
"Ah, another foolish individual" he spoke. Drool begins to drip from his mouth. You try to back away.
"Don't be an idiot, I can catch you easily" he licked his chops.
124121112211112122221.title: Big Bad Wolf

choices: Until then, go back outside, and see who will be dessert
1241211122111121222211.content:
Just when it seemed like you were about to be torn to shreds, something more extrordinary occurs.
Three short figures emerged from the way you came. They stood in front of the werewolf.

"Get out of my way" he ordered. "Now you have to ask yourself, 'Do I feel lucky ?' Do ya, punk ?" one of them did a Clint Eastwood impression.
The wolf was just confused, and a little insulted by this mockery. "Do you know who I am ?!" he yelled. "No, do you know I am ?" the smallest figure asked. "No" he answered. Finally that very individual came into the light, but only because she began to grow.
"I am, Princess Angelina Contessa Louisa Franchesca Bananna Fanna Bobesca ! The Third !" the twenty foot tall toon then ate the wolf with her big mouth.
"It's a toon thing" she said to the camera.

She shrunk back to normal size, during which her stomach expanded greatly. She burped, and one of her siblings said "Nice one".
They then turned towards you.
You by now were suffering from a fandom overload, since you knew who these very famous toons were. "Wow, you you and you, this is, I mean, I can't even, I I....." you faint.
"I'm guessing he's a fan" the oldest said.
The middle child then went to your ear, and released one of his trademark belches.

"I'm up ! I'm up !" you awaken to the slight defening.
"Wow this is just awesome, look, I already know who you are, but could you introduce yourselves" you request.
"What do you say sibs ?" the oldest asks. They nod.

"Were the Warner Brothers" said the first two. "And the Warner Sister" the cute fat one added.
"I'm Yakko," he said. "I'm Wakko," he said.
Dot then jumps into your arms "and I'm that really long name I just said, but you can call me Dot, oh and FYI, if you stay on my good side, you won't be on my fat side *burp*". You then collapse under her weight.

After getting back up, "Wow, this is such an honor and....". You stop and notice something rather strange about your hand.
It has a penciled outline !
"How 2-D" Yakko said pointing with his thumb. "What ? What's happening to me ?!" you panic, yet again. "Ain't it obvious, you've been in this dimension for so long, that now you're turning into a toon, duh" Yakko explained. "But I don't want to be a toon!" you say.
"Why not, now you can do this" Yakko made his arms long and rubbery, and tickled you.
"Or this" Wakko started juggling his own head.
Dot turned into a gaint again "Or this" before going back to normal.

"Heck, being a toon can probably get you outta here" Yakko pointed out.
"Really ?" you like the sound of that. "Sure, just reach in your pockets" Dot suggested.
Taking there advice, you start digging.
You pull out, a Stop Sign, a rubber chicken, Elvis, Waldo, a tire, a mallet........
"This is going to take a while" they in unison to the audience.
1241211122111121222211.title: Warner Bros.

12412111221111212222111.content:
The camera than pulls away from the Warner Brothers (and fat sister) and you as you search your pockets and pull out a rather large whoopie cushion. The camera keeps pulling back, revealing the whole intestinal labyrinth, the stomach, and the outside of Lola. The camera shifts to Lola, who says "Can we get back to me please?"


"Ahem" said Lola. "It's five minutes until the end of class. To determine who'll be dessert for today, we'll play musical chairs. The winner gets to be dessert. I know, it's not as impressive as a test, but work with me here! I will also take part of the game...so I might even be the dessert of today!"


And so, the game started. All of the students in the room started to circle chairs. The music was supplied by a radio in the corner (which looked like the radio from "The Brave Little Toaster").




Meanwhile, you keep pulling out stuff from your deep pockets. You pull out a pokeball, followed by Ash Ketchum, a rather large fanny outfit (to make your butt look bigger), a stick of TNT, The Mario Brothers. Yakko, Wakko and Princess..err..Dot started to play poker in the background, complete with visors.

The game of musical chairs was down to 5 people; Lola, Babs, Buster, Dizzy, and Shirley the Loon. There was only three minutes left in the class...who would be the winner and be the dessert of the day?
12412111221111212222111.title: Meanwhile, back in the room...

124121112211112122221112.content:
The game went on for a few more tries. Only Lola and Shirley the Loon were left. With one chair remaining, they were both on their toes.
The music stopped, and the two contestansts rushed forward.
In the end, the butt in the chair belonged to Shirley.
Everyone cheered, along with herself. At least until Babs came over, licking her lips. "Mondo dragdola" Shirley said realizing.
Babs stuffed the psychic duck in her mouth and swallowed. Then she burped up some feathers.

Back in Lola's intestines, yoy finally got lucky. You pull out the very item you needed. A cartoon hole.
"I did it!" you announce. By now, Yakko was playing thumb wars by himself, Wakko was picking out his toe jam, and Dot was sleeping off her big meal.
"What ?" they asked looking back.
"Come on guys, were getting out of here" you say. You toss the hole forward and it hangs in mid-air. Being more of a toon now, you jump in first. The Warner brothers soon follow. Dot however gets stuck and has to be pulled in.

The bell rang. "Great job today class, see ya later" Lola said. The class was dismissed. Buster walked while rubbing Bab's belly.
Once all the students had left, Lola suddenly felt a large pressure build up in her rear. "Uh oh" she said before rushing to the nearest restroom.
124121112211112122221112.title: Getting out

choices: Go over and drink some (or all) Jumbo Gro.
Be covered in BBQ scauce and eaten by a random cartoon character
1241211122111121222211121.content:
Lola rushed to the nearest bathroom, which was at the end of the hallway. The pressure from her rear got greater and greater. Someone must've found thier way out of my intestine, Lola thought...or a great big log was ready to come out. She entered the bathroom, pushed aside a student with her girth, and entered a stall that could support a fat person like Lola. It took a few minutes for Lola to push you and the Warner Bros. and sister out of her rear. You emerge from Lola's backside feet first and you're squeezed out...Dot needed some help getting out due to her large belly. When all was said and done, the four of you grin at the shocked expression on Lola's face.

"You got out?" asked Lola. "well, that's amazing. Some people just stay in my stomach and enjoy the TV. You're the first ones to make it out of my intestinal labyrinth"

You feel proud, along with Yakko, Wakko and Dot.

"I don't suppose you want to be eaten by me again" said Lola.

"Maybe later" you say, stashing the portable hole back in your pocket. Once you found the portable hole, you stuffed all the people/objects that came out of your pocket.

"Get a breath mint first" said Wakko.

"You get a breath mint, Wakko" said Dot. "for your butt"

All of you exit the ladies' bathroom and go to the cafeteria (since it was lunchtime). When you enter the cafeteria, you discover that it's common place for students to eat each other (or try to serve one another to a dinning teacher). You find yourself hungry, and you're looking forward to stuffing your gut with several cartoon characters...or anything, really.
All kinds of cartoon characters are in the cafeteria now; There's Jerry from the Tom and Jerry cartoons with a huge gut; There's Templeton from Charlotte's Web feasting on who looked like Wilbur. One table only had anime characters at it: Mai Valentine from Yu-Gi-Oh, Tea Gardner, Joey Wheeler, Kagome, Souta and others. Lola went to a table marked "Teacher's Table; Approach at your own risk". At the teacher's table sat ten cartoon characters. These characters were;

Jessica Rabbit (wearing her trademark super tight outfit that seemed to hug her body)
Faye Valentine (from "Cowboy Bebop")
Dr. Scratch 'n Sniff
Minerva Mink
One of the hippos from "Fantasia" minus the tutu
Dr. Zoidberg (from "Futurama")
Seymour "Spanky" Skinner (from "The Simpsons")
Edna Krapable (also from "The Simpsons")
Hello Nurse
and
Jon Arbuckle (from "Garfield and Friends")


You are geeking out, seeing all those icons of Saturday Morning Cartoons. Before you can find a table to sit at (or decide what to eat), you're gabbed from behind by Plucky Duck. Plucky isn't alone; there's about ten other students with him.

"So, you're the new kid in school" said Plucky.
"Uh..yeah" you say. "my name's Steven"
"I heard you made it out of Lola" said Plucky. "that isn't easy, you know. Yakko told me all about it"
"Yeah" you say.
"Well, since you made it out of Lola.." said Plucky. "you should try your luck getting out of someone else's digestive system"
"I was thinking the other way round" you say. "I was going to stuff my gut"
"Then, go and drink Jumbo Gro" said one of the other students; a cartoon dragon that you don't recongize. The dragon is 15 feet tall, and pointing at a lonely bottle sitting at an empty table. The bottle is marked "Jumbo Gro; The miracle growth formula for plants. Also works on people. Warning: Don't drink the entire bottle in one gulp".
"Otherwise, we'll cover you in Bar-B-Que sauce and leave you in a classroom" said Plucky. "and see who enters the room first to eat you"
1241211122111121222211121.title: In The Cafeteria

choices: Princess Peach from Super Mario Bros.
12412111221111212222111212.content:
You ponder on the options. On one hand you're not in a big rush to go back inside of someone. On the other hand, you don't know much about this Jumbo Gro stuff. Then again.....

A timer goes off and Plucky says "Oh did I mention there's an eight second answer period ?". "What ?" you ask.
Next thing you know, Plucky, a plump Fifi La Fume, Dizzy Devil, and even Beast Boy from Teen Titans grabs you. No one pays much attention.
They toss you kicking and screaming in a room. Before you can reach the door, they douse you with a tub off BBQ sauce and lock it.
After wiping the seasoning out of your eyes, you realize you're out of luck.
All you can do now is wait.

"Maybe it won't be so bad" you think.
However, you still cringe when the door knob starts to twist.
The doors opens, and in steps.........
12412111221111212222111212.title: Teacher's treat

choices: Who's in the stomach with you?
You land on the stomach of Buster Bunny
124121112211112122221112121.content:
Wile E. Coyote enters the room. You blink. Didn't you see him in Lola's stomach? You don't recall seeing him in Lola's stomach at all....although, you did see the Road Runner in there. Ironic to hide from someone that wants to eat you inside a stomach..although, it would be a perfect hiding place for such people. At First, Wile E. doesn't even notice you. He seems to be talking to someone out in the hallway. In a few cartoons, Wile E. does speak with a upper-class voice, suggesting that he's smart..he even calls himself a "super genius"..but that claim turns out to be false as he fails to catch the Road Runner (or Bugs Bunny). Wile E. speaks in that upper-class voice to whoever he's talking to. To be honest, you really didn't care who entered the room and ate you. You survived in Lola's stomach, so that means that you can survive in anyone's stomach. Maybe it won't be so bad, you had thought earlier. 'I'm probably going to end up in a lot of stomachs' you muse to yourself.
Wile E. Coyote turns into the room, and closes the door behind him. He's not the rail-thin coyote you see in those old cartoons; he's sporting quite a big belly that reaches pass his knees and almost to the ground. He's holding a stack of papers in one arm. When he sees you, he just stares at you and takes a sniff at the air. The whole room is filling up with the smell of Bar-B-Que sauce, and Wile E. is looking at the source of that smell; you.
"Someone done me the honor of bringing my lunch to me" said Wile E.
"It was Plucky and.." you start to say.
"I know who it was" said Wile E. "Plucky and his band of friends do this all the time..trying to get on the good side of the teacher's"
"They didn't leave me with much choice" you say.
"They hardly do" said Wile E, licking his lips. "well, any last words before I send you down to my waiting stomach?"
Before you can think of anything to say, Wile E jumps on you with mouth wide open. In a few seconds, you're sliding down Wile E's throat and enter his cavernous stomach. Wile E. Burps.
124121112211112122221112121.title: Super Genius

1241211122111121222211121211.content:
To possible meetings.
(Leave it to me)
1241211122111121222211121211.title: Option time

12412111221111212222111212111.content:
You plunge down into Wile's large belly. The landing is pretty soft and squishy.
As you look around, you see that the coyote's gut is also bigger on the inside, though nowhere near as big as Lola's.
Then, the current inhabitant of Wile's tummy spoke up.
"Hello there" came a woman's voice. You turn around, and see Princess Peach from the Super Mario Bros. video games.
"Wait, why is she here ? I thought this place only had TV cartoon stars" you think. Then remember that starting back in 1989, 'The Super Mario Brothers Super Show" was on television, and later other Mario series as well.
"Your highness" you bow to be polite. After rising, you ask her "How did you wind up in here ?". "I was supposed to be here to talk about building a similar school like this for video game characters, but I was captured, again" she explained. "At least it wasn't by Bowser" you say. "True" she sees your point.
"Anyway, I shouldn't worry, it's kinda nice in here, plus Mario will probably be here soon" Peach reassured.
Unfortunately, you soon remember something. You reach into your cartoony pockets, and pull out the Mario Brothers. "Hiya Peach" Mario says.
12412111221111212222111212111.title: Princess Peach

124121112211112122221112121112.content:
Meanwhile, on the outside....



Wile E. Coyote, that super genius that he is, waited patiently for his next class to show up. It was time for the afternoon classes to begin, and Wile had a very special thing to teach his next class. There was no evidence that anybody was inside his stomach. When everybody was in thier seats, Wile did the role call...and then, he went onto the lesson.


"Today, we'll be learning about Hammerspace" said Wile. "now, who can tell me just what is 'Hammerspace'? "

"It's the space that you put your hammer?" suggested Bart.

"Why, yes" said Wile. "that's not the full defination, of course, but I'll let it slide. Okay, now listen up....Hammerspace is a space where you can put any large item into a place that looks to be too small for it. As an example, I want each of you to reach into your pockets and pull out something"

The class did just that. Bart Simpson managed to pull out the Titanic from his pocket; Izzy from digimon pulled out a WWII Tank, while Tai pulled out a modern tank from his pocket. Tails had pulled out a large bowling ball from his pockets.

"Very good" said Wile. "Hammerspaces can be found anywhere; even in your bodies! Many stomachs of Toons have Hammerspaces in them. A Hammerspace can be any size; it can be as small as an insect, or it can be as big as the universe itself! In fact, there is a serious theory that a Hammerspace is, in fact, a gateway to another dimension! But this theory can't be proved or disproved. If you reach into your pockets deep enough, you'll probably vanish into your own pocket...and simply pop out of existence..and into another dimension"

"COOL!" said Bart. "see ya, guys!" And, Bart reached deeply into his pocket until his whole body ended up in his own pocket and popped right out of existence.

You make your way towards the candy castle in the distance. While walking there, you nibble at the chocolate grass under your feet and lick at the candy cane trees. As you get nearer to the castle, you're able to see several people around it. As you get even closer, you see the people at the castle are actually 20 foot tall gingerbread men! They must be the guardians of the castle. There's about 10 of these guardians all around the castle.
"Eating that castle will be no minor feat" saids a voice to the side. You turn towards the source of the voice and you see a total of 10 people standing in a thicket of trees. All of these people are cartoon characters from various cartoons; Sonic the Hedgehog, Darkwing Duck, Babs Bunny, Buster Bunny, Gene Starwind, Jim Hawking, Kiyone from Tenchi Muyo, Ash Ketchum, Misty and May. "The gingerbread guards are armed with real spears that are 25 feet tall" said Jim. "Too bad the spears aren't made of chocolate"
"They probably figured someone would try to eat the castle" said Gene.
"If only we could grow a little" said Sonic. "that would help a bit"
"I got just the thing" said Kiyone. She pulled out a series of bottles from her uniform. "These pills are inventions of Washu's....There's 5 kinds of pills; Growth Pills, Booty Pills, Shrink Pills, Weight gain pills and something labeled "Cosmic Pills" errmm....doesn't say what the 'cosmic pills' do on the bottle"

You all turn to look at the newcomer.

1241221.content:
You all turn to stare at the newcomer. "Of..Officer Jenny?" you gasp in complete bewilderment.

This wasn't the Officer Jenny you remembered from Pokemon. She was so much... bigger, by about seven hundred pounds to say the very least! She now sported an enormous gut sticking out five feet in front of her, a mound of flab that jiggled and bounced with her every movement. All of her soft, round tummy was freely exposed draping down to her pudgy legs at the bottom and showing off her deep navel in the middle. Her upper body and well-endowed breasts were crammed into a tight blue police uniform as her bottom was crammed into a now tiny police skirt. Even her gloves were tight on chubby fingers.

"Yes! Officer Jenny," May smiled, "She can definitely help us out; she's almost legendary in this world for leading attacks on candy fortresses, even storming them singlehandedly some times."

The blue haired Jenny tipped her cap and began to pace.. or waddle, "Well, it seems that these are our enemies," she pointed a plump gloved finger at one of the gingerbread men, "They're what are going to help you take out the gingerbread soldiers easily. And just so they don't call their buddies for reinforcements," she smiled, "I'm going to cause a little distraction... you, you, and you two," she said calling out Darkwing, Sonic, and Babs and Buster Bunny, "You're going to help me destroy the north wall downstream, currently unguarded. We're going to make such a mess down there, they'll have no choice but to give it their all."

Jenny held up a wide gun, "That's when I'll send the flares and the rest of you get to make a full-frontal assault on the castle. Gobble it all, munch away, do whatever it takes, whatever you want to turn that stronghold into a sweet morsel for your stomachs."

Jim licked his lips in anticipation.

"The gingerbread guards might get smart and keep the ten they have here, which is okay. It seems the pills you have here will be your heavy artillery against them. That will set the favors on our side, okay?" she grinned, "But just to be safe, let's divide the rest of you up into two teams so you won't have to go against them all. We'll definitely win that way. So choose up wisely," she said, waddling off. She was rubbing her hands together, ready to tear down the wall.

You saw that the two teams had formed, each with their own boxes of pills: Gene and Jim along with Kiyone, and the other team was Ash, Misty, and May.

You decided to group with...

choices: Stay and wait to be noticed.
125.content:
It sure as hell wasnt pure coincidence that the signpost to Path 5 is shredded up... usually, this would be a sign of a bad omen... a VERY bad omen. At the worst, it could be the path to Hell... Cassandra IS the grandaughter of Lucifer aka Satan!

BUUUTTTT, sometimes youre just too curious for your own good. You decide to take the path of the destroyed signpost. The road seems safe enough.
It leads down a clear straight path... so far so good.

However, it's not too long before the path finally ends. It ends at another signpost... unlike the last one, it's in near-perfect condition! Not a scratch on it! Good as new!
Still, it's not necessarily a good sign. It's a BAD sign. You learn that as you read it out:

'If you can read this, youre allready screwed.
G'bye!
Love, Satan!'

"LOVE SATAN"?!! Is this some kind of sick joke?! Unfortunately, it's true... the ground below you quickly crumbles into dust, sending you falling down a deep dart pit!
'This path IS the path to Hell, isnt it?!' you think to yourself as you scream off the top of your lungs.
"AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH...."

***************

You ended up passing out before you reached the bottom... But it seems you've finally reached the end. Perhaps youve finally did it... you've reached Hell. Hmm... Hell doesnt seem so hot, and it feels a lot softer than you expected.
You finally open your eyes and realize youre in a huge white room, on top of an enormous white silk bed. It's super soft, but it's not uncomfortable.

You turn your head to see huge white curtains in front of an enormous window... next to it is a humongous red haired maid dusting the curtains. Ok, a giant maid. Fine. But why does this giant red-head have big cat ears? And a long tail sticking out the end of her dress?!

You shake your head, thinking youre imagining this stuff, when you turn your head again and see ANOTHER maid polishing a huge mirror on top of a dresser. This maid is even slightly taller than the cat-like maid... only this time, you see long white rabbit-ears sticking out of her long black hair and even a small puffy rabbit-tail sticking out the back of her dress!!
A giant cat-girl AND a bunny-girl?! You MUST be dreaming!

You even check out the elegant glass chandelier hanging from the ceiling and see a blonde maid humming to herself as she's wiping it clean. 'What's holding her up?' you wonder to yourself. Your answer: that nice long snake tail of hers that seems to stretch about a hundred feet long.. at least to someone her size!!! A naga!

Who the hell are these maids?! WHAT the hell are these maids?! And where exactly are you? You had a bad feeling about that destroyed signpost from earlier, but just where did it take you? This cant be Hell... Hell probably doesnt seem so... PLEASANT!

There are two ways to find out where you are: You can jump off that huge bed and explore the place, or stay where you are and hope of the maids spot you... preferably the bunny-girl, because you dont wanna be mistaken for a mouse by the other two!

The bed is a landscape to you....someone really big must sleep in it! And you don't really want to know who that giant person is! You slowly inch your way on the bed. The three maids took no notice of you and continued cleaning. What feels like ten minutes later, you come to the edge of the bed and look down. The floor of the room looks to be 40-50 feet below you. That fall would normally kill you, but you see a number of trampolines lining the edge of the bed on the floor. It seems like this bed was tailor-made for you to jump off of. You shrug and leap from the bed to one of the trampolines on the floor. You land on the trampoline and bounce back up even higher than the bed. You fall once again to the trampoline on the floor, but you don't bounce as high this time. It takes you 4 or 5 times bouncing on the trampoline for you to stop bouncing and climb off the trampoline in question. Once off the trampoline, you look around the room. The door to the room is about 300 feet (to your scale) away. The carpet of the room hides you from sight from the three maids, and you begin to walk towards the door.
"...As I have told you before, your father is away on business" comes a voice from behind the door! As you watch, the door opens and two people walk in. These two people are actually giants as well....and you can't help but stare at the pair. One of the pair is a giant horse dressed like a butler...and its walking on two legs! The other person who walked into the room is a giant fox. The two giant animals are walking on two legs and wearing clothes. The fox is wearing what a prince--or another Royal--would wear. Due to the fact that the fox is wearing a white satin dress, you gather that the fox is a female. Just where the hell are you anyway?!
"Forgot today just happens to be my 21st birthday, did he?" asks the fox, glancing around the room.
"As I recall, your father did bring you a birthday present" said the horse. "he found it just outside...in the flowerbed, no less"
"Indeed?" asked the fox.
"Yes" said the horse. The horse looked on the bed. "Hey...where did it go?"
You have a BAD feeling about this!
"Hey, did any of you maids steal my birthday present?" asked the fox to the room at large. The maids denied it.
The feet of the fox are only 10 feet away from you. You decide to make a run for it. You manage to get passed the huge foot of the fox and approach the open door, which leads into a hallway.

Cessa opens a small door within the big door and enters the room.
You are now in what looks like a throne room. The ceiling of the room is so high you can't even see it. The room is filled with guards--more naga even bigger than Cessa is! The throne itself is pure gold and sitting on it is the LARGEST naga of them all. The throne itself is large, but the naga sitting on it is truly immense. Lady Carmen is easily a 1000 feet tall and 2000 feet long. You stare in awe at Lady Carmen and she smiles down at you.
"Welcome to my domain" said Lady Carmen.
1252.title: Under New Management

12521.content:
Just when you thought your day couldnt get any worse, the cloud of 'Reality Check' pisses on you! Youre trapped in Hell as a personal guest of the ginormous Naga mistress, Carmen of Upper Hell. At this rate, you can probably assume that the slant in her green snake-eyes is twice as big as you!
Quite amazing something as big as her can see something as small as you!

Speaking of which, that 2000-foot snake-tail begins to slither closer to your direction... "Welcome to my domain!" she repeats with an eerie grin on her slightly scaley yet elegantly beautiful face.

At this rate, what the hell else do you do?! You beg for Carmen to send you back to the living world!
"M..M..Mistress Carmen," you slowly stutter as she leans her head closer to your tiny body, "I I I... I beg you to return me back to Earth! T T There is so much left for me to do.. and... and..."

"Welcome... to my... domain!" Carmen says yet again. It was almost as if she had trouble contemplating what you were saying!
"Uh... look, as much as I enjoy this place," you tell her, "I would really appreciate being put back on Earth. Please, oh great Lady of Hell."

"WELCOME!" she shouts, emphasizing each word, "TO! MY DOMAIN!" This might be kind of a stupid guess, but could it be that she doesnt really speak English?

Out of curiosity, you test her. "Uh... Someone set up us the bomb! All your base are belong to us! Door is locked by magic of black! IM RICK JAMES, BITCH!"
Sure enough, Carmen just simply gave you a blank stare...
Almost a minute passed before she finally replied, "...Welcome to my.. domain?"

Damn... it looks like she cant understand you. How can you plead to someone who doesnt understand a word you say? It's probably not like it would help anyway, cuz she probably isnt very intent on giving you up!

*SSSiiSSSSSSS!!!!!* Just then, you hear a rattling sound behind you. There could be only one guess what it would be...
Yep! You turn your head to see a huge snake-rattle almost the size of your house shaking in excitement at the end of Carmen's mega-long tail!

*WWWWHHHHEEEEOOOOOOOOWWWWW!!* In almost lightning speed, the end of the rattle darts you and scoops you off the ground before you could even have time to scream!
As you hang on to dear life at the end of the rattle, the tail itself gets raised up to Carmen's eye-level!

Your eyes widen as her possibly 200-foot face is staring at you with an intrigued grin.

"Welcome to my..... DOMAIN!!" Her tail-rattle swings you high up in the air! You can only scream off the top of your lungs as sent flying... only to be falling right back down..

Luckily for you (or perhaps UNluckily), Carmen is down there waiting to catch you...
12521.title: Damn you, Tower of Babel!

choices: time to pleasure your new mistress
125212.content:
You are caught in mid-air by something slimy and easily as big as a house...Carmen's forked tongue! She's gonna swallow you whole! And she does. A football stadium could've fit in her mouth, but you only have a second view of her mouth as she swallows you down. This is it, you realize. You're gonna spend the rest of eternity in the recesses of Carmen's belly.
A minute later, you fall in a huge chamber that must be Carmen's stomach. The stomach is so vast that you can't see the 'ceiling' of the stomach! There's light in the stomach, coming from torches that are lying atop great big laterns. You look around and see that there's a lake of stomach acid 4 feet in front of you. You almost landed in the stomach acid! Even though you're in hell, you're still alive...meaning that you just missed a horrible death by digestion!
"Hello, newcomer" said a female voice from behind you. You turn around and see a naga standing there. A Naga with red hair on her human half and big full D-Cup breasts.
"H..hello" you stammer. "Carmen eats her own kind?"
"Not quite" said the naga, smiling. "I am Lady Carmen, ruler of Hell"
"What?!" you ask. "but I thought..."
"That big naga we're in is actually a robot of my own disign" said Carmen.
"That thing........is a robot?" you ask not believing.
"You gotta be big to rule hell" said Carmen.
"Hold on....then why it kept saying the same thing?" you ask.
"It was?" asked Carmen. "damn it! That stupid glitch is still there, I see" She sighs heavily.
"So...you're really Carmen?" you ask.
"That's LADY Carmen if you mind" said Carmen.
Carmen is about the size of you...at least her human half is...her snake-tail goes on for 200 feet behind her.
"You said that you wanted to return to Earth?" asked Carmen. You nod eagerly.
"Well...Since you're not dead...I can't keep you here" said Carmen. "Only one situation to that problem; I'm going to kill you!"
Carmen smiles evilly and wraps her coils around you as fast as lightning.
"No...please no" you stammer. "I'll do anything if you won't eat me"
"Anything?" asked Carmen.
"Ye.." you start to say, but Carmen's coils squeeze your whole body, cutting you off.
"Alright" said Carmen. "you are to be my plaything for a month! If you do whatever I say, I shall send you back to Earth. If you don't do what I say...I'll show you what happened to Lucifer! So, what do you say to that?"
"Yes!" you manage to squeak out.
Carmen's coils side off of you and you fall to the floor, gasping for breath.
"This is gonna be fun" said Carmen, pulling you up to your feet.
"For who..?" you gasp out.
"For me, of course" said Carmen. "here's some ground news for you, my little pet: 1) You shall address me as Lady Carmen, or Ma'am....or mistress 2) You shall eat only when I eat...us naga can go for months without eating..... 3) If you mention the "G" word in front of me, I'll send you to meet the "L" word. 4) you don't have to worship me, but you will kneel everytime you and I meet. 5) No escaping from me....and, lastly 6) when not serving me, you will sleep within my second stomach. Do you argee with these terms?"
"..yes" you say with your eyes downcast.
"And cheer up a little" said Carmen. "I'm not as bad as you think I am"
"That's a matter of.." you start to say, but you slap your hands over you mouth without you doing it!
"Don't talk back to me" said Carmen. "as my pet, I get to control your body whenever I feel like it"
125212.title: The REAL Lady Carmen

1252122.content:
You'd think being the personal plaything of a woman of such high class would be the greatest thing to happen to your life since your very first trip to Disneyland.

Unfortunately, the truth hurts. You have no freedom, this woman has a snake-tail that can probably fit your entire neighborhood inside, and her 'high class' happens to be in Hell!
And if you thought THAT was painful, what if she chooses NOT to return you to Earth when the month is over?! There aint much you could do. You could revolt... and you'd probably be eaten alive.. AGAIN.

All you can do now is hope to please Car-sorry, LADY Carmen and hope that she'll keep her word. Either that, or suffer the same fate that Lucifer, Hitler, 4kids, the evil Lassie, and those illiterate bastards that created the godawful game, 'Final Fantasy Legend' the steaming cowpie in the lively grassland of Square-Enix.

You swallow hard and bow to your mistress. Good response, because it seems that Carmen is now smiling sweetly at you.
"Good. Now for your first task," Her entire 200 foot snake-tail uncurls and stands completely straight, "Would you mind giving me a nice massage?" Does she mean her ENTIRE tail??!!! That'll take forever! But then again, you now have all the time in the world.

You shrug, "Yes Lady Carmen". After taking one hard deep breath, you gently put your hands on her green and black spotted tail of hers.. It feels very scaley and wet, like the time you felt your best friend's boa constrictor.
Not being a genius when it comes to a naga's anatomy, the only idea you had was to slowly run your fingers down Carmen's tail in a rhythmic pattern...

Judging by Carmen's *Hiissssssssss* underneath her devious grin, you might have gotten lucky! She's obviously enjoying this! No reason to stop the pace now!
However, it's not long before her human torso starts slithering circles around you.

Carmen then claps her hands, "That's enough, plaything! Good, good."
You were nowhere even near finishing up the rest of her, but it's not like you mind or anything. Just means less work for you!

By the time you could sigh in relief, Carmen's head is allready two inches away from your face with those slanted eyes of hers staring into yours.
"Now for your next task," she tells you, "...I order you to take your clothes off."
"Wait... what?"
"You heard me! Take your clothes off!" she commands you.

NOW you mind! If this is going where you THINK it's going...
"But...but..." you start blushing like crazy trying to spew out the words, "Im... Im... human... and... youre... well... uh.."

"Did I just ask you to start rambling on," Carmen asks you, "Or did I just order you to TAKE YOUR CLOTHES OFF???!!!"
Sigh... you know what's gonna happen if you dont do what youre told. But how just how exactly can you pleasure one such as her?!
Sure Carmen's hot as Hell (no pun intended) But it's that bottom half of hers that weirds you out...

What do you do? What CAN you do?
1252122.title: Just how exactly do you pleasure that?

You have no choice but to do what you're told...or you'll be eaten alive! You hestitate for a minutes, than start taking your clothes off. Lady Carmen smiles when you're totally naked and looks you over. Lady Carmen's human half is hot, but that snake-tail weirds you out. Just what is she planning to do with you? Surely, she doesn't want to sleep with you...or does she?
"Good" said Carmen. "now make love to me"
"What?"

You then notice there's a slit just below Carmen's human half....no doubt, that slit is a vagina.
"Now...make love to me" said Lady Carmen. "I heard mortal men can be creative in bed"
"I..I..." you stammer.
"Lady Carmen!" yells a male voice from somewhere behind you. Carmen sighs heavily and goes behind you. You turn around to see a large TV screen with a naga on it.
"Damn it, Alexander" said Lady Carmen. "I thought I told you never to call me when I have a..."
"Excuse me, Lady" said Alexander. "The Lady Cassandra is here to see you"

The screen turns to the most beautiful woman you ever saw. She has bat-like wings on her back and the sides of her head...and she has hooves instead of feet. She also has a tail. The woman's demonic appearence doesn't make her ugly....rather, you fall in love with her the moment you see her. You stare at her silver eyes and kneel.
"Greetings, Carmen" said Cassandra.

12521221.title: Up for Sale already?

It doesnt look like this matter will be settled anytime soon. Both these demonic beauties of Hell seem to want you! But for what? As a mate?!
To be quite honest, you really dont wanna nob either one of them! It's not that you find them unattractive or something like that. Far from it! It's just that youre in Hell. And you desperately want to get back home!

At this time, Cassandra and Carmen are practically cussing each other out by now. Usually this kind of thing results in a catfight, but they're worlds apart for that to happen!
While the succubus and naga are busy with eachother, you look around in hopes of a way to escape... there's a tiny little hole in which you can see light from the outside.

Without any other options, you run toward this whole while the other two are distracted. After looking back one last time, you jump up to that hole and climb out of the opening of the Robot Carmen's stomach!

After escaping the inside of the robot, you gently slide down part of her extremely long tail before jumping to the ground and heading for the double doors!
Thankfully, the ginormous robot doesnt even notice you possibly because it's operator is still distracted.

Well, getting away from Carmen was the easy part. The HARD part would be getting away from the Naga soldiers! However, another miracle happens! Each and every one of the soldiers are fast asleep. Ha! Not even the troops of Hell are very trustworthy!

Great. That means you run into no problems sliding under the huge double doors out of the throne room.

Out of the throne room and into an endless hallway... this gives you plenty of time to think about your predicament. The only probable way out of Hell would be going back the way you came in. But how? You dont remember WHERE you came in... just waking up in a huge bed with three bizarre maids.

..Oh speak of the devil! A humongous foot blocks your path! You stop JUST before you could bump into it head-on. When you look up, you recognize the maid outfit!
Worse even, the maid definitely sees you! Judging by her bending down at looking at you in intrigue, you have her utmost attention!

Wait a sec... you recognize the maid! She was one of those maids that was with Cessa in the room you woke up in!

It's...
125212212.title: Leaving? So soon?

1252122121.content:
It's the cat-maid you saw earlier in that room! You try to run, but the maid grabs you and picks you up and raises you to her feline face! The cat-maid smiles at you, revealing her very sharp teeth! You gulp as you see the maid open her jaws wider and wider. Oh great! Looks like you're gonna be cat chow!


"Hey!" shouts a voice from down the hall. The cat-maid looks in the direction of the yell and so do you. The shout came from a naga that's coming towards the cat-maid. This naga looks young, judging by the youthful appearance of the human half. The human half of this naga is that of a thin man with reddish hair and green eyes...just like Carmen! Could this naga be related to the new Queen of Hell?

"Where's my mother, and how did you get that human?" asks the naga, eyeing you.

"Your mother is in the throne room" said the cat-maid. "I saw this human running out of the throne room. Must've escaped somehow"

"A mere human escaping from my mother?" asked th naga, and then he burst out laughing!

"Um..." you start to say.

Just then, the double doors to the throne room burst open and there's Carmen along with two of the guards! The guards each have a hand mark on thier faces...it's easy to guess that Carmen slapped them awake!

"Ah, there you are" said Carmen, snatching you from the cat-maid. "You really thought you could escape from me?" She wraps you in her coils while she looks over at her son.

"Mozzari, what are you doing here?" asked Carmen. "I thought I sent you to look after our other little problem"

At that moment, a bright flash of white light filled the hallway, blinding everyone. You feel Carmen's coils being lifted around you.

"What the--?!" shouts one of the guards, but you are too blinded to see what else is happening around you. Taking this chance, you make a run for it. A few moments later, your eyesight comes back and you find yourself running down the seemingly endless hallway. You look back and see that Carmen and the others are busy fighting with what looks like a human with wings! An angel?! You don't stop running.

You keep running until you come to a T-section. One hallway leads to the right, and the other leads to the left. You look behind yourself and see that nobody is behind you...for now. Now that you escaped Carmen, all you need to do is to escape Hell somehow...but how did you reach Hell in the first place? All you remember is waking up in that huge bed. There's gotta be a way back to Earth....right? Right now, you gotta decide which hallway to go down.
1252122121.title: An angel comes

12521221211.content:
You always were a little obsessive compulsive. Since childhood, 'right' was your lucky direction. Everything beyond the left side was BAD! In a way, right was always the 'right' way to go! Hahahaha! .....*urrghh*!
Anyway, long story short, you took the right side. You hope to God that this is the way out of Hell, because in Hell's thing's can ALWAYS get any worse!

The hallway seems to go on and on and on and on. It feels as if you constantly passed that same damn portrait of Carmen, a young Mozarri, and a slightly taller gentleman with white angelic wings sticking out of his back. Carmen's husband and Mozarri's pa, you assume.
If you didnt know any better, you'd think the hallway is repeating over and over just to keep you from escaping! Then again, the screams of that angel attacking are becoming fainter and fainter. Also, everything's getting brighter. Youre not dizzy or anything, so it's not like youre passing out... but as you run, everything just goes white!

*****************

What happened? This isnt that lovely white Mansion of Hell! It's dark, and hot.... very hot! Like the fires of Hell itself.
You can hear sounds of loud rustling all around you. Followed by lots of heavy breathing. The breathing comes from that colossal mountain above you.. It's quite a huge mountain... looks about big enough for the fake Cassandra to lie on, give or take her tail!!

Strange... this mountain has big white angelic wings, and long black hair all across it's face... wait, mountains dont have faces. ..But Hell demons do! The hair on it's head as well as it's beard cover it's face entirely... but you can actually see a big jade green eye glaring down at you. Quite a scary sight... but thankfully the angel's body is completely binded by lots of ginourmous golden shackles! Each one pinning a certain body part down. There's even one in his tongue, so eating you is out of the question!

"You.... do not belong here."
You overheard a voice in your head calling out to you! The fallen angel, perhaps?
"Yes... why are you here?!"
He speaks, but doesnt move his mouth (because he cant!)

"Uh... who... are you?" you shout to him.

"Ein. Ein Von Fel Lyaniak... the former ruler of Lower Hell."
Ein Von Fel Lyaniak? The name doesnt ring a bell, but you coulda sworn you heard the surname 'Von Fel Lyaniak' before. Nah! Must be your imagination!

"You... you do not belong in Hell. Yet you are here," you hear Ein calling out to you, "Tell me... how is my wife and child doing?"
"Who?" you ask.
"Carmen. Ruler of Upper Hell. And her child, Mozarri. You have met them, have you not?" Carmen?! That naga woman's his wife?! Last time you checked, you just escaped her oh-so-hospitable custody.. wait a minute! That reminds you... that little thing that happened before you got away. His wife made a pass at you.

"...SHE DID WHAT??!!!" Oops! He heard that thought! The jade eye widened with obvious anger pointed toward your tiny little body. But it wasnt your fault you were treated like a mistress!
"Sir, I am deeply sorry!" you plead to him, "I swear, if I knew that-"

"So it wasnt enough that she locked me away and took everything that belonged to me. Now she plans to break an eternal-bond...."
You can sense a bit of sadistic rage in Ein's voice. Just hearing it gives you the creeps, but at least he doesnt feel like killing you. ...Not like he could anyway!

"You... human. I need your help. Free of my chains and I will send you back to the living world." And now he bargains with you!
"How do I do that?" you ask, "There's like a hundred of 'em. And Im way too small."

"See that switch?" His eye moves toward the direction of a tiny little switch just big enough for anyone your size to pull! "Pull it. That will release these damned chains. Free me, human! Do it now!"
Help out a lord of the Underworld? Is that really a good idea? Then again, there's not much choice at this point. Ein could be your only way back home if you help him...

...then again, what if he's lying?!

125212212111111.content:
Well, although you were the Head Lady of the Night, you are still a gentleman deep down. You didnt bark orders at who you assume is your loyal and slightly cute servant.
"Who the hell are you?" but youre no saint!

"Hmm?" the cat girl tilted her head as she continued smiling at you, "What do you mean, your majesty? Surely you havent forgotten ol' Kura, your most loyalest maid!!"

Your head was pounding like Greed and Lust were having an orgy inside your skull! Just how long were you out, you wondered to yourself. Despite the pain, you slowly got up out of bed and rubbed your aching head. "Uh... no! Of course! Sorry, I uh... just have a hangover! That's all!"

"Not to worry, Lady Menny!" 'Kura' smiled at you and she leaned against you, "I'll fix that stubborn noggin in a jiffy!" you didnt really like her hands/paws were twitching as she edged very close to you!

"No no no no NO!' you backed away from her, "That... that's ok! I'll be fine!" Kura frowned a little as she lowered her guard, "If that is your wish, my lady. ...OH!" as if something went off in her head, she regained herself and pulled out an interesting costume from behind her back, "I made you this! It's a special outfit I made myself that's sure to impress the prince!"

Prince? "P...Prince?"
Kura tilted her head and looked at you questionably, "Uh.... yeah. Prince Dante? The crowned prince of Western Hell? The guy you invited over this evening?"
You have no idea who or what she's talking about but to avoid looking TOO suspicious (not that you arent already there), you smiled and nodded, "OH! RIGHT! Him. Of course! How could I forget?"

"It's a good thing you didnt," Kura sighed disappointedly, "you know, since youre gonna marry him and all-"
At that moment, you wanted to do a spit-take SO badly, but you werent drinking anything! You wanted to shout off the top of your lungs, but you didnt want to cast suspicions to your weird maid! ....Not only are you turned into a woman, but youre gonna marry a guy! A guy from HELL, even!! You know Ein kept this a secret from you on purpose just so he could laugh his ass off at this very moment! Word to the wise: next time you see some kinda evil ginormous angel chained to a rock in Hell, YOU LEAVE HIM THERE!

"Frankly, I dont really know what you see in a guy like Dante...." you overheard Kura mutter. Keeping your cool, you swallow hard and commence with the 'girl-talk', "Oh? Something you dont like abut him?"
"Eh, he's ok I guess... if you like that type," Kura rolled her eyes, failing to cover obvious jealousy, "he may seem cool and calming, but deep down you know he's hiding a crazy psychopathic side ready to pounce on anything with boobs!" you gritted your teeth/fangs after hearing that part, "Besides..." Kura actually grinned a little, "I'm more into the kind of person who's not afraid to take a walk on the wild side, if you know what I mean!"

You dont know and you dont wanna know! You just wanna get this mess over with...
"I...I think I better get changed!" you say as you grab Kura's costume. You hope to God this suit looks less trampy than your current one!
But just before you could start changing, you saw your maid still standing behind staring your direction in the mirror! The smile of hers is still giving you the creeps, especially since she's smiling at YOU.

"Um..." you turn your head to her, "you mind?"
Kura just shakes her head, "Not at all! Go right ahead!"
Your new maid is getting too close for comfort. Normally you dont mind her attention, but her attention toward her mistress Menyssan kinda weirds you out!
You have two choices... you can either tell her to leave so you can change in private... or you can mess with her head and just change right in front of you. Are you in the mood to play with your PERSONAL maid?

12521221211112.title: Calm? Who’s Calm?

125212212111122.content:
(A.N: I’m changing the name of girl Steven to Tiffania. Tiff or Tifa for short.)

Dear, Tiffania

I am writing this letter to give you a rundown of the world you are in. (You are no longer on the Earth that you were raised on.)

The world you are in is one of many worlds of swords and magic, like your RPGs that you liked to play, and many of the modern conveniences in your new home is run by magic.

Normally worlds like this one are called [starter worlds] by those of Celestial or Infernal persuasion. These [Starter worlds] are meant for young devils or gods to learn how to use their powers without having to worry about messing up the plans of those much higher ranked then them.

Because of the power you inherited from my former compatriots you already have the power of a high ranked Demon Lord, even if you are only [Level 1] right now. The Celestial of the world is also [Level 1], though her (Your opponent is indeed a goddess) power is equal to her level. (In other words your power is several magnitudes larger than hers. It’s funny really… your fight is like that of a [Level 1] noob, the Celestial vs a noob, you, controlling their siblings [Maxed Level] character.

You really can’t lose, the goddess’s attacks will do scratch damage at best and you have a constantly active [Regeneration] spell placed on you. (You heal faster than she can hurt you.)

Back to world info…

The world you currently inhabit is similar to the earth that you used to live in.

Except for the fact that there is a second race of humans that are only six centimeters (about 2.3 inches) tall and the world is inhabited by mythological monsters.

In the living room you’ll find a box containing two of the [Buggers], what the natives call the smaller race of humans. Feel free to use them anyway you wish to relieve yourself of stress.

Wishing you well,

Ein

P.S: Since this is a [Starter World] I will no longer be able to interact with you face to face. (I will make sure to come pick you up for the next Grand Demon gathering.)


Tiff Pov

I reread the letter twice more to make sure I really read the letter correctly.

“This… This is really happening.” I say out loud to myself as I fall back, from my sitting position, onto the bed one arm covering my eyes to block out all light. “I… I wasn’t expecting to have to play the role of Demon Lord when I agreed to Ein’s offer.”

I laid on my back for a few minutes before making my decision.

What do I do next?

1. Go play with those [Buggers] to relieve some stress.

2. Play time can wait, try to find out how to use your new powers first.
125212212111122.title: Goddess Warning

13.content:
You begin to walk away from the house, but before you even know what's going on, you hear the sound of flapping wings from above you. Looking up, you see what appears to be a young woman with large black bat wings flying right toward you! You didn't know exactly what was happening, but your instincts were telling you to run. You immediately began to flee from the flying bombshell behind you, but you soon felt the smooth skin of her hands gripping your shoulders. Her speed was incredible to have caught up with you so quickly, but the girl firmly held you by your shoulders and began to lift you off of the ground.

The next thing you knew, you were being carried through the air back toward the mansion at an alarming speed. The bat-girl carried you into the building through an open window before releasing you and letting you land on the floor. It was here that you got your first good look at her. At first she looked like any ordinary woman, minus the bat wings, but soon her appearance began to change. While her figure earlier wasn't anything special, she was still fairly attractive. Now her appearance was becoming more voluptuous and sexy than anything you had ever seen before.

Her modest B-cup chest expanded to a soft-yet-firm pair of perfectly round D-cups, and her figure molded into a seductive hourglass shape. However, that's when things started getting even weirder. Her fingernails extended into inch-long claws, and her feet morphed into a pair of hooves. The bat-wings on her back changed from black to red, and an identical (albeit smaller) pair appeared on the sides of her head. Her blond hair lengthened to reach down to her waist, and her clothing changed into an incredibly sexy black leather corset and a pair of long purple stockings that reached down to her ankles. The most noticeable change, however, was the simple fact that the formerly petite 5'6'' girl had grown a full foot taller and reached 6'6'', now standing a good 4 inches taller than you yourself.

As you stared at this figure of beauty in utter awe of her body's sheer perfection, she began to speak to you in a voice so beautiful that it would be fitting of an angel.

"So Steven, I see that you like my true form..."

"How do you know my name?!" You ask in shock.

The woman before you simply laughs.

"It's quite simple really; I'm able to read people's minds. Normally it takes a bit of effort to find just the info I'm looking for, but you seem to be very attracted to me, so your mind is like an open book to me! And yes, my girls here are as real as any you'll ever find..." She said, taking massive breasts in her hands and bouncing them up and down hypnotically.

You were completely entranced by this woman's goddess-like beauty, and you found yourself incapable of drawing your gaze away from her flawless breasts. The woman laughed once again before walking up to you and seductively tracing a circle on your chest with her index finger. She then put her head right up next to your ear, pressing her plush bosom against your chest as she leaned in toward you, and whispered into your ear in a soft and seductive tone.

"Well Steven, would you like to get to know this body of mine a little more... Intimately?"

By now you were starting to get somewhat nervous. You had never met this woman before in your life, she had just scooped you off of the ground like a hawk catching a mouse, and now she was coming onto you like this?! You quickly backed away from her and decided to confront her about what was going on.

"Listen Miss, I want to know who you are and what you plan on doing with me! Right now!"

"Oh, but of course! I completely forgot to introduce myself! My name is Cassandra, and I am the owner of this mansion. As for what I want with you, that's a bit more complicated. You see, I am actually a succubus, and I want you to live here with me as my personal..."
13.title: Spirited away by a succubus?!
