Someone comes through the mysterious doorway
Someone enters the attic from downstairs
131.content:
You simply stare at her for a moment after she said that she wants you to become her personal boyfriend. You then realize what she had just said. She was a succubus? Wasn't that a female demon that seduces men into sex and then drain their life energy? You've heard of succubuses before. Adam's first wife--Lilith--was said to be a succubus. Of course, the Bible failed to mention that little tidbit. Before Eve was around, Lilith was there in the Garden of Eden and married Adam...or at least had a fling with her. Adam had refused to be on the "bottom" of the relationship, and so he had rejected her. Lilith was insanely jealous of Eve and was said to kill the babies of the world.
"Succubi is the correct plural form" corrected Cassandra. "as for Lilith, she's the queen of the succubi. She and Adam had seven children. All succubi are related to Lilith if you look far back enough"
"I bet she and Adam got along well" you say.
"Lilith truly loved Adam" said Cassandra, turning away from you. That gives you the chance to look around. Clearly the two of you are in the attic of the house. The attic was fairly large and was about the size of a regular floor. It was lighted by several bald light bulbs that hung from the ceiling. At one corner of the attic was a large cedar chest with an ornate design on the lid. The design on the lid seemed to be a scene in a forest glade of two nude humans with a third figure hiding behind a rather thick tree trunk. The third figure was shockingly beautiful. In another corner of the large attic stood what looked to be a doorway without a door frame around it. The doorway was filled with a watery substance...very much like the stargate in the movie and TV shows.
"That leads to other dimensions" said Cassandra, looking over what you were looking at.
"Dimensions?"
"Never mind that now" said Cassandra. "Here, let me take you on a tour of my lovely house. This house belonged to my father who was a mortal. He came from a fairly rich family"

132.content:
"...and I want you to live here with me as my personal servant" said Cassandra.

"You mean you're not human?" you blurt out. Of course she wasn't human....she had hoofs for legs for goodness sake and she just shifted her appearance. You seem more interested in the fact that you just met a demonic being then what she had just said. She wanted to live with her as her servant? What did that mean? Does she want a simple butler like Alfred in Batman....or does she want someone more than a butler?

"A combination of butler and servant" said Cassandra. "I never had a servant before.....can you imagine? Me, who has lived for hundreds of years and I never had a servant"

"Hundreds of years?" you ask. "you don't look any older than I do"

Cassandra smiled a smile that made you want to melt. You then nod and agree to be her servant on the spot. You'll do anything for this charming lady!

"I'm so glad that you want to be my servant" said Cassandra. Then, she cleared her throat. "Well then, come along and I'll show you the rest of the house"

The Victorian mansion that Cassandra owns has four floors counting the tower and the wine cellar. Cassandra takes you on a tour of her house, with you eagerly following her. The room where she flew you to was at the top of the tower...it was a large room but it was crowded due to a table and four chairs around it. Next, came the third floor which had bedrooms and Cassandra's personal study and rather large library. The second floor had more bedrooms, the servants' quarters and Cassandra's bedroom (the servants' quarters are directly opposite of Cassandra's bedroom). The ground floor had a large kitchen, dinning room, drawing room, living room, and a small cloakroom. The wine cellar had three rooms to it; two of them held human-made wine while the third room had wine made from demons and not fit for humans to drink. Cassandra warns you about drinking the demonic wine. Lastly, Cassandra showed you one last room that was in the wine cellar, accessible only by a secret door. In the secret room, there was a huge crystal ball sitting on a stand for it. Inside the crystal ball were swirling colors at the moment.
"This is my pride and joy" said Cassandra. "I have only recently made this" She rubbed the crystal ball.
"What is it?" you ask.
"A portal to other dimensions" said Cassandra. "it was very hard to come into this plane of existence you know. This device lets me open portals to other planes of existence. Makes it a lot easier for me to go to my real home"
"This isn't your real home?" you ask.
"Oh no" said Cassandra. "my true home is in the Netherworld....or hell, as you mortals call it"
"If I'm going to be your servant, why show me this?" you ask.
"As my servant, you'll have to know the complete layout of the house" said Cassandra.
"I see" you say. "and what are my.......wages?"
"Isn't it enough to be a servant for a lovely woman like me?" asked Cassandra.
Before you can answer, the doorbell to the house rang. "Get that, will you?"
"You expecting someone this late?" you ask as you start to walk out of the secret room with Cassandra close behind.
"No" said Cassandra.
You and Cassandra head for the ground floor, and you go to answer the door. Cassandra goes into the drawing room, which has a huge fireplace in it. You approach the door and open it. Who--or what--is at the door?
132.title: Servant Steve

133.content:
You blink several times after hearing that this succubus--Cassandra--wants you as her personal pet. Her pet?

"Your pet?" you ask, your voice shaking slightly. You don't like the sound of becoming anybody's pet, much less the pet of a demonic woman. And yet, you can't help but think that perhaps being her pet wouldn't be as bad as it sounded. "you mean, you're going to change me into an animal?"

"Perhaps" said Cassandra with a wicked glint in her eye. "perhaps not. I can change you into any animal imaginable...even a mythological one. But if you want to stay a human being.....you'll have to beg for me to keep you human"

"Beg?" you ask.

"Beg" said Cassandra. "as in, get on your knees and beg me to keep you human. I quite like the sight of human males on their knees"


Before you can say anything else, Cassandra waves a hand and a leather collar appears in her hand. The collar is black with red letters spelling out your name, The collar has a ten-foot leash attached to it. The collar also has four-inch spikes all around it save for the part of it that has your name. The sight of the collar sends a shiver down your spine and you have a metal image of yourself as a dog wearing that collar. You very much like to remain human.

"I take good care of my pets" said Cassandra, seeing the uncertainly on your face. "you'll be safe and happy at my side"

Without another word, you get on your knees in front of Cassandra and beg her to allow you to remain human. You even kiss her right hoof, which makes her chuckle. You spend a good five minutes begging at Cassandra's feet......err....hooves. Then she comes to her decision.

"Alright, I've come to a decision" she says with a grin.

"What have you decided?" you question. Before she answers, Cassandra lifts up her hoof and slams it into your chest. You feel the wind get knocked out of you as you crumple in pain. Before you can recover, you feel the hoof once more as she firmly lowers it onto your covered neck.

"That's for making me question my decision, pet."

"But you told me to beg!"

"Perhaps I did, but the first rule of being my pet is to never question my rule."

You shut up, not wanting to risk her wrath once more.

"Now then, as I said, I treat my pets well, but only if they remained well trained. Speaking of which, I never told you the decision. I have chosen to make you into an animal!"

You groan in disappointment. It was bad enough to be under her control, but as an animal as well? You could hardly imagine what that would be like. Seeing no protest from you, Cassandra snaps her fingers. A bright blue ray of light shoots out from the tips and strikes you squarely in your pained chest. Worse still, you haven't become any old pig. Judging by you miniscule size, you've become a piglet. Though your mental faculties seem intact, you still shudder at the thought of being a child once more.

She pulls you tightly against her chest, pressing your small snout against her meaty bosom. You can't help but imagine it must be a little awkward for her, but you aren't complaining.

"You are so much cuter than I imagined!" she says. "I haven't transformed someone into a piglet in forever. I can't wait to play with ya, babe."

"Did you really have to make me a baby?" you try to ask only to let out a series of squeals. Luckily, Cassandra can somehow understand your voice.

"Of course, silly. This way I can keep you around for longer, since you're younger and all. Plus, I'll get to fatten you up myself!"

The mere thought of being fattened up by her as some plaything sends your body into a shudder. Frankly, you fear spending the rest of your life like this, though it's not as if you can really act against her. All you can do is wait and hope something comes up.

Finished snuggling with you, Cassandra lightly places you back on the ground. With a light tug of your leash, she orders you forward and the two of you make your way to the door. Though she never said, it turns out that she's taking you to...

Cassandra leads you back outside her house and going behind the house. The night air seems cooler now than it was the last time you were out here--which was about ten minutes ago give or take. Or maybe it was longer than that. Your little feet has no trouble in keeping up with Cassandra. Now behind the house, Cassandra is leading you to what looks like a pig pen. A rather large pig pen.

The pig pen is a small house that's only one story tall. It's about as wide as a regular house and about twice as long. You see a huge mud patch near the pigpen but you see no pigs in the mud at the moment. Cassandra opens the pigpen and walks inside with you. The inside of the pigpen is extremely dirty and quite smelly but neither of those facts seem to bother you. There are what looks like three pens in this pigpen. Two of the pens each have gigantically fat pigs in them. These two pigs are much fatter than any other pig that you ever seen....not that you've seen that many pigs in your life. Each of the fat pigs must weigh at least 500 pounds! You start to wonder if Cassandra likes to eat bacon which sends a shiver through your little body.

"Here we are" said Cassandra. "welcome to your new home, my new pet. Sorry there isn't any food around here now. You'll have to wait until morning to be fed" Cassandra leads you to the third pen which is the smallest. The other two pens are a good forty feet square while the third pen is only twenty feet square.

"Now, make me proud and be sure to eat all of the food you'll be given" said Cassandra, smiling. "I want you to become the fattest pig in the world! Even bigger than those two useless ones" With that, Cassandra leaves you in the pen and blows a kiss goodnight.


For the next few minutes, the pigpen is silent.

"You hear that, Dom?" asks a voice. It's coming from one of the two fat pigs. "she plans to make the newcomer even fatter than us"

"So what?" asks the other pig. "she's just going to eat us sooner or later"

"She's going to eat us?!" you ask in a trembling voice....but all that comes out are squeals.

"Of course" said Dominick . "what else do you do with a pig? I hear she likes her food alive"

"I'm Ralph and this is Dominick" said the other pig. "we were once human like you until the mistress turned us into pigs"

"Nice to meet you two" you say. "my name is Steven"

"And I'm Charlotte" came a new voice. You look around until you spot a rat in your pen. The rat--Charlotte--must've came from that hole in the corner of the pen. Charlotte looks bigger than any rat you ever saw.

"Were you a human too?" you ask the rat.

"Goodness, no" laughed the rat. "I've always been a rat. I live under Cassandra's house in a series of tunnels made by my family for ten generations now. Welcome to the family"

"Hold on" you say. "how can I understand you now?"

"Magic I guess" said Charlotte.

You can see at least three towns on the horizon and what must be a mountain even further away. It might've been your imagination but you could've sworn you saw the mountain move away from you as the two of you looked around to spot any more clues.

"Not much to go on" you say. "I can't find any more tracks"

"Me neither" said Cassandra. "which is puzzling to me. Oh well, I'm sure we'll find the thief soon enough"

152.content:
The cool night air suits you. You have no qualms about being in daylight, but you much prefer traveling at night. Perhaps because you're a succubus...and not just any succubus...you're Morrigan, Queen of all Succubi....and you're not altogether evil. You like to prey upon the weaker humans, but you don't hold humans as a lesser race...rather, you treat your human lovers with respect and you're friendly to them...for the most part. You travel mostly by night, going to town to town to feed off humans. As a succubus, you're able to lure mortal men to you and make love to them...and feed off thier life force while they reach thier climax. You can change your appearance at will, and no mortal man can resist your charms.
You're in a remote area of up-state New York, looking for a handsome human to seduce. While you're not a lesibian, you're more than willing to lure a female human to you if you can't find a male. You're flying over some dense woods when you spot a car broken-down by the road. You also see that a human male working on the car. The human is in his late 20's, judging by the smell of him. You smile, and decide to land a short distance from the human. When you land, you also smell that there's another succubus somewhere in the woods. A succubus, living in up-state New York? You chuckle as you change into your human self. You decide to have some fun with the human first.
You walk the half a mile to the broken-down car and the male human. As luck would have it, it looks like the human male is alone, which makes you grin.

154.title: Different Monster

choices: You offer Steven a lift...in your dragon form!
You both hear a noise from the surrounding woods
15431.content:
It isn't easy being a dragon in this day and age. There used to be thousands and thousands of dragons in the world of all shapes and sizes. Most dragons lived in Europe in the "olden days" as it were because the population of humans were much lower then. Then the modern age came along and the human population had exploded. Dragons--the few that had survived--had to be very careful because if humans knew that there were still dragons around, they would hunt them down. Humans fear what they cannot know or control.
You are Nithoggisapahyl but you much prefer the shorter name of "Nithog". You are a female dragon that's 250 years old and you make your home in the Catskill Mountains in the state of New York. 250 years for a dragon is basically like an older human teenager of 18 or 19. Dragons practically live forever. In dragon form, you are a little over 200 feet long from head to tail and have a wingspan of nearly 300 feet. You are dark green on top and lighter green on your underside. While in dragon form, you are practically invincible due to your tough hide and scales. You can produce near hurricane-like winds from your wings.
Like all dragons, you can assume a human disguise. You can alter your humanoid form in any way you wish; you can appear as a normal human or you can make yourself into a hybrid of dragon and human.
You have several human friends that know your real nature. You prefer to eat cows and other large herbivores than humans because humans taste nasty to you....and yet you've eaten more than a few humans during your lifetime because you were mad at them.

You're soaring over a forest somewhere in the state of New York when you catch the scent of a human. Looking below you see that a human male is working on a car that clearly has broken down. You are virtually silent in the night sky so the human hasn't spotted you yet. Not wanting to scare the human in your dragon form, you keep flying until you're out of sight from the human. Then you land in a small clearing in the forest and turn into a human female complete with clothes. In your human form, you stand at 5'6" and have a thin frame. Your hair is long and red. You walk to the road and towards the human.

"Need some help?" you ask as you approach the human. He has short brown hair and is probably 6'2"

"Not unless you have a tow truck" said the human, glancing back at you as he works under the hood of the car. "I can't figure out why my car decided to break down" here, the human stands at his full height and turns at you. "I'm Steven by the way and you are?"

"Call me Carla" you say. Carla is what you call yourself in your human form.

"Well, Carla" said Steven. "we're not going anywhere in my car. Do you live around here? You just came right out of nowhere"

"I live nearby" you say.

"Do you have a phone at your place?"

"Take a look around" you say. "you see any power lines? This is the boondocks, bucko"

Steven sighs. "Just my luck"
15431.title: A Different Start

info.brief_description: Your car breaks down in the middle of nowhere...,.
info.description:
Your name is Steven Johnson and your car breaks down after going on vacation. You're out in the middle of nowhere, but you see a Victorian House in the distance. Do you go to the Victorian house, or go elsewhere for help?


----------------

List of Characters

Steven (you) -- 6'2", brown eyes, brown hair, age 26 ....you're going home after a vacation to Niarga Falls. You make a wrong turn somewhere and end up in a thick forest and your car breaks down at night. You take a flashlight and search for a house to call a tow truck. You spot an old Victorian house in a clearing. Will you enter this house, which is home to a succubus?

Cassandra --- 6'6", Blue hair, silver eyes --- The owner of the Victorian house is actually a succubus. She looks just like Morrigan from the Darkstalkers video game, complete with dragon-like wings on her back and the sides of her head. She has hoofs instead of feet and is VERY attractive to you. She has claws instead of hands. As a succubus, Cassandra lives on the life energy of mortals by having sex with them to the point of exuastion or even death. Cassandra can also change her form into anything (or anyone) at will. Cassandra can also read your mind with ease. Despite her demonic appearance, she's not evil...she's just a little too mischivous. She rarely kills her 'victims'. Looks to be 25 in her demonic form.

Dennis -- 5'8" Red hair, blue eyes --- Cassandra's housekeeper for the past 11 years. Dennis came to Cassandra just like you did...with a broken-down car. He's in love with Cassandra and is jealous with you for showing up. Looks to be around 30.

Jenkins -- 5'5" -- Silver eyes, gray hair --- One of the gargoyle statues that rest atop the roof of Cassandra's house. Works as an intruder alarm by telling Cassandra about any and all intruders near the house.

You can add other characters if you wish
----------

The Rules

1) Don't kill off anyone too quickly
2) Vore, GTS, GT, Unbirth, Shrinking, Weight Gain are all allowed
3) I prefer soft vore here, but you can go hard vore if you wish
4) Digestion is allowed. Scat is allowed.
5) use good grammar please
6) have fun!
7) Don't stick a fork in a wall socket
